ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Chocolate-Pistachio Torte with Warm Chocolate Ganache
ingredients: ['12 ounces shelled unsalted natural pistachios (untoasted; about 2 2/3 cups)', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 large egg whites', '12 ounces bittersweet (not unsweetened) or semisweet chocolate, chopped', '1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature', '6 large eggs, separated', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons (packed) golden brown sugar', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '15 ounces bittersweet (not unsweetened) or semisweet chocolate, chopped', 'Chopped pistachios']
directions: Finely grind nuts and sugar in processor. Add egg whites and blend well. DO AHEAD Can be made 3 days ahead. Transfer to small bowl, cover, and refrigerate. Preheat oven to 350F. Butter 8-inch-diameter springform pan. Line pan bottom with parchment paper; butter paper. Place chocolate in medium metal bowl set over saucepan of simmering water and stir until chocolate is melted and smooth. Remove from over water. Cool chocolate to lukewarm. Measure 1/3 cup pistachio paste and transfer to small bowl (cover and reserve for another use). Place remaining pistachio paste in large bowl; add butter. Using electric mixer, beat until blended. Beat in egg yolks, then melted chocolate. Using clean dry beaters, beat egg whites with salt in another large bowl until soft peaks form. Gradually add 2 tablespoons sugar, beating until firm peaks form. Sift brown sugar over and fold in. Using flexible rubber spatula, fold egg-white mixture into chocolate mixture in 4 additions; transfer batter to prepared pan. Bake torte until center is slightly puffed and tester inserted into center comes out with some batter still attached, about 1 hour. Cool torte completely in pan on rack. DO AHEAD Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and let stand at room temperature. Bring cream to simmer in small saucepan. Remove from heat; add chocolate and whisk until smooth. DO AHEAD Can be made 1 day ahead. Chill. Rewarm before using. Cut torte into wedges; place on plates. Pour warm ganache over. Sprinkle with pistachios and serve.

title: Green Punch

directions: Mix 1 pk lime kool aid, l can frozen lime aid, sugar and water. This can be made ahead. Prepare second package of kool-aid. Freeze in ring mold. When ready to serve mix lime mixture, 4 cups water, ginger ale. Mix in punch bowl. Add frozen kool aid ring and sherbet.

title: Homespun Meat Pie

directions: Combine beef, mushrooms, egg, onion, bread crumbs and salt. Press mixture into 9-inch glass pie dish. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Reduce to 350\u00b0. Mash potatoes, milk, cheese, parsley and salt. Fill meat pie. Bake an additional 15 minutes.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Frozen Kool-Aid Dessert
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1 package (.13 ounce) Kool-Aid, any flavor', '2 cups milk', '1 cup heavy whipping cream']
directions: In a bowl, combine the sugar, Kool-Aid and milk; stir until the sugar and Kool-Aid are dissolved. Pour into a freezer container. Freeze for 1 hour or until slushy. In a bowl, beat cream until stiff. Add Kool-Aid mixture; mix just until combined. Return to the freezer container. Freeze until solid, about 2 hours.

directions: Bring water, sugar and Kool-Aid to a boil. Thicken with mixer of 3/4 cup clear jell and 1 cup water. Add jello the same flavor as Kool-Aid.

KRAFT Light Mayo Reduced Fat Mayonnaise', '2 piece lettuce leaves', "1 medium apple King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.87 thru 02/09", '6 oz. nonfat yogurt, favorite flavor', '1 pouch , or 8 fl oz (1 cup) drinking water']

directions: Mix Kool-Aid, sugar and water. Add juice, ginger ale and sherbet. (Coordinate flavor of Kool-Aid with sherbet; lemon lime Kool-Aid with lime sherbet, etc.)

title: Kool-Aid Punch
ingredients: ['6 pkg. lemon lime Kool-Aid', '2 gal. water', '2 cans frozen orange juice', '2 cans unsweetened pineapple juice', '1 c. sugar per pack', '2 (2 liter) bottles ginger ale', '2 cans grapefruit juice']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid, sugar and water, dissolving fully. Add juices; let set overnight. Add ginger ale just before serving. Kool-Aid may be substituted according to color scheme.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Country Frittata
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 lb cooked potato, diced small', '1/4 cup diced ham', '1/4 teaspoon minced garlic', '8 eggs', 'salt and pepper', '1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. In a 12\  non stick skillet with oven proof handle, heat olive oil until hot and add the potatoes, ham and garlic. Saute just until browned. In a bowl, whisk eggs and pour over the potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper and cook over medium low heat, occasionally sliding a spatula around the edge of the pan to loosen the frittata as it cooks. When nearly set, sprinkle with cheese and place in oven for 2 to 4 minutes or until evenly set and slightly golden. Note: If you do not have a skillet with an oven proof handle, wrap two layers of aluminum foil over your handle before baking.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Strawberry Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid', '3 c. sugar', '1 small can pineapple juice', '1 small bottle ginger ale', 'orange sherbet']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid and sugar with enough of water to make 2 quarts. Mix the other ingredients to the Kool-Aid. Add orange sherbet before serving.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Dinosaur Eggs For Children
ingredients: ['hard-boiled eggs', 'Kool-Aid']
directions: Gently crack the hard-boiled eggs. Put the cracked eggs in a small bowl or cup of Kool-Aid. Cover bowl with Saran Wrap and refrigerate for 24 hours. Take eggs out of bowl and remove egg shells. The eggs will have a marbled look and taste like Kool-Aid.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Super Protein Peach Shake/smoothie
ingredients: ['4 -5 frozen peach slices', '18 ounce packagepeach Kool-Aid (I used Kroger Brand)', '1 tablespoon powdered soy protein concentrate', '1 cup soymilk, as needed (I use Silk Unsweetened)', '1 tablespoon Splenda sugar substitute', '2 tablespoons vanilla soy yogurt or 2 tablespoons tofu yogurt', '1 -2 ice cube']
directions: Blend the peaches, peach Kool Aid, Soy Protein Powder, Soy Milk, Splenda, Soy or tofu yogurt, blend until smooth. Add ice, blend again.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Quiche Lorraine
ingredients: ['1 frozen pie shell', '6 strips bacon', '3 eggs', '3/4 cup whole milk', '1/2 cup heavy cream', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '4 ounces shredded Gruyere 4 oz. per 1 cup']
directions: Preheat the oven to 400\u00b0F. Arrange a rack to the lowest position in the oven. Poke the bottom of the frozen pie shell with a fork, and place on a baking sheet. Pro tip: Docking a pie crust by poking holes in it with a fork allows steam to escape, avoiding bubbles in the crust while baking. Bake the pie shell for 12-14 minutes or according to package directions on the bottom rack of oven, until the bottom is slightly puffed. Remove from the oven and set aside. Reduce the oven to 350\u00b0F. Place two sheets of paper towels on a large dinner plate, and set aside. Set a large skillet over medium-high heat. Arrange the bacon strips in the skillet. Fry the bacon until brown and crisp, about 6-8 minutes, flipping once. Transfer the bacon strips onto the paper-towel lined dinner plate. In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, heavy cream, salt, and black pepper, until smooth. Using clean hands, crumble the bacon into small pieces. Place the crumbled bacon and shredded cheese into the egg and milk mixture. Fold with a rubber spatula until the bacon and cheese are evenly distributed. Pour the egg, bacon, and cheese mixture into the pie shell. Cover the edges of the pie shells with pie guards or strips of aluminum foil to avoid burning or over-browning the crust. Bake the quiche for 45-55 minutes on the bottom rack of oven, until the top is firm and golden brown. Check to see that quiche is done. Remove from oven or add time as needed. Allow to cool for at least 30 minutes at room temperature before slicing and serving. Leftover quiche may be stored covered in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Punch For 100

directions: Mix all together and serve chilled.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Bride's Pink Punch Recipe
ingredients: ['3 ounce. box strawberry Jello', '1 c. boiling water', '1 pack unsweetened strawberry kool-aid', '2 quarts. cool water', '2 1/2 c. sugar', '46 ounce. can pineapple juice', '10 ounce. 7-Up', '2 pts. pineapple sherbet']
directions: Dissolve Jello in boiling water. Mix kool-aid, cool water and sugar. Add in Jello with kool-aid and pineapple juice. Store till ready to use. Add in 7-Up and spoonfuls of sherbet when ready to serve. Serves 35 people. (To make Peach Punch, substitute orange Jello for strawberry Jello and orange kool-aid for strawberry kool-aid.)

title: Poppy Seed Dressing

directions: Blend all ingredients together until mixed well, dressing should be thick. Store in tightly covered jar in refrigerator. Stir well before using. Makes about 1 1/2 cups.

directions: For red punch, use cherry Kool-Aid. For green punch, use lime Kool-Aid.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Homemade Cocoa

directions: Mix Kool-Aid according to directions on can. Chill. Add equal parts of Kool-Aid to equal parts of chilled ginger ale.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Punch

directions: Pour Kool-Aid into an empty 2 liter bottle. Pour sugar into bottle with the Kool-Aid. Fill the bottle of Kool-Aid and sugar with warm water to the top. Cap bottle and shake really well and freeze overnight.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Tutti Frutti Ice
ingredients: ['1 pkg. lime Kool-Aid', '1 pkg. orange Kool-Aid', '1 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid', '2/3 c. sugar', '1 bottle Sprite']
directions: You make up each package of Kool-Aid using 2/3 cup of sugar in each pitcher of Kool-Aid. You pour the Kool-Aid in ice trays and freeze it. After frozen, you put each kind of ice in glass and pour in some Sprite, then drink.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Blue Bayou Gumbo
ingredients: ['1/4 cup butter', '1/4 cup flour', '1 cup onion, diced (about 2)', '1 cup celery, diced', '2 quarts chicken stock', '1 cup okra, sliced', '12 ounces meat (cubed chicken, andouille sausage and or shrimp)', '1 (6 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '1 teaspoon cajun seasoning', '1 teaspoon gumbo file', '1 tablespoon salt, divided use (OR to taste)', '2 cups rice, cooked', 'optional', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3/4 lb green bell pepper, diced', '1 tablespoon garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons parsley, chopped']
directions: Place room-temperature butter in a small saute pan or saucepan over very low heat. Slowly whisk in flour until very smooth. Continue whisking until the roux begins to brown. Add the onion and celery. Cook for 5 minutes. Add the stock and stir. Simmer for 10 minutes. Add remaining ingredients (except file and salt) and return to a simmer. Adjust salt to taste. If you are adding seafood, add it at the very end and make sure it is completely cooked. Add file. Mix well and serve over rice.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Koolaid Cookies
ingredients: ['12 cup butter or 12 cup margarine', '1 cup granulated sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '2 12 teaspoons baking powder', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '12 cup low-fat milk', '14 teaspoon salt', "12 teaspoon unsweetened Kool-Aid (don't use grape flavor)"]
directions: Cream butter and sugar together. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt and Kool-Aid together. Mix the flour mixture alternately with milk to the butter mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a 375F oven for 12 minutes. KOOL-AID FROSTING:. Blend 1 cup powdered sugar with 1/4 teaspoons Kool-Aid powder, then add 1 teaspoon soft butter and 2 tablespoons low fat milk and beat until creamy. Spread on cooled cookies.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: German Chocolate Cookies
ingredients: ['1 (18 1/4 ounce) package German chocolate cake mix', '2 eggs', '1/2 cup butter or 1/2 cup margarine, melted', '1/2 cup quick-cooking oats', '1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips', '1/2 cup raisins (optional)']
directions: \ In a mixing bowl, combine the dry cake mix, eggs, butter and oats. Stir in the chocolate chips and raisins. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart onto an ungreased baking sheet. Bakew at 350 degrees for 9-11 minutes or untill set. Cool for 5 minutes; remove to wire racks.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Punch

directions: Mix Kool-Aid according to package directions. Combine Kool-Aid and pineapple juice. Just before serving, add ginger ale and mix well.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Kool-Aid Paint
ingredients: ['1 (1/4 ounce) package Kool-Aid (any flavour or colour you want to use)', '1/2 tablespoon hot water']
directions: Pour Kool-Aid in a very small container (Glad Mini Round/4oz containers work very well). Add water. Stir well until the Kool-Aid is dissolved. Have fun!

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Ruby'S Fruit Punch
ingredients: ['3 packets cherry Kool-Aid', 'amount of sugar required on packet', '1/2 amount water recommended', '2 oranges, diced and juiced', '1 1/2 lemons, diced and juiced', 'ginger ale']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid, sugar and water. Stir to dissolve sugar and Kool-Aid. Add juices of oranges and lemons. Add ginger ale to required strength.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Strawberry-Pineapple Punch
ingredients: ['3 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid', '1 large can pineapple juice']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid according to package directions. Add pineapple juice to Kool-Aid mixture.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Punch
ingredients: ['1 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid', '1 big can pineapple juice', '1 large ginger ale']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid as directed on package. Add pineapple juice and chill. Before serving, add chilled ginger ale to Kool-Aid and pineapple juice.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Smoked Salmon & Cream Cheese Omelet
ingredients: ['12 cup egg white', '2 teaspoons fat free cream cheese', '1 teaspoon canola oil', '14 ounce smoked salmon', 'salt & pepper']
directions: Whisk together egg whites, cream cheese, salt & pepper. Pour oil into a non-stick skillet and turn to coat. Heat over medium-high flame. Add egg whites mixture to the skillet, gently pushing egg whites toward the center as they cook. When eggs are almost set, place smoked salmon on top. Cover the pan, and cook for 30 seconds. Remove the lid, and add pepper. Slide omelet onto a cutting board to fold it in half. Then place on a plate and serve.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Easy Punch

directions: Mix Kool-Aid, sugar and water. Add pineapple juice and chill. (One package cherry Kool-Aid and one package raspberry Kool-Aid make a good flavor combination. For green punch, use lemon-lime Kool-Aid.) Pour over ice in punch bowl. Add chilled ginger ale. Serve at once. Makes 50 half cup servings.

directions: Mix Kool-Aid according to package directions. Pour small amount in Bundt pan and freeze to make ice ring for punch. Mix the remaining ingredients with Kool-Aid.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Vegetable Sandwich(Party Sandwich)

directions: Mix and let stand in refrigerator overnight; spread on round pieces of bread and garnish with a pimento.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Kool-Aid Pie

directions: Combine Kool-Aid and Eagle brand milk until Kool-Aid is well mixed. Add Cool Whip and fold in until well mixed. Pour into crust and chill. If adding fruit, fold in last, before putting mixture in the crust. Try drained pineapple with orange Kool-Aid, or drained black cherries with black cherry Kool-Aid.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Applesauce Biscuits
ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons shortening', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce', '1/4 cup sour cream', '1/2 cup cheddar cheese, grated']
directions: Sift together the first four ingredients. Cut in shortening. Combine the rest of the ingredients except the cheese and add to the dry ingredients. Mix gently but quickly. Turn out on a floured surface and knead for a few seconds. Roll out to 1/2 in ch think. Cut with 2 inch biscuit cutter. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with the cheese. Bake at 400 for 15 minute.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter

directions: Mix Kool-Aid and freeze in a plastic milk jug. Set Kool-Aid out of freezer about 1 hour before serving time. Cut away plastic jug. Place Kool-Aid in punch bowl. Add ginger ale and stir until slushy. Scoop in sherbet.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Breakfast Casserole

directions: Combine ingredients. Pour into greased 9x13 glass pyrex dish. Refrigerate 12 hours or overnight. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: KOOL-AID Tie-Dye Easter Eggs
ingredients: ['2 env. (6 g each) Kool-Aid Unsweetened Drink Mix, any red colour (try Cherry, Black Cherry, Strawberry or Tropical Punch flavour)', '2 env. (6 g each) Kool-Aid Unsweetened Drink Mix, any orange colour (try Orange, Mango or Peach flavour)', '2 env. (6 g each) Kool-Aid Unsweetened Drink Mix, any yellow or green colour (try Lemonade, Pina or Lemon-Lime flavour)', '2 env. (6 g each) Kool-Aid Unsweetened Drink Mix, any blue colour (try Mixed Berry or Ice Blue Raspberry Lemonade flavour)', '1/2 cup water, divided', '1-1/2 doz. hard-cooked eggs, cooled']
directions: Mix contents of 2 (same-flavoured) Kool-Aid envelopes with 2 Tbsp. water in 3/4- to 1-cup container; stir to dissolve drink mixes. Repeat in 3 separate containers with remaining Kool-Aid envelopes. Place eggs on cooling rack in sink; rinse eggs with tap water. Spoon Kool-Aid mixtures, 1 at a time, over wet eggs to create tie-dye patterns. Repeat with remaining eggs. Pour a little tap water over each egg to set colours. Use tongs to transfer eggs to paper towel-covered baking sheet to dry. Rinse sink immediately as needed.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Flavored Frostings

directions: Whip ingredients to a fluffy texture. Add any flavored Kool-Aid to frosting and whip more. Frosting will have the Kool-Aid flavor.

directions: *If using sugar-free Kool-Aid, no sugar needed. If using regular Kool-Aid, sweeten just as you would regular Kool-Aid.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter

directions: Mix Kool-Aid, Eagle Brand milk and Cool Whip and pour into graham cracker crust! Other flavors of Kool-Aid may be used for a variety of tastes.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Crock Pot Spinach Casserole

directions: Grease crock pot with margarine or PAM. Combine all ingredients in crock pot. Cook on high for 1 hour. Stir. Cook on low for 3 1/2 to 5 hours.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Overnight Cinnamon Rolls I
ingredients: ['1 cup milk', '1/3 cup butter', '1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast', '1/2 cup white sugar', '4 1/2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 eggs', 'FILLING:', '3/4 cup brown sugar', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 cup raisins', 'GLAZE:', '1 teaspoon light corn syrup', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', "1 1/4 cups sifted confectioners' sugar", '2 tablespoons half-and-half cream']
directions: Heat the milk in a small saucepan until it bubbles, then remove from heat. Add the butter and stir until melted; let cool until lukewarm. In a large mixing bowl, dissolve the yeast in the milk mixture. Add the sugar, 3 cups of flour, salt and eggs; stir well to combine. Add the remaining flour, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring well after each addition. When the dough has pulled together, turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and knead until smooth and supple, about 8 minutes. Lightly oil a large mixing bowl, place the dough in the bowl and turn to coat with oil. Cover with a damp cloth and let rise in a warm place until doubled in volume, about 1 hour. Deflate the dough and turn it out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a 10x 14 inch rectangle. Lightly brush the far edge with water. In a small bowl combine the cinnamon and 3/4 cup brown sugar and sprinkle over the rectangles. Then sprinkle the raisins and chopped nuts over the dough. Roll up the dough into a log and seal the seam. Cut the dough into 12 equal pieces; place the pieces in a greased 9x13 inch baking pan, or 12 inch deep dish pizza pan. Cover with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator to rise overnight. The next morning, preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Take the rolls out of the refrigerator and let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes. Bake the rolls for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden. Meanwhile, combine the corn syrup with the vanilla in a small bowl. Whisk in the powdered sugar and enough cream to make a thick glaze; set aside. Drizzle the glaze over the rolls and serve warm.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: All-Purpose Punch
ingredients: ['6 oz. frozen orange juice', '1 large can pineapple juice', '2 pkg. Kool-Aid (to make color needed)', '6 oz. frozen lemonade juice', '3 c. sugar']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid with 1 gallon water. Mix orange juice and lemonade with water as directed on cans. Pour juice mixture and sugar into Kool-Aid. Makes 1 3/4 gallons.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Blackeye Beans With Rice & Herb Salad
ingredients: ['200g Black eye beans ( kidney beans ); 225g cooked wild rice; 225cooked long grain rice; 1 x large diced tomato; 1 x diced capsicum; 100g corn; 1.5 tspn x fresh chopped thyme;2 x tspn white wine viniger; 3 x tspn ex virg olive oil; salt & blk pepper to tase.']
directions: Black eye beans; Place beans in a bowl & cover with cold water. Soak beans over night. Drain & rinse beans. Place beans in a pot with plenty of fresh water.Boil rapidly for 10 mins. Simmer for 45 /60 mins, 'till beans are tender. Add more water if required to keep beans covered while cooking.Let beans cool. Prepare dressing by whisking together the oregano,thyme,white wine viniger,olive oil,salt & pepper. Set aside. On a platter the 2 rices, tomato,capsicome, & corn. Add black eye beans & dressing. Mix, season with salt, pepper & fresh herbs.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. bread crumbs', '8 Tbsp. Parmesan, divided in half', '1/8 tsp. garlic powder', 'paprika', '3 lb. chicken breasts', '1/2 tsp. oregano', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1 can mushroom soup', '1/2 c. milk']
directions: Mix crumbs, 1/2 Parmesan, garlic, oregano and pepper. Roll chicken in mixture; drizzle with melted margarine. Place in greased dish and bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Turn breasts over and bake another 20 minutes. Pour soup mixed with milk over top. Sprinkle with remaining half of Parmesan and paprika. Bake 20 minutes more or until done.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Kool-Aide Lipgloss
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable shortening', '1 teaspoon honey', '3 tablespoons Kool-Aid, mix', '14 teaspoon hot water']
directions: Mix one tablespoon of solid vegetable shortening with one teaspoon of honey. In a different bowl mix the Kool-Aid with 1/4 teaspoon of hot water until the Kool-Aid is dissolved. The amount of dissolved Kool-Aid left depends on how hot the water is. The more Kool-Aid you can dissolve, the stronger the flavor. Add one drop of the Kool-Aid mixture to the honey/shortening bowl. Stir. Keep adding drops and stirring until you get your desired flavor. Add the body glitter if you wish. Stir it in gently.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Lois Punch
ingredients: ['1 small can tangerine juice (frozen)', '1 small can orange juice (frozen)', '8 small c. pre-sweetened Kool-Aid in a can']
directions: Make a gallon of cherry Kool-Aid. Add tangerine juice (frozen), orange juice (frozen) and pre-sweetened Kool-Aid in a gallon size can. Mix it up real good.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Good 4 U Punch
ingredients: ['1 pkg. sugar-free Kool-Aid', '1 bottle orange juice', '1 (2 liter) diet 7-Up']
directions: Mix Kool-Aid following package. Pour 3 ounces orange juice and 3 ounces Kool-Aid and a big splash of diet 7-Up. Red Kool-Aid works best.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Popsicles
ingredients: ['1 pkg. unsweetened Kool-Aid', '1 c. sugar', '1 small pkg. jello', '1 c. hot water', '5 c. cold water']
directions: Kool-Aid and jello should be same flavor. Dissolve Kool-Aid, jello and sugar in hot water. Add cold water. Makes 2 quarts liquid. Takes about 6 hours to set.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Muesli Balls With Figs
ingredients: ['2 cups oatmeal/blended rolled oats', '6 dry figs', '2 tablespoons tahini paste', '1-2 tablespoons flax seeds', '2-3 tablespoons runny honey/molasses', '2-3 tablespoons milk.almond milk', 'cocoa for coating']
directions: Grind oat flakes, add chopped figs, pulse several times and add rest of the ingredients, at the end pour some milk if the mixture is too stiff Shape with the help of ice cream spoon the oat mixture into (18) balls. Cover them in cocoa powder.\r\nThey can be kept several days in the fridge.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Special Cheese Cake
ingredients: ['2 1/2 lb. cream cheese', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '6 eggs', '1 tsp. lemon flavor', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 pt. sour cream', '1 pt. heavy cream']
directions: Cream in bowl together the sugar, cream cheese, sour cream and eggs. Add flavoring. Add heavy cream last. Beat about 3 minutes. Bake at 375\u00b0 or 400\u00b0 for 1 hour.

ing: ramen, yogurt, Kool-Aid, eggs, peanut butter
title: Cherry Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid', '1 (46 oz.) can pineapple juice']
directions: Make up 1 package of Kool-Aid and freeze in cubes. Make up 1 package as to drink. Chill Kool-Aid and pineapple juice.

title: Chicken Spaghetti
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. ground chicken', '1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste', "1 can Hunt's Italian sauce", '1 can stewed tomatoes', '1 lb. spaghetti, cooked and drained', '1 tsp. Italian seasoning', '1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. pepper', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1 tsp. oregano', '1 large onion', '1 bell pepper', '3 c. water']
directions: Brown meat, all your seasonings and onion. Add tomato paste, sauce, tomatoes and water. Add bell pepper. Cook 30 minutes.

title: Shepherd'S Pie
ingredients: ['ground beef', 'mashed potatoes', 'sliced cheese', 'seasoning']
directions: Brown ground beef. Pour off grease. Prepare potatoes as you would for meal. Layer the ground beef, potatoes, cheese, ground beef, potatoes and cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 until it melts.

title: Meat And Potato Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '4 medium potatoes', '2 cans Ro-Tel tomatoes', '8 oz. grated cheese', '1 chopped onion', '1/4 c. chopped bell pepper']
directions: Brown ground beef with onions and\tpeppers; drain. Layer sliced potatoes in ungreased casserole dish. Top with ground beef mixture. Mash Ro-Tel tomatoes with juice and pour over casserole.\tBake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Top with\tcheese; place\tin oven until cheese melts.

title: Hamburger Hash Brown Recipe
ingredients: ['1 lb lean ground beef', '1 cup chopped onion', '1 (14 1/2 ounce) can diced fire-roasted tomatoes', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 1/2 cups corn kernels', '16 ounces frozen hash browns or 16 ounces to 4 cups diced or sliced raw potatoes', '1/4 cup flour', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '4 tablespoons margarine, melted', '2 cups shredded cheddar cheese']
directions: Combine beef, onion, tomatoes, Worcestershire sauce, and salt. In a separate bowl, combine corn, potatoes, flour, and chopped green bell pepper. Add the melted margarine. Spray 13 X 9 X 2 inch pan with non stick spray. Pat the beef mixture into baking pan; top with the corn and potato mixture. Bake uncovered at 375\u00b0F for 45 minutes; sprinkle with the cheese and bake ground beef casserole 15 to 20 minutes longer, until potatoes seem done. I usually drain the casserole of the fat two times during cooking, once at about 20 minutes and again before I add the cheese (if your using beef, turkey doesn't usually make much fat).

title: Cherry Almond Roll
ingredients: ['Dough:', '2 to 2 1/2 cups all-purpose flour', '1/4 cup sugar', "1 envelope Fleischmann's(R) RapidRise Yeast", '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup sour cream', '1/4 cup water', '1/4 cup butter or margarine', '1 egg', 'Filling:', '1 can (12 1/2 ounces) almond filling', '1 jar (10 ounces) maraschino cherries, well drained and chopped (reserve syrup)', 'Cherry Glaze:', '1 cup powdered sugar, sifted', '2 to 3 tablespoons reserved cherry syrup', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '1/2 cup sliced almonds, toasted']
directions: Combine 3/4 cup flour, sugar, undissolved yeast and salt in a large mixing bowl. Heat sour cream, water and butter until very warm (120\u00b0 to 130\u00b0F). Gradually add to flour mixture. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed of electric mixer, scraping bowl occasionally. Add egg and 1 cup flour; beat 2 minutes at medium speed. Stir in enough remaining flour to make a stiff batter. Cover; let rest 10 minutes. Transfer dough to lightly floured surface. Roll to a 15- x 10-inch rectangle. Spread with almond filling; sprinkle with the cherries. Beginning from long end, roll up tightly as for jelly roll. Pinch seam and end to seal. Place roll on greased baking sheet. Cover; let rise in warm draft-free place until doubled in size, about 1 hour. With sharp knife, make 6 X-shaped cuts across top of loaf. Bake at 375\u00b0F for 20 minutes or until done. Remove from sheet; cool on wire rack. Drizzle with Cherry Glaze while warm. Sprinkle with almonds. To make Cherry Glaze, combine powdered sugar, cherry syrup and almond extract in a small bowl. Stir until smooth.

title: Upside-Down Fettuccine Bake
ingredients: ['1 lb bulk Italian sausage (hot or sweet)', '14 cup chopped onion', '1 (16 ounce) canned diced tomatoes, drained', 'salt and pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano leaves or 1 teaspoon dried Italian herb seasoning, crushed', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', '12 cup grated parmesan cheese, divided', '0.5 (1 lb) package fettuccine, cooked', '3 eggs, slightly beaten', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley or 2 teaspoons dried parsley', '14 teaspoon garlic powder', 'additional parmesan cheese']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. While oven heats, brown sausage in a 10-inch oven-proof skillet, crumbling sausage as it cooks; drain and discard fat. Add onion to skillet; cook until tender. Stir in tomatoes salt, pepper and oregano; bring to a boil. Simmer 20-25 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in mozzarella cheese. Sprinkle 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese over meat mixture; don't mix. Meanwhile, cook fettuccine according to package directions; drain. Combine remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, eggs, margarine, parsley and garlic powder. Toss hot noodles with egg mixture. Spread noodle mixture over meat mixture in skillet. Transfer to preheated oven; bake 25 minutes. Invert skillet onto serving platter; lift off skillet. Sprinkle top with additional parmesan cheese. Cut into wedges and serve.

title: Beef And Potato Chili
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon garlic clove, minced', '1/2 teaspoon red pepper flakes', '6 very small red salad potatoes, diced small', '1 small yellow onion, diced small', '1 yellow bell peppers or 1 orange bell pepper, diced small', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 lb extra lean ground beef', '2 large tomatoes, chopped coarsely']
directions: Heat olive oil, garlic, and pepper flakes over medium-high heat. Add potatoes, bell pepper, and onion. Sprinkle chili powder over vegetables. Cook until potatoes are almost soft and starting to turn translucent (about 12 minutes). Add ground beef. Using the leanest ground beef will mean that you can cook everything together because you won't have to drain the beef. It saves time and tastes richer. Chop up the beef as it's cooking so that it is crumbly. Cook until it is mostly brown. You may want to add more chili powder at this point. Add tomatoes and turn down heat slightly. Allow them to become soft. I like to gently mash them with a potato masher at this point. Let the whole mixture simmer for about 10 minutes. Serve with corn bread. I like to get the corn bread (which takes 20 minutes) in the over right before I add the ground beef. Everything is done at about the same time.

title: Mexican Mush
ingredients: ['1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes', '1 regular size can taco sauce', '3 cans pinto beans (regular size)', '1 1/2 lb. ground beef', '1 regular size bottle Italian dressing', '1 head lettuce, cut into bite size pieces', '2 tomatoes, cut into pieces', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '1 lb. Cheddar cheese', '1 large pkg. Doritos chips']
directions: Cook together Ro-Tel tomatoes, taco sauce, pinto beans and ground beef. (I cook this in my crock-pot all day).

title: Ms. Toole'S Spaghetti
ingredients: ['1 jar Ragu sauce', '1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes', '1 can sliced white potatoes', '1 can sliced carrots', '1 tsp. cayenne pepper', '1 lb. ground beef']
directions: Brown ground beef; drain off fat. Add Ragu sauce, tomatoes, potatoes, carrots and cayenne pepper. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes. Serve over noodles. Enjoy!

title: German Beef Cakes
ingredients: ['4 c. or so mashed potatoes (enough for 4 servings)', '1/4 c. chopped green onions (with tops)', '2 c. ground beef, cooked and drained', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '2 Tbsp. flour', '1/2 tsp. garlic salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '2 to 3 Tbsp. butter']
directions: Prepare mashed potatoes (I used leftovers). Stir in onions, ground beef, egg, garlic salt and pepper. Shape into 8 patties. Coat with flour.

title: Tijuana Hash
ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef', '1 onion, minced', '2 -3 garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 cup of shredded cheddar cheese', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '5 -6 potatoes, shredded']
directions: Brown ground beef with onion and garlic . cook for 10 minutes. drain grease. add chili powder, salt ,pepper, and tomato sauce. cook for 15 minutes. shredded potatoes and cook in oil ( i use grill to brown them but u can fry them if u wish)when u are done browning add to a grease casserole potatoes first then ground beef mixture then cheese and tomatoes on top ( make sure u slice tomatoes) you should have 6 or 8 slices of tomatoes. bake in oven at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. enjoy!

title: Hamburger Potato Pie
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 medium onion', '1 c. cooked peas', '2 c. tomatoes', '1/2 c. catsup', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. pepper', '5 potatoes, cooked and mashed', '1 egg']
directions: Brown the chopped onion in butter. Remove onion and brown ground beef with salt and pepper. Place ground beef and onions, peas, tomatoes and catsup in a casserole to combine. Mash potatoes, beat in 1 egg and spoon potatoes on top of other mixture. Brown in 375\u00b0 oven until peaks are golden.

title: Sally Struthers' Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: ['1 1/2 sticks butter', '1 Tbsp. olive oil', '6 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley', 'salt', 'pepper', '4 large cloves garlic, chopped fine', '3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice', '1 lb. large fresh shrimp, cleaned and deveined']
directions: Heat butter over low heat. Add olive oil, parsley, garlic and lemon juice. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cook for about 3 minutes, then remove from heat. Add shrimp to mixture; let stand about 30 minutes. Remove shrimp from butter and place in shallow pan. Broil approximately 5 minutes and turn. Pour remaining sauce over shrimp; broil another 5 minutes. Serve with toothpicks as a snack or appetizer.

title: Chanax
ingredients: ['3 potatoes medium size', '3 eggplants medium size', '5 tomatoes medium size', '3 onions medium size', '5 crushed cloves of garlic', '2 bell peppers medium size', 'salt/pepper teaspoons accordin your taste', 'bunch handfuls parsley, tarragon, cilantro, oregano, thyme.', '1 tablespoon corrienda grinded', '2 pounds beef ground or cubed']
directions: Season beef ground or cubed with salt/pepper, garlic, corrienda , set aside. Slice the tomatoes, potatoes, eggplants, onions, bell peppers into round thin shapes. Cut up the herbs. The fun part is to build all these ingredients together. I would recommend clay pot containers and also Le Creuset Mini Cocotte. Rub butter and olive oil the containers first layer would be potatoes, next eggplants, seasoned beef, onions, tomatoes, herbs pressed down lightly, sprinkle the top with little salt.\r\nCover with lead or tinfoil and place into preheated oven 350 degrees Fahrenheit.\r\nCook about one hour.

title: Candied Sweets(Great For Thanksgiving)
ingredients: ['1 can large sweet potatoes, drained', '1 lb. can crushed pineapple', '2 c. small marshmallows', '1/2 stick butter', '1 Tbsp. cinnamon']
directions: Mash potatoes. Put in butter, pineapple, cinnamon and 1 cup marshmallows; stir together. Bake for 1/2 hour at 300\u00b0, then put 1 cup marshmallows on top for the remaining 15 minutes. Should be golden brown. I usually double for Thanksgiving.

title: Hamburger Soup
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 can (15 oz.) tomatoes', '1 can (16 oz.) Veg-All mixed vegetables', '3 c. water', '1/2 tsp. chili powder', 'salt and pepper']
directions: Brown ground beef in skillet. Mash tomatoes in a saucepan (I use a potato masher). Add to the tomatoes the ground beef and the remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil and then simmer at least 1 hour.

title: Cheddar Cheese Biscuits
ingredients: ['2 cups self-rising flour (Red Band)', '1/2 tsp baking powder', '1 tsp sugar', '1/3 cup Crisco shortening', '1 cup grated cheddar cheese', '1 cup buttermilk']
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix flour, baking powder, and sugar together. Using a fork, cut in the crisco, add cheese and stir in buttermilk all at one time until blended. Roll out biscuits (or drop by tablespoonsful) on a well-greased baking pan. Bake for 12-15 minutes.

title: Meal In A Skillet
ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1 cup bread crumbs', '4 potatoes, diced', '1 can corn', '1 can whole tomatoes', '1 to 2 onions, sliced', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Brown ground beef with potatoes and bread crumbs. Pour corn on top of meat mixture. Add tomatoes over corn. Slice onions and place on top of tomatoes. Cover and simmer until heated through. (May also be fixed without the potatoes.)

title: Potato Nachos
ingredients: ['3 medium potatoes', '1 lb ground beef', '1 packages shredded cheese', '1 pints sour cream']
directions: peel, wash, and slice potatoes. Bake at 375F for 30 minutes or until potatoes are done. you can season potatoes to your taste, I used butter, garlic salt, and parsley. Meanwhile, brown ground beef and drain excess grease. Again, season to your taste. I just used some seasoned salt Once meat and potatoes are cooked you are ready to assemble. Layer potatoes, meat, and cheese on a plate and top with sour cream and your favorite nacho ingredients (i.e. shredded lettuce, tomatoes, black olives, onions, jalapenos)

title: Spicy Chipotle Fry Sauce
ingredients: ['3/4 cups Mayonnaise', '3 Tablespoons Ketchup', '1 Tablespoon Sriracha', '1 Tablespoon Chipotles In Adobo Sauce (from A Can), Sauce Only', '1 Tablespoon Dill Pickle Juice', '1/2 teaspoons Dijon Mustard', '1/2 teaspoons Chipotle Chili Powder', '1/4 teaspoons Black Pepper', '1/4 teaspoons Fine Sea Salt (more To Taste)', 'Chopped Parsley For Garnish', 'Onion Rings Or French Fries (for Serving)']
directions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the mayo, ketchup, Sriracha, chipotle sauce, dill pickle juice, mustard, chipotle chili powder, black pepper and salt until smooth, creamy and thoroughly combined. Set aside or cover and place in the fridge where it will keep for about a week. When ready to serve, garnish with chopped parsley and serve alongside crispy onion rings or french fries!

title: Hamburger Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 pkg. brown gravy mix', 'water', '4 servings instant mashed potatoes', '1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese', 'pepper']
directions: Brown ground beef, drain and put back in skillet. Add brown gravy mix and water. Cook together for about 10 minutes, moist but not too soupy. Make up 4 servings instant mashed potatoes per instructions (I use Idaho). Put ground beef mixture in small casserole dish. Layer mashed potatoes. Add grated cheese to top. Sprinkle with pepper. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until brown.

title: Banana Bread With Praline Icing
ingredients: ['FOR THE DRY MIX:', '3 cups Flour', '1/4 teaspoons Cinnamon', '5 teaspoons Baking Powder', '1-1/2 teaspoon Salt', 'FOR THE WET MIX:', '1-1/4 cup Milk', '1/3 cups Vegetable Oil Or Melted Margarine', '1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract', '3 whole Smashed Ripened Bananas', 'FOR THE PRALINE ICING:', '1/4 cups Packed Brown Sugar', '3 Tablespoons Milk', '1 Tablespoon Butter', '1/2 Tablespoons Light Corn Syrup', '1 dash Salt', '1 cup Powdered Sugar', '1/4 teaspoons Vanilla Extract', '2 Tablespoons Chopped Pecans']
directions: For the bread: Preheat the oven to 350 F. Prepare two bowls: one with the all the dry ingredients and one with the wet. Stir each mix, then blend them together. Pour into a greased and floured standard size loaf pan. Bake for around 1 hour and 20 minutes for a large loaf, or 40-45 minutes for smaller loaf pans. When done baking, remove from the pan and place on a cooling rack. For the icing: Place brown sugar, 1 1/2 tablespoons milk, butter, corn syrup, and a dash of salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, remembering to stir occasionally. Scrape brown sugar mixture into a bowl. Add the vanilla extract, remaining 1 1/2 tablespoons milk and powdered sugar. Beat with a mixer at high speed until slightly cooled. Drizzle icing over the cooled banana bread and sprinkle with the chopped pecans. Let the bread stand until the icing sets, then slice and serve!

title: Hamburger Stew
ingredients: ['2 lb. ground beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 can chopped tomatoes (16 oz.)', '2 cans red beans (16 oz.)', '2 large potatoes, diced']
directions: In large skillet, brown ground beef. Add onion, tomatoes, red beans and potatoes. Simmer until potatoes are tender, even better the next day. Salt and pepper to taste.

title: Mashed Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['5 medium -sized boiled sweet potatoes, (2 cups)', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'a little hot whole milk, cream, lemon juice or dry sherry ( I use warm whole milk)', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', 'Grated orange or lemon rind, cloves or cinnamon']
directions: 1. cook, skin and mash potatoes. 2. Add butter, salt, milk brown sugar and mix  This is a taste thing, I always make much larger amounts and increase butter and milk and brown sugar to taste. Thanksgiving top with marshmallows.

title: Potatoes With Chicken & Bacon Cream
ingredients: ['4 medium Potatoes', '2 clove Garlic', '1 cup Bacon', '2 cup Cooked chicken', '1 can Heavy whipping cream', '1 cup Milk', '1 cup Shoestring potato (optional)', '1 Nutmeg', '1 Salt', '1 Black pepper']
directions: Peel and cook the potatoes until tender Chop the garlic and the bacon, and sauteed both together. Add the cooked meat (in this pic I used my left over turkey from Thanksgiving) Cook well for about 10 minutes Add the whipping cream and the milk until you reach your desired consistency. Season with ground nutmeg salt and black pepper Place 2 cooked potatoes in a bowl and cut into big squares Add the cream on top of the potatoes Lastly add the shoestring potatoes and serve.

title: Cowboy Casserole (Crock Pot)
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, chopped', '1 lb ground beef, brown, drain, &, rinse', '6 medium russet potatoes, washed &, sliced, do not peel', '1 garlic clove, minced fine', '1 (16 ounce) can kidney beans', '1 (15 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '2 tablespoons flour', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '1/4 teaspoon chili powder (I like Ancho)']
directions: Layer onions, ground beef, potatoes, garlic and beans in slow cooker in that order. Mix your diced tomatoes& flour in a separate bowl. I like to take my immersion blender to it, kids don't like tomato chunks. Pour tomato mixture over top of things in pot and sprinkle with salt& pepper. Cover& cook on low for 5-6 hours, or until potatoes are done (the thinner the faster).

title: Beef Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['2 cans mixed vegetables, drained', '2 cans tomatoes', '6 potatoes, peeled and chopped', '1 lb. ground beef', '1/2 onion (if desired)']
directions: In large saucepan, fill about half full of water. Add ground beef; let cook, then add potatoes, mixed vegetables, tomatoes and onion. Cook until potatoes are tender. Cool and serve.

title: Quick Barbecue Beef Bake
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '3/4 c. chopped onion', '18 oz. bottle barbecue sauce', '2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese', '2 c. Bisquick', '1 c. milk', '2 eggs']
directions: Heat oven to 400\u00b0. Cook ground beef and 1/2 cup of the onion in skillet until beef is brown; drain. Stir in barbecue sauce.

title: Baked Acorn Squash Filled With Green Peas
ingredients: ['4 medium acorn squash', '1/3 c. butter, melted', '1/4 c. light brown sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon', '2 pkg. (10 oz. size) frozen green peas', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: I use this on Thanksgiving and serve around the turkey.

title: Vegetable Beef Soup
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '2 large potatoes', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 can (15 oz.) whole kernel corn', '1 can English peas', '1 can diced tomatoes', '1 can tomato sauce', '1 can sliced carrots', '3 tbsp. instant beef bouillon', 'salt, pepper, celery salt, garlic salt - to taste']
directions: In skillet, brown ground beef. Drain. Peel and cube potatoes. Cover with water. Add chopped onion. Cook until tender (about 20 minutes). Add ground beef, canned vegetables (with liquid), and seasonings. I also add instant potato flakes to thicken.

title: Chocolate Squares
ingredients: ['1 1.4 cup chopped dates', '1 cup hot water', '1 cup soft butter', '1 1/4 cup white sugar', '2 eggs', '1 3/4 cup flour', '1 1/2 tsp. Baking Soda', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 cup chocolate chips', '1/2 cup chopped nuts', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: 1.Mix chopped dates and hot water. Let cool  2.Beat butter, sugar, and eggs until creamy.  3.Sift together flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in date mixture. Add second mixture, vanilla and 1/2 cup chocolate chips.  Spread 1/2 cup chocolate chips and 1/2 cup chopped nuts over top. Bake at 325 for 1 hour. Note: Sprinkle flour before and after adding date mixture. Ice with chocolate icing.

title: Cabbage Stew
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 can diced tomatoes (large can)', '1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes with chilies (medium)', '1 large onion, diced', '4 potatoes, peeled and diced', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 stick butter', '1 small head cabbage']
directions: Brown ground beef and onions. Add cabbage, tomatoes, Ro-Tel, potatoes, butter, salt and pepper. Stir and let simmer until done.

title: Six In One
ingredients: ['3/4 lb. ground beef', '1/2 c. uncooked rice', '2 potatoes, thinly sliced', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 green bell pepper, sliced', '18 oz. can tomatoes']
directions: Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly. Drain. Spoon into casserole. Layer rice, potatoes, onion, green pepper and tomatoes over ground beef. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours or until rice and vegetables are tender. Yields 4 servings.

title: Simple Italian Potato Pie
ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef', '2 cups mashed potatoes', '14 ounces diced tomatoes', '1/2 cup onion', '1/2 cup shredded parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon parsley']
directions: Brown ground beef in skillet. Drain off excess fat. Place ground beef, seasoned with salt and pepper if desired, in bottom of shallow baking dish. Cook 2 cup mashed potatoes according to box directions. Layer mashed potatoes over ground beef. Drain juice from diced tomatoes and cover mashed potatoes with diced tomatoes and onions. Sprinkle parmesan cheese and parsley over tomatoes and onions. Cook in a 350\u00b0F oven for 30 minutes.

title: Honey Maple Granola
ingredients: ['3 cups old fashioned oats', '1/2 cup shredded coconut (sweetened or unsweetened)', '1 cup nuts, chopped (I like a mixture of almonds, pecans, cashews, and sunflower seeds)', '1/2 - 1 teaspoon cinnamon (I use 1 teaspoon)', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3 tablespoons honey', '3 tablespoons maple syrup', '1 cup dried fruit (I like a mixture of cranberries, raisins, chopped apples and apricots)']
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Combine rolled oats, coconut, nuts, cinnamon, and salt. In a separate bowl stir together oil, maple syrup and honey. Pour liquid mixture over the dry ingredients and stir together. Spread onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for approx 20-25 minutes (stirring occasionally). The longer you bake it the crunchier the granola will be. It may still be sticky when it comes out of the oven, but it will become crisp and dry as it cools. Place baking sheet on a wire cooling rack. Once cooled, mix in the dried fruit and store in an airtight container or plastic bag in the refrigerator. It will keep for several weeks.

title: Southwest Stew
ingredients: ['2 pounds ground beef', '1 onion, chopped', '1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, drained and rinsed', '1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained', '4 potatoes, cubed', '1 cup medium salsa', '2 cups water', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese']
directions: Cook ground beef and onion until done. In a large pan add beef, onion, tomatoes, beans, corn, potatoes, picante sauce, water, cumin, salt and pepper to taste, and garlic powder. Simmer, covered, for 45 minutes. I like to use slow cooker and let it simmer all day. Serve; top with cheese.

title: Beef In Potato Shells
ingredients: ['3 large baking potatoes', '1 Tbsp. margarine or butter', '1 lb. ground beef', '1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes (undrained)', '1 envelope taco seasoning mix', '1/2 c. shredded Cheddar or Monterey cheese', '1/3 c. sour cream', '2 green onions (wild), chopped']
directions: Bake potatoes at 475\u00b0. When done, cut potatoes lengthwise in half. Scoop out all but 1/4-inch shell. Brush inside and outside of shell with melted butter. Place shells, cut side up, on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake, uncovered, until edges are brown, 15 to 20 minutes. Cook and stir ground beef in skillet until brown; drain. Stir in tomatoes and seasoning mix. Break up tomatoes. Heat to boiling; reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes. Spoon beef into shells. Sprinkle with cheese. Heat just until cheese is melted. Top with sour cream and onions.

title: Chili
ingredients: ['3 lb. ground beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '1/2 pkg. celery, chopped', '1 large can diced tomatoes', '1 c. V-8 juice', '1 can kidney beans', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 bay leaves']
directions: Brown ground beef, onion and celery until browned well. In large kettle, mix tomatoes, juice and beans. Add beef mixture. Simmer on low heat for about 1 hour. Add salt, pepper and bay leaves. Add chili powder to your taste. I cook macaroni on the side or rice to add whatever you desire.

title: Zucchini Moussaka
ingredients: ['1 lb beef, ground', '4 large potatoes', '4 large tomatoes', '2 -4 medium zucchini', '1 lb tomatoes, canned', '1/2 cup beef stock', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons italian seasoning', '2 garlic cloves', '1 shallot', '1 tablespoon black pepper', 'salt, to taste', 'pepper, to taste']
directions: Finely mince the garlic cloves and shallot. Fry the ground beef with the minced garlic and shallot until nicely browned, season with salt and pepper to taste. Set aside. Peel and slice the potatoes, about 1/4 inch thick. Slice the tomatoes and zucchini likewise. Combine canned tomatoes, beef stock, 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning and 1/2 tablespoon pepper. Cover the ground of a large pot with the olive oil, then layer it with the sliced tomatoes. Sprinkle some Italian seasoning, salt and pepper on the tomatoes. Place a layer of sliced potatoes on the tomato layer, season the same way. Place a layer of sliced zucchini on the potato layer, season like the tomatoes and potatoes. Cover with the browned ground beef as last layer, then pour prepared tomato sauce over it. You can now sprinkle some parmesan on top. If you use nutritional yeast, I'd recommend to mix it into the tomato sauce. Parmesan mixed into the sauce is another option to play with. Bring the moussaka to a gentle boil, cover and let simmer on low heat for about 1 hour. Serve with plain yoghurt if desired.

title: Cowboy Stew
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 onion, chopped', '4 green onions', '1/2 clove garlic', '1/4 c. green pepper, chopped', '1/4 c. celery, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 Tbsp. chili powder', '1 can whole tomatoes', '1 can Ranch Style beans', '1 (16 oz.) can corn', '10 medium potatoes', '3 c. water']
directions: In Dutch oven brown ground beef. Add salt, pepper and chili powder. Stir well. Add tomatoes, corn, beans and potatoes. Cook until potatoes are done. Salt and pepper to taste.

title: Hamburger Stew
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 can tomato paste', '6 to 8 potatoes, cut up', '1 small onion, cut up', '1 large can diced tomato']
directions: Boil potatoes. Drain 1/2 water off (only boil until potatoes are tender). Brown ground beef with onions and drain. Add ground beef, 2 cups of fresh water, tomatoes and tomato paste. Heat until boiling. Turn down to simmer for 30 minutes.

title: Vegetable Beef Soup
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '2 c. cubed potatoes', '3/4 c. diced onions', '1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes', 'salt and pepper']
directions: Cook and drain ground beef with onions. Stir in tomatoes, potatoes, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Cover and simmer about 40 minutes.

title: Hot Chocolate Milkshake
ingredients: ['3/4 cup milk', '1/3 cup powdered chocolate drink mix (such as Nesquik(R))', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 teaspoon maple syrup', '1 teaspoon half-and-half', '3/4 cup vanilla ice cream']
directions: Combine milk, chocolate drink mix, sugar, maple syrup, and half-and-half in a large cup. Stir with a spoon until liquid is smooth. Add ice cream gradually, mixing after each addition until blended.

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef or ground turkey', '1 envelope taco seasoning mix', '1 head lettuce', '2 tomatoes', '1 green pepper', '1 small onion', 'Cheddar cheese, grated', '1 large bottle French dressing', '1 bag Doritos chips']
directions: Brown ground beef and drain. Stir in envelope of taco seasoning; set aside to cool. Dice other ingredients. (I put ground beef mixture on the bottom of serving container.) Dice tomatoes, green pepper and onion; put on top of ground beef. Sprinkle grated Cheddar cheese on top. (Layering ingredients makes it look really colorful.) Grated lettuce goes on top.

title: Zippy Hamburger Soup
ingredients: ['1 - 1 1/2 lb ground beef, browned and seasoned to taste (weight after browning- starting with raw, 2 lbs)', '1 (1 1/8 ounce) envelope Lipton beefy onion soup mix', '1 (32 ounce) box low sodium beef broth (taste carefully if using salted stock to keep soup from getting too salty) or (32 ounce) box broth (taste carefully if using salted stock to keep soup from getting too salty)', '1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes', '4 medium potatoes, washed and diced with skins left on', '1 cup carrot (Chopped, sliced, or diced- I used baby carrots and cut them into thirds)', '1 (14 ounce) can sweet corn (or equivalent of frozen)', '1 (14 ounce) can green beans (or equivalent of frozen)', '3/4 cup frozen peas', '1/3 - 1/2 cup A.1. Original Sauce', '3/4 teaspoon celery salt', 'salt', 'black pepper']
directions: Begin with ground beef (either freshly browned/drained/seasoned) or frozen, in soup pot, over medium heat. Add beef stock, onion soup mix, tomatoes (do not drain), Celery Salt, and 1 can of water (use empty tomato can- 28 oz, I guess). Mix well. Add potatoes and carrots and bring to a full simmer, until vegetables are fork tender (about 20 minutes depending on the size you cut them). Add drained beans/corn, and frozen peas. Add steak sauce at the end, allowing to cook just about 5 minutes to bring things together. This could easily be a crockpot recipe by putting the ground beef, onion soup, broth, tomatoes, potatoes and carrots on in the morning, and finishing by adding the other vegetables and A1 at the end.

title: Shrimp & Spring Onion Omelette.
ingredients: ['100 grams Shrimp.', '1 some Spring Onions.', '2 or 3 Egg, depending on amount of ingredients', 'pinch Salt', '1 tsp Sesame Oil', 'pinch Pepper', '2 tbsp Cooking Oil.']
directions: Whisk the eggs until bubbly. Mixed the shrimp, spring onion, salt & sesame oil into the egg. Put 2 tablespoon of cooking oil into the pan & turn your gas stove to medium heat. Move the ingredients around evenly & cook until it's turn light brown on both sides.

title: Mississippi Mud Cake
ingredients: ['2 sticks soft margarine', '4 eggs', '1 1/2 c. plain flour', '3 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. cocoa', '1 c. nuts', '1 pkg. miniature marshmallows']
directions: Cream margarine and sugar; add eggs and beat well. Sift flour and cocoa. Add to batter. Add vanilla and nuts. Bake in 10 x 14-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cover with marshmallows. Return to oven until marshmallows soften and run together.

title: Corn And Rice Casserole
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', '1 onion', '1 bell pepper', '1 small jar pimientos', '1 egg', '1 small box Minute rice', '2 cans cream-style corn', '2 Tbsp. sugar', 'cheese']
directions: Brown chopped onion in butter. Add corn, bell pepper and pimientos. Prepare rice as directed on box. Add rice to corn; stir in 1 egg, sugar, salt and pepper. Top with grated cheese. Place in a 300\u00b0 oven for 20 to 30 minutes.

title: Seven Layer Vegetable Casserole
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs ground beef', '3 sliced potatoes', '3 -4 sliced carrots', '2 sliced green bell peppers', '1 -2 sliced onion', '2 sliced tomatoes', '2 cups cooked rice']
directions: brown ground beef and drain grease,. spread on bottom of casserole dish. layer the 3 sliced potatoes on top of ground. beef. layer the carrots,then the bell peppers,. next the sliced onions,then the tomatoes. put the 2 cups of cooked rice over the top. cover with foil, that has been sprayed w/vegetable spray. bake at 350\u00b0for 1 hour -- i love this.

title: Coffee & Milk Tea Mix (Hk Style)
ingredients: ['3/4 cup boiling water', '1 lipton tea bag (Red Tea)', '7/8 teaspoon regular coffee or 7/8 teaspoon naturally decaffeinated coffee', '1 teaspoon white sugar', '3/8 cup milk']
directions: Put the teabag into the cup along with the regular (adults) or the Naturally Decaffeinated (children). Then fill the cup up to a little more than a 3/4 of boiling water. (Hold the teabag string so it won't fall in); stir. Then add sugar and milk while stirring. Throw the teabag away after.

title: Grandma'S Divinity
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. Karo', '1/2 c. water', '2 egg whites', 'vanilla']
directions: Cook sugar, water and Karo at 260\u00b0. Beat egg whites until stiff. Pour sugar into egg whites in slow stream. Add vanilla and beat until shine goes away (5 to 10 minutes). Finish by hand. Add pecans and drop onto waxed paper.

title: Drc hamburger stew
ingredients: ['1 lb hamburger', '1/2 tsp salt', '1/2 tsp ground cumin', '1/4 tsp chili powder', '1/4 tsp cracked black pepper', '3 tomatoes', '4 potatos', '1 can mixed vegetables', '1 cup water', '1/4 tsp salt']
directions: prep work: dice tomatoes into large chunks. dice potatoes into smaller chunks add tomatoes and 1/4 teaspoon salt into saucepan. add 1 cup water, stir and bring to a boil. reduce heat low cimmer for 30 minutes. stir ocasionally boil potatoes until soft, drain off water add ground beef to large pot. add ground cumin, cracked black pepper, and chili powder, with 1/2 teaspoon salt. brown add tomatoes, potatoes, mixed vegetables, in with ground beef. add water if necessary. simmer for 15 minutes serve hot

title: English Pancake Batter
ingredients: ['50 g butter', '180 g flour', '2 eggs', '275 ml milk', '150 ml water', 'salt', 'oil, for greasing']
directions: Melt a knob of butter in a pan, then leave to cool down. Meanwhile, place the flour in a bowl. Break the eggs into the bowl and pour in the milk. Mix until it turns into a smooth batter. Stir in the now cooled melted butter and leave to stand for about half an hour. This lets the starch expand and makes the finished pancake lighter. When you're ready to cook the pancakes, melt a little more of the butter along with a bit of oil in a frying pan. A non-stick pan is the best. When it is quite hot pour 1/4 cup batter into the pan. Swirl it until it covers the pan and you have a thin, even layer that should set almost immediately. After about a minute it should be ready to flip. Cook for 30 seconds on the other side and then tip onto a plate. Repeat until you have used up all the batter.

title: Stick Cookies
ingredients: ['1 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips', '2 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch chips', '1/2 c. chopped nuts', '1 small can chow mein noodles']
directions: Melt chips; add nuts and noodles. Drop on wax paper and chill.

title: Hamburger And Kidney Beans
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs lean ground beef', '2 (16 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans', 'salt', 'pepper', 'garlic salt']
directions: Brown and drain ground beef. Add Kidney Beans (I always drain one can and use juice from other can) to beef and stir. Season to taste. Serve over Mashed Potatoes.

title: Indian Green Chutney
ingredients: ['1 large bunch cilantro top, about 3 cups', '1 cup mint leaves, loosely packed', '1 tbsp honey, I prefer raw honey', '6 clove garlic', '1 large Serrano pepper, stemmed.. but with seeds.. add more if you dare', '1/2 cup fresh lime juice', '1 tsp ground cumin', '1 tsp ground ginger', '1 tsp salt', '1 olive oil as needed']
directions: combine ingredients in a blender, drizzle enough oil while push8ng herbs to the blades until a pesto like consistency great to serve with naan, meats, fish. accompanied well with some Greek yogurt

title: Easy Chili
ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef', 'chili powder (to taste)', '1 can tomato soup', '1 can stewed tomatoes', '1 can kidney bean']
directions: brown the ground beef. drain. add chili powder to taste, I usually cover the ground beef. add tomato soup. add stewed tomatoes, undrained. add kidney beans, undrained. heat up in skillet. serve.

title: Pot Pie
ingredients: ['2 c. flour', '3 Tbsp. shortening', '1 tsp. salt', '1 small egg', '1/2 c. milk', 'cooked meat of your choice *', '6 to 8 medium potatoes, quartered', '1 Tbsp. parsley', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: *We like chicken and beef, also good with that leftover Thanksgiving turkey.

title: Barbecued Spareribs(Serves 6)
ingredients: ['1 1/4 c. tomato juice', '2 Tbsp. soy sauce', '3/4 c. vinegar', '1 tsp. dry mustard', '1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce', '2 Tbsp. onion, finely grated', '1 c. vegetable oil', '3/4 c. sugar', '6 lb. spareribs']
directions: Combine all ingredients, except spareribs, in a blender or large, lidded jar, and blend or shake until mixture is thoroughly combined. Place the ribs in a large, shallow baking pan and cover them with the sauce. Cover with aluminum foil and marinate at room temperature for several hours. Preheat the oven to 350\u00b0. Leave the foil in place and bake for 45 minutes; uncover and bake another 30 to 40 minutes. Serve, cut in portions of 2 to 3 ribs.

title: Hamburger Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef, cooked', '1 large can whole tomatoes', '4 medium size potatoes']
directions: Boil round slices of potatoes until almost done. Line bottom of casserole dish with ground beef. Put layer of potatoes on ground beef, then a layer of tomatoes. Do this until all ingredients are used. Pour juice from the tomatoes over all. Put lid on casserole and bake in preheated oven at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Janet'S Italian Casserole
ingredients: ['16 oz. assorted macaroni', '1 lb. browned ground beef', '1/2 c. chopped pepperoni', '8 oz. Mozzarella cheese', '1 large jar spaghetti sauce', '1 c. sauteed green pepper', '1/2 c. sauteed onion', 'mushrooms as desired', '1/4 c. Parmesan cheese', '1/4 tsp. each: garlic powder, oregano and basil']
directions: Cook macaroni al dente. Place cooked macaroni in casserole dish. Combine ground beef, sauce, pepper, onion, mushrooms, pepperoni and spices. Pour mixture into macaroni with 1/2 the cheeses and mix. Top with remaining cheese. Refrigerate overnight or bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or microwave on Full power for 15 to 20 minutes.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Turkey Twist Casserole
ingredients: ['1 Tbsp. olive oil', '1 c. chopped broccoli', '1 c. thin sliced carrots', '1 tsp. dried basil, crushed', '1 can cream of celery soup', '1/2 tsp. garlic powder', '1 c. skim milk', '2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese', '2 c. cooked corkscrew macaroni (cooked without salt)', '2 c. cubed cooked turkey']
directions: In skillet, heat olive oil and cook broccoli and carrots with basil and garlic powder until tender, stirring often. Stir in soup, milk and cheese. Add macaroni and turkey. Heat through, stirring often. Serves 4.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Veggie Pizza
ingredients: ['1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing', '2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese', '3/4 c. Miracle Whip', '2 pkg. crescent dinner rolls', 'chopped broccoli', 'chopped carrots', 'chopped cauliflower', 'light shredded cheese']
directions: Mix first 3 ingredients with mixer. Bake crescent dinner rolls on cookie sheets at 375\u00b0 for 10 minutes; cool, then spread the cream cheese mixture on top. Add chopped broccoli, carrots and cauliflower and cheese on top.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Variations On A Meringue Cookie
ingredients: ['2 large egg whites', '1/2 cup plus 2 tbl. organic cane sugar, or caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar, optional', '1 teaspoon excellent vanilla extract', '1 cup ground hazelnuts, almonds or pinenuts', '1/2 cup grilled corn kernels', '1/3 cup roasted chestnuts, peeled and coarsely chopped', '1/2 tablespoon fresh grated ginger', 'powdered sugar, optional for garnish', 'Dutch cocoa, optional for garnish', '1 cup fresh whipped cream, optional for garnish with 1 cup fresh blueberries', 'sprig of lavender or mint for garnish']
directions: Beat your room temperature egg whites preferably in a copper bowl until foamy. Add cream of tartar if you are nervous about your meringue not getting stiff. Gradually add the sugar, a tablespoon at a time. When the mix begins to turn smooth, add the vanilla. Continue beating until the meringue is very shiny and holds peaks. Fold in the nuts. Gently stir in your additions. Refrigerate for one hour to firm up the batter. If you don't do this your cookies will be runny, flatter and larger, like my first batch in the photo.....which will still taste delicious. Preheat your oven to 350 degrees just before the hour is up. Drop the meringue batter by the spoonful to cookie sheets lined with parchment. Put the cookies on the sheets in the oven. Turn off the oven as soon as you do this. Leave undisturbed for 6-16 hours. For black and white cookies after they are dry and cool, sift powdered sugar on top on half the batch and cocoa on the other half. For an elaborate pavlova variation, especially good if you had any cookies break, and you want to conceal your misfortune, spoon whipped cream on top of a plated cookie. Top with fresh blueberries. Garnish with a sprig of lavender or mint. Let sit for 10 minutes and serve.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Teriyaki Marinade
ingredients: ['1/2 c. low salt soy sauce', '1/4 c. dry sherry', '1/4 c. vegetable oil', '1/4 c. dark brown sugar', '4 large cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tsp. black pepper']
directions: Mix all together and stir-fry with baby carrots, broccoli, tofu, pea pods, cellophane noodles, ginger and mushrooms (stir-fry separately first, not in sauce, these take too long). A great lo-cal dinner choice!

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Gordon Ramsay'S Broccoli Soup
ingredients: ['Ingredients:', "if you want to make the fancy version in the video, you'll also need two more ingredients:"]
directions: Cooking Gordon Ramsay's Broccoli Soup:  Bring water to a boil in a large stock pot. Add a large pinch of salt (1 - 1 1/2 Tbsp.). Add broccoli and boil rapidly.  You will want to slice your goat cheese at this point if you're making the fancy version. Dip the knife into the boiling hot water before each slice for even smooth cuts. Cut two slices of goat cheese per bowl being served. After cutting, use the hot smooth side of your knife to smooth one side of the cheese slices for appearance.  Your broccoli is finished cooking when you can pierce it with little or no effort. Remove the stock pan from the stove burner. DO NOT POUR THE WATER OUT! Use a slotted spoon to add broccoli to a blender but be careful because it's boiling hot! Pour enough of the water left over from cooking the broccoli to fill the blender half way. Add a pinch (or more) of salt. Use several pulses on your blender to break the broccoli up and then puree for several seconds.  If you are making the fancy version, add five walnuts to the bottom of a shallow bowl and then place pieces of goat cheese on top of them.  Pour soup into shallow bowl. Drizzle lightly with olive oil and serve at once! Delicious!

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Whisper Dessert(A Luscious Concoction For Guests)
ingredients: ['6 oz. creme de cacao', '6 oz. brandy', '1 qt. coffee ice cream']
directions: Mix ingredients in blender. While eating dinner, freeze (1/2 hour). Re-blend and serve in small, fancy glasses.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Fruity Bran Muffins
ingredients: ['1 c. flour', '1/3 c. firmly packed brown sugar', '1 Tbsp. baking powder', '1/4 tsp. salt', '2 1/2 c. Fruit and Fiber cereal', '1 c. skim milk', '2 egg whites', '1/4 c. oil']
directions: Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Mix flour, brown sugar, baking powder and salt in large bowl. Combine cereal and milk in another bowl. Let stand 3 minutes. Stir in egg whites and oil. Add to flour mixture; stir until just moistened. Spoon into greased muffin pan, filling each cup 3/4 full. Bake 20 minutes or until golden brown.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Beef Flank Steak, Roasted
ingredients: ['3 ounce beef flank steak, raw', '1 garlic cloves', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves', '1 carrot Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06', '1 whole wheat dinner rolls', '1/8 pound strawberries Safeway 1 lb For $3.99 thru 02/09', '1/8 pound blueberries Whole Foods 3 For $10.00 thru 02/09', '1/2 BREYERS Vanilla Lowfat Yogurt, 8-oz. container', '15 piece/slice bear-shaped cinnamon graham snacks']
directions: Trim fat from flank steak. Peel and mince garlic; place in small bowl with Balsamic vinegar, olive oil, basil and salt. Whisk together. Wash and peel carrot; slice thinly. Place a large piece of aluminum foil inside of a shallow oven-safe container. Place meat on foil. Spread olive oil mixture over top of meat, and place sliced carrots on top of meat. Seal foil tightly around flank steak. Bake at 450 degrees Fahrenheit for 35 to 40 minutes. (Serve meat and carrots with a whole wheat dinner roll.) While meat roasts, create Very Beary Teddy Parfait by slicing strawberries (1/8 pound = about 3 to 4 large berries), and then combining them with blueberries (1/8 pound = 1/2 cup) and yogurt (1/2 container = 1/2 cup). Layer 1/2 of the graham snacks and yogurt mixture in parfait glass. Refrigerate. Top with remaining graham snack just before serving.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Veggie Squares
ingredients: ['2 to 3 c. each: broccoli, cauliflower and carrots', '2 large cans crescent dinner rolls', '2 regular size pkg. cream cheese', '1 small carton sour cream', '1 pkg. Ranch dressing mix', 'grated Cheddar cheese']
directions: Spread dinner rolls on cookie sheet and press together. Bake just until set. Mix cream cheese, sour cream and Ranch dressing mix and spread on dinner rolls. Chop 2 to 3 cups each of broccoli, cauliflower and carrots. Put on top of cream cheese mixture. Chill and cut into squares. This is good with grated Cheddar cheese sprinkled on top of vegetables.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Rib Eye Steak With Broccoli And Cheese Sauce
ingredients: ['2 Rib Eye Steaks (the thicker, the better)', 'Olive Oil', 'Fresh Rosemary', 'Fresh Thyme', 'salt pepper', 'One lg. head of broccoli', '1 8 oz. package of cream cheese', '1 pint of sour cream', '1 packet of Goya Sazon seasoning']
directions: Steak: Pull a generous amount of fresh rosemary and thyme leaves off the stems and drop leaves onto steaks in a pile. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, then olive oil. Rub the oil and herbs into steaks on all sides. You can refrigerate steaks for up to 12 hours, or cook right away. To cook: heat a frying pan to very hot. Place steaks in pan. Fry in hot pan on each side until crispy on the outside (3 - 4 minutes per side for rare to medium rare steak).  Broccoli: Steam broccoli in a large steamer pot to desired consistency.  Cheese sauce: Put cream cheese and sour cream in a bowl and microwave on high for 30 - 45 seconds, until cream cheese is soft. Add Sazon, and mix ingredients until smooth. Top broccoli with cheese sauce, or serve on the side to dip broccoli in.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Philly Steak And Cheese Sliders
ingredients: ['1 pound sirloin steak, cut into 1/8-inch strips', '1 pinch meat tenderizer', '1 splash olive oil', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1/2 cup minced bell pepper', '1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, or to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 cups canned sliced mushrooms', '1 (12 count) package Hawaiian-style dinner rolls, sliced in half', '8 slices provolone cheese']
directions: Set oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler. Mix steak and meat tenderizer together in a bowl. Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and bell pepper; cook and stir until slightly softened, about 3 minutes. Stir in steak mixture; cook and stir until flavors combine, about 3 minutes. Mix in Italian seasoning and pepper; add mushrooms. Cook and stir until steak is mostly browned, about 3 minutes. Spoon steak mixture onto lower half of dinner rolls until covered; top with provolone cheese. Place onto a baking sheet. Broil in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, 1 to 3 minutes; remove from broiler. Place dinner roll tops onto melted provolone cheese; broil until tops are toasted, 1 to 2 minutes.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Sweet Potato And Orange Salad
ingredients: ['1 (6 ounce) sweet potato', '1/4 cup water', '1 orange - peeled, segmented, and seeded', '1 tablespoon raisins', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 pinch salt', '4 walnut halves, chopped']
directions: Place sweet potato into a microwave steamer with a rack; add water. Cook in the microwave until sweet potato is soft but not mushy, about 8 minutes. Set aside until cool enough to handle, about 5 minutes. Peel cooled sweet potato and cut into 1/2-inch cubes. Cut each orange segment into 3 pieces. Place sweet potato and orange pieces in a bowl; add raisins. Mix lemon juice and honey together in a bowl; pour over potato-orange mixture. Add a pinch of salt and sprinkle walnuts over salad.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Cheese Wreath
ingredients: ['2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '1 (8 ounce) packageshredded mexican cheese', '12 cup finely chopped pitted olive', '12 cup finely chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons finely chopped red peppers', '1 teaspoon chili powder']
directions: Beat cream cheese and shredded cheese with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Add remaining ingredients; mix well and cover. refrigerate several hours or overnight. Place drinking glass in center of serving platter. Drop rounded tablespoons of cheese mixture around glass just touching outer edge of glass to form ring; smooth with spatula. Remove glass. Garnish with additional parsley and red peppers, placing peppers so they look like red ornaments.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Mediteranean Mixed Vegetable Risotto
ingredients: ['1/2 cup pine nuts', '1/3 cup sun dried tomatoes, reconstituted', '1/2 cup celery, finely chopped', '1 med onion, finely chpped', '1/2 cup carrot, finely chopped', '1 yellow or red bell pepper, finely chopped', '1/2 cup parsley, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1/2 cup fresh basil, chiffonade', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter']
directions: 1. Boil water in preparation for making risotto. 2. Toast pine nuts in a large skillet then set aside. Using the same skillet add olive oil and butter. Saute onions, celery, pepper and carrots, al dente. Midway through the cooking process add the minced garlic cloves and oregano. 3. Strain risotto and add to vegetable mixture. Throw in basil and remove from heat.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Nutty Graham Cake
ingredients: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 1/2 cups packed brown sugar', '1 cup graham cracker crumbs', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 cup butter, softened', '1 cup orange juice', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '3 eggs', '1 cup chopped walnuts', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon water', '1/2 cup packed brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour one 10 inch bundt pan. Measure the flour, 1 1/2 cups packed brown sugar, graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, baking soda, salt, ground cinnamon, softened butter or margarine, orange juice and the eggs. Beat until smooth about 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in the walnuts and pour the batter into the prepared pan. Bake at 350 degrees F (for 45 to 50 minutes) or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Let cake stand in pan for 20 minutes.
