Invert cake onto a serving plate and ice with Brown Sugar Glaze. To Make Brown Sugar Glaze: Combine the confectioners' sugar, water, 1/2 cup brown sugar and the vanilla. Add more sugar or water to make a proper consistency for a barely pourable glaze.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Steak and Veggies
ingredients: ['1 14 lbs london broil steak', '1 cup bottled marinade', '1 head broccoli', '1 lb baby carrots', '15 ounces loaf French bread']
directions: Place steak in a gallon-size storage bag and add marinade. Let marinate for at least 1 hour or as long as overnight. Preheat grill to medium high or preheat oven broiler. Grill or broil steak until done, about 5-8 minutes per side, depending on thickness. While steak is cooking, wash broccoli and carrots in cold water, place in a covered casserole and microwave 5 minutes or until just tender. If desired, season with salt and pepper and a bit of olive oil. Cut steak thinly against the grain. Serve steak and veggies with French bread on the side.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Cubed Steak Cuban Style
ingredients: ['1 lb top sirloin steak (cubed)', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 cups brown rice', '1/2 cup flour', '12 garlic cloves', '2 cups broccoli', '2 carrots', '2 cups fat-free chicken broth', '1/2 teaspoon garlic salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/4 teaspoon chili powder', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon clove', '2 (15 1/4 ounce) cans black beans']
directions: Cook rice. Heat olive oil in non stick pan. Cut cubed steak into bite size pieces and coat with flour. Toss in pan until browned on all sides. Slice garlic very thin and chop carrots and broccoli into bite size pieces. Add these to the steak along with all the spices. slowly add the chicken broth. Simmer until thicken stirring regularly. Add the beans and heat through. Serve over rice. Enjoy the taste and aroma!

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Turkey Divan
ingredients: ['1/2 c. Kraft mayonnaise', '2 Tbsp. flour', '3/4 c. milk', '1 (14 oz.) pkg. Kraft deluxe macaroni and cheese dinner', '1 (10 oz.) pkg. Birds Eye broccoli spears, thawed and drained', '1 (6 oz.) pkg. Louis Rich oven roasted turkey breast slices', '2 Tbsp. Kraft grated Parmesan cheese']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Blend mayonnaise and flour in saucepan over low heat. Gradually add milk; cook, stirring, until thickened. Prepare macaroni and cheese dinner as directed on package; spoon dinner into 10 x 6-inch baking dish, arrange broccoli spears and turkey slices over the macaroni. Top with mayonnaise, sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake 30 minutes covered.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Chicken Pie
ingredients: ['2 9 inch pie crusts', '1 1/2 lb. chicken breasts, boneless', 'olive oil', '4 broccoli crowns', '1 c. baby carrots, diced', '1 c. potato peeled and diced', "1 can Cream of Campbell's Soup of your liking"]
directions: In fry pan cook chicken with olive oil. Add diced carrots and broccoli. Take a 9 inch pie pan and place a bottom crust. In bowl mix soup with 1/2 c. milk. In pie pan add your chicken, broccoli and carrots, potatoes. Pour soup over ingredients. Put top on pie. Preheat over 350\u00b0. Cook pie in oven until golden brown or approximately 1 hour.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Poached Seafood In Tomato Sauce With Risotto
ingredients: ['1 Box Bertolli Risotto', '2 Tbsp Bertolli Olive Oil', '1 Tbsp Butter', '2 Tbsp finely chopped onion', '3 cans stewed tomatoes', '2 Bay leaves, whole', '1 Tsp hot red pepper oil', '1/2 Tsp ground black pepper', '4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '2 lbs (approx) Orange Roughie or Halibut in 1-inch cubes, deboned and no skin', '1/2 cup tiny bay scallops', '1/2 cup small shrimp, peeled and deveined']
directions: Prepare Bertolli risotto according to directions. While it is simmering, use a separate dutch oven to saute the onions in olive oil and butter til just before brown. Then add the stewed tomatoes, spices and garlic. Let this mixture come to a gentle simmer on medium heat. When it starts to bubble, add the fish, scallops and shrimp. Continue to poach until the fish is solid and cooked through. Place 3/4 cup cooked Bertolli risotto on each dinner plate and top with a generous ladleful of the poached seafood in tomato sauce. Garnish with a sprig Italian parsley and serve hot with lemon wedges on the side.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Shrimp Creole
ingredients: ['1 stick oleo', '1 c. bell pepper, chopped', '2 c. onion, chopped', '2 c. celery, chopped', '1/2 c. flour', '2 large (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce', '6 Tbsp. sugar', '1 tsp. chili powder', '1/2 tsp. hot sauce', '1 1/2 Tbsp. salt', '46 oz. tomato juice', '1 Tbsp. black pepper']
directions: Saute pepper, onion and celery in oleo until tender and soft, not brown. Add flour and mix well. Add other ingredients; mix well and cook on low for 2 hours. Add 3 pounds shrimp that have been\tpeeled and deveined. Cook slowly for another hour.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Beef Flank Steak, Roasted
ingredients: ['3 oz. extra lean beef flank steak', '1 peeled garlic clove', '1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar', '1 tsp. extra virgin olive oil', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. dried basil leaves', '1 carrot', '1 whole wheat dinner', '1/8 lb. sliced fresh strawberries', '1/8 lb. fresh or frozen blueberries', '1/4 vanilla low-fat yogurt', '10 piece bear-shaped cinnamon graham snacks']
directions: Trim fat from measured amount of flank steak. Peel and mince garlic; place in small bowl with red wine vinegar, measured amount of olive oil, basil and salt. Whisk together. Wash and peel carrot; slice thinly. Place a large piece of aluminum foil inside of a shallow oven-safe container. Place meat in foil. Spread olive oil mixture over top of meat, and place sliced carrots on top of meat. Seal foil tightly around flank steak. Bake at 450 F for 35 to 40 minutes. Serve meat and carrots with a whole wheat dinner roll. While meat roasts, create Very Beary Teddy Parfait by slicing strawberries, and then combining them with blueberries and yogurt. Layer 1/2 of the graham snacks and yogurt mixture in parfait glass. Refrigerate. Top with remaining graham snacks just before serving.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Hollowed Rye Bread
ingredients: ['1 (1 1/2 oz.) pkg. dry vegetable soup mix', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. sour cream or yogurt', '1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped', '1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and drained', '1 (1 lb.) loaf round rye bread']
directions: Combine soup mix, mayonnaise, sour cream, chestnuts and spinach. Place dip in hollowed out rye loaf. Serve dip with bread pieces from the hollow, then rip off pieces until the loaf is gone. Makes about 2 cups of dip.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Garden Vegetable Twist
ingredients: ['1 c. chopped broccoli', '1 c. thinly sliced carrots', '1 tsp. dried basil leaves, crushed', '1/2 tsp. garlic powder', "1 can Campbell's Healthy Request cream of celery soup", '1 c. skim milk', '2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese', '2 c. cubed cooked chicken']
directions: In a skillet over medium heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive oil, cook broccoli and carrots with basil and garlic powder until tender, stirring often. Stir in soup, milk and cheese; add macaroni and chicken. Heat through, stirring often. Makes 4 servings. 350 calories, 11 g fat.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Cheesy Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '12 medium onion', '14 cup whole wheat flour', '3 12 cups skim milk', '1 12 cups Velveeta cheese', '1 12 cups broccoli', '1 12 cups cauliflower', '1 12 cups carrots']
directions: Chop broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots. Steam broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots until tender, and set aside. Dice onion, and soften in large soup pot with olive oil and flour. Add milk slowly to onion, stirring. Cube velveeta and add to pot, stirring until fully melted. Add steamed vegetables to cheesy base, and serve.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Birds Eye Mushroom Risotto With Roasted Red Peppers & Peas
ingredients: ['1 bag (10 oz) Birds Eye(R) Mushroom & Green Bean Risotto, cooked according to package directions', '2 tablespoons diced roasted red bell pepper, drained', '1/2 cup Birds Eye(R) Baby Sweet Peas, thawed under warm water', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme']
directions: Pour prepared risotto into a bowl. Stir in red peppers, peas and thyme. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serving Suggestion: Serve with grilled steak and Birds Eye(R) Asparagus, Gold & White Corn, Baby Carrots.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Zucchini Cookies
ingredients: ['1/2 cup margarine, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '1 egg', '1 cup grated zucchini', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1 cup raisins']
directions: In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg then stir in the zucchini. Combine the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon; stir into the zucchini mixture. Mix in raisins. Cover dough and chill for at least 1 hour or overnight. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Grease cookie sheets. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheet. Cookies should be about 2 inches apart. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven until set. Allow cookies to cool slightly on the cookie sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Beef 'n Broccoli Noodle Bowl
ingredients: ['300 g (1/3 of 900-g pkg.) linguine, uncooked', '1 Tbsp. oil', '1 lb. (500 g) beef sirloin steak, thinly sliced Whole Foods 1 lb For $7.99 thru 02/09', '1 cup broccoli florets', '1 cup sliced carrots (about 2 medium) Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06', '1/2 cup beef broth', '1/3 cup hoisin sauce', '1/4 cup Kraft Balsamic Vinaigrette Dressing', '1 Tbsp. minced gingerroot or 1/2 tsp. ground ginger']
directions: Cook pasta in large saucepan as directed on package. Meanwhile, heat oil in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat. Add steak, broccoli and carrots; cook and stir 4 min. or until steak is evenly browned. Add broth, hoisin sauce, dressing and gingerroot; stir. Cover. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer 3 min. or until vegetables are crisp-tender, stirring occasionally. Drain pasta; return to pan. Add steak mixture; toss lightly.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Steak With Quick Mushroom "Risotto"
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 pounds strip steak', 'Kosher salt and pepper', '10 ounces mushrooms, sliced', '1/2 cup dry white wine (such as Sauvignon Blanc)', '1 cup orzo', '2 cups low-sodium chicken broth', '3/4 cup grated Parmesan', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary, chopped', '1 bunch broccoli rabe', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice']
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season the steak with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper and cook, 3 to 5 minutes per side for medium-rare. Transfer to a cutting board; let rest. Wipe out the skillet and heat the remaining oil over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and cook, 3 minutes. Add the wine and cook until evaporated. Add the orzo and chicken broth and simmer until the broth is absorbed, about 10 minutes. Stir in the Parmesan, rosemary, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Steam the broccoli rabe in a separate pot until tender, about 5 minutes, as the orzo cooks. Drizzle the rabe with the lemon juice. Divide among plates. Serve with the steak and \ risotto.\  Orzo, a rice-shaped pasta, is a speedy stand-in for the Arborio rice traditionally used in risotto. Cooking orzo in broth instead of water intensifies its flavor.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Vegetable Pizza
ingredients: ['2 rolls crescent dinner rolls', '2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese', '1/2 c. sour cream', '3/4 c. mayonnaise', '1 pkg. Ranch salad dressing mix', '1 c. diced tomatoes', '1 c. diced broccoli', '1 c. diced carrots', '1 c. diced onions', '1 c. diced cucumbers', '1 c. diced green peppers', 'grated Cheddar cheese']
directions: Spread dinner roll dough onto pizza pan. Bake as directed on package; let it cool. Mix the cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise and Ranch mix in bowl. Spread mixture onto crust. Cover mixture with tomatoes, broccoli, carrots, onions, cucumbers and green peppers. Top off with Cheddar cheese.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Skillet Beef and Potatoes
ingredients: ['1/4 lb. unpeeled red potatoes, cut into thin slices', '3 oz. beef sirloin steak, cut into thin slices', '1/2 oz. GOOD SEASONS Italian Dressing Mix', '1/4 medium yellow onion, chopped', '1 tsp. canola oil', '1 cup frozen peas and carrots, thawed', '2 Tbsp. drinking water', '1 tsp. olive oil', '1 peeled garlic clove', '4 oz. frozen broccoli florets, thawed, drained', '2 Tbsp. sliced pitted ripe olives, drained', '1 Tbsp. KRAFT Reduced Fat Parmesan Style Grated Topping']
directions: Place potatoes in large microwavable bowl. Add enough water to cover potatoes completely. Cover and microwave on HIGH 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, place steak slices in large bowl. Sprinkle with salad dressing mix (1/2 ounce = 1 Tbsp. ); toss to coat. Cook onion in hot canola oil in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add steak mixture; cook until steak is cooked through, stirring frequently. Reduce heat to medium-low. Drain potatoes. Add to steak mixture in skillet along with peas and carrots and water; stir gently. Cover; simmer 5 minutes or until water is absorbed and mixture is heated through. Meanwhile, for Broccoli with Black Olives, heat olive oil in large nonstick skillet on medium-high heat. Add garlic clove (minced); cook and stir 30 seconds or until tender. Add broccoli and olives to skillet; cook and stir 4 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Remove from heat. Stir in grated topping. Serve immediately.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Rarebit Risotto
ingredients: ['4 cups vegetable broth (low sodium preferred)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 1/2 cups arborio rice', '12 ounces beer (I prefer a lager or ale)', '3 cups chopped broccoli florets', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '4 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, shredded', '2 cups chopped roma tomatoes', 'salt and pepper']
directions: In a medium saucepan, bring vegetable broth to a gentle simmer. In a medium dutch oven (or large sauce pan), heat olive oil over medium high heat. Add rice and stir till well coated and golden. Add beer and stir till rice has absorbed all the liquid. Ladle in a cup or so of the stock and continue stirring till liquid is absorbed, about 5 minutes. Repeat till all broth has been absorbed (stirring constantly). While risotto is cooking, steam broccoli until bright green and just tender (I just pop it in a bowl, sprinkle with water, and microwave for a minute or so). When the last of the broth is absorbed, add mustard and cheese and stir till cheese is melted and well combined with risotto. Stir in broccoli and tomatoes and sever immediately. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Lobster Salad
ingredients: ['4 cups lobsters, cooked', '12 cup celery, diced', '12 teaspoon salt', '18 teaspoon paprika', '14 cup oil-and-vinegar dressing, more as needed (French Dressing (Not Catalina Style), your own recipe or store bought)', "12 cup mayonnaise (use a good quality, such as Hellman's)", '1 egg, hard cooked and sliced', 'salad greens', 'capers, for garnish', 'stuffed olives, sliced for garnish']
directions: Cut lobster in small pieces and mix well with celery, salt and paprika. Marinate in dressing and chill thoroughly. Place salad greens on a chilled platter and pile the lobster in the center. Cover with mayonnaise and garnish with egg, capers and olives.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Bruschetta-Stuffed Chicken Breasts
ingredients: ['3 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1/2 tomatoes, diced', '3 tablespoons fresh basil, chopped', '1/4 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded', '3 tablespoons parmesan cheese, grated', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3/4 cup Italian seasoned breadcrumbs', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0F. Mix diced tomatoes, chopped basil, and cheeses in a bowl with olive oil. In a separate bowl, combine bread crumbs, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Place chicken breasts, one at a time, into a zip-top bag. Pound with a tenderizing mallet or a rolling pin until uniformly about 1/4\  thick. Distribute tomato mix evenly on top of the chicken breasts. Roll each breast up, starting from one of the narrow ends. Moisten with water and roll in bread crumb mixture. Bake for approximately 30 minutes. Optional: about 5 minutes before cooking time is up, top each breast with a little of the reserved tomato mix. Continue baking until cheese is melted.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Broccoli And Zucchini Pasta Recipe
ingredients: ['1 head broccoli', '8 ounce. spaghetti', '5 cloves garlic', '1 zucchini', '1/4 c. extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1/4 c. butter', '1/2 c. Parmesan cheese', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Steam broccoli. Cook spaghetti. While spaghetti cooks, saute/fry garlic and zucchini in oil. Add in oregano, salt and pepper. Heat butter and add in the broccoli to zucchini. Toss zucchini and broccoli with spaghetti. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. (Fast and easy summer dinner.) Serves 4-5.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Cheesy Broccoli Mac
ingredients: ['1 pkg. (7-1/4 oz.) KRAFT Macaroni & Cheese Dinner', '1-1/2 cups frozen broccoli florets']
directions: Prepare Dinner and cook broccoli (separately) as directed on packages. Top Dinner with broccoli.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Garden Linguine(I Usually Halve This Recipe.)
ingredients: ['1 (14 1/2 oz.) chicken broth', '1 bunch broccoli (flowerets only)', '2 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1 lb. fresh green beans', '1 Tbsp. olive oil', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced', '1 red bell pepper, sliced', '1 1/4 c. milk', '1 tsp. dried basil', '1/2 tsp. dried oregano', '1/4 c. chopped parsley', 'salt and pepper', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. linguine', '1/3 c. Parmesan cheese']
directions: Boil broth until reduced to half. Cook broccoli, carrots and beans in microwave until crisp tender. In large skillet, heat olive oil and saute onion, garlic, mushrooms, broccoli, pepper, carrots and asparagus until almost soft. Add reduced broth, milk, basil, oregano, parsley, salt and pepper. Simmer 10 minutes. If needed, thicken slightly with 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 3 tablespoons cold water. Cook pasta and drain. Combine with vegetables. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. This cooks up quickly if the vegetables are cut ahead of time.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Roasted Butternut Squash Risotto With Sage
ingredients: ['1 whole Butternut Squash', '3 Tablespoons Or More Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Divided', '1 whole Small Onion, Diced', '1 clove Garlic, Minced', '1 cup Arborio Or Carnaroli Rice', '2 Tablespoons Fresh Sage, Minced', '1 Tablespoon Fresh Thyme, Minced', '1/2 cups White Wine', '5 cups Or More, Chicken Stock, Warmed', '1/2 cups Grated Parmigiano Reggiano Cheese']
directions: Peel squash with a vegetable peeler. Trim ends. Cut squash in half, vertically. (You can save one half for another use-roast it and serve it with dinner tomorrow). Scoop out seeds. Cut squash into 1-inch cubes and place on a foil-lined baking sheet. Drizzle with some olive oil, salt and pepper. Bake at 350 degrees until tender, about 25 minutes. Test with a fork. You want nice crispy carmelized pieces. Do not be afraid to roast the squash a little longer. Meanwhile, start risotto. In a medium-sized pot (I use a Chef's pan with sloping sides, it makes stirring the risotto easier), add 2 tablespoons olive oil and chopped onion. Saute onion until it starts to get a little soft, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and saute for 1 minute. Add rice and toast the rice, stirring for about 2 to 3 minutes. Add herbs and stir. Add wine and let simmer for a couple of minutes. Start adding stock with a ladle, just a couple of ladles at a time. Stir the risotto and leave uncovered at a simmer. When the stock has almost completely evaporated, add a couple more ladles and stir. Continue this until risotto is creamy, about 25 minutes. Turn off the heat and add cheese and roasted squash.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Healthy Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['1 to 2 lb. steak, cubed', '2 c. broccoli spears', '1 c. chopped celery', '1 c. julienne carrots', '1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms', '1/2 c. chopped onion', 'salt to taste', '2 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. cooking oil']
directions: Brown steak in 1 tablespoon cooking oil. Set aside bowl. Cook broccoli, celery and carrots in 1 tablespoon oil until onion is clear. Drain excess oil from pan. Salt to taste. Heat until hot. Serve with rice. Yield: 6 servings.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Barbecue Beef
ingredients: ['1 lb. chopped beef', '1/2 c. catsup', '2 tsp. dry mustard', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 c. onion, chopped', '1/2 c. green pepper, chopped', '2 Tbsp. vinegar', '1/2 c. celery, chopped']
directions: Brown meat and onions in a large pan. Add rest of ingredients and simmer for about 1 hour. Serve on buns.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Oriental Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['1 lb. round steak, cut into 1-inch strips', '1 bunch broccoli', '1/2 head cauliflower', '1/2 lb. mini carrots', '2 ribs celery', '6 green onions', '1/3 lb. snow peas', '6 to 8 fresh mushrooms', '1/2 green and/or red pepper', '2 Tbsp. dried parsley', '1 tsp. minced garlic', '1 tsp. ground ginger', '1 beef bouillon cube', '1 c. water', '3 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1 1/2 Tbsp. wine vinegar', '1 Tbsp. cornstarch', 'cooked rice', 'chow mein noodles']
directions: Put steak into freezer for about 45 minutes. Cut steak into 1-inch strips. Wash vegetables and break broccoli and cauliflower into flowerets. Cut carrots, celery and onions on the diagonal. Slice mushrooms. Stir-fry onion and celery together and remove from pan. Stir-fry carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, snow peas, pepper and mushrooms separately and remove each from pan when finished. Stir-fry steak, ginger and garlic until done. Remove steak. Mix together water, soy sauce, wine vinegar, bouillon cube, cornstarch and parsley together. Add mixture to pan and cook until thick. Add all vegetables and steak and heat through. Serve over cooked rice and top with chow mein noodles. Other meats and vegetables may be substituted.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Chicken With Caramelised Baby Onions And Pears
ingredients: ['4 small firm beurre bosc pears or 2 large firm beurre bosc pears, unpeeled, quartered and cored', '40 g unsalted butter', '4 tablespoons sunflower oil', '500 g shallots or 500 g baby onions', '1 onion, peeled and chopped', '1 large chicken, jointed', 'sea salt, to taste', 'fresh ground black pepper, to taste', 'good pinch saffron thread', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 -2 tablespoon clear honey', '100 g blanched almonds (optional)']
directions: Melt the butter in a non-stick pan over a medium heat, add 1 tablespoon of sunflower oil and saute the pear quarters until they are lightly coloured, then set aside. Blanch the eschalots or baby onions in boiling water for 5 minutes, and drain. When they are cool enough to handle, peel the eschalots and trim the root ends. Saute the eschallots in a little sunflower oil, in a non-stick pan (you can use the same pan as you used to saute the pears) over a medium heat, shaking the pan and turning the eschalots until they are browned and caramelized on all sides. Remove the eschalots from the pan and drain them on paper kitchen towelling. Add 3-4 tablespoons of oil to a casserole pot large enough to include the chicken pieces, pears and eschalots, and saute the chopped onion over a medium heat until it begins to soften; then add the chicken pieces and lightly brown them on all sides. Season to taste. Add 1 cup of water, and stir in the saffron threads, ginger and cinnamon, and cook, covered, over a low heat, turning the pieces over several times, for 10-15 minutes or until the breasts are cooked. Remove the breasts, set aside and keep warm. Add the caramelised eschalots to the pot. If the pear quarters are still firm (see also step 14), add them to the pot now and continue to cook, covered, over a low heat, for 25 minutes or until the remaining chicken pieces are very tender, turning occasionally, and adding a little more water if it is needed. Lift the chicken pieces out, set aside with the breasts, and keep warm. Stir the honey into the pot and check the seasoning. You will need quite a bit of pepper to balance the sweetness. Cook uncovered to reduce the sauce if necessary, until the sauce has the consistency of thick jam. Return all the chicken pieces to the pot and heat through. If the pears were soft enough after they were sauteed, add them at this point. A few minutes heating should be enough. If you are serving this dish with blanched almonds, lightly toast the almonds under the grill or dry saute them in a non-stick pan (or you can add a drop of oil). Serve over rice, noodles or couscous.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Amazing Horseradish Sauce For Prime Rib
ingredients: ['3 2/3 tablespoons horseradish (drain before measuring)', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon cider vinegar', '2 teaspoons grainy mustard', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard or 1 teaspoon sweet mustard (I prefer the sweet)', '1 1/4 teaspoons sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 dash red pepper']
directions: Stir all ingredients together in fancy serving bowl. Serve with prime rib or cold family steak.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Veggie Packed Leftover Chicken Chowder Recipe
ingredients: ['5 carrots', '1 can corn', '1/2 lb. cooked chicken breast', '1 large onion', '1/2 head broccoli', '3 medium sized potatoes', '1 bell pepper (any color)', '1 large tomato', '1 stick of butter', 'cheese', '1 packet of beef Stroganoff sauce mix', '1 cube of chicken and tomato bouillon', 'leftover mashed potatoes (optional)', '2 c. of lowfat milk']
directions: Chop all ingredients very small. Saute/fry onions and pepper in heated pot with extra virgin olive oil. Add in broccoli, carrots, potatoes, tomato and chicken. Stir in the sauce mix and bouillon, then pour in the lowfat milk, mixing ingredients well. Add in the stick of butter. Add in mashed potatoes and cook till potatoes and carrots are tender. Garnish with cheese and serve.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Easy Barbecue Chicken
ingredients: ['3 or 4 chicken breasts, skinned', '1 c. catsup', '12 oz. cola']
directions: Simmer until the chicken is tender and the sauce thickens.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Crisp Greens With Guacamole ,Sour Cream ,And STEAK!!
ingredients: ['1 ripe avocado', '1 teaspoon lime juice', '1 green onion, minced', '2 teaspoons garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '14 cup vegetable oil', '2 teaspoons white wine vinegar', '14 teaspoon oregano', '1 dash cumin', 'assorted greens', 'tomatoes, chopped', 'cucumber, sliced', '8 ounces sour cream', '34 cup shredded cheddar cheese', '16 ounces top sirloin steaks', 'plain Doritos']
directions: Mash avacoda with lime juice and green onion. Chill. Combine garlic, salt, and olive oil. Rub on steak. Mix veg. oil, vinegar, oregano and cumin in small bowl. Chill. Broil steak to desired doneness. Let rest on cutting board 5 minutes. Cut into small cubes. On dinner plates, layer greens, tomato,cucumber. Pour vinegar mix over greens. Add steak cubes. Add cheese. Put Doritos around the edge of the plate. Serve with the avacoda and sour cream.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Easiest Ever Lemon Squares
ingredients: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '1/4 cup granulated sugar', '1/2 cup butter', '1/3 cup raspberry jam', '2 eggs', '1 (212 g) package lemon pie filling mix', '1/2 cup ground almonds', '1/4 cup sliced almonds']
directions: Combine flour and sugar, then butter until the mixture clumps together. Press firmly into 8\  square pan. Bake at 350 degrees 15-18 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove from oven and spread with jam. Beat eggs until light and creamy. Beat in pie filling powder and ground almonds. Pour over jam layer. Sprinkle with sliced almonds. Bake 20-25 minutes at 350 or until set and firm to touch. Cool and cut. For Lemon Coconut squares sub 1 1/2 cups flaked coconut for the ground almonds and sliced almonds.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Sicilian Steak
ingredients: ['1 1-inch thick Steak or Sirloin Tips', '1\\\\3 C. Italian Bread Crumbs', '1\\\\3 C. Romano Pecorino Cheese, grated', '1\\\\2 tsp. Dalt', 'Dash Pepper', '2 tbsp. Olive Oil']
directions: Put olive oil on a dinner plate (big enough for steak). On another plate, mix bread crumbs and cheese. Dip steak in oil, covering both sides, then on to the bread crumbs, covering both sides. Broil for 10 min, then flip to cook other side. Serve with Italian bread, butter and a salad. Bon Apetit!

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Rarebit Risotto
ingredients: ['1 quart vegetable broth (see page 295)', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 1/2 cups arborio rice', '12 ounces beer (1 1/2 cups)', '3 cups chopped broccoli', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '4 cups loosely packed grated sharp Cheddar cheese (about 10 ounces)', '2 cups chopped tomatoes or halved cherry tomatoes', 'Sprinkling of black pepper']
directions: In a saucepan, bring the broth to a boil and then reduce the heat to maintain a gentle simmer. Meanwhile, in a large, heavy saucepan on medium-high heat, warm the olive oil. Add the rice and stir until well coated with oil. Add the beer and stir until the rice has absorbed the liquid, a couple of minutes. Ladle in the simmering broth a cup at a time, stirring often. Let the rice absorb most of the broth before adding the next cup, usually about 5 minutes between additions. While the risotto is cooking, steam the broccoli until bright green and just tender. Set aside. When the last of the broth is absorbed, the kernels of rice should be al dente and the risotto moist. Add the mustard and cheese to the risotto and stir until the cheese is melted. Stir in the broccoli and tomatoes, season with black pepper, and serve hot. Serve something crisp with this silky risotto.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Green Rice
ingredients: ['1 c. onions, chopped', '1/4 c. cooking oil', '1 1/2 c. rice (uncooked)', '2/3 c. green peppers, minced', '1/3 c. parsley, minced', '3 c. chicken stock', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper']
directions: Saute onions in salad oil until tender, but not browned. Add remaining ingredients. Pour into a 2-quart baking pan. Cover. Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for about 45 minutes or until rice is tender. Toss lightly with a fork before serving. Serves 6 to 8.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Grilled Steak And Portobello Salad
ingredients: ['1 pound skirt steak', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'Salt and pepper', '4 portobello mushroom caps', '1/4 cup olive oil', '10 cup baby arugula', '1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 ounces blue cheese, crumbled']
directions: Combine steak, 2 Tbsp. vinegar and 1/2 tsp. salt in a ziplock bag; seal bag and turn several times to coat. Set aside for 15 minutes. Preheat a gas grill to high. Brush mushroom caps with 2 Tbsp. oil and season with salt and pepper. Remove steak from bag; discard liquid. Oil grill grates and grill mushroom caps and steak until tender, turning once, about 10 minutes total for mushrooms, 6 to 7 minutes total for steak. Transfer mushrooms and steak to a cutting board and let stand 5 minutes. Coarsely chop mushrooms and slice steak against grain. Combine arugula, tomatoes, mushrooms, remaining 2 Tbsp. olive oil, remaining 1 Tbsp. vinegar and 1/4 tsp. salt in a large bowl; toss to coat. Arrange salad on dinner plates. Top with sliced steak and sprinkle with cheese.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Pasta & Broccoli with Parmesan
ingredients: ['1 oz. rotini pasta, uncooked', '1 cup chopped frozen broccoli', '2 tsp. extra virgin olive oil', '1 peeled garlic clove, minced', '2 Tbsp. KRAFT Reduced Fat Parmesan Style Grated Topping', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice Safeway 4 ct For $5.00 thru 02/09', '1/2 cup sliced frozen carrots', '1 fresh peach', '8 fl oz (1 cup) fat-free milk']
directions: Cook pasta and broccoli according to package instructions. Drain, but do not rinse pasta; place into large bowl. Blend olive oil, garlic, parmesan cheese and lemon juice in a small bowl; pour over hot pasta and blend well. Fold in hot broccoli. Heat carrots as directed on package. Enjoy a fresh peach for dessert. Serve meal with a glass of milk.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Broccoli & Garlic Pasta For One
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 teaspoon lite olive oil or 1 teaspoon virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons white wine', '1/4 cup chicken broth, defatted or 1/4 cup vegetable broth', '1 cup broccoli floret', '2 cups cooked pasta', 'salt and pepper', '2 tablespoons parmesan cheese or 2 tablespoons romano cheese, grated']
directions: Saute the onions and garlic in the olive oil until soft. Add wine, broth& broccoli. cover and cook for 3 minutes. Toss pasta with broccoli and cook until both are heated through. Season to taste, put on a dinner plate and sprinkle with cheese.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Wheat Drop Biscuits
ingredients: ['1-1/4 cup Wheat Flour', '1 cup All-purpose Flour', '4 teaspoons Baking Powder', '1/2 teaspoons Salt', '2 Tablespoons Sugar', '1/3 cups Shortening', '2/3 cups Milk', '2 whole Eggs']
directions: Mix together the flours, baking powder, salt, and sugar. Cut in the shortening. Gently stir in the milk and eggs. Mix just until the dough follows the spoon. Knead 4-5 turns on a floured board. (You may need to add more flour to get the dough so it's not sticky.) Drop mounds onto an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 425 degrees for 10-12 minutes.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Baked Salmon With Coconut Crust
ingredients: ['4 (4 ounce) salmon fillets, skin removed', '1T coconut white balsamic', '1/2 cup panko bread crumbs', '1/4 cup flaked sweetened coconut', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste', 'Cooking spray']
directions: Place salmon fillets on a non-stick baking pan. Brush balsamic vinegar on salmon.  In a shallow dish, combine pano, coconut, salt and pepper. Dredge each fillet in the mixture and return to baking pan. Spread leftover crumbs on top of each fillet. Coat with cooking spray.  Bake for 12-15 minutes. If desired, put under broiler until crust is golden brown.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Chicken Enchilada
ingredients: ['1 (8 oz.) pkg. Doritos or Fritos or tortilla chips, crushed', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies', '1 lb. Longhorn cheese, cubed', '2 c. cooked chicken, chopped', '1 c. chicken broth', '2 cans cream of chicken soup', '1 (8 oz.) jar El Paso taco sauce']
directions: Mix all ingredients, except taco sauce. Stir well in large pan. Pour into buttered casserole dish and cover with taco sauce. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 45 minutes. Don't let it get too brown.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Military Diet Day 2
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice toast', '12 banana', '2 ounces cheddar cheese', '1 hard-boiled egg', '5 saltine crackers', '2 hot dogs', '1 cup broccoli', '12 cup carrot', '12 banana', '12 cup vanilla frozen yogurt']
directions: Breakfast:. 1 egg. 1 slice of toast. 1/2 banana. Lunch:. 2 oz cheddar cheese. 1 hard boiled egg. 5 saltine crackers. Dinner:. 2 hot dogs. 1 cup of broccoli. 1/2 cup of carrots. 1/2 banana. 1/2 cup vanilla frozen yogurt.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Glazed Carrots Asian Style
ingredients: ['6 large carrots, halved', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce', '3 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '2 teaspoons minced fresh ginger root', '1/4 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder']
directions: Bring a large pot of water to boil, add the carrots and parboil for 5 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a large glass dish, combine the remaining ingredients. Add the carrots and marinate for 30 minutes. Prepare an outdoor grill with an oiled rack set 4 inches from the heat source. Using a oiled wire hinged vegetable basket or just directly on the rack ( whichever you find easier), grill the carrots, turning constantly for a total of 10 minutes, until slightly charred.

ing: risotto, steak, olive oil, milk, carrots, broccoli, cheese
title: Vegetable Squares
ingredients: ['2 pkg. crescent dinner rolls', '2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese', '1 c. Miracle Whip', '1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing']
directions: Bake dinner rolls flat on jelly roll pan. Mix the cream cheese, Miracle Whip and Ranch dressing. Spread on dinner rolls. Top with broccoli, cauliflower, carrots and peppers. Refrigerate for 2 hours.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Exotic Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['4 c. chopped, cooked chicken', '2 (5 oz.) cans water chestnuts, sliced', '1 c. finely chopped celery', '1 lb. fresh seedless grapes', '1 c. toasted slivered almonds', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks']
directions: Combine chicken, water chestnuts, celery, grapes and almonds. Mix mayonnaise, curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice. Add mayonnaise mixture to chicken mixture and chill for several hours. Serve on leaf lettuce and top with pineapple chunks. Garnish with orchids, tropical fruit slices, etc. if desired.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Chicken Salad Sandwiches
ingredients: ['2 cups cubed cooked chicken breast', '3/4 cup chopped apple', '3/4 cup dried cranberries', '3/4 cup mayonnaise', '1/2 cup chopped walnuts', '1/2 cup chopped celery', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon chopped green onion', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '6 lettuce leaves', '6 croissants, split']
directions: In a large bowl, combine the chicken, apple, cranberries, mayonnaise, walnuts, celery, lemon juice, onion and curry powder. Place lettuce on croissants. Top with chicken salad mixture.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Chicken And Guacamole Tostadas
ingredients: ['1 ripe peeled avocado', '1 cup plus 2 tablespoons finely chopped tomato, divided', '3 tablespoons minced fresh onion, divided', '3 tablespoons fresh lime juice, divided', '1/2 teaspoon salt, divided', '1 small garlic clove, minced', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro', '1 tablespoon minced seeded jalapeno pepper', '2 cups shredded skinless, boneless rotisserie chicken breast', '1/4 teaspoon smoked paprika', '8 (6-inch) corn tostada shells']
directions: Place avocado in a small bowl; mash with a fork. Stir in 2 tablespoons tomato, 1 tablespoon onion, 1 tablespoon juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and garlic. Combine remaining 1 cup tomato, 2 tablespoons onion, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1/4 teaspoon salt, cilantro, and jalapeno; toss well. Combine chicken, remaining 1 tablespoon juice, and paprika; toss well to combine. Spread about 1 tablespoon guacamole over each tostada shell; top each with 1/4 cup chicken mixture and about 2 tablespoons salsa.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Polynesian Turkey Salad
ingredients: ['4 cups diced turkey breast', '1 cup diced delicious red apple', '1 (15 1/4 oz) can of pineapple tidbits, drained', '1 cup Hellmans lite mayo', '1 teaspoons lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '1 (11oz) can of mandarin oranges, drained and rinsed']
directions: Combine first four ingredients in a large bowl and mix well. Combine mayo, lemon juice, curry powder and then stir into turkey mixture. Add oranges and toss gently. Cover and chill. Serve on a bed of lettuce.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Baked Cheese And Crab Dip
ingredients: ['8 oz. imitation crab meat, shredded', '1 c. Swiss cheese, grated', '1/2 c. mayonnaise', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '1/2 tsp. curry powder', '4 green onions, chopped', '1/4 c. slivered almonds', '1 tsp. butter']
directions: Mix crab meat, Swiss cheese, mayonnaise, lemon juice, curry powder and onions together; bake for 20 minutes at 300\u00b0.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Sweet Apple Face Snack
ingredients: ['1 apple (per person)', '1 bag mini marshmallows', '1 jar peanut butter', '1 bag mini chocolate chips', '1 bag red shoe string licorice', '1 bag black shoe string licorice']
directions: Wash apple. Spread peanut butter all over apple. Decorate with mini marshmallows and chocolate chips for eyes and eye brows. Use licorice for hair. Have fun creating your own sweet apple face!

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Mom'S Chicken And Broccoli Casserole
ingredients: ['3 to 4 chicken breasts', '1 c. mayo', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 can cream of celery soup', '1 (16 oz.) frozen broccoli', '1 tsp. curry powder', 'Cheddar cheese']
directions: Boil chicken until tender. Remove meat from bone. Mix chicken, mayo, lemon juice, celery soup, broccoli and curry powder. Place in large casserole dish. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes. Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese, more the better. Bake additional 5 minutes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Chicken And Broccoli
ingredients: ['4 whole chicken breasts, cooked', '2 pkg. frozen broccoli, cooked and drained', '1 can cream of chicken soup', '2/3 c. mayonnaise', '1/3 c. evaporated milk', '1/2 c. grated American cheese', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 c. buttered bread crumbs']
directions: Skin and debone cooked chicken breasts. Place broccoli in buttered casserole dish and top with chicken meat. Combine undiluted chicken soup with mayonnaise, milk, cheese, lemon juice and curry powder. Pour over chicken and broccoli mixture. Sprinkle with bread crumbs. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Quaker Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['3/4 cup shortening', '1 cup brown sugar', '1/2 cup white sugar', '1 egg', '1/4 cup water', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '3 cups oats, uncooked', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 cup raisins', '1/2 - 1 cup nuts, chopped']
directions: Beat together shortening, sugars, egg, water and vanilla until creamy. Add combined remaining ingredients; mix well. Add raisins, nuts or even chocolate chips at the end. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-15 minutes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Hamburger Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 chopped onion', '1 c. chopped bell pepper', '1 c. cooked macaroni or small seashells', '1/2 c. Pepperidge Farm herb dressing', '1 c. diced Cheddar cheese']
directions: Brown beef, onion and pepper; add macaroni, dressing and cheese. Top with 1 can tomato puree or sauce. Sprinkle top with Parmesan cheese or Romano cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Popeye'S Passion
ingredients: ['2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach', '1/2 pkg. firm tofu', '1 lb. red potatoes, boiled and cooled', '1 can cream of potato soup', '1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1/2 c. shredded Cheddar', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Cook, drain and squeeze excess water from spinach. Boil potatoes; slice thin and line casserole dish. Cut remainder into small cubes. Cut tofu into small cubes. Mix spinach, potato soup (no milk added), curry powder, cubed potatoes and cubed tofu. Spread over thinly sliced potatoes in casserole dish. Top with shredded Cheddar. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Polynesian Turkey Salad
ingredients: ['4 cups diced turkey', 'chicken, cooked', '1 cup unpeeled and diced Red Delicious apple', '1 cup chopped pecans', '1 can (15-1/4 oz.) pineapple tidbits, drained', '1 cup mayonnaise', '2 tsp. lemon juice', '1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 can (11 oz.) mandarin oranges, drained', 'Lettuce leaves']
directions: Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl; mix well. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, and curry powder; stir into turkey mixture. Add mandarin oranges, and gently toss. Cover and chill. Serve on lettuce leaves.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Tofu Yam Curry
ingredients: ['454 g medium firm tofu, cubed', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '1 yam', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 medium white onion', '1 cup coconut milk', '1 tablespoon cornstarch', '1 tablespoon curry powder']
directions: Mix oil, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, and curry powder in small bowl. Brush tofu cubes with marinade and place in a container with a lid. Refrigerate for about one hour. Preheat Oven to 350 degrees F. Peel and cut yam into 1/2 inch cubes and place on a cooking sheet covered with tinfoil. Sprinkle with 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, and 1 tablespoon curry powder. Bake in oven for 20min, or until tender. Sautee onions in butter and 1 teaspoon curry powder. Add marinated tofu and fry about 5min. Then add yams and fry another 5min. Add coconut milk and cornstarch, and let simmer about 10min. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon curry powder and stir in right before serving. Eat with couscous or rice.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Seafood Wild Rice Salad
ingredients: ['1/2 c. mayonnaise', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 tsp. curry powder', '2 c. cold, cooked wild rice', '1/2 c. very finely chopped green pepper', '1 lb. whole medium cooked shrimp, drained and deveined', 'cherry tomatoes', 'parsley', 'lettuce']
directions: Mix mayonnaise, lemon juice and curry powder in a 2 1/2-quart bowl. Add rice, pepper and shrimp; toss. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour. Spoon onto lettuce lined dish. Garnish with cherry tomato halves and parsley.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Crunchy Salmon Cakes With Greek Yogurt Sauce
ingredients: ['1-1/4 pounds salmon fillet', '1/8 teaspoon plus 1/4 teaspoon pepper, divided', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley', '1-1/2 cups panko (Japanese) bread crumbs, divided', '1/2 cup reduced-fat mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, optional', '2 egg whites, lightly beaten', 'Cooking spray', '1/4 cup reduced-fat plain Greek yogurt', '1 teaspoon snipped fresh dill', '3/4 teaspoon lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon capers, drained and chopped']
directions: Place salmon on a coated with cooking spray; sprinkle with 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 until fish flakes easily with a fork, 14-17 minutes. Cool slightly; remove skin, if necessary. Transfer salmon to a shallow dish and cover; refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion; cook and stir until tender. Stir in parsley. In a large bowl, combine 1/2 cup bread crumbs, mayonnaise, lemon juice, salt, remaining pepper and the onion mixture; if desired, add pepper sauce. Flake salmon; add to bread crumb mixture, mixing lightly. Shape into eight 2-1/2-in. patties. Place egg whites and remaining bread crumbs in separate shallow bowls. Dip salmon patties in egg whites, then roll in crumbs to coat. Place on a coated with cooking spray. Spritz tops with cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, at 425\u00b0 until golden brown, 14-17 minutes. In a small bowl, mix sauce ingredients; serve with salmon cakes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Easy Thai Green Curry
ingredients: ['1 lb meat or 1 lb tofu, diced', '1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk', '1 tablespoon oil, for sauteing', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 inch fresh gingerroot, minced', 'green chili, minced, to taste (optional for added spiciness)', '2 tablespoons green curry paste (I use Thai Kitchen brand)', '1 lime, juiced and rind grated', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro, chopped']
directions: In a large skillet, saute the meat (or tofu) with garlic and ginger root (and chilies, if using) in oil for a couple minutes. Add the curry paste, coconut milk, lime rind and juice. Simmer until meat is desired tenderness, or until tofu is heated through. Stir in the cilantro just before serving. Serve with rice.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Californias Almond Joy Cookie Balls
ingredients: ['2 ounces unsweetened chocolate squares', '1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk', '3 cups sweetened flaked coconut', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '36 whole blanched almonds']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper that has been lightly greased. In the microwave, melt the chocolate with the sweetened condensed milk, stirring after every minute of cook time. Microwave cook times vary; you know your oven better than I do, so no specific cook times; just until melted and smooth. Pour the chocolate mixture over the coconut in a large bowl. Stir in the vanilla. Mix well until the coconut is completely coated. Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet. Top each cookie with an almond, pressing down slightly. Bake at 350 degrees for ten to twelve minutes. Check at about 8 minutes though as the bottoms tend to burn easily. Double panning is a good idea if they still seem doughy but bottoms are done. Let cool on pan for one minute, then transfer to cooling rack and cool completely.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: San Clemente Curry
ingredients: ['1 lb. shrimp, shelled and deveined', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 tsp. salt', '1 medium tomato, chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 c. sour cream', '3 avocados', '6 lettuce leaves']
directions: In a saucepan, melt butter with curry powder and salt; add chopped tomato and onion. Cook until soft. Add lemon juice, shrimp and sour cream. Heat thoroughly. Cut avocados in halves, remove seeds and skin and fill centers with the hot curry. Arrange on lettuce leaf. May be served with rice.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Creamy Tomato Soup
ingredients: ['1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes', '1 (14 ounce) can fat-free evaporated milk', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon sugar']
directions: Mix all ingredients together in a pan and heat gently. Do no boil! Serve.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Spaghetti Sauce
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. hamburger', '5 medium onions', '1 large green pepper', '1/4 tsp. garlic powder', '1 Tbsp. vinegar', '2 small cans tomato paste', '1 (32 oz.) can tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/4 tsp. chili powder', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon', '1/4 tsp. basil', '1/4 tsp. parsley flakes', '1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce']
directions: Brown hamburger and drain fat. Place back in cooking pot. Add onions and green pepper (may puree if wish). Then add dry ingredients followed by tomato ingredients. Simmer mixture on low 2 to 4 hours.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Meat Kabobs
ingredients: ['1/2 c. lemon juice', '1/4 c. salad oil', '1 medium onion, grated', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 tsp. curry', '1/8 tsp. ginger', '2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce', '1 bay leaf', '1 garlic clove', '2 lb. sirloin or boneless chicken breasts or pork, cut into 1-inch squares', 'mushroom caps', 'green pepper squares', 'quartered tomatoes', 'baby onions']
directions: Mix lemon juice, oil, onion salt, pepper, curry powder, ginger, bay leaf, Worcestershire sauce and garlic into shallow pan. Add meat and mushroom caps. Marinate in refrigerator for 4 hours or longer, turning meat occasionally.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Passage To India
ingredients: ['8 ounces light cream cheese', '8 ounces lowfat cottage cheese', '4 ounces nonfat greek yogurt', '1 tablespoon curry powder(I like Madras)', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 whole chicken breast, poached and shredded', '1 cup mango chutney', '1/2 cup shredded sweetened coconut', '1/2 cup golden raisins', '1/2 cup chopped scallions', '1/2 cup chopped peanuts or cashews', '1/4 cup chopped cilantro(optional)', '1 cup crumbled flavored tofu or chopped hard boiled eggs(vegetarian option)']
directions: In the bowl of a food processor, combine cream cheese, cottage cheese, yogurt, curry powder and lemon juice. Process until smooth. Taste and add salt & pepper to taste along with additional curry powder. On a flat serving dish or platter spread the cheese mixture in an even layer. Spread chutney to taste over the cheese, followed by layers of coconut, raisins and scallions. Top with shredded chicken, tofu or hard boiled eggs. Wrap and chill for at least 6 hours to blend flavors. Before serving, top with chopped peanuts, additional scallions and cilantro. Serve with toasted pita chips or pappadams.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Tomatoes With Artichoke Hearts
ingredients: ['6 large ripe tomatoes', 'salt', 'pepper', 'powdered dill weed', '6 canned artichoke hearts', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1/2 c. sour cream', '1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '1/2 tsp. grated onion']
directions: Scald tomatoes to remove skins. Scoop out centers and season them inside and out with salt, freshly ground pepper and powdered dill. Put an artichoke heart in each tomato. Chill. One hour before serving, cover each tomato with a sauce made by combining mayonnaise with sour cream, curry powder, grated onion and lemon juice. Add more curry powder if desired. Serve very cold on bibb lettuce. Serves 6.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Sicilian Eggplant Caviar
ingredients: ['2 large Italian eggplants', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, sliced thin', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', '4 high-quality anchovy fillets, chopped', '10 Italian olives, pitted and sliced', '1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 cup grated Parmigiano-Reggiano', '1/2 cup plain croutons or diced stale bread', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '3/4 cup tightly packed fresh mint leaves, coarsely chopped', '1/4 cup tightly packed fresh Italian parsley leaves, coarsely chopped']
directions: Heat oven to 375 degrees. Prick eggplants all over with a fork, then place on a sheet pan. Roast until tender, about 45 minutes. Let cool completely. Cut eggplants in half lengthwise, and scoop out meat into a saucepan. Simmer until most of the liquid is evaporated and eggplant is dry, about 20 minutes. Set aside. In a large saute pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and red pepper, and saute one minute. Add anchovies and olives, and saute another minute, stirring continuously. Add tomatoes, and cook a minute more. Add eggplant, and cook two minutes. Add cheese, croutons and salt and pepper to taste. Stir in mint and parsley until well combined. Serve immediately.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Cold Chicken Curry Salad
ingredients: ['4 c. cooked chicken, cut in pieces', '2 c. thinly sliced celery hearts', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice', 'salt and pepper', '1/2 c. sour cream', '1/2 c. mayonnaise', '1 1/2 tsp. curry powder', '6 hard-boiled eggs', 'lettuce cups', 'parsley (garnish)']
directions: Make this at least 3 hours in advance and chill. Toss chicken, celery and lemon juice and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Mix in sour cream, mayonnaise and curry powder. Carefully fold in 4 sliced hard-boiled eggs. Cover and refrigerate. To serve, spoon into lettuce cups and top with more egg slices. Garnish with fresh parsley (optional). Serves 12.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Crab Salad
ingredients: ['2 cups lump crabmeat', '1 cup cooked rice', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '3/4 cup mayonnaise', '1/4 cup sour cream', '2 hard-boiled eggs', '3 drops fresh lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon minced chives']
directions: Toss crab and rice together. Add curry powder to mayonnaise and sour cream. Blend well. Stir into crab mixture. Sprinkle chopped eggs with lemon juice, salt and chives. Add to crab mixture. Serve on lettuce leaves.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Ange'S Fluffy Frosting
ingredients: ['1 c. Crisco', '1 c. sugar (pure sweet)', '3 Tbsp. flour', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2/3 c. milk']
directions: Cream Crisco; add sugar and beat well. Add milk, teaspoon at a time, then vanilla. Beat until fluffy.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Grilled Pork Tenderloin And Pineapple
ingredients: ['1 - 2 3/4 lb pork tenderloin', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', '1/2 teaspoon dry mustard', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 fresh medium pineapple, peeled, cored, and cut crosswise into 8 slices']
directions: Trim fat from pork, if necessary; place pork in a self-sealing plastic bag set juice, oil, mustard, and garlic powder. Pour marinade over pork in bag. Seal bag. Marinate in refrigerator for at least 8 hours or up to 24 hours, turning bag occasionally. Drain, reserving marinade. In a grill with a cover, arrange medium-hot coals. around a drip pan*. Test for medium heat above pan. Place pork on grill rack over drip pan. Cover and grill for 30 to 45 minutes or until meat is slightly pink in center (meat thermometer registers 160 degrees F) and juices run clear. Brush occasionally with marinade during the first 20 minutes of grilling. Discard remaining marinade. Add pineapple slices to grill directly over coals for the last 5 minutes of grilling; turn slices once. *To grill on gas grill, preheat grill. Reduce heat to medium. Adjust for. indirect cooking. Grill as above, except place meat on a rack in a roasting pan.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Chicken Or Turkey Divine
ingredients: ['1/3 stick butter', '2 c. chopped turkey or chicken', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese', '2 pkg. frozen chopped broccoli', '2 cans cream of chicken soup', '1 c. mayonnaise', '3/4 tsp. curry powder', '1 c. soft bread crumbs']
directions: Cook broccoli and drain. Place butter in 8 x 12-inch baking dish and let melt in oven. Put broccoli in dish. Top with layer of chicken or turkey. Combine soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice and curry powder. Pour over meat. Top with cheese and bread crumbs. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes. Serves about 6.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Tuna Salad In Pita Bread
ingredients: ['1/3 c. plain low-fat yogurt', '1/4 c. light mayonnaise', '1 1/2 tsp. hot curry powder', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice', '2 Tbsp. chutney', '1 (6 1/2 oz.) can water packed tuna, drained and broken up finely', '1/4 c. cashews or peanuts, finely chopped', '2 pita breads, cut in half crosswise', 'shredded iceberg lettuce and tomato slices (garnishes)']
directions: Stir together the yogurt, mayonnaise, curry powder, lemon juice and chutney. Add the tuna and mix well. Stir in the nuts. Fill the pitas with the tuna salad; tuck the lettuce and tomato into the pita pocket and serve. Makes four servings.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Royal  Thai Siam  Forest  Salad
ingredients: ['salad', '1 head lettuce, torn', '1 cucumber, peeled, sliced', '1/2 cup carrot, grated', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '4 eggs, hard boiled', '1 cup bean sprouts', 'dressing', '2 tablespoons oil', '2 tablespoons peanut butter', '2 tablespoons red curry paste', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '1/2 cup peanuts, ground fine', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups coconut milk', '1/2 cup shallot, deep fried, could use french fried onions here']
directions: fry oil curry. chili powder. add finely chopped peanuts. add peanut butter. add sugar add lemon juice salt. coconut milk. shallot. bring to a boil. gently until oil rises. put in serving bowl. salad. lettuce on bottom. cucumber center. tomatoes either side next eggs. bean sprouts either side. carrot either side. onion 4 corners.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Strawberry Dip with Tortilla Crisps
ingredients: ['1 cup Philadelphia Strawberry Light Cream Cheese Product', '1 cup thawed Cool Whip Light Whipped Topping', '10 small flour tortillas', '1/4 cup cinnamon sugar']
directions: Heat oven to 375 degrees F. Whisk cream cheese product in medium bowl until creamy. Stir in Cool Whip. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Spray tortillas with cooking spray; cut each into 8 wedges. Place wedges in resealable plastic bag. Add cinnamon sugar; seal bag, then shake to evenly coat wedges with cinnamon sugar. Place in single layer on baking sheets. Bake 8 to 10 min. or until crisp and golden brown. Serve with cream cheese mixture.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Chicken Or Turkey Curry
ingredients: ['cooked, boiled chicken, remove from bones', '2 pkg. whole broccoli, cooked', '2 cans creamed chicken soup', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '1/2 c. grated sharp cheese']
directions: Cook chicken and remove from bones. Cook broccoli. Lay slices (pieces) of meat in baking dish. Lay broccoli over meat. Mix creamed chicken soup and mayonnaise. Pour over broccoli. Sprinkle with curry powder and lemon juice. Sprinkle with grated sharp cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 45 minutes.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1 c. chopped celery', '2 c. white seedless grapes', '1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained', '1 c. canned pineapple chunks, drained', '1 c. slivered almonds', '1 1/2 c. mayonnaise', '1 tsp. soy sauce', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice']
directions: Bake the chicken and remove the meat from the bones. There should be 4 cups or more of chicken. Add chopped celery, grapes, water chestnuts, pineapple and slivered almonds. Mix mayonnaise with curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice. Pour into other ingredients. Mix well and chill. Hard-boiled eggs and 1 cup cooked chopped potatoes can be added to this salad. Serve on lettuce garnished with strawberries or sliced oranges.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Four C. Salad
ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (approximately 1 1/4 lb.)', '3 Tbsp. mayonnaise', '1/2 c. celery, diced', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'about 1 Tbsp. soy sauce', 'about 1 tsp. curry powder', '1/2 c. cashews']
directions: Poach chicken breasts. Cut into bite sized pieces. Mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, soy sauce and curry powder. Add chicken and celery, chill. Just before serving, add cashews and more dressing ingredients to suit taste and consistency. Serve on lettuce. Serves 4.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Tofu Salad
ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package extra firm tofu, drained and cubed', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar', '1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 large carrot, grated', '1 chopped red bell pepper', '1/4 cup peanuts', '1/4 cup pitted dates', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 large green onion, chopped']
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place tofu on a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake tofu in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, stirring halfway through the cooking time. Remove tofu from the oven and allow to cool. Mix curry powder, lemon juice, mayonnaise, vinegar, red pepper flakes, and soy sauce in a small bowl. Set aside. Combine tofu, carrots, red pepper, peanuts, dates, garlic, and green onion in a large bowl. Top with sauce and mix thoroughly. Chill for an hour before serving.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Tuna Fish Special
ingredients: ['1 6-oz. can tuna, drained and flaked', '1 c. frozen peas, thawed', '1/2 c. chopped celery', '1/4 c. sliced green onions', '1/3 c. mayonnaise', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '1/2 tsp. soy sauce', '1/8 tsp. curry powder', 'Dash garlic powder', '2 Tbsp. slivered almonds, toasted', '1 c. chow mein noodles', 'Lettuce leaves, optional']
directions: In a bowl, combine tuna, peas, celery and onions. In another bowl, combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, soy sauce, curry powder and garlic powder; stir into tuna mixture. Stir in almonds; top with noodles. Serve on lettuce if desired. Serves 2.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Quick Curried Tofu
ingredients: ['1 (9 ounce) package tofu, drained and thinly sliced', '4 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon curry powder']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Put the tofu slices into a shallow casserole dish. Mix the mayonnaise and curry powder together and spoon over the tofu, moving the slices around so they all get coated. Bake for 15-20 minutes and serve.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Indian Chicken Mango Salad
ingredients: ['14 cup mayonnaise', '1 lb cooked chicken breast, diced', '13 cup yogurt', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 tablespoons mango chutney', '2 green chili peppers, small minced seeded', '3 celery ribs, sliced thinly', '1 mango, peeled and chopped', '14 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '14 cup cilantro, minced', '1 head lettuce, chopped', '3 tablespoons sliced almonds', '2 tablespoons cashew nuts, chopped']
directions: mix yogurt ,mayo ,chutney ,lemon juice, green peppers pepper, curry powder. together add celery toss. add chicken toss. add cilantro toss on plate put lettuce then top with chicken mixture. sprinkle on mangoes then top with nuts.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Exotic Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['4 c. chopped cooked chicken', '2 (5 oz.) cans water chestnuts, sliced', '1 c. finely chopped celery', '1 lb. fresh seedless grapes', '1 c. toasted slivered almonds', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 tsp. soy sauce', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks']
directions: Combine chicken, water chestnuts, celery, grapes and almonds. Mix mayonnaise, curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice; add to chicken mixture. Chill for several hours. Serve on lettuce leaf and top with pineapple chunks. Serves 10 to 12.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Tropical Turkey Salad
ingredients: ['2 qt. turkey, bite size pieces', '1 (2 oz.) can water chestnuts, sliced', '2 lb. seedless grapes', '2 c. celery, sliced', '2 1/2 c. toasted, sliced almonds', '3 c. mayonnaise', '1 Tbsp. curry powder', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice', '2 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1 (1 lb. 13 oz.) can pineapple chunks', 'Boston, bibb or butter lettuce']
directions: Combine turkey, water chestnuts, grapes, celery and 2 cups almonds. Mix mayonnaise, curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice. Combine with turkey mixture. Spoon onto bed of lettuce. Garnish with remaining almonds and pineapple. Chicken may be substituted for turkey. Serves 12 to 14.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Vegetarian Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons raw peanuts', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 cup finely diced tofu', 'salt to taste', '1 large cucumber, finely diced', '5 radishes, grated', '1 large tomato, finely diced', '1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped (optional)', '3 tablespoons soy sauce, or to taste', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 large head of iceberg lettuce, leaves separated']
directions: Roast peanuts in a skillet over high heat, stirring frequently until brown, reducing heat to medium if necessary, about 5 minutes; set aside to cool. In a food processor, grind peanuts into a coarse powder. Heat canola oil in a skillet over medium heat; add tofu and season with salt to taste. Turn tofu frequently until all sides are brown, 8 to 10 minutes; remove from heat. Pat tofu dry with a paper towel and allow to cool, about 5 minutes. Combine cucumber, radish, tomato, water chestnuts, soy sauce, and lemon juice in a large bowl. Add tofu and peanut powder just before serving. Arrange lettuce leaves around the edge of a large platter and mound tofu filling in the center. To eat, spoon 1 or 2 tablespoons tofu mixture into the center of a leaf and wrap lettuce around filling like a burrito.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Exotic Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['4 c. cooked chicken, chopped', '1 lb. fresh seedless grapes', '1 c. toasted slivered almonds', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 1/2 tsp. curry powder', '1 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks']
directions: Combine chicken, grapes and almonds. Mix mayonnaise, curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice. Add seasoned mayonnaise to chicken mixture and chill for several hours. Serve on a lettuce leaf and top with pineapple chunks. Serves: 10 to 12.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Mother'S Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ["1 pkg. devil's food cake mix", '1 pkg. instant chocolate pudding', '3/4 c. water', '3/4 c. oil', '4 eggs', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. sour cream', '1 oz. chocolate chips']
directions: Bake for 1 hour at 350\u00b0 in a tube pan. Frost with 7 minute frosting.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Chicken Or Beef Marinade Recipe
ingredients: ['1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce', '1/4 c. Italian dressing, not creamy style', '2 teaspoon garlic, approx. 1 clove']
directions: Mix well and pour over meat. Let set in refrigerator for several hrs.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Extra cheesy chicken spaghetti
ingredients: ['1/2 packages spaghetti noddles', '3 large bonless skinless chicken brest', '3/4 lb velveeta cheese', '2 can rotel', '1 cup milk', '1 can cream of chicken', '1 large can cream of mushroom']
directions: Boil chicken till done Take chicken out of water boil noodles in same water shread chicken breasts In larger pot mix cheese milk cream of chk. Cream of mush. And rotel over stove till hot and cheese is melted Drain noodles add chicken and mix stir untill mixed well Enjoy! :)

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Baked Curry Tofu
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed', '1 tablespoon fresh lime juice', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '16 ounces firm tofu or 16 ounces extra firm tofu']
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine orange juice, lime juice and curry powder in a 9 x 13 glass or ceramic baking dish. Drain tofu. Cut block of tofu horizontally into three pieces. Then, with pieces stacked on top of each other, cut tofu on the diagonal from one corner to the other. Repeat the cuts on the other two corners. You should have 12 triangles of tofu. Place tofu pieces in a single layer in the baking dish and turn to coat with the marinade. Bake the tofu for about 25 minutes, turning once, until the marinade is absorbed and the tofu is browned. Serve immediately or use cold or at room temperature as a sandwich filler.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Exotic Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. cooked chicken, cut in chunks', '1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts', '1 lb. seedless grapes', '2 c. celery, chopped', '2 to 3 c. slivered almonds, toasted (save 1/2 c. for garnish)', '2 to 3 c. mayonnaise', '1 Tbsp. curry powder', '1 Tbsp. soy sauce', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice', 'lettuce', '1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks']
directions: Combine first 5 ingredients. Combine mayonnaise, curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice; toss with chicken and chill several hours. Spoon onto bed of lettuce or individual plates. Sprinkle with pineapple and rest of almonds.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Sweet Cinnamon Applesauce
ingredients: ['3 lbs granny smith apples', '3 Red Delicious apples', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon molasses', '1 tablespoon cinnamon', '1 cup brown sugar']
directions: Prepare jars, lids, and rings; be sure they are sterilized. Peel, core, and slice apples into large chunks. If necessary, place in a bath of water and lemon juice to prevent browning. In a heavy pot, cook the apples and butter over medium heat until the apples begin to soften. Be sure not to burn the butter! Once apples are soft, continue cooking while mashing them with a potato masher. Gradually add the remaining ingredients, and continue mashing until the mixture reaches the desired texture. If you like fewer chunks, you could put it through a ricer or food processor. Turn the heat up and cook until boiling. Place in jars, being careful to keep rims clean. Process for 10-15 minutes in boiling water.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Berried Treasure
ingredients: ['1 8 -ounce package cream cheese, at room temperature', '1/2 cup heavy cream', "1/2 cup confectioners' sugar", '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella)', '2 cups raspberries (1 pint)', 'Short bread cookies, sliced baguette or ladyfingers, for serving']
directions: Beat the cream cheese, heavy cream, sugar and vanilla in a bowl with a mixer until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Spoon 1/4 cup chocolate-hazelnut spread each into two 12-ounce glass or plastic jars and smooth to make an even layer. Divide half of the cream cheese mixture between the 2 jars, then top each with a handful of raspberries. Repeat with the remaining chocolate-hazelnut spread, cream cheese mixture and raspberries. Serve with cookies or baguette slices, or cover the jars with lids and pack them to go. (The spread can be made the night before; cover, refrigerate and return to room temperature before serving.) Photograph by Sam Kaplan

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Butter Bean Salad
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '150 ml natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '40 g canned butter beans, drained and rinsed', '1/2 head lettuce']
directions: Heat oil and gently fry onions for about 10 minutes Add curry powder and stir well, leave to cool. Mix yoghurt with the lemon juice and add to the onion mix. Stir in the butter beans. Serve with the lettuce leaves.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['6 chicken breast halves', '1 (10 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts', '1 lb. green seedless grapes, halved', '1 c. celery, chopped', '1 to 1 1/2 c. slivered almonds, slightly toasted', "1 1/2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", '1 tsp. curry powder', '1 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1 Tbsp. lemon juice']
directions: Cook chicken and cut into large chunks. Mix mayonnaise, curry powder, soy sauce and lemon juice together. Add all ingredients and toss until thoroughly mixed. Let marinate overnight. If serving individually, serve in lettuce cups and garnish with pineapple chunks and avocado slices.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Hot Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ['3 c. cooked chicken breasts, cubed', '2 c. chopped celery', '3 Tbsp. grated onion', '1/2 c. chopped sweet bell peppers', '2 cans cream of mushroom soup', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. grated crackers', '2 large slices Swiss cheese']
directions: Mix all ingredients except crackers and cheese. Put in casserole dish. Mix together grated crackers and cheese. Sprinkle over chicken mixture. Heat at 350\u00b0 for 1/2 hour.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['2 cups chopped cooked chicken', '1/2 cup chopped celery', '1/2 cup slivered almonds, toasted', '1/4 cup sliced water chestnuts', '1/2 pound seedless green grapes, halved', '1 (8-ounce) can pineapple tidbits, drained', '3/4 cup mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '2 teaspoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon curry powder', 'Lettuce leaves']
directions: Combine chicken and next 5 ingredients in a medium mixing bowl; mix well. Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, soy sauce, and curry powder, stirring well; add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly to coat well, and chill Serve salad on lettuce leaves.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Curried Chicken Salad Stuffed Shells
ingredients: ['32 Ronzoni jumbo shells', '1/2 c. plain yogurt', '1/3 c. mayonnaise', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1 Tbsp. curry powder', '2 tsp. prepared mustard', '2 garlic cloves, pressed', '2 c. cooked chicken, cut in strips', '1 1/2 c. chopped red peppers', '1 c. unsalted sunflower seeds', '1/2 c. sliced scallions']
directions: Cook pasta as directed on package; drain. Combine yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, curry powder, mustard and garlic. Add chicken, red peppers, celery, sunflower seeds and scallions. Toss lightly. Spoon about 1 1/2 tablespoons filling into each shell. Chill. Serve on lettuce, if desired.

ing: lettuce, licorice, eggs, lemon juice, curry powder, tofu
title: Cooking Light'S Carrot Souffl
ingredients: ['7 cups carrots, chopped (about 2 pounds)', '2/3 cup granulated sugar', '1/4 cup nonfat sour cream', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons butter, melted', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 large eggs, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon powdered sugar']
