ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Trout Meuniere
ingredients: ['6 large trout fillets', '1 1/2 cups flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '6 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons minced parsley', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
directions: Rinse trout filets and pat dry. Mix salt and pepper with the flour and roll fillets in the flour mixture. Melt the butter in a large frying pan and saute the filets for five minutes. Turn the fish and saute the other side for about four minutes. Put the trout on a warm serving dish and sprinkle with a little more salt and pepper. Add the lemon juice and the parsley to the butter remaining in the pan and heat until foamy. Pour over the trout and serve.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Spicy Chickpea Nibbles
ingredients: ['9 ounces chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (or to taste)', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: Preheat oven to 400. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with greased foil. Spread chickpeas on a large plate and blot dry with paper towels. In a large bowl, combine paprika, garlic powder, salt, cayenne and oil. Add chickpeas and toss to coat. Spread chickpeas in a single layer on prepared sheet. Bake for about 40 minutes, shaking the pan 2 or 3 times until chickpeas are golden brown and starting to crisp,. Turn oven off and leave chickpeas in the oven for 10 - 20 minutes to crisp. (at this point, you really want to watch as they can burn quite easily) Remove from oven and let cool slightly on baking sheet.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. shortening', '2 c. oatmeal', '1 c. sugar', '2 c. cornflakes', '1 c. brown sugar', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '12 oz. walnuts', '2 eggs', '12 oz. chocolate chips', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. flour']
directions: Cream sugars, shortening, eggs and vanilla. Add flour, soda, salt and baking powder. Stir in cereals, walnuts and chocolate chips. Bake at 350\u00b0 for approximately 10 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Karen'S Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. butter', '1 c. white sugar', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. flour', '2 1/2 c. oatmeal (powderized in blender)', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1 tsp. baking powder', '12 oz. pkg. chocolate chip cookies']
directions: Cream together butter, both sugars, eggs and vanilla. Add flour, powderized oatmeal, salt, baking soda and baking powder. Fold in chocolate chips. Refrigerate overnight (very important). Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Blow out Cookies
ingredients: ['2 cups flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '14 teaspoon salt', '14 cup chunky peanut butter', '12 cup butter, softened', '12 cup brown sugar', '12 cup granulated sugar', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '14 cup milk', '34 cup chocolate chips', '34 cup honey-roasted peanuts', '34 cup coarsely chopped miniature peanut butter cup, FROZEN']
directions: Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Beat peanut butter and butter until fluffy. Add both sugars and beat until light. Add egg, beat 3 minutes. Add vanilla. Stir in dry ingredients, then add milk and beat thoroughly. Fold in chips, nuts, then chopped peanut butter cups. Drop by 2 Tbsp clumps on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375 for 10-12 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Crunchie Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. melted butter', '2 c. white sugar', '2 c. brown sugar', '2 c. oatmeal', '2 c. corn flakes, crushed', '2 tsp. vanilla', '3 eggs, beaten', '4 c. flour', '2 tsp. baking soda', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 c. chocolate chips', '1 1/2 c. coconut', '1 1/2 c. nuts']
directions: Mix butter, sugars, oatmeal, corn flakes, vanilla and eggs. Add in flour, baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, coconut and nuts. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 7 to 10 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Rocky Road Cookies
ingredients: ['1 (6 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips', '1/2 c. butter or margarine', '2 eggs', '1 c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. flour', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chopped nuts', '4 doz. miniature marshmallows, if desired']
directions: Melt 1/2 cup chocolate chips and butter over low heat; cool. Heat oven to 400\u00b0. Mix remaining chocolate chips, eggs, sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla, nuts and melted chocolate mixture. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Press a marshmallow into center of each. Bake 8 minutes or until almost no imprint remains when touched with finger. Immediately remove from baking sheet.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Cowboy Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. margarine', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. flour', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '2 c. oatmeal', '1 c. chopped nuts', '1 c. chocolate chips']
directions: Cream margarine, sugar and brown sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Sift and add flour, baking soda and baking powder. Add oatmeal, chopped nuts and chocolate chips. Drop on ungreased cookie sheet and bake about 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Seven-Up Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. hot water', '2 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O', '1 c. pecans', '1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened', '1 small can crushed pineapple', '2 c. 7-Up']
directions: Dissolve Jell-O in the boiling water. Add cream cheese to Jell-O. Stir to dissolve cream cheese. Mix in the other ingredients. Pour into mold. Chill until set.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Mexican Chicken Casserole
ingredients: ['3 -4 chicken breasts', '1 (10 1/2 ounce) can cheddar cheese soup', '1 (10 1/2 ounce) can cream of chicken soup', '1 (8 ounce) jar salsa', '1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies', '1 (16 ounce) bag nacho cheese flavor Doritos, crushed (large bag)', '1 (8 ounce) bag mexican cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package jalapeno jack cheese, shredded', 'canned jalapeno slices or sliced ripe olives, for presentation']
directions: Boil the chicken until done. Pull apart. Keep the broth. Mix soups, salsa, and chilies together. Set aside. In 13x9 pan, layer half of the doritos, half of the chicken, half of the sauce, and then half of the cheese. Pour about 1/4 cup of the broth on top. Repeat ending with cheese and broth. Add on sliced jalapenos or black olive slices for presentation, if you wish. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Dr. Murphy'S Famous Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. butter', '2 c. sugar', '2 c. brown sugar', '4 eggs', '2 tsp. vanilla', '4 c. flour', '5 c. oatmeal (small amounts at a time, please)', '1 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. baking soda', '24 oz. bag chocolate chips', '1 (8 oz.) Hershey bar, grated', '3 c. chopped nuts (any or all kinds)']
directions: Cream together butter, sugar and brown sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix together flour, oatmeal, salt, baking powder and baking soda. Mix together all these ingredients. Add chocolate chips, Hershey bar and nuts.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Cowboy Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 c. flour', '2 c. oatmeal', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: Cream the sugar, butter, vanilla and salt. Add eggs and beat. Add flour, baking soda and baking powder and beat. Stir in oatmeal, chocolate chips and nuts. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Pumpkin Cookies
ingredients: ['4 c. flour', '2 c. sugar', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. cinnamon', '1 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. baking soda', '1 can pumpkin', '2 eggs', '1 c. salad oil', '1 c. nuts', '2 tsp. milk', '2 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. chocolate chips']
directions: Sift together, flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, salt and baking soda. Add pumpkin, eggs, salad oil, nuts, milk, vanilla and chocolate chips; mix well. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 10 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Double Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. butter', '2 c. sugar', '2 c. brown sugar', '4 eggs', '4 c. flour', '3 c. chopped nuts (pecans)', '5 c. blended oatmeal (blend oatmeal in a blender to make a fine powder)', '1 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. baking powder', '1 tsp. soda', '2 tsp. vanilla', '12 oz. chocolate chips', '12 oz. white chocolate chips']
directions: Cream butter and both sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix together with flour, oatmeal, salt, baking powder and soda. Add chocolate and white chocolate chips and nuts.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. butter', '2 c. sugar', '2 c. brown sugar', '4 eggs', '2 tsp. vanilla', '4 c. flour', '5 c. oatmeal', '1 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. baking soda', '24 oz. chocolate chips', '1 (6 oz.) Hershey bar', '3 c. nuts']
directions: Cream together butter, sugar and brown sugar, then add eggs and vanilla. Mix together flour, oatmeal (in blender, make the oatmeal to a powder), salt, baking powder and baking soda. Then mix altogether. Add chocolate chips, Hershey bar (grated) and nuts.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '2 eggs', '3 tablespoons milk', '3 large bananas, mashed', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '2 cups flour', '1/2 cup melted butter', '6 ounces chocolate chips']
directions: Combine eggs, sugar, milk & bananas. Combine flour, baking soda & baking powder & add to wet mixture, mixing thoroughly. Add butter & finally the chocolate chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Vindaloo for Chicken or Lamb
ingredients: ['1 rounded tablespoon ground turmeric', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons hot paprika', '1 teaspoon dry mustard', '1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 whole chicken, cut up into thighs, legs, wings and 2 pieces of breast, skin removed except for the wings', '2 to 3 large cloves garlic, finely chopped', 'Juice of 2 limes', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper', '2 tablespoons vegetable or peanut oil', '4 large cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 fresh bay leaves', '1 Fresno or other moderate-heat red chile pepper, seeded and finely chopped', 'One 2-inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated or minced', '1 onion, chopped', 'Salt', '1 can petite diced tomatoes', '1 1/2 cups jasmine rice', 'Naan bread and melted butter, for brushing', 'Chopped toasted peanuts or almonds', 'Chopped fresh mint', 'Chopped fresh cilantro', 'Lime wedges']
directions: For the spice blend: Combine the turmeric, coriander, cumin, paprika, dry mustard, cardamom and cinnamon. For the chicken: Place the chicken (except for the wings) in a shallow dish and dress with half the spice blend, the garlic, lime juice and some salt and pepper. Cover and let marinate for 1 hour. Place the chicken wings in a small pot, cover with water and season with salt. Bring to a boil, then reduce the heat to a low simmer and poach for 30 minutes. For the vindaloo: Heat the vegetable oil in a large, deep skillet or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add the garlic, bay leaves, chile pepper, ginger, onions and the remaining curry spice blend. Season with salt. Cook, stirring frequently, until softened, 7 to 8 minutes. Add the tomatoes and about 1 cup of the wing stock and bring to boil. Slide in the chicken and partially cover with the lid or foil, allowing some steam to escape. Reduce the heat to a simmer and poach the chicken in the sauce, about 30 minutes. For serving: Meanwhile, prepare the rice according to the package directions. Heat the naan on a griddle pan with a splash of water, then brush with melted butter. Serve the vindaloo with choice of garnishes over the rice, and the naan on the side.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Sour Cream Orange Cake
ingredients: ['2 cups cake flour (sifted before measuring)', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 cup butter (no substitutes)', '1 cup white sugar', '3 large eggs, separated', '1 tablespoon grated orange rind', '1 tablespoon grated lemon rind', '1 cup sour cream']
directions: Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Cream butter and sugar until very light and fluffy. Beat in egg yolks and rinds. Sift dry ingredients into creamed mixture, alternating with sour cream. Do not overbeat. Beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Fold in with a rubber spatula. Oven 325. well greased Bundt or tube pan. Bake approximately 1 hr. Cool 10 minutes and then turn cake onto a plate with a rim. Orange Syrup. Combine:. 1/2 cup orange juice, fresh. 2 tablespoons lemon juice. 1/2 cup white sugar. Bring to a boil and simmer about 3 mins. Slowly pour hot syrup over cake, allowing time for it to soak it.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Chocolate Chip Sour Cream Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '2 eggs', '1/4 lb. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. flour', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1 tsp. baking powder', '1 c. sour cream', '3/4 (12 oz.) bag chocolate chips', '1/2 c. chopped walnuts', '1/4 c. sugar', '3 tsp. cinnamon']
directions: Cream together sugar, eggs, butter and vanilla. Sift together flour, baking powder and soda. Add to creamed mixture. Then add sour cream and chocolate chips.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Coconut-Chocolate Chip-Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. unsalted butter', '1 c. brown sugar', '1 c. white sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla extract', '2 Tbsp. milk', '2 eggs', '2 c. flour', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1 tsp. baking powder', '2 1/2 c. old-fashioned oats', '2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips', '1 c. coconut']
directions: Cream the butter with the sugars. Add vanilla, milk and eggs. Beat in flour, salt, baking soda and baking powder. Stir in oats, chocolate chips and coconut. Bake about 10 minutes in a 350\u00b0 oven. Cool on racks.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Barbara'S Banana Cake
ingredients: ['1/2 c. soft butter', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '3 mashed bananas', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. baking powder', '1 c. chopped nuts and/or chocolate chips', '1 tsp. baking soda', '2 1/2 c. flour', '1 c. sour milk (1 c. milk + 1 Tbsp. vinegar)', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Mix together butter, sugar, banana, eggs, vanilla and milk. Mix flour, baking powder and baking soda; add to banana mixture. Add nuts and/or chocolate chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Frost with White Creamy Icing.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Stellar'S Cakes
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. flour', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. baking powder', '1/4 c. melted shortening', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '1 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Stir until moistened (like pancake mix). Grease and flour muffin pan. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes. Sift confectioners sugar over top. Makes 2 dozen.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Cowboy Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. shortening', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '1 pkg. chocolate chips', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 eggs', '2 c. sifted flour', '1 tsp. baking soda', '2 c. quick rolled oats']
directions: Mix sugar, shortening, eggs and vanilla. Sift together flour, salt, soda and baking powder. Add to mixture. Blend in oats and chocolate chips. Bake at 350\u00b0 until browned.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Mrs. Field'S Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. flour', '2 1/2 c. oatmeal powder', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. baking powder', '1 tsp. baking soda', '12 oz. chocolate chips', '4 oz. Hershey bar, grated', '1 1/2 c. chopped nuts']
directions: Cream butter and sugars together. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix together flour and oatmeal powder. Then add salt, baking powder and baking soda. Mix together chips, chocolate and nuts, then fold it into batter. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. butter', '2 c. sugar', '2 c. brown sugar', '4 eggs', '2 tsp. vanilla', '4 c. flour', '5 c. oatmeal *', '1 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. baking soda', '24 oz. bag chocolate chips', '1 (3 oz.) plain chocolate bar, cut into small pieces', '3 c. chopped nuts (any kind)']
directions: Cream together butter, sugar and brown sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. In separate bowl, mix flour, oatmeal, salt, baking powder and baking soda. Mix all ingredients together. Add chocolate chips, chocolate bar and chopped nuts.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Sour Cream Drops
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter or oleo', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '2 eggs', '1 c. sour cream', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 3/4 c. flour', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '1/2 tsp. soda', '2 sq. baking chocolate']
directions: Cream butter and sugar. Add beaten eggs, sour cream, vanilla and melted chocolate. Sift flour, salt, baking powder and soda together and add to above. Drop by spoonfuls on baking sheet and bake at 350\u00b0 until leaves no indentation. (Don't overbake.)

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Apple Cranberry Compote
ingredients: ['6 apples, peeled and sliced', '1 cup fresh cranberries', '3/4 cup sugar', '1/2 teaspoon orange zest', '1/2 cup water', '1/4 cup port wine']
directions: Combine apples and cranberries in slow cooker. Sprinkle with sugar. Stir in zest, water and port. Cover and cook on low 4-6 hours.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Special Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['2 cups unsalted butter', '24 ounces semi-sweet chocolate chips', '4 cups flour', '2 cups brown sugar', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 cups sugar', '1 (8 ounce) Hershey special dark mildly sweet bar (grated)', '5 cups pulverized oatmeal', '4 eggs', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '3 teaspoons vanilla', '3 cups chopped nuts (optional)']
directions: Measure oatmeal and pulverize in blender till fine powder. Cream butter and both sugars. Add eggs and vanilla to butter. Mix flour, oatmeal, salt, baking powder and baking soda. Mix butter and flour together. Add chocolate chips, grated chocolate and nuts. Bake at 375F.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Cowboy Cookies
ingredients: ['2 1/4 c. oleo', '2 1/4 c. sugar', '2 1/2 c. brown sugar', '5 eggs', '1 1/2 tsp. vanilla', '4 1/2 c. flour', '2 1/4 tsp. baking soda', '1 1/8 tsp. baking powder', '1 1/8 tsp. salt', '4 1/2 c. oats', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips', '1 c. pecans']
directions: Cream shortening, sugars, eggs and vanilla. Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt and add to creamed mixture. Mix in oats, chocolate chips and nuts.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Buffalo Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. soft butter', '2 c. brown sugar', '2 c. sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla', '4 eggs', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips (can use 1 c.)', '4 c. flour', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. baking soda', '1 tsp. salt', '2 c. oatmeal', '2 c. Raisin Bran or 2 c. cornflakes and 1 c. raisins', '1 c. coconut', '1 c. walnuts']
directions: Cream together butter, brown sugar, sugar, vanilla and eggs. Add flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Mix. Add chocolate chips, oatmeal, cereal, coconut and walnuts. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes. Makes a lot of cookies.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Soft Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1/4 c. white sugar', '3/4 c. brown sugar, packed', '1 c. butter or margarine', '1 small pkg. Jell-O instant pudding mix (vanilla)', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 1/2 c. flour', '1 tsp. baking powder', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips']
directions: Cream the eggs, sugars, butter, pudding mix and vanilla. Mix flour, baking powder and baking soda together. Add to creamed mixture. Add chocolate chips. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake 10 minutes at 375\u00b0. Yields 3 1/2 dozen.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: Chewy Milk Chocolate Cookies
ingredients: ['23 cup butter, melted', '2 cups brown sugar, packed', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons hot water', '2 23 cups flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '14 teaspoon salt', '1 (12 ounce) package milk chocolate chips']
directions: Beat together melted butter, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs and hot water. Stir in flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop from small spoon on parchment paper. Bake ast 375F for 8-10 minutes.

ing: baking soda, baking powder, chocolate chips, eggs
title: White Chocolate Mocha Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup butter, at room temperature', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '2 cups flour', '1/2 cup cocoa powder', '2 tablespoons instant coffee powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 cup white chocolate chips']
directions: Preheat oven to 350.  Cream butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla until fluffy. Add flour, cocoa powder, coffee powder, baking soda and salt and mix until combined.  Fold in chocolate chips. Roll into balls and set on baking sheet.  Bake at 350 for 8-10 minutes.

title: Substitute For Sweetened Condensed Milk
ingredients: ['1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '1 cup brown sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '2 tablespoons flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder']
directions: Mix all ingredients together. Use as a substitute for sweetened condensed milk in recipes for pies, bars and desserts.

title: Old Time Gingerbread
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. sifted flour', '1 tsp. soda', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '2 tsp. ginger', '1/2 c. soft butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. molasses', '1 c. buttermilk']
directions: Sift into a large bowl the flour, salt, soda, ginger and cinnamon. Cream butter light and fluffy. Add sugar to butter, beating well. Add eggs and milk to cream mixture. Stir in molasses. Add dry ingredients. Pour into buttered pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes, until done.

title: Layered Salad
ingredients: ['1 head lettuce sliced thin', '3/4 cup chopped celery', '1/2 cup chopped green pepper', '8 sliced water chestnuts', '1/4 cup finely chopped red onion', '10 oz frozen green peas, uncooked', '2 cup mayonnaise mixed with 1 TBS sugar', '6 oz Romano cheese', 'sliced hard boiled eggs', 'cherry tomatoes', 'Bacon bits']
directions: layer ingredients in order in dish

title: Honey Cake
ingredients: ['1 c. shortening', '2 c. honey', '2 eggs, well beaten', '1 c. sour milk', '4 c. flour', '2 tsp. baking soda', '1 tsp. ginger', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1/4 tsp. salt', 'chopped nuts (if desired)']
directions: Cream shortening with the honey; add eggs, sour milk and flour which has been sifted with baking soda, ginger, cinnamon and salt. Sprinkle nuts on top and between layers as desired.

title: Dutch Potatoes
ingredients: ['potatoes, cooked with jackets', '1/2 stick butter', 'flour', 'milk', 'a few slices of cheese']
directions: Slice cooled potatoes into thin pieces. Melt butter in skillet and add potatoes. Sprinkle flour over and add enough milk to thicken. Add a few slices of cheese just before serving. Turn carefully.

title: Chocolate Mint Treasures
ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 cup softened butter, divided (2 sticks)', '1 cup sugar, divided', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla, divided', '2 1/4 cups flour, divided', '1/4 cup baking cocoa', '1/4 teaspoon salt, divided', '1 cup chopped Andes mints candies']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0F. Spray a 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray. In a mixing bowl, cream 1/2 cup (1 stick) butter and 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Add one egg and 1/2 teaspoons vanilla and beat well. Gradually add 1 cup flour, cocoa, and 1/8 teaspoons salt, mixing well after each addition. Spread mixture into 9x13 dish. In a mixing bowl cream remaining 1/2 cup (1 stick) butter and remaining 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Add remaining egg and remaining 1/2 teaspoons vanilla and beat well. Gradually add remaining 1 1/4 cups flour and remaining 1/8 teaspoons salt, mixing well after each addition. Gently spread over chocolate layer and bake until golden brown, about 15 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle chopped Andes mints over the top. Bake until chocolate begins to melt, about 1 additional minute. Spread melted chocolate over the top of the bars. Cool completely. Cut into 24 squares, and then cut squares into triangles.

title: Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['2 c. pumpkin', '1 c. milk', '2 eggs', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. nutmeg', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon', '1/4 tsp. ginger', '2 Tbsp. butter', '3/4 c. sugar']
directions: Beat butter, eggs and sugar. Add salt, nutmeg, ginger and cinnamon. Add pumpkin and milk. Bake in raw pie crust at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes, then decrease oven to 350\u00b0 and bake until set. (Wet knife inserted should come out clean.)

title: Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['1 c. cooked pumpkin', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '2 eggs', '3 Tbsp. flour', '1/2 stick butter', '1 pie shell', 'cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg and cloves']
directions: Mix sugar and flour together. Add cooked pumpkin, milk, eggs and butter. Mix ground cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg and cloves with flour and sugar. Cook on medium heat on stove, stirring constantly. Pour into pie shell when thick and cook in oven for 30 minutes at 350\u00b0.

title: Creme De Menthe
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '2 1/4 c. water', '4 tsp. mint extract', '1 tsp. green food color', '10 jiggers vodka']
directions: Mix sugar and water; bring to a boil. Boil 8 to 10 minutes. Let cool. Pour into a jug and mix by shaking. Serve anytime.

title: Sugar-Dipped Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['2 cups sugar', '3/4 cup Land O Lakes Unsalted Butter, softened*', '1 Land O Lakes Egg', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'Water']
directions: Heat oven to 375F. Combine 1 cup sugar and 3/4 cup butter in bowl. Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until creamy. Add egg; continue beating until well mixed. Add flour, baking powder and salt; beat at low speed until well mixed. Place remaining 1 cup sugar in another bowl. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Dip top of each ball into water, then into sugar. Place 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake 8-14 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. *Substitute Land O Lakes Salted Butter.

title: Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['2 c. pumpkin', '3 eggs', '1 stick margarine, melted', '2 c. sugar', '1 c. canned milk', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1 tsp. ginger', '2 Tbsp. flour']
directions: Mix pumpkin, sugar, eggs and margarine together. Add milk, flour, cinnamon and ginger. Mix well. Bake in a 325\u00b0 oven for 1 1/2 hours. Makes 3 pies.

title: Barbecued Bologna Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon barbecue sauce', '1 teaspoon ketchup', '1 slice light bologna', '2 slices white bread']
directions: Mix together barbecue sauce and ketchup. Thin with just a little water. Place bologna slice in skillet over medium heat. Cook on both sides a few minutes until bologna is slightly browned and begins to curl up. Spread sauce mixture on bologna and cook about 1 minute more. Place on bread to make a sandwich. Enjoy!

title: Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['2 eggs, well beaten', '3/4 c. sugar', '2 c. milk', '1 1/2 c. cooked pumpkin', 'salt to taste', 'nutmeg', 'cinnamon', 'little ginger', 'melted butter']
directions: Mix eggs, sugar, milk and cooked pumpkin. Salt to taste. Add seasonings: nutmeg, cinnamon and ginger. Add melted butter. Bake in cooker 1 hour.

title: Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 loaf white bread', '1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk', '6 eggs', '1 1/2 c. sugar, divided', '1 can coconut milk', '1 Tbsp. cinnamon', '1 Tbsp. ginger', '1 1/4 c. butter', '2 snack pkg. raisins', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Moisten bread with water and drain well. Add the evaporated milk and knead it with your fingers. Add eggs, 1 cup sugar, coconut milk, cinnamon, ginger, butter, raisins and vanilla.

title: Instant Chocolate Sauce
ingredients: ['34 cup golden syrup', '12 cup cocoa']
directions: Combine warmed syrup with cocoa until smooth. Add to mugs of warm milk for great hot chocolate, or pour over desserts like ice cream. Yummmm.

title: Mom'S Sweet Potato Pone
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. grated sweet potatoes', '1 c. molasses', '2 eggs', '2 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. melted margarine', '1 tsp. ginger or grated orange rind', '1 Tbsp. brown sugar', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon']
directions: Add molasses, well beaten eggs, milk, butter and ginger (or orange rind) to grated potatoes. Mix well and pour into well-greased skillet or baking pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes at 350\u00b0. Sprinkle brown sugar and cinnamon over top when half done.

title: Sweetened Condensed Milk Substitute
ingredients: ['2 whole Eggs', '1 cup Brown Sugar', '1 teaspoon Vanilla', '2 Tablespoons Flour', '1/2 teaspoons Baking Powder', '1/4 teaspoons Salt']
directions: Mix all of the ingredients together! That's it. Simple, right? After mixing, use the mixture as a sweetened condensed milk substitute in desserts.

title: Pumpkin Custard
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. canned pumpkin', '1 1/2 c. skim milk', '2 eggs', '2 Tbsp. honey', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 tsp. ginger', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: Combine milk, eggs, honey, vanilla, cinnamon, ginger and salt. Add pumpkin, blend well. Pour into 6-ounce custard cups and bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes.

title: Butternut Squash Pie With Graham Cracker Crust
ingredients: ['1 cup butternut squash, cooked and mashed', '3/4 cup nonfat milk', '2 eggs', '1/2 cup dark brown sugar', '1/8 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/8 teaspoon ginger', '2 teaspoons cinnamon', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1 graham cracker crust']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In blender, puree squash , milk eggs , brown sugar , nutmeg , ginger , cinnamon and salt until completely mixed -- .

title: Warm Beef & Goat Cheese Bruschetta Salad
ingredients: ['1 pound beef tenderloin', '3/4 cup Wish-Bone Italian Dressing', '1 french bread or medium italian, (12 in long), cut into 12 slices', '4 ounces goat cheese', '4 ounces baby arugula about 4 cups']
directions: Pour 1/4 cup Wish-Bone(R) Italian Dressing over beef in large, shallow nonaluminum baking dish or plastic bag; turn to coat. Cover, or close bag, and marinate in refrigerator up to 3 hours. Remove beef from marinade, discarding marinade. Grill or broil beef until desired doneness. Let stand 10 minutes; thinly slice and keep warm. Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Evenly brush bread with 1/4 cup Dressing. Arrange bread on baking sheet and bake 12 minutes or until golden. Evenly spread goat cheese on bread, then top with beef; set aside. Toss arugula with remaining 1/4 cup Dressing. Arrange arugula on serving platter, then top with prepared bruschetta slices.

title: Pumpkin Cake
ingredients: ['2 (1 lb.) cans pumpkin', '1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk', '3 eggs, slightly beaten', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. cloves', '1/2 tsp. nutmeg', '1/4 tsp. ground ginger', '1 c. sugar', '1 pkg. dry yellow cake mix', '1 c. chopped nuts', '1 1/2 sticks melted butter']
directions: Mix pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, ginger and sugar. Pour in a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle cake mixture and nuts on top. Drizzle 1 1/2 sticks melted butter over top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes.

title: Hershey Bar Cake
ingredients: ['8 Hershey bars (8 oz.)', '1 c. butter', '2 c. sugar', '4 eggs', '2 1/4 c. flour', '1/2 tsp. baking soda', '1 c. buttermilk', '3/4 c. chocolate syrup', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Melt candy bars. Mix butter, sugar and eggs. Add flour mixture alternately with milk. Add chocolate syrup, candy bars and vanilla. Pour into tube pan or large cake pan. Bake 1 1/2 hours at 350\u00b0.

title: Pumpkin Dessert
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. cinnamon', '1 tsp. ginger', '1/2 tsp. cloves', '1 large (29 oz.) can pumpkin', '6 eggs, beaten', '2 c. milk', '1 pkg. yellow cake mix', '1 cube butter or margarine', 'chopped nuts']
directions: Mix together sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger and cloves. Add pumpkin, eggs and milk.

title: Mike'S Famous Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['1 (16 oz.) can pumpkin', '2 eggs, slightly beaten', '3/4 c. brown sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. ginger', '1/2 tsp. cloves, freshly ground', '1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk', '1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell']
directions: Mix pumpkin, eggs, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and milk in this order. Preheat oven to 425\u00b0.

title: Indian Pudding
ingredients: ['6 c. milk', '1 c. yellow cornmeal', '1/2 c. black molasses', '1/4 c. sugar', '1/4 tsp. ground ginger', '1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon', '1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg', '1/4 c. melted butter', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. baking soda', '2 eggs, well beaten']
directions: Preheat oven to 250\u00b0. Simmer milk; remove from heat. Combine cornmeal, molasses, sugar, ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, salt, baking soda, eggs and half the milk in a bowl. Whisk thoroughly. Stir in remaining milk. Pour into a well-greased 2 to 3-quart baking dish. Bake 5 to 7 hours, occasionally until firm.

title: Creamy Creme Brulee
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1 pkg. (4.6 oz.) JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Cook & Serve Pudding', '1 qt. (4 cups) whole milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/3 cup brown sugar']
directions: Whisk eggs in small bowl until blended. Mix pudding mix and milk in medium saucepan. Bring to boil on medium heat, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Add small amount of hot pudding to eggs; mix well. Gradually stir into remaining pudding in pan; cook and stir 1 min. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Pour into 8 (5-oz.) ramekins or small ovenproof bowls. Refrigerate 3 hours. Heat broiler when ready to serve desserts. Sprinkle desserts with sugar. Broil, 4 inches from heat, 2 to 3 min. or until sugar is melted.

title: Simple Sandwich Spread
ingredients: ['6 oz. cream cheese', '2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped fine', '2 Tbsp. grated raw onion', '2 Tbsp. diced green pepper', '1/2 c. pecans, put through blender', '2 Tbsp. chili sauce']
directions: Mix all of the ingredients together. Add salt and pepper to taste, put on bread and . . . . surprise!

title: Pineapple Whip
ingredients: ['8 ounces crushed pineapple', '14 cup lemon juice', '12 ounces Cool Whip', '10 ounces sweetened condensed milk']
directions: Mix lemon juice and milk together, then add Cool Whip and pineapple. Also great as a topping on angel food cakes or other desserts!

title: 5-Minute Pear Crumble
ingredients: ['1 can (16 oz.) pear slices, drained Safeway 1 lb For $1.88 thru 02/09', '8 vanilla wafers, crushed', '1/2 cup thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping', '1/8 tsp. ground cinnamon']
directions: Spoon pears into 4 dessert bowls. Sprinkle with wafer crumbs. Combine COOL WHIP and cinnamon; spoon over desserts.

title: Apricot Tart
ingredients: ['7 tablespoons butter melted and cooled down', '1 2/3 cups wheat flour', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons almonds grounded', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 cup yoghurt', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon flour', '3 cups apricots pitted and cut in wedges']
directions: 1. Sift flour, mix with almonds and salt. 2. In separate bowl mix butter with vanilla extract and add flour bit by bit, keep mixing. 3. Knead dough. 4. Transfer to baking tray, lined with parchment. 5. Press the dough to the bottom and form a brim around. 6. Pinch with fork and bake about 15 minutes, in preheated oven, in 200 C degrees. 7. Mix yoghurt, egg, honey, vanilla extract and 1 tablespoon of flour. 8. Remove crust from the oven, arrange apricot's wedges around, starting form the edge. Once whole crust is covered, pour over the yoghurt mixture. 9. Return to the oven, continue baking about 50 minutes, till the filling sets and turns golden brown.

title: Simple Apple Fritters
ingredients: ['1 cup flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '3 tablespoons sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 egg (beaten)', '1/3 cup milk', '1 cup apple (diced)', '1 cup cooking oil', "confectioners' sugar (for dusting)"]
directions: Measure and sift all dry ingredients. Beat eggs and milk together; slowly incorporating the dry ingredients. Add the chopped apples. In a heavy skillet on the stovetop, heat cooking oil over medium-high heat. Drop teaspoon full of apple-batter into hot oil and fry until golden brown in color- 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Remove from oil and drain on brown paper. Cool and sprinkle with powdered sugar. Makes 12 small fritters. Eliminate the sugar and serve with pork roast.

title: Pumpkin Crunch
ingredients: ['16 oz. can pumpkin', '13 oz. can evaporated milk', '1 c. sugar, granulated', '3 eggs', '18 1/4 oz. box yellow cake mix', '1 c. butter, melted', '1 c. pecans, chopped', '1/2 tsp. ginger', '1/2 tsp. cloves', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon', '1 tsp. nutmeg']
directions: Mix pumpkin, ginger, milk, cloves, sugar, cinnamon, eggs, and nutmeg. Pour into a 9-inch x 13-inch pan coated with Pam. Sprinkle cake mix dry over pumpkin mixture. Sprinkle nuts over cake mix. Spoon cooled, melted butter over nuts. Bake 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes.

title: Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['1 soup chicken', '3 1/2 qt. water', '2 onions', '1 Tbsp. salt', '2 carrots', '3 stalks celery', '2 sprigs dill', '3 sprigs parsley']
directions: Clean chicken thoroughly. Combine in a deep saucepan with water and onions. Bring to a boil and cook over medium heat for 1 1/2 hours. Add remaining ingredients. Cover and cook over low heat 1 hour longer or until chicken is tender. Remove chicken and strain soup. Makes about 2 to 2 1/2 quarts soup. Use the chicken in other dishes or serve with soup.

title: Cheese Bread
ingredients: ['1/2 c. onion, chopped', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1/2 c. milk', '1 1/2 c. Bisquick', '1 c. sharp cheese, grated', '1 Tbsp. sesame seed', '2 Tbsp. melted butter']
directions: Heat oven to 400\u00b0. Bake 20 to 25 minutes. Saute onion in 1 tablespoon butter until golden. Mix egg and milk; blend in Bisquick. Add onion and half of cheese. Spread dough in greased 8 x 11-inch round glass baking dish. Sprinkle top with remaining cheese and sesame seed. Sprinkle melted butter over all.

title: Satay Meatloaf
ingredients: ['400g lean beef / veal mince', '400g lean pork mince', "1 onion, coarsely grated King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", '1 cup fresh breadcrumbs', '1 cup grated carrot Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06', '1/3 cup KRAFT* Light Crunchy Peanut Spread', '1/4 cup finely chopped coriander', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce', '2 tablespoons kecap manis']
directions: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl, being careful not to overmix. Place the mixture in a greased-lined loaf tin; pressing down gently. Cook at 180C for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until cooked through. Rest for 5 minutes. Slice meatloaf and serve drizzled with pan juices.

title: Molasses Whoopie Pies
ingredients: ['2 3/4 c. flour', '1 tsp. baking soda', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 1/4 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 c. butter', '3/4 c. sugar', '2 eggs', '2/3 c. light molasses', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. ginger']
directions: Sift flour with soda, salt, cinnamon and ginger; set aside. Cream butter and sugar; beat in eggs. Stir in molasses. Add flour mixture, alternating with milk. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. Drop by tablespoon onto greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375\u00b0 about 10 minutes.

title: Gingerbread Cookies
ingredients: ['3/4 c. sugar', '1/2 c. softened oleo', '1/2 c. dark molasses', '1/8 c. warm milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 eggs', '2 1/2 c. flour', '1 tsp. baking soda', '3/4 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. ginger', '1/4 tsp. allspice', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: Mix sugar and butter together. Add molasses, milk, vanilla and eggs. Mix until blended. By hand, mix in flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon, allspice and salt until well blended. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.

title: Acorda a Alentejana- "Poor Mans' Soup" Recipe
ingredients: ['3 garlic cloves, peeled and chopped', '1 bunch of cilantro, washed and roughly chopped', '2 tsp sea salt', '1/3 cup of olive oil', '7 cups boiling water', 'A Loaf of day old Portuguese, French or Italian crusty bread, cut into 1 1/2 inch chunks', '1/2 tsp ground pepper', 'Hard boiled eggs or poached- if and as many as desired']
directions: Add the garlic, cilantro, salt, olive oil, into a medium size bowl and mix well. Once it is mixed add the boiling water. Take your bread, dip it in the soup and then place it on your plate. Then add your egg, eat the egg and the bread together and...Enjoy!

title: Down South Potato Pie
ingredients: ['2 1/4 c. cooked mashed sweet potatoes', '1/2 c. butter', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. flour', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. nutmeg', '1/2 tsp. ginger', '1/2 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. ground cloves', '2 eggs, beaten', '2 small cans Milnot', '2/3 c. milk', '2 (9-inch) unbaked pastry shells']
directions: Combine sweet potatoes and butter, mixing until blended. Add sugar, flour, salt, nutmeg, ginger, cinnamon and cloves. Blend in eggs and milk. Pour into crusts and bake in a 350\u00b0 oven 1 hour.

title: Butterscotch Ice Cream Recipe
ingredients: ['1 x Recipe basic vanilla ice cream Sugar', '2 Tbsp. Butter']
directions: Vary any of the basic vanilla ice cream recipes in the following way: Butterscotch Ice Cream. Cook sugar with 2 Tbsp. butter till melted and well browned. Dissolve in warm lowfat milk or possibly cream. from Fannie Farmer /DESSERTS

title: Mel'S Hot Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ['2 large cans pineapple chunks, drained', '6 Tbsp. pineapple juice', '6 Tbsp. flour', '1 c. sugar', '2 c. grated cheese', '3 c. crushed Ritz crackers', '2 sticks butter, melted']
directions: Mix together first 5 ingredients and put in Pyrex dish. Mix crackers and butter together and pour on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Serve with baked ham.

title: Praline Pumpkin Mousse
ingredients: ['1 cup cold milk', '1 can (15 oz.) pumpkin', '2 pkg. (4-serving size each) JELL-O Vanilla Flavor Instant Pudding', '1-1/4 tsp. pumpkin pie spice', '2 cups thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping', '1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted', '1/2 cup chopped PLANTERS Pecans', '1/3 cup firmly packed brown sugar']
directions: Pour milk into large bowl. Add pumpkin, dry pudding mixes and pumpkin pie spice. Beat with wire whisk 2 min. or until well blended. (Mixture will be thick.) Gently stir in whipped topping. Spoon evenly into 10 dessert glasses. Refrigerate 4 hours or until set. Mix butter, pecans and sugar until well blended; sprinkle evenly over desserts just before serving. Store leftover desserts in refrigerator.

title: Brown Rice And Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['3 to 4 eggs', '3 c. milk (skim)', '5 to 6 slices whole wheat bread, cubed', '2 to 3 c. brown rice, cooked', '1/2 c. raisins', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1/2 c. brown sugar', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: Beat eggs, sugar, milk and vanilla together. Add cinnamon. Stir in rice, bread and raisins. Bour into 3 quart casserole. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 60 minutes. Pudding is done when knife inserted between edge and center comes out clean. Let cool to warm! Great for breakfast and desserts.

title: Hot Dog Chili
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 Tbsp. mustard', '1/4 stick margarine', 'dash of A.1 sauce', '3/4 bottle ketchup', '1/2 tsp. chili powder', '1 large onion, chopped', 'dash of Worcestershire sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Put ingredients into saucepan with 1/2 cup water. Let it get hot, stirring occasionally to break up ground beef. When mixture cooks little while, turn to low and simmer for 30 to 45 minutes.

title: Pumpkin Pie

title: Chicken Khao Soi
ingredients: ['4 large dried guajillo chilies, stemmed & halved & seeded', '2 shallots, peeled & halved', '8 garlic cloves, peeled', '2 inches ginger, peeled & sliced', '1/4 cup cilantro, chopped', '1 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 (14 ounce) cans unsweetened coconut milk', '2 cups chicken broth', '1 1/2 lbs boneless skinless chicken thighs, halved lengthwise', '1 1 lb ramen noodles or 1 lb rice noodles', '3 -4 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon palm sugar or 1 tablespoon brown sugar', 'sliced red onion, bean sprouts, cilantro sprigs, crispy fried onions, chili oil, and lime wedges (all optional for serving)']
directions: Place chiles in a small heatproof bowl, add boiling water to cover, and let soak until softened, 25-30 minutes. Drain chiles, reserving soaking liquid. Puree chiles, shallots, garlic, ginger, cilantro, coriander, turmeric, curry powder, and 2 tablespoons soaking liquid in a food processor, adding more soaking liquid by tablespoonfuls, if needed, until smooth. You've just made khao soi paste! Heat oil in a large heavy pot over medium heat. Add khao soi paste; cook, stirring constantly, until slightly darkened, 4-6 minutes. Add coconut milk and broth. Bring to a boil; add chicken. Reduce heat and simmer until chicken is fork-tender, 20-25 minutes. Transfer chicken to a plate. Let cool slightly; shred meat. Meanwhile, cook noodles according to package directions. Add chicken, 3 tablespoons fish sauce, and sugar to soup. Season with salt and/or more fish sauce, if needed. Divide soup and noodles among bowls and serve with toppings.

title: Dilly Pickled Beans

directions: Cook's Note: When you fill your jars, really pack these beans in. Even if you think you can't cram one more in, try it; you'll be surprised how many you can fit in, and it will help them keep from floating in the jar. Also, be sure not to use iodized salt, like table salt. It will discolor your pickles over time. Wash the green beans and trim their ends so that they are uniform. If needed, cut them further so that they will fit easily inside of the jars you are using to can them. Divide the beans into sterilized canning jars, along with the garlic, pepper flakes and dill seed. In a small saucepan, bring the vinegars, water and pickling salt to a boil, until the salt dissolves. Pour the pickling mixture over the green beans and cap the jars. Process the jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes. Alternatively, allow to cool and refrigerate. Properly-handled sterilized equipment will keep canned foods in good condition for years. Sterilizing jars is the first step of preserving foods.

ingredients: ['8 oz. Hershey milk chocolate bar', '1 1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: Melt chocolate bar and mix in 1/2 cup peanut butter. Take the remaining cup of peanut butter and melt in a Pyrex cup set in water in a pot. Use paper muffin cups. Put 1 tablespoon of chocolate first and let it set. Then, add 1 tablespoon of peanut butter and let it set. Cover with chocolate.

title: Easy Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1/2 to 3/4 c. margarine', 'Season-All', 'garlic salt', '1 1/4 c. uncooked rice', 'black pepper', '1/2 c. diced onion (optional)']
directions: Place whole chicken in microwave-safe casserole dish. Baste with butter or margarine. Season with Season-All, garlic salt and black pepper. Add onion. Cover tightly with lid or cling wrap. Cook on High for 20 minutes, with breast down. Repeat this procedure every 20 minutes, each time turning over chicken and adding seasoning, for about 1 hour.

title: Chocolate-Pecan Brownies
ingredients: ['1/4 c. flour', '1/4 tsp. soda', '3/4 c. sugar', '1/3 c. butter or oleo', '2 Tbsp. water', '12 oz. chocolate chips', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 large eggs', '1/2 c. chopped nuts']
directions: To make Chocolate-Peanut Butter Brownies, add 1/2 cup peanut butter (and omit pecans, optional).

title: Un-Fried French Fries(Low-Fat)
ingredients: ['5 large baking potatoes', 'light vegetable oil spray', '2 large egg whites', '1 Tbsp. Cajun spice']
directions: Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Slice potato lengthwise into 1/4-inch ovals, then slice each oval into lengthwise matchsticks. Coat baking sheet with 3 sprays of vegetable oil. Combine egg whites and Cajun spice in a bowl. Add potatoes and mix to coat. Return to baking sheet, leaving a little space between. Cook on bottom shelf. Bake 40 to 45 minutes until crispy, turning often.

title: Reese'S Cups
ingredients: ['8 oz. Hershey milk chocolate bar', '1 1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: Melt 1/2 cup peanut butter in chocolate bar. Put chocolate in muffin pans; let set 20 to 30 minutes. Melt remaining peanut butter, then put on top of chocolate. Let cool.

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients: ['2 -5 ounces tuna in water', '12 cup onion, diced', '12 cup celery, diced', '6 egg whites', '3 tablespoons spicy brown mustard', '4 tablespoons Miracle Whip light']
directions: Mix all together. Sometimes I will use one egg yolk.

title: Peanut Butter Cup Pie
ingredients: ['20 miniature peanut butter cups, unwrapped', '50 chocolate kisses, unwrapped', '1 large Cool Whip', '1 graham cracker crust']
directions: Chop peanut butter cups. Set aside. Melt kisses in microwave on High for 1 minute or just until chocolate is melted. Stir in 3 1/2 cups Cool Whip. Spread 1/2 chocolate kisses topping mix into pie crust. Sprinkle peanut butter cups over chocolate layer. Top peanut butter cups with the remaining 1/2 chocolate mixture. Refrigerate 3 hours or until set. Spread the remaining Cool Whip over pie. Garnish with chocolate kisses.

title: Sweet Potato Empanadas
ingredients: ['2 large sweet potatoes', '2 tablespoons diced onion', 'olive oil', 'salt', '1/4 cup heavy cream', '1 teaspoon ground chipotle pepper', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon chopped scallion', '2 slices bacon, cooked until crisp and crumbled', '2 packages of Goya empanada shells, \\', 'discos\\', '', '1 egg']
directions: Scrub sweet potatoes and prick all over with a knife or fork. Place on microwave safe plate and microwave on high for 15 minutes until the potatoes are very soft. Remove from microwave and set aside to cool. Saute onion in a bit of olive oil and a pinch of salt until softened. When potatoes are cool enough to handle, scoop flesh into a bowl. Add cream, chipotle, brown sugar, and cinnamon, stirring well to combine. Stir in scallions, cooked onion, and bacon. Refrigerate until ready to use. Preheat oven to 350F. Remove discos from packaging. Place a scant tablespoon of sweet potato filling in the center of each. Fold ends over to form a half-moon, and crimp closed with the tines of a fork. Place empanadas on a nonstick cookie sheet. Beat egg with a teaspoon of water and brush onto tops of pastries. Bake for 25 minutes, or until golden brown. Serve hot or at room temperature.

title: Joyce'S Homemade Fudge
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. evaporated milk', '1 (7 oz.) jar marshmallow cream', '1/2 stick margarine', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 (12 oz.) bag milk chocolate chips', '1 (6 oz.) bag semi-sweet chips', '1 c. chopped pecans or other nuts', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Optional: Peanut butter chips instead of milk chocolate chips for peanut butter fudge.

title: Buckeye Candy
ingredients: ['1 stick butter, softened', '1 1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 lb. confectioners sugar', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips', '1/3 block wax']
directions: Mix butter, vanilla, peanut butter and confectioners sugar. Melt wax in a double boiler. Add chocolate chips. Make peanut butter mixture into balls. Dip into chocolate and place on wax paper.

title: Spinach Bread
ingredients: ['1 lb. dough', '1 pkg. fresh spinach, steamed and drained', '1/2 c. black olives', '1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese or other cheeses', 'Swiss or Provolone cheese, sliced (if desired)']
directions: Fry the spinach with garlic, salt and pepper in a little olive oil. When almost done, add chopped olives to the fried spinach. Layer spinach on rolled out dough. Top with cheeses, as desired. Roll into jelly roll shape. Place on a lightly floured pan with seam on the bottom and the ends turned under. Lightly oil dough top, then make 3 diagonal slits across top with knife. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 60 minutes.

title: Oatmeal Crispies
ingredients: ['1 c. shortening', '1 c. brown sugar', '1 c. white sugar', '3 c. oats', '2 eggs', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chopped nuts', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1 1/2 c. flour', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. soda']
directions: Cream shortening and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Beat well. Add sifted dry ingredients. Add oatmeal and nuts. Mix well. Shape into rolls. Wrap in wax paper and store in refrigerator until chilled or overnight. Slice 1/2-inch and bake 10 minutes at 350\u00b0. You can add raisins.

title: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['8 oz. bar chocolate', '1/4 lb. butter', '1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: Melt butter and peanut butter together. Pour melted chocolate in paper cupcake liners. Layer peanut butter mixture and top with layer of melted chocolate. Refrigerate until set.

title: Hot Dog Corn Supper
ingredients: ['6 hot dogs', '2 Tbsp. onion, chopped', '1/4 c. green pepper, chopped', '1 Tbsp. margarine', '1 can (2 c.) corn']
directions: Cut hot dogs into 1/2-inch pieces. Brown hot dogs, onion and green pepper in margarine. Add the corn and stir. Heat until corn is hot. Serves four.

title: Peanut Butter, Chocolate And Nut Loaf
ingredients: ['0.50 cups fresh ground (no-sugar) peanut butter', '4 teaspoons butter', '1 cup almond flour', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '2 tablespoons baking powder', '6 eggs, beaten', '0.25 cups rough chopped pecans', '0.25 cups sweetener (Swerve)', '2 ounces chopped dark chocolate (99% Scharffen Berger)']
directions: Melt the peanut butter and butter in the microwave; stir to mix. Beat the eggs in a mixing bowl, add everything except the chocolate and the peanut butter mixture. Blend. Then add the peanut butter mixture. Divide between two medium sized or three small loaf pans. Top with the chocolate. Freely adapted from: \r\nhttp://www.sugarfreemom.com/recipes/low-carb-gluten-free-chocolate-peanut-butter-loaf

title: Reese's Peanut Butter Bars
ingredients: ['1 12 cups graham wafer crumbs', '1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup butter (melted)', '2 12 cups icing sugar', '2 cups chocolate chips']
directions: Mix together everything except the chocolate chips. Press into a 9x13 pan. Melt chocolate and pour over peanut butter mixture. (If you don't want the chocolate to set hard, mix a little peanut butter in with the melted chocolate. ). Cut into squares before the chocolate completely sets, or the chocolate will crack.

title: Reese'S Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['1 (8 oz.) Hershey chocolate candy bar', '2 Tbsp. peanut butter', '1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: Melt chocolate and 2 tablespoons peanut butter in a small saucepan. Pour into paper cup lined muffin tin, approximately 2 tablespoons. Let cool. Melt 1/2 cup peanut butter. Pour over chocolate. Cool. Top with another tablespoon of chocolate peanut butter mixture.

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['4 ounces peanut butter', '3 ounces peanut butter cups', '3 12 ounces butterfinger candy bars', '14 teaspoon salt', '2 cups brown sugar', '4 tablespoons chocolate syrup', '3 ounces milk chocolate candies', '5 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1 cup flour']
directions: Cream peanut butter (preferably peter pan honey roast), vanilla, peanut butter cups, butterfinger, 1/5 teaspoon salt, 1 tbsp sugar and set aside as peanut butter mixture. Cream 1 stick butter, 1 cup brown sugar, 4 tbsp chocolate syrup, 3 ounces ground chocolate. Stir 5 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 cup flour and 1/4 tsp baking powder into the creamed chocolate mixture. Fold the chocolate cookie over the peanut butter, forming a chocolate crust with a peanut butter center. Bake 350 degrees for 5 minutes.

title: Peanut Butter Cup Brownies
ingredients: ['4 oz. unsweetened chocolate', '1/2 c. butter, softened', '1/2 c. creamy peanut butter', '2 c. brown sugar', '4 eggs', '2 tsp. chocolate extract', '1 c. flour', '2 c. (12 oz.) peanut butter chips', '12 miniature peanut butter cup candies']
directions: Melt chocolate in a saucepan or double boiler over simmering water. Cool slightly. Cream butter, peanut butter and brown sugar. Beat in eggs and chocolate extract. Mix in melted chocolate. Blend in flour and peanut butter chips. Pour batter into greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Top evenly with peanut butter cup candy pieces, pressing them lightly into the batter.

title: Chocolate-Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['8 oz. Hershey milk chocolate bars (6 candy bars)', '1 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: Break chocolate bars into small pieces; melt in a double boiler. Mix 1/2 cup melted peanut butter in with the chocolate. Melt 1 cup peanut butter separately. Put cupcake liners into a muffin pan. Put about a tablespoon of chocolate into each cup. Allow this to harden before putting peanut butter next. Peanut butter needs to harden before placing 1 tablespoon chocolate on top.

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Snacking Cake
ingredients: ['1 chocolate cake mix', 'peanut butter', "16 oz. Hershey's chocolate bar"]
directions: Grease cookie sheet. Mix cake and directed and pour mixture into cooking sheet and bake until done. While still warm, coat top with peanut butter. Cool and then chill in refrigerator until peanut butter is firm. Melt chocolate and pour chocolate over top of peanut butter. Cool and chill until chocolate is hard.

title: Chocolate Sheet Cake
ingredients: ['1/2 c. buttermilk mixed with 1 tsp. soda', '2 c. each sugar and flour, sifted in large bowl', '1 c. cold water', '2 sticks oleo', "2 Tbsp. Hershey's cocoa", '1/2 pkg. German Sweet Chocolate (4 -1 oz. blocks)', '2 eggs']
directions: Bring to boil the German Sweet chololate, oleo, water, and cocoa. Add buttermilk and eggs. Beat well and pour into greased and floured (1 in. high, 17 3/4 in. long, 11 3/4 in. wide) pan. The mixture will be liquid-like. Cook on 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes.

title: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['2 c. peanut butter', '8 oz. bar Hershey chocolate']
directions: Mix 1/2 cup peanut butter with chocolate. Melt 1 1/2 cups peanut butter in a measuring cup in saucepan of water. Cut cupcake paper; place in pans. Put 2 tablespoons of chocolate in cups; let cool. Put 1 to 2 tablespoons of peanut butter on top, 1 tablespoon on to just cover peanut butter.

title: Onion Rings
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '2 c. flour', '1 c. milk', '1 tsp. salt', '2 Tbsp. butter', '2 or more large onions', 'Crisco (enough to fry deep)']
directions: Cut onions 1/3 to 1/2-inch thick. Soak in the cup of milk for two hours. Drain well. Bake batter with the flour, salt, butter, eggs and the milk the onions were soaked in. Dip rings one at a time; fry one at a time in Crisco. Drain when browned.

title: Reese'S Cup Candy
ingredients: ['1 box confectioners sugar', '2 sticks soft butter', '1 (12 oz.) jar peanut butter', '8 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips', '1/3 bar paraffin']
directions: Mix sugar, butter and peanut butter by mixer. Roll into balls on waxed paper and chill. Melt chocolate and wax. Dip peanut butter into chocolate and chill.

title: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['12 oz. real chocolate chips', '2/3 stick wax', '2 c. powdered sugar', '1/2 c. melted butter', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: Melt 1/2 of chocolate chips and 1/2 of wax together. Put thin layer of chocolate mix in bottom of petite baking cups. Mix together powdered sugar, butter and peanut butter. Layer over chocolate. Melt other half of chocolate and pour over peanut butter layers.

title: Peanut Butter Cup Popcorn Mix
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter', '1 (1 ounce) packet hot chocolate powder', '1 cup chocolate chips', '1 cup miniature peanut butter cup', 'chocolate-covered peanuts', 'popped kettle corn']
directions: Whisk together powdered peanut butter and hot chocolate (equal parts of each) in a small bowl. Pour into a shaker bottle if desired. Scoop prepared kettle corn into a bowl. Melt chocolate chips, then drizzle chocolate all over popcorn and shake/stir to distribute over all the kernels. Sprinkle chocolate peanut butter seasoning mix all over popcorn, then shake/stir again to stick to melted chocolate. Add mini peanut butter cups and chocolate covered peanuts to the popcorn and finish with a final drizzle of melted chocolate. Optionally add crushed or whole peanuts, chocolate sprinkles, chocolate chips, and/or chocolate peanut butter candies to the mix.

title: Tandy Cakes
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2 tsp. baking powder', '2 tsp. butter', '2 c. flour', 'pinch of salt', '1 c. milk', '4 eggs', '1 tsp. vanilla', 'peanut butter', '1 (8 oz.) bar Hershey chocolate']
directions: Mix together in bowl all ingredients, except peanut butter and chocolate. Spread in a 9 x 13-inch pan or larger. Bake for 25 minutes at 350\u00b0. Spread with peanut butter while hot. When cool, melt the chocolate and spread over peanut butter.

title: Buckeye Candy
ingredients: ['3 c. peanut butter', '2 sticks butter', '12 oz. chocolate chips', '2 lb. powdered sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 piece paraffin wax']
directions: Mix peanut butter, butter, powdered sugar and vanilla. Form into balls. Melt the chocolate chips and paraffin together. Dip each peanut butter ball into the chocolate mixture. Let dry on wax paper. The paraffin adds shine to the chocolate coating.

title: Chocolate-Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ['2 sticks soft oleo', '18 oz. smooth peanut butter', '1 lb. box powdered sugar', '12 oz. block chocolate bark']
directions: Mix oleo, peanut butter and sugar. Roll into 1-inch balls. Chill for approximately 1 hour. Melt chocolate bark. Dip peanut butter balls in chocolate. Set on wax paper until chocolate cools and hardens.

title: Peanut Butter Swirl Squares
ingredients: ['16 ounces white chocolate, chopped', '12 ounces peanut butter, smooth', '16 ounces milk chocolate chips']
directions: Grease pan and set aside. Melt white chocolate, stirring frequently. Add peanut butter to white chocolate and stir until well blended. Pour peanut mixture into prepared pan. Melt milk chocolate chips. Pour milk chocolate over peanut butter mixture and stir with a knife. Place in refrigerator until firm. Cut into squares and store in the refrigerator.

title: Apple Square Cake(No Eggs)
ingredients: ['1 c. oleo', '2 c. sugar', '3 c. applesauce', '2 tsp. soda', '1 box (15 oz.) raisins', '4 c. flour', '2 tsp. cinnamon', '1 c. walnuts']
directions: Mix all ingredients together and mix well. Bake in tube cake pan at 325\u00b0 for 1 1/2 hours.

title: Reese'S Cups
ingredients: ['8 oz. Hershey milk chocolate bar', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: Line muffin pans with cupcake liners. Melt chocolate bar. Add 1/2 cup peanut butter. Melt 1 cup peanut butter. Layer in muffin liners as follows: chocolate layer and let set; peanut butter layer and let set; and chocolate layer and let set.

title: Baked Mac And Cheese
ingredients: ['1 package (16 ounces) uncooked elbow macaroni', '1/3 cup plus 1/4 cup butter, divided', '3/4 cup finely chopped onion', '6 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon ground mustard', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '4-1/2 cups 2% milk', '4 cups shredded sharp cheddar cheese', '3/4 cup dry bread crumbs']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Cook macaroni according to package directions for al dente; drain. In a Dutch oven, heat 1/3 cup butter over medium heat; saute onion until tender. Stir in flour and seasonings until blended; gradually stir in milk. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly; cook and stir until thickened. Stir in cheese until melted. Stir in macaroni. Transfer to a greased 13x9-in. baking dish. In a microwave, melt remaining butter; toss with bread crumbs. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake, uncovered, until heated through, 30-35 minutes.

title: Candy Reese'S Cups
ingredients: ['1 stick margarine', '1 box powdered sugar', '2 c. peanut butter', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 large pkg. chocolate chips']
directions: Mix butter, sugar, peanut butter and vanilla. Roll into small balls and chill. Melt chocolate chips. Dip chilled peanut butter balls in chocolate mix. Lay on waxed paper.

title: Bourride
ingredients: ['Court Bouillon', '6 cups water', '2 pounds fish heads, bones & trimmings', '1 cup dry white wine', '2 onions, thinly sliced', '2 leeks, white part only, thinly sliced', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon fennel seeds, crushed', '2 three-inch strips fresh orange peel', '2 bay leaves', '2 teaspoons sea salt', 'space', '2 pounds each of three kind of firm white fish fillets or steaks - choices should include: either monkfish or swordfish; a gelatinous fish, such as rockfish or halibut; and a delicate fish, such as flounder, whiting, sea bass, porgy or red snapper. Have your whol', '3 pounds new potatoes (preferably red-skinned), boiled, then peeled and sliced 1/3-inch thick', 'Croutes', 'Aioli', '1 tablespoon fine, dry, unflavored breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '6 garlic cloves, chopped', '3 large egg yolks', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/8 teaspoon white pepper', '1 cup extra-virgin olive oil']
directions: For the Aioli: Soak the breadcrumbs in 1 tablespoon of wine vinegar for 5 minutes, then squeeze the crumbs dry in the corner of a towel. In a food processor fitted with the metal blade, chop the garlic, then add crumbs and combine with garlic to make a smooth paste. Add egg yolks, and all the other ingredients except the oil and combine. Scrape down sides. Now, with the motor running, add olive oil in a slow, steady stream. When all the oil is in, you have aioli. In a 4- to 6-quart saucepan, bring the court bouillon ingredients to a boil, partially cover the pan, and cook over low heat for 30 minutes. Meanwhile, make the Aioli. Spoon 2/3 cup of Aioli into a small sauceboat and cover with plastic wrap. Put the rest of the sauce (about 1 1/3 cups) into a 3- to 4-quart saucepan. Strain the court bouillon through a sieve into a bowl, pressing down hard on the vegetables and trimmings with a spoon before discarding them. Wash the pan and return the court bouillon to it. Add the fish, bring to a boil and simmer uncovered for 3 to 8 minutes, or until the fish is just firm to the touch. Watch the fish CAREFULLY!! Different kinds and thicknesses cook at different speeds. With a slotted spoon or spatula, transfer the pieces to a heated platter as soon as they are done. Cover the platter loosely to keep the fish warm. Off the heat, beat the remaining 4 yolks, one at a time, into the aioli in the saucepan. Add 1 cup of hot fish broth, beating constantly, then gradually beat in the remaining broth. Cook over low heat, stirring, until the soup is thick enough to coat the whisk lightly. Do NOT let it come to a boil! Season with salt, pepper and lemon juice if needed. While the bouillon simmers also make the croutes. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Spread the slices of bread in one layer on a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes. With a pastry brush, lightly brush both sides of each slice with olive oil. Then turn slices over and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the bread is completely dry and lightly browned. Rub each slice with the cut garlic clove and set aside. To serve, pour the soup into a large tureen and bring it to the table with the platter of fish, a bowl of the sliced potatoes, the sauceboat of aioli and the croutes. Line the bottom of each soup bowl with potatoes and ladle in the soup. Pass the croutes and aioli to put on top. Eat at least part of the soup like this. Then, pass the platter of fish. Put some in your bowl and add some more broth, aioli and croutes. This is the second course of the meal.

title: Editor'S Choice Pineapple Cake
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (undrained)', '2 c. all-purpose flour', '1 c. granulated sugar', '1 c. brown sugar', '2 tsp. baking soda', '1 c. walnuts, chopped']
directions: In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs until they are light and fluffy. Add pineapple and juice, flour, sugars and baking soda. Mix these ingredients well by hand (if you use an electric mixer, too much air is beaten in). Then stir in walnuts and spread the contents of the bowl evenly in an ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 45 or 50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean. After the cake cools, cover it with Cream Cheese Ginger Frosting, then sprinkle some additional walnuts on top. Serving Size: 24. Preparation Time: 1:00.

title: Lemony Lemon Drop Martini
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 cup ice cubes', '3 lemons, peel grated and juiced', '2 large mint leaves', '2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers vodka', '2 tablespoons simple syrup']
directions: Moisten the rim of a martini glass with lemon juice or water, then dip in sugar. Set aside. Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add lemon peel, lemon juice, mint leaves, vodka and simple syrup. Shake until well chilled, then pour into prepared martini glass.

title: Bridget's Peanut Butter Squares
ingredients: ['1 12 cups graham cracker crumbs', '1 lb powdered sugar (about 3 - 3 1/2 c)', '1 12 cups creamy peanut butter', '1 cup butter, melted', '12 ounces semi-sweet chocolate chips, melted']
directions: combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and peanut butter. mix in melted butter. press into a 9x13 pan. spread melted chocolate over peanut butter mixture. chill until chocolate is set. cut into 1 inch squares.

title: Chicken Tortillas
ingredients: ['6 boneless chicken breast halves, skinned and boiled', '2 cans cream of mushroom soup', '12 flour tortillas', '1/4 c. chopped onion', '1 pt. sour cream', '1 c. picante sauce', '2 c. grated cheese']
directions: Mix chicken, onion, sour cream and 1 can of soup. Spoon mixture into tortillas and roll up. Place in a baking dish and bake 10 minutes at 350\u00b0. Pour remaining can of soup over tortillas. Top with salsa and cheese. Bake an additional 20 minutes. Serve.

title: Candy Bar Cookie Squares
ingredients: ['1 package yellow cake mix (regular size)', '1/2 cup packed brown sugar', '1/2 cup butter, melted', '2 eggs', '3 Snickers candy bars (2.07 ounces each) , chopped']
directions: In a large bowl, combine the cake mix, brown sugar, butter and eggs until well blended. Stir in chopped candy. Spread into an ungreased 13-in. x 9-in. baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into squares.

title: Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ['1 lb. Parkay', '2 lb. confectioners sugar', '3 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips', '1 qt. or 4 c. peanut butter', '1 block paraffin']
directions: Melt Parkay; add peanut butter and powdered sugar; mix well. Refrigerate and cool. Melt paraffin and chocolate chips in double boiler. Roll peanut butter mixture into balls the size of walnuts. Dip in chocolate, lay on waxed paper to cool. Or make miniature cups with miniature cupcake liners in miniature muffin pans. Add small amount of chocolate in bottom, then your peanut butter ball and cover with chocolate. Tastes like Reese's peanut butter cups.

title: Mutant Peanut Butter Cups!
ingredients: ['1/2 cup peanut butter your favorite kind', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '1/4 cup sugar powered', '1 pinch salt', '1 bag dark chocolate chips', '1 bag milk chocolate chips']
directions: Add all the peanut butter filling ingredients together in a bowl. Stir them together until the ingredients are well combined. Chill in the fridge until ready to use. Line a muffin tin with the correct sized muffin liners (or risk having mutated looking peanut butter cups). Set aside. Using either your microwave or a double boiler, melt half, of EACH bag of chocolate together. Once the chocolate is completely melted, spoon about 1/2 - 1 tablespoon of chocolate into the liners, inside the muffin tin. Once each liner has chocolate, pick up the muffin tin and give it a gentle shake, side to side, to ensure the chocolate evenly coats the bottom of the liner. Make sure the bottom of the liner is completely covered in chocolate too, touching all sides. You should have left over chocolate in your bowl, which is what you want. Grab the peanut butter from the fridge. Pinch off about a tablespoon of peanut butter with your fingers, and make a flattened disc out of it. Then gently, place the peanut butter on top of the chocolate. Repeat until each muffin liner has peanut butter on top of the chocolate. If you have leftover peanut butter, either eat it, or check to see if any liner has less peanut butter than the others. If so, add the peanut butter to that particular tin. Once your peanut butter is in, spoon in the remaining chocolate, covering the peanut butter completely (you may have to melt more chocolate, it depends on how much chocolate you used for the bottom layer). Once all of the peanut butter is completely covered, give the muffin tin another shake, side to side, to even out the chocolate and make a smooth, level surface. Refrigerate the muffin tin for 30 minutes, or until the chocolate completely hardens. Once finished, take out a peanut butter cup, peel off the liner, and consume!

title: Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ['1 (16 oz) jar peanut butter', '1 box confectioners sugar', '1/3 block paraffin wax', '4 sq. semi-sweet chocolate bar']
directions: Mix peanut butter and sugar together. Melt chocolate bar and wax down. Roll peanut butter mix into quarter size balls. Dip in chocolate. Place on wax paper.

title: Lavender Margarita
ingredients: ['Lavender Simple Syrup', '1 cup sugar', '1 cup water', '1/4 cup dried lavender flowers', 'Lavender Margarita', 'dried lavender + sugar', 'ice', '1 tablespoon lavender syrup', '1 1/2 ounces silver tequila', 'juice of one lime', 'splash of seltzer', 'lavender sprig']
directions: Make the lavender simple syrup: In a small saucepan set over medium heat, combine the sugar and water. Put the lavender in a mesh tea bag or metal tea ball and add to the pan. Stir to ensure no sugar sticks to the bottom of the pan and bring the mixture to a boil. Lower the heat and let simmer until the sugar is completely dissolved. Turn off the heat and let the syrup steep and cool. Discard the lavender, strain if necessary, and transfer to an airtight container or Mason jar. Wet the rim of a glass and dip in a mixture of dried lavender and sugar. Fill the glass with ice and top with lavender syrup, tequila, lime juice, and a splash of seltzer. Garnish with a sprig of lavender and serve.

title: Chocolate Or Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['5 c. sugar', '2 sticks margarine or butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 (12 oz.) can evaporated milk', '1 (7 oz.) jar Marshmallow Creme', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips (I use 3/4 of pkg.)', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: Peanut Butter Fudge: Omit chocolate chips and nuts. Add 8 ounces peanut butter.

title: Peanut Butter Crunch Balls
ingredients: ['6 cups (1425 ml) Rice Krispies Cereal', '4 cups (950 ml) crunchy Peanut butter', '2 lbs (.9 kg). powdered sugar', '3 tbsp (45 ml). vanilla extract', '2 tsp (10 ml). margarine', '1 cup (225 ml) oleo or margarine, softened', "2 packages Hershey's Dark Chocolate chips"]
directions: Mix cereal, peanut butter, powdered sugar, vanilla and oleo in a large bowl. Use your hands to mix together well. Heat chocolate with 2 tsp (10 ml). margarine in a saucepan on very low heat until smooth. Roll peanut butter mixture into small balls. Use tongs to coat the balls with chocolate, then place on waxed paper. Cool chocolate/peanut butter balls in refrigerator until chocolate hardens.

title: Golden Salad Dressing Recipe
ingredients: ['1/4 c. vinegar', '2 tbsp. onion, minced', '4 tbsp. sugar', '2 tbsp. prepared mustard', '1 tbsp. celery seed', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 c. salad oil']
directions: Mix all ingredients except oil with electric mixer. Slowly add in oil, beating at low speed till mix is thick and transparent. Dressing will keep for weeks in refrigerator.

title: Deviled Egg Casserole
ingredients: ['12 hard-boiled eggs, peeled and rinsed', '2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine', '2 tablespoons flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon white pepper', '2 cups skim milk or 2 cups low-fat milk', '1/2 cup swiss cheese, grated', '2 tablespoons dijon-style mustard, divided', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, divided', '1/4 cup fresh finely grated parmesan cheese']
directions: Cut eggs in half lengthwise. Remove yolks and mash on a flat plate with a fork. Set aside. Place egg white halves in a 13x9x2-inch glass baking dish. Set aside. Make sauce by melting butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. Stir in flour, salt and white pepper. Cook 1 minute with mixture bubbling. Whisk in milk gradually, bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil 1 minute, stirring. Add cheese; stir until melted and smooth. Measure out 1/2 C. of sauce in a small bowl and add 1 T. mustard and 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce; stir to blend. Pour over mashed egg yolks and mix until smooth. Fill egg white halves with egg yolk mixture, dividing evenly. Add remaining 1 T. mustard and remaining 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce to remaining sauce. Pour sauce over top of filled eggs. Sprinkle tops of eggs with Parmesan cheese. Bake in a preheated 375-\u00b0F oven for 25 minutes, or until tops are lightly browned. Serve hot.

title: Lettuce And Potato Salad
ingredients: ['romaine lettuce', 'cooked potatoes, baked, cold and diced', 'oil and vinegar', 'salt/pepper to taste', 'onions, chopped (optional)']
directions: Slice romaine lettuce crosswise. Pour in oil and vinegar and mix in tossing with lettuce. Add salt, pepper, onion and diced potatoes. Toss again and serve.

title: Bibb Lettuce And Fruit
ingredients: ['1 large can mandarin oranges, drain and reserve', '1 pt. strawberries', 'cherry tomatoes or tomato wedges', 'purple onions', 'Good Seasons Zesty Italian dressing']
directions: Follow package directions on dressing, using juice from mandarin oranges for the water and substitute tarragon vinegar for white vinegar. Mix well and refrigerate. Combine lettuce, chopped onion, oranges, strawberries and tomatoes. Add dressing to lettuce and fruit when serving.

title: Summer Bean Salad
ingredients: ['1/2 c. olive oil', '1/4 c. red wine vinegar', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. sugar', '1/4 tsp. black pepper', '1(19 oz.) can chick peas, drained', '1 (19 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained', '1 bell pepper, thin 1-inch strips', '1/2 medium red onion, thin strips', '1/4 c. chopped parsley', '2 (11 oz.) cans mandarin oranges, drained', 'lettuce leaves']
directions: For dressing, whisk together oil, vinegar, salt, sugar and pepper; set aside. In large bowl, combine remaining ingredients except lettuce leaves. Toss with dressing. Serve on lettuce leaves.

title: Mini Cracker Sandwiches
ingredients: ['3 Stoned Wheat Thins Cracker', '1 tsp. Miracle Whip Original Spread', '1 Kraft Singles Cheese Slice Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06', '1 slice lettuce', '1 1/2 slices tomato Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09']
