directions: Break 3 Stoned Wheat Thins in half. Divide 1 tsp. Miracle Whip Spread, 1 Singles Slice, 1-1/2 tomato slices and a little lettuce between half of the crackers. Finish off each sandwich by topping with another cracker.

title: Tuna Mac Salad
ingredients: ['1 lb. cooked macaroni', '2 cans tuna fish, drained', '1 large chopped onion', '1/2 c. pickle relish or salad cubes', '1/2 c. mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 boiled eggs, chopped', '1/4 c. chopped celery']
directions: Combine drained/cooked macaroni with well drained tuna. Mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Serve chilled on lettuce with tomato wedges and favorite cracker.

title: Perfect Cashew and Peanut Butter Gluten Free Cookies
ingredients: ['12 cup brown sugar', '12 cup white sugar', '1 egg', '14 cup salted natural-style peanut butter', '14 cup smooth cashew butter', '12 cup gluten-free margarine (casein free)', '12 teaspoon baking soda', '12 cup cornflour', '12 cup tapioca flour', '14 cup potato flour']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 Degrees C). In a medium bowl, mix together the margarine, brown sugar, white sugar and egg until smooth. Stir in the peanut butter and cashew butter. In a small bowl combine the baking soda, corn flour, tapioca flour, and potato flour; stir into the peanut butter mixture to form a dough. Roll the dough into teaspoon sized balls and place them 2 inches apart onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven. Let cool on baking sheets before removing to wire racks to cool completely.

title: French Salad
ingredients: ['1 head green or red leaf lettuce', '2 to 3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 Tbsp. olive oil', '2 Tbsp. canola oil', '1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar', '1 ripe tomato, chopped small', 'bit of red onion, diced (optional)', 'salt']
directions: Wash lettuce, tearing leaves into smaller pieces as you wash. Use a few sprinkles of vinegar to make sure lettuce is squeaky clean. Set aside. In a salad bowl, mix olive oil, canola oil and red wine vinegar. Add plenty of salt. Add garlic, red onion and tomatoes. Let sit for 20 minutes. Add lettuce. Mix salad together to make sure lettuce is coated in dressing. Add additional oil and vinegar as needed (4 parts oil to 1 part vinegar). Serve with French bread.

title: BLT Dip
ingredients: ['1 cup (225 ml) sour cream', '1 cup (225 ml) mayonaise', '1 lb (.5 kg). bacon', '1 tomato diced', '1 cup (225 ml) lettuce shredded']
directions: Mix sour cream and mayo let set overnight. Fry bacon and crumble. Dice tomato. Shred lettuce. Just before serving stir bacon, lettuce and tomato into mayo mixture. Serve with toast tips or really any kind of cracker or chip

title: Rich & Charlie Salad
ingredients: ['1 head iceberg lettuce', '1 head romaine or red leaf', '1 lg. red onion', '1 can Hearts of Palm', '1 can Artichoke hearts, quartered', 'salt', 'pepper', '1/2 C olive oil', '1/4 C red wine vinegar', '1/2 C parmesan', '4 oz Pimentoes with juice']
directions: Break lettuce in salad bowl and add Hearts of Palm, artichokes, pimentoes salt and pepper. Make dressing with oil & vinegar Toss with lettuce and add parmesan

title: Wilted "Killed" Lettuce And Onions
ingredients: ['4 to 6 c. green leaf lettuce, freshly picked', '1 c. chopped young sweet green onions', '1/3 c. bacon grease or oil', '1/3 c. white vinegar', '1/3 c. water', '1/8 tsp. sugar', '1/8 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. black pepper', 'fried bacon, broken in pieces (optional)']
directions: Wash lettuce and pat dry with paper towels. Combine lettuce and onions in a large bowl. Set aside. In a saucepan over high heat, combine oil, vinegar, water and sugar. Bring vinegar mixture to a boil (do not boil in microwave) and pour over the lettuce and onions, stirring and turning the lettuce so most of the lettuce comes in contact with the hot mixture. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add bacon, if desired.

title: Award Winning Cheesy Baked Potatoes
ingredients: ['5 pounds Red Potatoes', '1/2 cups Unsalted Butter', '8 slices Turkey Bacon', '1/2 cups Parmesan Cheese, Freshly Shredded, Divided Use', '1-1/2 cup Monterey Jack Cheese, Shredded', '1-1/2 cup Cheddar Cheese, Shredded', '1 clove Garlic, Minced', '1 Tablespoon Green Onions, Chopped', '1/2 cups Milk', '1-1/2 teaspoon Salt', '1-1/2 teaspoon Fresh Ground Pepper', '1 teaspoon Paprika']
directions: Rinse off the potatoes and quarter them. Then they all get tossed into a big pot, covered with water and boiled lightly. Don't boil 'em to death, please. Once the water gets to rollin' these potatoes will cook a lot quicker than you'd think, so keep a close eye on them. You will know they are done when they are juuust fork tender. Also, if you're wanting to make this for a big upcoming dinner, then you can boil the potatoes ahead of time to save yourself a little bit of time there. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees (F). Use at least a 13x9 inch casserole dish for this, but one that's a little bigger than that works really well. Lightly grease it with olive oil (we are primitive folks and just use our hands to oil the dish). While your potatoes are boiling, melt your stick of butter in a small pot. Once it's melted, remove from heat and set aside. In another pan, fry up the turkey bacon until each piece is nice 'n crunchy. When it's done, remove the turkey bacon from the heat and set aside. You can now start shredded up all of your cheeses. Put them all in the same bowl, but save 1/4 cup of your Parmesan cheese to get sprinkled on the top of your dish before it goes into the oven. Now is also the time to mince your garlic and chop up the green onions and put both into the cheese bowl. Next add in the milk, salt, pepper and paprika. Mix. Try not to eat too much of the cheese. When your potatoes are just fork tender, drain them and pour in your melted butter. Mix. Next add in the big cheese mixture and mix again. Pour the whole thing into your greased casserole dish and top with the reserved 1/4 cup of Parmesan cheese. Crumble your cooked bacon pieces and sprinkle over the top of the potatoes. Can you stand it? Of course not! And I'm not gonna judge you for that. Into the oven goes the dish and it bakes at 350F for about half an hour. Eat 'n enjoy!

title: Salad
ingredients: ['1 head lettuce', '2 stalks celery', '1 red onion', '1/2 pt. sour cream', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. salad dressing (mayo)', '2 Tbsp. vinegar', 'frozen peas', 'bacon bits', 'Parmesan cheese']
directions: Break lettuce up and lay out on platter. Cut up celery and onion and layer over lettuce. Mix sour cream and sugar. Drizzle over lettuce. Mix salad dressing and vinegar; drizzle over lettuce. Sprinkle with frozen peas, bacon bits and Parmesan cheese. Cover and chill overnight.

title: Wilted Lettuce Salad
ingredients: ['garden lettuce or head lettuce', 'green onion', 'vinegar', 'bacon grease']
directions: Cut lettuce very small. Add onion. Add vinegar and salt to taste. Heat bacon grease until smoking. Pour over lettuce (amount to taste), then toss.

title: Old Fashion Lettuce Salad
ingredients: ['1 large bowl fresh lettuce', '3 or 4 green onions', '4 bacon strips', '1/4 c. vinegar', '1/4 c. water', 'salt', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: Chop bacon strips and fry in skillet, add vinegar and water and bring to boiling. Sprinkle salt and sugar on lettuce and pour boiling mixture over the lettuce.

title: Peruvian Seafood and Rice Stew
ingredients: ['1 cup diced plum tomatoes', '1 cup cilantro, finely chopped', '1/2 cup diced red onion', '1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup fresh lime juice', 'Kosher salt', 'Freshly ground pepper', '1 tablespoon canola oil', '1/3 cup aji panca paste (see Note)', '4 cups cooked medium-grain white rice', 'Four 8-ounce bottles clam juice', '12 mussels, scrubbed', '8 shelled and deveined large shrimp', '8 large sea scallops', '4 cleaned squid, bodies cut into thin rings and tentacles halved', '1/2 cup cilantro, finely chopped', '2 scallions, finely chopped', 'Kosher salt', 'Freshly ground pepper', 'Lime wedges, for serving']
directions: Make the salsa criolla In a medium bowl, combine all of the ingredients and season with salt and pepper. Cook the rice and seafood In a large, wide saucepan, heat the canola oil. Add the aji panca paste and cook over moderately high heat, stirring, for 1 minute. Add the rice and stir for 1 minute, then stir in the clam juice and bring to a boil. Add the mussels and cook until they open, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer the mussels to a bowl. Discard any that do not open. Reduce the heat to moderate and continue simmering the rice, stirring constantly, until it has the texture of a very loose risotto, about 4 minutes longer.

title: Pasta Crab Salad
ingredients: ['1 can crab meat', '1/2 c. chopped green olives', '8 oz. shell pasta, cooked', '2 Tbsp. pickle relish', '1/2 c. chopped green onions', '2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped', '2 Tbsp. mayonnaise', '1 Tbsp. mustard', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Combine all ingredients and serve with your favorite cracker on a leaf of lettuce. This is also good with a can of small drained shrimp added.

title: Salata Marouli (Romaine Lettuce Salad)
ingredients: ['1 head romaine lettuce', '3 -4 scallions, chopped', '2 -3 tablespoons fresh chopped dill', 'olive oil', 'vinegar', 'salt']
directions: Wash the lettuce leaves very well under cold running water. Chop the lettuce finely, and put it in a bowl. To it, add the scallions and dill. Add salt, olive oil, and vinegar to taste. Traditionally, this salad has a tart flavor (a little extra vinegar).

title: Salmon Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. flaked salmon', '1/2 c. finely chopped celery', '1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper', '2 Tbsp. mayonnaise', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice']
directions: Combine salmon, celery and green peppers. Add mayonnaise and lemon juice. Refrigerate until time to serve. Serve on lettuce leaves with cracker.

title: Pork Rib Rub
ingredients: ['1/3 cup Paprika', '3 tbsp Dry Mustard', '3 tbsp Onion Powder', '3 tbsp Garlic Powder', '2 tbsp Basil Leaves', '1 tbsp Ground Black Pepper', '1 tbsp Salt', '2 tsp Cayenne Pepper (more or less depending on heat level desired)', '2 tbsp Brown Sugar']
directions: Combine all ingredients. Remove silver skin from the ribs. Coat ribs heavily and massage into the meat (should be enough for 3 slabs or about 1 1/4 cups). Let ribs rest for atleast 2 hours or overnight. Cook/smoke ribs as desired. Extra rub can be stored in an airtight container.

title: Minestrone Siciliano
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus 1 tablespoon', '1 large onion, cut into large dice', '1 celery stalk, cut into large dice', '1 carrot, peeled and cut into 1/2 moon shapes', '1 clove garlic, thinly sliced', '1/4 cup boiled ham chunks or end of prosciutto, large dice', '4 medium tomatoes, fresh or canned, peeled and roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped Italian parsley leaves', '6 cups hot vegetable stock or chicken stock', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '4 small zucchini, medium dice', '3/4 cup arborio rice', '2 yellow, red, or orange bell peppers, roasted, cored, skinned, seeded and cut into strips', 'Freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano', '6 fresh chopped basil leaves']
directions: In a heavy-bottomed soup pot, heat 2 tablespoons olive oil over medium heat until hot, but not smoking. Add the onion and cook, stirring for 1 minute. Lower the heat to low, and add the celery, carrots and garlic. Allow to simmer over low heat until the vegetables begin to soften, about 10 minutes. Add the ham pieces and cook 2 more minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the tomatoes and the parsley. Cook for 5 more minutes so that the flavors meld. Add the hot water or stock and season with salt and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil, and add the zucchini and the rice. Bring back to a boil and then lower the heat so that the liquid is simmering. Let simmer gently until the rice is cooked, about 40 minutes. Remember to stir the soup occasionally. Add more water or stock, if necessary. When the rice is cooked, add the roasted peppers and remove the soup from the heat. Stir in Parmesan, to taste, and top each serving with some chopped basil.

title: Chicken Salad With Blue Cheese
ingredients: ['1 lb cups cooked chicken, diced', '6 cups shredded lettuce', '1 -1 12 cup mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons tarragon vinegar', '4 tablespoons chili or 4 tablespoons seafood cocktail sauce', '2 tablespoons green peppers, chopped', '4 ounces blue cheese, crumbled', 'whole lettuce leaf, for serving']
directions: Mix chicken with shredded lettuce. Mix mayo, vinegar, chili sauce, and green pepper. Add blue cheese. Gently combine chicken, and mayo mixtures. Place salad in a bowl, lined with lettuce, or in individual lettuce cups.

title: Chicken Or Turkey Salad
ingredients: ['2/3 c. mayonnaise', '2 Tbsp. cider vinegar', '1 tsp. salt', '4 to 5 c. chopped, cooked chicken or turkey', '1 c. sliced celery', '1 c. minced green pepper', '2 tsp. grated onions', 'lettuce leaves']
directions: Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and salt. Add chicken and remaining ingredients, except lettuce. Toss well; refrigerate. Serve on lettuce leaf.

title: Date Nut Pudding
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '1 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. flour', '2 c. nuts', '2 c. dates, chopped', '1 tsp. baking powder']
directions: Grease and flour pan. Bake on top shelf at 350\u00b0 for 1/2 hour or more. Serve with Cool Whip.

title: Sweet And Sour Lettuce
ingredients: ['1 head lettuce', '1 small onion', '1 lb. bacon', '3/4 c. sugar', '1/4 c. vinegar', '1/2 c. water']
directions: Break lettuce in small pieces; slice onions thin. Break apart. Cube bacon and brown. Add vinegar, sugar and water mixture. Just before serving, pour over lettuce. Vinegar mixture may be adjusted to taste.

title: Corn Salad
ingredients: ['2 (20 oz.) cans whole kernel corn, drained', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 bell pepper', '1/4 c. mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper']
directions: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Yields 4 to 6 servings.

title: Layered Salad
ingredients: ['lettuce', 'sliced water chestnuts', '1 c. celery, sliced', '1 small head cauliflower, broken', '6 large carrots, grated', '1 pkg. Good Seasons Zesty Italian dry seasoning mix', '1 pkg. frozen English peas', 'Cracker Barrel Cheddar cheese', 'mayonnaise', 'bacon bits']
directions: Shred lettuce to cover bottom of bowl for first layer. Cover lettuce with sliced water chestnuts. Cut up celery over sliced water chestnuts. Break up cauliflower for next layer. Spread carrots over cauliflower. Sprinkle seasoning mix over mixture. Cover with frozen peas. Cover with mayonnaise. Grate Cracker Barrel cheese over mayo. Sprinkle bacon bits on top. Prepare 1 day ahead.

title: Lemon Nut Cake
ingredients: ['1 lb. margarine, softened', '2 c. sugar', '6 eggs', '1 oz. lemon extract', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. baking powder', '3 c. flour (set aside 1/2 c. for fruit)', '2 lb. golden raisins', '1 qt. chopped pecans']
directions: Mix margarine and sugar; add eggs, extract, salt, baking powder, and 2 1/2 c. flour. Mix well. Mix raisins, pecans, and remaining 1/2 c. flour; add to batter. Stir just until blended. Pour into lined and buttered tube pan. Place foil over top of cake and bake at 275\u00b0 for about 2 hours. Place pan of water in oven under cake while it is baking.

title: Roasted Garlic Potatoes
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. vegetable oil', '1 clove garlic', '1 tsp. dried rosemary', '4 medium potatoes', '2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese', '1/4 tsp. pepper']
directions: Lightly grease a large cookie sheet. Wash potatoes and slice 1/8-inch thick. Mix oil, garlic and rosemary. Brush on potatoes. Sprinkle with cheese and pepper. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 30 minutes, until lightly browned and crisp.

title: Caesar Dip
ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese', '12 cup creamy caesar salad dressing', '12 cup crouton', '1 cup parmesan cheese, grated', '1 cup chopped romaine lettuce', 'bacon flavored crackers or cracker, of your choice']
directions: Beat cream cheese, Parmesan cheese and dressing until well blended. Spread on bottom of 9 inch pie plate. Top with lettuce and croutons. Sprinkle with additional parmesan cheese if desired. Serve with bacon flavored crackers or cracker of your choice.

title: Wilted Lettuce
ingredients: ['4 c. leaf lettuce, cut up small', '1 c. vinegar', '3 to 4 green onions, chopped up', 'salt to taste', '1/2 to 3/4 lb. bacon, cooked (save grease from bacon)']
directions: Mix lettuce and onions together. Crumble bacon up and put in lettuce mixture. Heat bacon grease up; it needs to be very hot. Pour bacon grease over lettuce. Mix thoroughly. Pour vinegar over lettuce mix. You can also slice radishes and put in this.

title: Florida Guspachy Salad
ingredients: ['1 cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced', '4 tomatoes, peeled and thinly sliced', '2 green bell peppers, seeded and sliced thinly', '1 pilot cracker (hardtack)', '1 tablespoon onion, finely minced', '2 tablespoons sour cream', '12 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '12 teaspoon A.1. Original Sauce', 'salt and pepper', 'paprika', "14 teaspoon dry mustard (Coleman's preferred)", '1 teaspoon sugar']
directions: Drain thinly sliced vegetables. Soak cracker in cold water for 3 minutes and squeeze dry. Place a layer of vegetable mixture in bowl and sprinkle with chopped onion and cracker. Mix sour cream with the remaining ingredients; spread lightly over this layer. Repeat layers until all ingredients are used. Chill. When ready to serve, spoon onto lettuce leaves or mesclun.

title: Wilted Lettuce Salad
ingredients: ['2 heads bibb lettuce, washed, dried and torn into bite size pieces', '3 hard boiled eggs, chopped', '1 medium red onion, thinly sliced', '1/2 lb. bacon, fried crisp and crumbled, reserve drippings', '1/2 c. vinegar', 'sugar to taste']
directions: Mix vinegar and sugar to taste. Chill in \ icebox.\  Divide lettuce between salad bowls. Place onions around lettuce, then add eggs and crumbled bacon.

title: Wilted Lettuce
ingredients: ['5 slices bacon', '1/4 c. bacon drippings', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. vinegar', 'loose lettuce', 'green onions', '1 bunch radishes']
directions: Saute bacon drippings, sugar, salt and vinegar. Dice onions and radishes. Pour over leaf lettuce (garden lettuce).

title: Rhode Island Clam Cakes
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 eggs, beaten', '1/2 cup milk', '1 (6 ounce) can minced clams, undrained', '1/4 cup dried onion flakes', 'oil, to fry']
directions: Mix all ingredients together;. Drop by ice cream scoop full in hot oil (325 degrees) and fry until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. Salt as desired and serve hot.

title: Tuna Patties
ingredients: ['2 (6 ounce) cans tuna, drained', '2 large potatoes, peeled boiled and mashed', '12 cup diced onion', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons pickle relish', '12 lemon, juice of', '34 cup cracker crumb']
directions: Preheat oven to 375. Mix all ingredients but the cracker crumbs. Shape the mix into 6 patties, and put in freezer 10 minutes. Take out; coat with cracker crumbs. Spray a cookie sheet with Pam. Put the patties on the cookie sheet. Bake 40 minutes. Turn over at the 20 minute point. Serve on buns with lettuce, tomato, and low-fat 1000 island dressing.

title: Eliza'S Sticky Toffee Pudding
ingredients: ['FOR THE PUDDING', '75 g sultanas', '150 g stoned chopped dates', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 tablespoons butter (plus extra for greasing)', '200 g brown sugar (bear with me)', '200 g self-raising flour, sifted', 'FOR THE SPECIAL SAUCE', '4 tablespoons butter', '350 ml double cream', '400 g brown sugar (still bear with me!)', '1 orange, zest of']
directions: To make the pudding, put the dates and bicarbonate of soda in a heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water and leave to soak. Preheat the oven to 180c/350f/gas mark 4. Grease a cake tin (round or square) 20cm diameter, with butter. Put the remaining butter in a separate bowl, add sugar, and mix well. Beat the eggs then fold in the flour. Drain the soaked dates, add to the bowl and mix. Spoon the mixture evenly into the prepared cake tin. Transfer to the preheated oven and bake for 25-30mins(longer for a non fan oven). The pudding is cooked when a skewer inserted into the centre comes out clean. About 5-10mins before the end of the cooking time, make the sauce. Melt the butter in a saucepan over a medium heat. Stir in the cream and the sugar and bring to the boil, stirring constantly. Lower the heat and simmer for 5mins. Turn out the pudding on to a serving plate, decorate with the orange rind, serve the sauce in a jug as you would do cream and serve per person.

title: Lettuce With Apricot Salad And Honey-Raspberry Dressing
ingredients: ['1 small head iceberg lettuce (or your choice)', '1 cup dried apricot, slivered', '1/4 cup olive oil', '3 tablespoons raspberry vinegar', '1/2 tablespoon honey', '1 minced small shallots or 2 tablespoons onions', 'salt and pepper', '6 large cupped boston lettuce leaves']
directions: Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Place in bowl and sprinkle with apricots. Process olive oil, vinegar, honey and onion or shallot. Pour dressing over lettuce and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange over Boston lettuce on individual plates. Spoon lettuce/apricot mixture over.

title: Waldensian Salad
ingredients: ['1/4 c. vinegar', '3/4 c. Canola oil', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. pepper', 'chip of garlic', '1 head lettuce', '1/2 jar parsley']
directions: Mix vinegar, oil, salt, pepper and chip of garlic. Chill overnight. Break lettuce. Add 1/2 jar parsley. Pour vinegar mixture over lettuce and mix well.

title: Bittersweet Brownie Drops
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons (30 grams) unsalted butter', '8 ounces (225 grams) dark chocolate with 70%-72% cacao', '1/3 cup plus 1 tablespoon (50 grams) gluten-free flour', '1/8 teaspoon baking soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar (175 grams) sugar', '1/2 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '2 large cold eggs', '1 cup (115 grams) walnut or pecan pieces, broken or very coarsely chopped', '6 ounces (170 grams) chocolate chips or chunks']
directions: Preheat the oven to 350\u00b0F. Position racks in the upper and lower thirds of the oven. Melt the butter with the chocolate in a medium stainless steel bowl set directly in a wider skillet of barely simmering water. Stir frequently until the mixture is melted and smooth and fairly hot to the touch. Meanwhile, mix the flour, baking soda, and salt together thoroughly and set it aside. Remove the chocolate bowl from the water bath. Stir in the sugar and vanilla. Add 1 egg, and stir briskly until it is incorporated. Repeat with the second egg. Add the flour mixture and stir until you can no longer see it. Stir the batter vigorously with a wooden spoon or spatula until it is smooth and shiny and pulls away from the sides of the bowl. It may start to slide around the bowl as you stir-just keep stirring until it is thick and cohesive and no longer slides in the bowl. Stir for a few more seconds for good measure. Be sure the batter is completely cool to the touch, and then stir in the nuts and chocolate pieces. Scoop slightly rounded tablespoons of batter 2 inches apart on parchment-lined baking sheets. Scoop all of the batter onto the parchment sheets right away, rather than letting it wait in the bowl, even if you are baking later. Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until the cookies are puffed and a little crackled on the surface and feel soft and tender-but not squishy- when touched with a fingertip. Rotate the sheets from upper to lower and front to back about halfway through the time to insure even baking. The cookies will firm up as they cool. Set the pan on racks to cool, or slide the pan liners from the baking sheets on the racks. Cookies keep in an airtight container for 2 to 3 days.

title: Wilted Lettuce
ingredients: ['4 to 5 slices bacon, sauteed and crumbled', '1/4 c. vinegar', '1 scant c. sugar', '1/4 c. water', 'any amount lettuce, chopped', 'leaf or head radishes, chopped if desired, and/or green onions or regular onions, sliced']
directions: Put chopped lettuce (and green onions and/or radishes) in large metal or glass bowl. Add bacon and toss. Mix vinegar, sugar and water together until dissolved. Then pour vinegar and sugar mixture over lettuce; toss some more, cover with a lid or plate to keep warm.

title: Wilted Lettuce Salad
ingredients: ['2 heads lettuce', '1/4 c. vinegar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '2 tsp. sugar', '4 slices bacon', '1/3 c. chopped onions', '1/8 tsp. pepper']
directions: In large skillet, fry bacon until crisp. Add vinegar; heat through. Remove from heat. Shred lettuce with knife. Add lettuce and onion to skillet. Season with salt, pepper and sugar. Toss 1 to 2 minutes until lettuce has wilted.

title: Wilted Lettuce
ingredients: ['1 large head lettuce', '1 bunch green onions', '1/2 lb. bacon, diced and fried (saving the grease)', '1/3 c. cider vinegar', '1/3 c. sugar', '2/3 c. water', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Wash lettuce and chop. Put in a good size bowl. Sprinkle the green onions on top. Mix together vinegar, sugar, water, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Have the bacon and drippings hot. Pour vinegar and sugar mixture over the lettuce and mix to coat. Take the hot bacon and drippings and pour over the lettuce right before serving.

title: Wilted Lettuce
ingredients: ['4 slices bacon, fried crisp', '1 c. vinegar', '1/4 c. water', '1 tsp. sugar', '1 large bowl lettuce']
directions: Remove bacon from large frying pan, crumble and set aside to add to lettuce just before serving. To fryings in pan, add vinegar, water and sugar or sugar substitute. Bring to boil. Add large bowl of lettuce; keep stirring and turning lettuce in pan until thoroughly coated with vinegar sauce and wilted. Lift lettuce from liquid, add crumbled bacon tossed in lightly and serve warm. The liquid may be saved for another preparation, just add a bit of fresh vinegar.

title: Salad Dressing For Vegetable Salad
ingredients: ['1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar', '3/4 tsp. salt', 'pepper to taste', '1/2 tsp. sweet basil', '3 Tbsp. oil', '1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar']
directions: Mix all, adding vinegar last. Salad of romaine lettuce, iceberg lettuce, purple onion, avocado and tomato.

title: Lemon Chicken
ingredients: ['4 -5 boneless chicken breast halves', '14 cup butter', 'seasoned flour', '1 cup chicken broth', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '12 teaspoon thyme', '12 teaspoon salt', '14 teaspoon pepper', '3 tablespoons lemon juice']
directions: Pound chicken breasts to flatten. Roll in seasoned flour. Saute in butter until light brown. Add other ingredients to skillet. Cove & simmer 15-20 minute or until tender. Serve over rice with green vegetables & a salad.

title: Wilted Lettuce
ingredients: ['1 large bowl leaf lettuce', '2 or more slices bacon', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. vinegar', 'dash of salt and pepper']
directions: Wash lettuce; set aside. Fry bacon until crisp. Crumble. Mix together sugar, vinegar, salt and pepper until sugar dissolves. Add bacon. Cook until hot. Pour over lettuce.

title: Double Dip Red Wine Taralli
ingredients: ['5 cups flour', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 cup red wine full bodied', '1 cup oil', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons water']
directions: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl, add the oil and wine and knead until the dough is smooth. Roll them into 6\  x 1/2\  thick pieces. Shape them into loops and press the ends together with your thumb. Brush them with the egg wash.

title: Smothered BBQ Chicken on Texas Toast
ingredients: ['2 pounds chicken thighs, boneless and skinless', 'Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon canola oil', '1 1/4 cups Chipotle Vinegar BBQ Sauce, recipe follows', '4 slices Texas toast, brushed with butter and toasted until golden', 'Southern White Sauce, recipe follows', 'Pickled Red Onions, recipe follows', '2 cups ketchup', '1/3 cup molasses', '1/3 cup cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 medium clove garlic, grated', '1 medium Vidalia onion, peeled, quartered and pureed in a food processer, solids strained and juice reserved (about 1/4 cup onion juice)', '1 chipotle pepper in adobo', '1 to 2 tablespoons adobo sauce, depending on spice desired', '1 cup mayonnaise', '1/4 cup apple cider vinegar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'Kosher salt and freshly cracked black pepper', '3/4 cup red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt', 'Red pepper flakes', '1 bay leaf', '1 large red onion, peeled, halved and sliced into half-moons, 1/4-inch thick', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Heat a 12-inch skillet over medium heat. Sprinkle both sides of the chicken thighs with salt and pepper. Add the oil to the skillet, and then the chicken thighs. Sear both sides of the chicken until golden in color, about 3 minutes per side. Lower the heat and add in the Chipotle Vinegar BBQ Sauce. Bring to a simmer, and then place in the oven to finish cooking the chicken, 10 to 15 minutes. Let the chicken cool a bit in the sauce. Then, using two forks, shred the chicken into medium pieces and hold in the sauce until ready to serve. Lay down the Texas toast and put a nice amount of the saucy, shredded chicken on top. Artfully drizzle Southern White Sauce on top of the chicken and then pile on the Pickled Red Onions. Pick it up or fork and knife it, either way it's delicious. Add the ketchup, molasses, vinegar, 1/4 cup water, mustard, oil, Worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, black pepper, garlic, onion juice, chipotle pepper and adobo sauce together in a saucepot and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Once at a boil, reduce to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes to combine the flavors. Remove from the heat and cool to room temperature. Combine the mayonnaise, cider vinegar, lemon juice and some salt and pepper in a bowl. Use immediately or store in airtight container in fridge for up to 4 days. Great as a salad dressing too! Yield: 1 1/2 cups. To a saucepot, add the vinegar, 1/2 cup water, sugar, salt, red pepper flakes to taste and bay leaf and bring to a boil. Add the onions to a heatproof container and pour the boiling pickling liquid over them. Let the onions sit for at least 30 minutes. Right before serving, add in the parsley.

title: Strawberry-Orange Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['2 cups torn spinach', '2 cups torn leaf lettuce', '3/4 cup cubed cooked chicken', '2/3 cup sliced fresh strawberries', '1 orange, cut into segments', '1/4 cup strawberry-flavored pancake syrup', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1/4 cup cashews or pecans, optional']
directions: Divide spinach and lettuce among two salad plates. Arrange the chicken, strawberries and oranges on lettuce. Combine syrup and vinegar; drizzle over salads. Top with nuts if desired.

title: Killed Lettuce
ingredients: ['lettuce', 'green onions (fresh)', '1/3 c. vinegar', 'salt', 'little brown sugar']
directions: Clean lettuce. Add onions. Mix together vinegar, salt and brown sugar. Pour over lettuce. Heat grease and pour over lettuce. Eat immediately.

title: Rum Baked Bananas
ingredients: ['2 firm bananas', 'grated rind and juice of 1 lemon', '2 Tbsp. brown sugar', '2 Tbsp. margarine, melted', '1 to 2 Tbsp. rum']
directions: Cut bananas in half lengthwise. Place cut side down in buttered baking dish. Brush bananas with lemon juice; sprinkle with rind and brown sugar. Combine butter and rum; drizzle over bananas. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes. Serve plain or with ice cream. Serves 2.

title: Ann J'S Polish Sour Cream Lettuce
ingredients: ['1 head iceberg lettuce, washed and drained', '1/2 pint sour cream', '4 tablespoons cider vinegar', '2 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon milk (may or may not need)']
directions: Tear lettuce in bowl. Sprinkle with salt, don't use too much, let wilt. Squeeze out lettuce. Combine dressing ingredients and blend until smooth. Pour over lettuce and mix. The ribs of the lettuce will have just a very slight crunch. Can adjust sugar or vinegar to taste.

title: Breaded Fish
ingredients: ['2 eggs, beaten', '3/4 c. cream', '1/4 c. vinegar', 'flour', 'cracker crumbs', 'fish']
directions: Mix eggs, cream and vinegar. Coat fish with flour; dip in this mixture, then cracker crumbs. Deep fat fry.

title: Beatrice Griffin'S Dutch Lettuce
ingredients: ['1 large bunch leaf lettuce or 1 head iceberg lettuce', '1/2 c. chopped green onions', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '3 Tbsp. vinegar', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'shake of pepper', '4 or 5 strips bacon, diced, fried and drained (reserve drippings)', 'hot bacon fat']
directions: Cut lettuce. Add onions. Add sugar, salt, vinegar and pepper to hot drippings quickly, all at once. Pour over lettuce and onions. Serve at once.

title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Sandwich Salad for Two
ingredients: ['12 woven wheat crackers', '1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter', '1 Tbsp. grape jelly', '2 cups tightly packed torn lettuce', '1 cup seedless red grapes, cut in half Target 1 lb For $2.99 thru 02/06', '1/2 cup PLANTERS Dry Roasted Unsalted Peanuts, toasted Rite Aid Buy 1 Get 1 Free thru 02/06', '1/4 cup KRAFT Classic Ranch Dressing']
directions: Spread 6 crackers with peanut butter, then spread remaining crackers with jelly. Press peanut butter and jelly sides together to make 6 cracker sandwiches. Cut each sandwich in half, then cut each piece in half again to make 4 pieces. Toss lettuce with grapes and nuts in medium bowl. Drizzle with dressing just before serving; top with filled cracker pieces.

title: Chocolate Ice Shake
ingredients: ['1 cup cold coffee', '1 cup low-fat milk', '3 tablespoons granulated sugar', '3 cups vanilla ice cream', '3 tablespoons chocolate syrup']
directions: Combine the coffee, milk, and sugar in a blender and mix on medium speed for 15 seconds to dissolve the sugar. Add ice cream, and chocolate syrup then blend on high speed until smooth and creamy. Stop blender and stir mixture with a spoon if necessary to help blend ingredients. Pour drink into two 16-ounce glasses. (www. topsecretrecipes. com).

title: Peloponnese Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. extra virgin olive oil', '1/3 c. red wine vinegar', '2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. freshly ground black pepper', '2 Tbsp. fresh thyme or 1 tsp. dried', '4 ripe tomatoes', '1 green bell pepper, cut in 1/8-inch strips', '1/2 lb. imported pitted black olives', '1/2 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled', '1/2 head lettuce', '1/2 cucumber, sliced']
directions: Combine oil, vinegar, salt, pepper and thyme in a jar; shake well. Cut up lettuce. Cut tomatoes into wedges and place around edge of bowl over lettuce. Top lettuce with cucumbers, bell pepper, Feta cheese and olives. Pour oil and vinegar mixture over lettuce just before serving. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

title: Pralines
ingredients: ['1 c. brown sugar', '1 c. white sugar', '1/2 c. evaporated milk']
directions: Cook until soft ball stage. Take off stove; let stand 5 minutes. Add nuts. Beat with wooden spoon until thickened. Drop on waxed paper.

title: Date Nut Balls
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. flour', '8 oz. grated Cheddar cheese', '1/2 c. softened margarine', 'dash of red pepper', '8 oz. box pitted dates', 'pecan halves']
directions: Combine flour, cheese, margarine and red pepper. Place one pecan half in each pitted date. Mold dough around each date. Place on cookie sheet. Bake 15 minutes at 400\u00b0. Yield: 2 dozen.

title: Pineapple Chess Pie
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '1 Tbsp. flour', '1 stick oleo', '2 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. corn meal', '1 small can pineapple (crushed)']
directions: Mix well and pour in unbaked pie shell. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes. Reduce oven heat to 325\u00b0 and bake for 30 minutes.

title: Best Ever Cheesy Chicken Alfredo!
ingredients: ['1 lb diced cooked chicken', '1 lb cubed Velveeta cheese', '1/4 cup butter', '2 1/2 teaspoons hot pepper sauce (I use Franks)', '1 cup half-and-half', '1 (12 ounce) package cooked egg noodles (Any pasta will do)']
directions: Mix all ingredients except noodles. Heat until cheese is melted. Pour over pasta. Mix throughly and enjoy!

title: Velveeta Goulash
ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package Velveeta cheese', '1 lb hamburger', '8 ounces macaroni noodles', '1 tablespoon oregano', '1 dash salt & pepper', '1 (15 ounce) can tomatoes', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 bell pepper, chopped']
directions: Boil noodles as package directs. Brown hamburger meat with onion and bell pepper. Drain. Add tomatoes and pasta. Sprinkle with oregano, salt and pepper. Layer casserole dish with meat mixture, noodles and cheese. Bake at 350 degrees until cheese melts.

title: Arnold'S Favorite Log Jams
ingredients: ['1 (12 oz.) pkg. butterscotch chips', '1 large can Chinese noodles', '1 (16 oz.) jar light salted, dry roasted peanuts']
directions: Melt butterscotch chips in large kettle. Add noodles and nuts; mix and drop onto wax paper by tablespoons. Cool. Fast and easy.

title: Low Fat Turkey Quesadillas
ingredients: ['6 flour tortillas', '1 medium onion, chopped', '2 tsp. oil', '1 pepper, chopped', '1 1/4 lb. ground turkey', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/2 c. tomato sauce', '1 jalapeno pepper, chopped', '1 tsp. ground cumin', '1 tsp. chili powder', '1 tsp. oregano', '2 Tbsp. parsley', '3/4 tsp. cilantro', '1/2 c. grated Monterey Jack cheese', '1 c. salsa']
directions: Wrap tortillas in foil and warm at 350\u00b0. Heat oil in pan. Add onion and pepper for 5 minutes. Add turkey and brown, then all the seasonings, jalapeno and tomato sauce. Heat through at 450\u00b0. Place tortilla on cookie sheet. Top with turkey and cheese. Bake 8 to 10 minutes. Serve with salsa.

title: Chocolate Noodle Candy
ingredients: ['1 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate morsels (1 c.)', '1 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch morsels (1 c.)', '1 c. Chinese noodles', '3/4 c. walnuts, chopped']
directions: Melt all morsels over hot water. When melted, add Chinese noodles and nuts. Drop by teaspoon onto wax paper. Chill in refrigerator. I usually double this recipe. They go fast!

title: Fettucine Alfredo
ingredients: ['1/2 cup unsalted butter (1 stick)', '1 lb fettucine noodles', '2 cups heavy whipping cream', '2 cloves finely minced garlic', '1 cup grated parmesan', 'nutmeg (optional)', 'fresh parsley (optional)', 'fresh cracked pepper']
directions: Bring large pot of water to a boil for the pasta.  In a separate pan (large and deep enough to add and mix the pasta), add the cream and garlic and heat on medium-high. When cream begins to bubble, begin whisking in parmesan, constantly stirring. Be careful not to let cream boil - watch your heat and reduce as necessary.  Once all parmesan has been added, add the butter. I like to add the butter in small slices so it melts easier. Continue stirring and reduce heat. Once butter has melted, add the drained fettucine noodles and thoroughly mix. Fettucine noodles should be cooked al-dente - approx. 10 minutes.  Pasta gets cold fast, so time your other dishes so you can serve pasta immediately. Serve pasta and sprinkle a pinch of nutmeg, cracked pepper and parsley to your taste.

title: Zucchini Lasagna
ingredients: ['3 c. or 1 (26 oz.) jar red pasta sauce', '1 large zucchini, thinly sliced', '1 tsp. dried basil', '12 uncooked no-boil-type lasagna noodles', '1 c. Ricotta or small-curd cottage cheese', '1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '1/2 tsp. dried oregano', '1 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese']
directions: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Mix pasta sauce, zucchini and basil. Spread 1/3 of mixture in an 8 x 12-inch baking dish, then top with half the noodles. Mix Ricotta cheese, Parmesan and oregano, then spread over noodles in dish. Spread with 1/3 of the pasta sauce mixture. Top with remaining noodles and sauce mixture. Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Let stand 15 minutes. Cut into wedges. Makes 6 servings.

title: Easy Cheesy Pasta
ingredients: ['1 pkg. tri-color rotini (spiral noodles)', '3 cans Italian-style stewed tomatoes', '2 tsp. olive oil', 'fresh garlic to taste', 'fresh basil to taste', '1 pkg. shredded cheese']
directions: Cook noodles according to package directions. While noodles are cooking, heat olive oil and garlic in skillet. Stir in tomatoes and basil; simmer. Drain noodles, then toss with cheese. Pour tomato sauce over noodles and serve. This dish makes a lot of food fast and reheats well.

title: Super Delicious Lazy Pasta Sauce
ingredients: ['1 onion, finely diced', '400 g diced tomatoes', '400 g water', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1/2 cup of fresh Baby Spinach', '3 teaspoons dried basil', '1 tablespoon chicken stock powder', '1 tablespoon cream']
directions: Put everything except for the cream in a pressure cooker, bring to pressure, then leave for 15 minutes. Release pressure, using fast release. Stir through cream and serve on pasta of your choice.

title: Polish Sausage Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. Polish sausage', '2 1/2 c. potatoes, sliced up', '1/3 c. Cheddar cheese', '1 can cream of celery, mushroom or chicken soup', '1/3 c. water', '1/4 c. green peppers (optional)', '1/4 c. pimento (optional)']
directions: Cook up spaghetti noodles; drain. Add butter, salt and Parmesan cheese to taste. Boil Polish sausage, slice up, add to noodles and sprinkle parsley flakes on. Fast, easy and delicious!

title: Corned Beef Casserole
ingredients: ['200 gr corned beef', '1 potato, peeled, boiled, then mashed', '50 ml milk', '2 eggs', '50 gram cheddar, grated', '1 onion']
directions: Add eggs to corned beef, stir until well combined. Add mashed potato and milk to corned beef batter. Line a casserole dish with butter. Peel and cut onion, line the pieces on the bottom of the casserole dish Add the batter to the dish. Top with grated cheddar. Bake for 40 - 45 minutes until done. Cool slightly, and slice.

title: Basil Pasta With Tuna, Chickpeas, And Pesto.
ingredients: ['1/2 lb whole wheat pasta (best with basil pasta)', '1/2 cup fresh pesto sauce', '1 cup organic chickpeas', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 (6 ounce) can tuna', '1 teaspoon freshly grated black pepper', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1/2 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese']
directions: Prepare pasta and drain. Return pasta to pot, add olive oil and mix to keep the noodles from sticking. Toss noodles with pesto, tuna, and chickpeas until combined and warm. Season with black pepper, kosher salt and parmesean cheese.

title: Stew Stroganoff
ingredients: ['1 large can Dinty Moore beef stew', '2 Tbsp. Heinz 57 sauce', '1 Tbsp. A.1. sauce', '1/2 c. sour cream', 'seasonings to taste', 'salt and pepper', 'Mrs. Dash', 'garlic']
directions: Serve over noodles, rice or toast. Seve with tossed salad. Fast and easy. Heat beef stew; add sauces until hot. Add sour cream. Heat slowly until hot.

title: Low-Fat Lasagne
ingredients: ['1 pkg. uncooked lasagne noodles (dry)', '1 jar low-fat spaghetti sauce', '16 oz. nonfat cottage cheese', '8 oz. nonfat Mozzarella cheese', '8 oz. nonfat Ricotta cheese']
directions: Layer all items, beginning and ending with sauce. Cover tightly with foil to allow the noodles to steam cook. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 75 minutes or until noodles are soft. Fast and easy!

title: Brian'S Pan Lasagna
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce', '6 cans water', '1 Tbsp. oregano', '1/4 tsp. garlic powder', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'pepper to taste', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Mozzarella', '1 (16 oz.) pkg. egg noodles']
directions: Brown ground beef; drain excess fat. Add tomato sauce, water and seasonings; stir. Add noodles; bring to boil in deep skillet or large saucepan. Turn down heat to fast simmer; let cook until sauce thickens and most of the water is absorbed into the noodles. Stir in Mozzarella. Serves 4 to 6.

title: Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['1 pkg. multi-color pasta', '1 small can black chopped olives', '8 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 tomato, diced', '1 small onion or scallions, chopped']
directions: Cook and drain pasta noodles. Add rest of ingredients. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and garnish with your favorite Italian dressing.

title: Italian Dish
ingredients: ['2 lb. ground beef', '1 (25 oz.) jar pasta sauce', '1 medium pkg. rigatoni noodles', '1 pkg. Cheddar cheese', '1 pkg. Mozzarella cheese']
directions: Cook ground beef; drain. Add pasta sauce; simmer. Boil noodles, not too soft. Alternate noodles, sauce and both cheeses in uncovered baking dish, ending up with Mozzarella cheese on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 until cheese is brown on top.

title: Super Easy And Fast Macaroni And Cheese
ingredients: ['1 lb small elbow macaroni', '8 ounces Cheese Whiz', '1 lb grated cheddar cheese']
directions: Cook the pasta in salted boiling water until tender. Drain and rinse with cold water. Put the pasta into a large mixing bowl. Melt the Cheese Whiz in the microwave, stirring every 15 seconds until the Cheese Whiz is hot, and then stir the Cheese Whiz into the pasta. Add the grated cheese and stir until well blended. Put the mixture into a greased baking dish and bake at 350F for 40-45 minutes until hot. If you want this super fast, put the mixture into a large glass bowl and microwave it, stirring every 30 seconds until the cheese has melted and macaroni is very hot. Sometimes I also use a blend of different grated cheeses.

title: Fettucine Carbonara
ingredients: ['1 pt. heavy cream', '1 stick soft butter', '1/2 lb. bacon', '1 large onion, cut in crescent shape', '1 bell pepper, sliced', 'black pepper to taste', '2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated', '2 eggs, beaten', '1/2 c. sour cream', 'fettucine noodles (fresh is better)']
directions: Brown bacon, drain and crumble; set aside. Saute onion and bell pepper in bacon grease until onion is barely transparent (pepper and onion should remain firm); set aside. Cook noodles per instructions; drain noodles. Do not rinse. Heat large pot until too hot to touch; turn off heat. Put butter in pot (get sides of pot coated with butter). Pour heavy cream in pot. Add noodles, eggs, sour cream, black pepper, Parmesan cheese, bacon, onion and green pepper. Work fast after draining noodles; the heat from the noodles cooks the eggs.

title: Lasagna
ingredients: ['1 (8-ounce) package uncooked lasagna noodles (about 9 noodles)', '1 1/3 cups (6 ounces) fat-free cottage cheese', '3/4 cup (6 ounces) 1/3-less-fat cream cheese, softened', '2/3 cup (6 ounces) part-skim ricotta cheese', '1/4 cup (1 ounce) grated fresh Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons minced fresh chives', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon dry mustard', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '2 large egg whites, lightly beaten', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', '1 (26-ounce) jar fat-free pasta sauce, divided', 'Cooking spray', '1/4 cup (1 ounce) shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Cook noodles according to package directions, omitting salt and fat. Combine the cottage cheese, cream cheese, and ricotta cheese in a large bowl; stir to blend well. Stir in Parmesan and next 8 ingredients (through egg). Spread 1/2 cup pasta sauce in the bottom of a 13 x 9-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Arrange 3 noodles over pasta sauce; top with half of cheese mixture and one third of remaining pasta sauce. Repeat layers once, ending with noodles. Spread remaining pasta sauce over noodles. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Sprinkle with mozzarella; bake an additional 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Remove from oven; let stand 10 minutes before serving.

title: Romaine And Sweet Onion Salad
ingredients: ['1 cup vertically sliced sweet onion', '1 1/2 cups grape tomatoes, halved', '1 1/2 cups English cucumber slices (about 1 small)', "1/3 cup Sweet Vidalia Onion Vinaigrette (such as Ken's Healthy Options)"]
directions: Combine onion, tomato, and cucumber in a bowl. Add dressing; toss well.

title: Mrs. Stella'S Chili
ingredients: ['1 lb. hamburger', '1 large onion', '1 can pinto beans', '1 large can chili and beans', '1 can tamales', '1 c. grated Cheddar cheese', 'chili powder (if desired)', '2 c. water']
directions: Brown hamburger; drain fat and add grated onion. Add beans and chili. Then add water (more if desired) and cook over low heat 15 minutes. Then add tamales and cheese and cook 15 minutes. Serve with pasta or rice. Fast and easy.

title: Easy Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: ['1 pkg. stew beef or cut sirloin', '1 small onion', '1 can golden mushroom soup', '1 can cream of celery soup', '1 can French onion soup', '1 pkg. egg noodles']
directions: Brown onion and beef together. Add all 3 cans of soup and one cup water. Cook in slow cooker until meat is tender. (I cook it all day on low heat.) Cook noodles. Place stroganoff over noodles and serve. \ Fast and very good.\

title: Potato Cakes
ingredients: ['1 c. mashed potatoes', '1/2 c. flour', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. shortening']
directions: Melt shortening in an iron skillet. Mix the potatoes, egg and flour. Shape into balls. Place in hot shortening. Flatten with a spatula and fry on both sides until brown. For extra flavor, add 1 tablespoon minced onion to the potatoes and flour.

title: Mushroom Pain Perdu
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons unsalted butter, plus more for the cooker', '1 (10 ounce) package sliced mushrooms', '1 small onion, finely chopped', 'salt', 'fresh ground pepper', '5 large eggs', '2 cups whole milk', '1/2 cup freshly grated parmigiano-reggiano cheese', '1/4 teaspoon freshly grated nutmeg', '6 cups day-old French bread cubes, lightly toasted, 1-inch cubes', '1/2 cup grated gruyere cheese or 1/2 cup emmenthaler cheese']
directions: Butter the insert of a large slow cooker. In a large skillet, melt the 3 T butter over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and onion and cook, stirring often, until the mushrooms juices evaporate and the mushrooms are golden, about 10 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. In a large bowl, beat the eggs until blended. Beat in the milk, Parmesan, nutmeg, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and pepper to taste. Stir in the mushrooms. Place the bread cubes in a large bowl. Pour the mixture over the bread cubes and stir well. Scrape the mixture into the slow cooker. Press the bread cubes down into the liquid. Sprinkle with the Gruyere. Cover and cook on HIGH for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Serve hot, scooping it out of the dish.

title: Tamale Pie
ingredients: ['2 cups 7 bean and barley mix, dried cooked', '3 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1/4 teaspoon onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon cumin', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 cup onions chopped', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1/4 cup olives ripe, sliced', '1/2 cup corn canned', '1/2 each sweet red bell peppers chopped', '1/4 cup parsley leaves chopped', '1/2 cup celery chopped', '2 1/2 cups water cold', '1 1/2 cups cornmeal', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon chili powder', '1/4 cup cheese grated']
directions: Mash cooked 7 Bean and Barley. Mix tomato paste with water. In skillet, saute onion in oil and combine all Group I ingredients. Let these cook over medium heat; if the beans were hot to begin with, no more than five minutes cooking is needed. Stir constantly to prevent sticking. Adjust seasonings to taste. Combine the ingredients of Group II except for cheese in a heavy pan, and cook over medium heat until cornmeal thickens and comes to a boil, stirring constantly. Oil a 8\  x 8\  pan and spread 23 of the cornmeal mixture over the bottom and sides. Pour the bean mixture into the cornmeal crust and spread rest of cornmeal mix on top. Sprinkle the top crust with grated cheese and cook in a 350F (180C). oven for 30 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Grilled Fillet of Beef with Tomato Ginger Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['2/3 cup olive oil', '6 garlic cloves, chopped fine', '1/4 cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons finely grated peeled fresh gingerroot', '1 1/2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon coriander seeds, crushed', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes', 'a 2 1/2- to 3-pound fillet of beef, trimmed and tied', 'Tomato Ginger Vinaigrette']
directions: In a large jar with a tight-fitting lid combine marinade ingredients with salt and pepper to taste and shake until combined well. In a large resealable plastic bag combine fillet with marinade and seal bag, pressing out as much air as possible. Turn bag several times to coat fillet with marinade and put in a shallow dish or bowl. Marinate fillet, chilled, turning bag every few hours, at least 8 hours or overnight. Let fillet stand at room temperature 30 minutes before grilling. Prepare grill. Grill fillet on an oiled rack set about 5 to 6 inches over glowing coals, turning every 5 minutes to evenly sear all sides, until it registers 130F. to 135F. on a meat thermometer, about 25 to 30 minutes, for medium-rare. (Alternatively, fillet may be roasted in an oiled roasting pan in a preheated 500F. oven approximately the same amount of time.) Transfer fillet to a cutting board and let stand 10 minutes. Slice fillet and serve with vinaigrette.

title: Quick Banana Pudding
ingredients: ['8 ounces Cool Whip', '1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk', '2 (1 3/4 ounce) boxes instant banana pudding mix', '1 box vanilla wafer', '6 large bananas', '2 cups milk']
directions: Layer bananas and vanilla wafers in a large casserole or trifle dish. Combine pudding, cool whip, condensed milk, and milk. Blend with mixer for 5 minutes, then pour over bananas and wafers. Chill.

title: The Old West Weiner Dish
ingredients: ['1 (500 g) package rotini pasta (or your favorite kind)', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 celery ribs, chopped', '1 can kernel corn, drained', '1 package hot dog, cut into bite sized pieces', 'chili powder, to taste', '2 cans tomato soup, undiluted']
directions: Cook pasta and drain. Fry onion, celery and wieners, until done. Stir in tomato soup, 1 can of water, and chili powder. Heat until mixture bubbles. Place pasta and corn into a large bowl. Pour hot mixture over top and mix well. My kids love this recipe and it makes a very fast supper.

title: Icebox Cherry Pie
ingredients: ['1 (15 oz.) can pie cherries', '1 can Eagle Brand milk', '3 medium lemons', '1/2 pt. whipping cream, whipped well', '1 c. chopped pecans']
directions: Put Eagle Brand milk in a bowl. Add lemon juice and cherries; stir well. Fold in whipped cream and nuts. Pour into a graham cracker crust. Chill 2 hours. Very rich, but delicious!

title: Mom'S Jam Cake
ingredients: ['3 c. flour', '1 tsp. baking powder', '1 tsp. allspice', '1 pkg. candied cherries', '1/2 box raisins', '1/2 tsp. nutmeg', '1/2 tsp. cloves', '1 c. shortening', '3/4 c. grape juice (concentrate)', '1 jar blackberry jam', '1 bag figs or 1 box dates, chopped', '2 c. chopped nuts', '2 tsp. molasses', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. brown sugar', '4 eggs', '1 c. bourbon or brandy']
directions: In a large bowl, cream sugar and shortening. Add eggs, molasses, juice and jam. Sift all dry ingredients together. Add dry ingredients alternately with bourbon. Stir in cherries, figs, dates and raisins. Pour into 3 (9-inch) greased and lined cake pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes.

title: Haystacks
ingredients: ['1 c. peanuts', '12 oz. bag chocolate or butterscotch morsels', '1/2 (2 1/2 oz.) can chow mein noodles']
directions: Melt morsels in a double boiler. Stir in peanuts and chow mein noodles. Drop onto wax paper. Refrigerate. They harden fast.

title: Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['8 oz. pasta noodles', '2 c. ham, cubed', '2 c. broccoli', '2 c. Cheddar cheese, cubed', '2 c. tomatoes, diced', '1 c. salad dressing (Italian or your favorite)']
directions: Cook pasta noodles; drain. Rinse in cool water. In large bowl, combine cooked pasta, meat, vegetables and cheese. Add dressing; toss lightly. Chill. Makes 6 servings.

title: Peanut Butter Crisscrosses
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: Mix all ingredients together. With floured hands, roll into balls. Smash them with a fork. Bake at 350\u00b0 on greased cookie sheet for 10 minutes.

title: Spinach Lasagna(Serves 6)
ingredients: ['1 (10 oz.) box chopped spinach', '1 c. low-fat cottage cheese', '1 (15 oz.) carton nonfat Ricotta cheese', '1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning', '1 tsp. oregano', '1 (27 oz.) jar light Ragu pasta sauce', '6 No Boil brand lasagna noodles', '1 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded']
directions: Open spinach box and cook (in box) in microwave for 4 minutes. Press out water. Blend the 3 cheeses and seasonings; set aside. Spray an 11 x 7-inch pan with a nonstick spray. Spoon about 1/2 cup pasta sauce in bottom of pan. Put in 3 noodles. Spoon about 1/2 of cheese mixture on noodles. Put drained spinach on cheese mixture. Spoon about 1/2 of pasta sauce on spinach. Add 3 more noodles, remaining cheese mixture and remaining pasta sauce. Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes, or until noodles pierce easily with fork. Uncover; top with Mozzarella cheese and bake another 5 minutes, or until cheese is melted. Let stand 10 minutes.

title: Pasta And Pesto
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter or margarine', '2 Tbsp. hot water', '1/3 c. olive oil', '1/8 tsp. white pepper', '1 tsp. salt', '1 Tbsp. dried sweet basil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1/4 c. minced walnuts', '1 Tbsp. (or less) dried parsley', 'grated Parmesan cheese', 'pasta noodles cooked according to directions on box']
directions: Melt butter and combine with all ingredients, except Parmesan, in a small saucepan and warm. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over hot pasta noodles and spoon on pesto sauce (a little goes a long way). This goes well with the Cajun Broiled Chicken. It's also very good if boiled shrimp is mixed in with the pasta. Fast and easy.

title: Tuscany Chicken
ingredients: ['6 medium red potatoes, scrubbed and sliced 1/8-inch thick', '12 ounces shiitake mushrooms or 12 ounces chanterelle mushrooms, sliced', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '4 tablespoons grated parmesan cheese, divided', '3 teaspoons minced garlic, divided', '3 teaspoons minced fresh rosemary, divided', 'salt and pepper', '3 lbs skinless chicken pieces']
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Pat potatoes dry with paper towels. Toss potatoes and mushrooms with 21/2 tbs oil, 2 tbs cheese, 2 tsp garlic and 2 tsp rosemary, 1/2 tsp salt and 1/4 tsp pepper. Arrange in 13x9 baking dish in one layer. Top with remaining 2tbs cheese and bake 15 minute or until potatoes are just lightly browned. Meanwhile, heat remaining 11/2 tbs oil in large nonstick skillet over med. heat. Add chicken pieces. Season lightly with S&P, sprinkle with remaining rosemary and garlic. Cook 5-6 minutes on each side or until browned. (don't crowd pan, may need to do more than one batch). Arrange chicken pieces on top of potatoes. Drizzle with any oil from skillet and return to oven. Bake 20-25 minute longer or until chicken is done.

title: Peanut Butter Chow Mein Cookies
ingredients: ['6 ounces butterscotch chips', '1/2 cup peanut butter', '1 1/2 cups chow mein noodles', '1 cup mini marshmallows']
directions: Melt chips and peanut butter in pan. Add chow mein noodles and marshmallows. Stir thoroughly on low heat. Drop by spoonfuls on wax paper. Cookies will harden quickly, so move fast!

title: Goulash
ingredients: ['1 lb. lean beef, small pieces', '1 large jar mushrooms and juice (whole or sliced)', '1 can mushroom soup', '1 pkg. onion soup mix']
directions: Mix together and place in casserole container or pan. Bake 1 hour at 325\u00b0. Use over rice or noodles. Fast and delicious!

title: Crockpot Balsamic Beef
ingredients: ['chuck steak boneless', 'balsamic vinegar', 'brown sugar']
directions: place roast in crockpot

title: Brandied Ginger Balls
ingredients: ['8 oz vanilla wafer cookies', '3 oz preserved ginger', '1/4 cup raisins', '1/3 cup whole almonds', '2 tsp unsweetened cocoa powder', '4 oz semi-sweet chocolate, chopped', '1/2 cup flaked coconut', '1 can (14 oz) sweetened condensed milk', '3 tbsp brandy']
directions: Process the cookies to fine crumbs in a food processor. Transfer to a large bowl. Process the ginger, raisins and almonds until finely chopped. Add to the cookie crumbs along with the cocoa powder. Place the chocolate in heatproof bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water to melt. Meanwhile, toast the coconut in a dry skillet on low heat, stirring constantly, until the coconut is a golden color and smells toasted. Set aside to cool. Add the melted chocolate, sweetened condensed milk and brandy to the cookie crumbs mixture and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for about 10 mins until firm. Line a baking pan with wax paper. Roll small spoonfuls of the mixture into balls. Roll the balls in the coconut and place on prepared pan. Refrigerate until firm. Serve in a bowl or small paper cups. Store in a covered container in the refrigerator or freezer.

title: Turkey Tortilla Soup
ingredients: ['6 cups Chicken Or Turkey Broth', '3 cups Cooked Turkey, Shredded', '2 cups Frozen Corn, Thawed', '1 can (15 Oz. Size) Black Beans, Drained And Rinsed', '1 cup Water', '1 cup Salsa', '2 Tablespoons Chopped Fresh Cilantro', '1/2 Tablespoons Cumin', '1 teaspoon Chili Powder', '1/2 Lime, Juiced', 'Salt And Pepper']
directions: Add all of the ingredients (except cilantro and lime juice) to a large saucepan and bring to a simmer. Cook for 20 minutes. Take off heat and add in cilantro and lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately and garnish with avocado, tortilla strips or cilantro, if desired.

title: Chicken Tetrazzini
ingredients: ['1 (6 lb.) stewing chicken', '1 large pkg. medium noodles', '2 small cans mushrooms', '1 lb. sharp cheese', '1 small can pimentos', '1 can cream of mushroom soup', '1 can cream of celery soup']
directions: Boil chicken until tender. Reserve broth. Cool, bone and cut into bite size pieces. Saute mushrooms and add to chicken. Cook noodles in chicken broth. Cut pimentos into small pieces. Add chicken, mushrooms, noodles, pimentos, both soups and salt and pepper to taste. Mix together.

title: 15 Minute Shrimp Carbonara Fettuccine
ingredients: ['8 ounces fettuccine', '1 cup baby peas, frozen', '2 (6 ounce) cans shrimp, drained (Chicken Of The Sea)', '3/4 cup parmesan cheese, shredded', '1/2 cup half-and-half cream', '1/2 cup bacon bits', 'garlic salt, to taste', 'black pepper, to taste']
directions: Prepare pasta noodles according to package directions, adding peas for the last 5 minutes of cooking. Drain; immediately return pasta and peas to pan. Add remaining ingredients, tossing well until cheese is melted.

title: Crab Pasta Quicky
ingredients: ['1 pkg. Lipton creamy garlic pasta and sauce', '1 small can crab meat, drained']
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. After pasta is tender, add drained crab meat and stir. Let stand 3 minutes. Serve with tossed salad for complete, fast meal.

title: Lasagna-Like Pasta Dish
ingredients: ['1 (32 ounce) jar ricotta cheese', '1 cup parmesan cheese', '2 cups mozzarella cheese', '2 lbs mafalda pasta', '1 (32 ounce) can tomato sauce', '10 ounces fresh mushrooms', '1/2 cup parsley', '1 cup of hot pasta water']
directions: Boil water for pasta, be sure to add salt before adding the pasta. In a mixing bowl, mix the full jar of ricotta cheese and the parmesan cheese and add some salt and pepper. Once the noodles are cooked, reserve 1 cup of the starchy hot pasta water and then strain. Gradually add the pasta water to the cheese mixture, you may not use all of the water, just add enough to make the mixture nice and creamy and melted. Toss the noodles into the cheese mixture. Spread the noodles and cheese mixture into a baking dish. Evenly spread the tomato sauce and mushrooms over the top. Then add the parsley. Top with mozzarella cheese and bake at 350 degrees until cheese is melted and hot and bubbly. Then serve.

title: Ragu No-Boiling Lasagna
ingredients: ['2 (15 oz.) Ricotta cheese', '2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese', '1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese', '2 eggs', '2 (2 lb.) jars Ragu rich and meaty mean sauce', '12 uncooked lasagna noodles']
directions: Preheat oven to 375\u00b0. In bowl, combine Ricotta cheese, 1 cup Mozzarella cheese, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese and eggs. In 13 x 9-inch baking dish, spread 1/2 of one jar of pasta sauce. Layer 4 uncooked noodles, then 1/2 jar of pasta sauce and 1/2 of the Ricotta cheese mixture; repeat. Top with remaining 4 uncooked noodles and rest of pasta sauce. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake 1 hour. Remove foil and sprinkle remaining cheeses. Bake, uncovered, an additional 10 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

title: Ham & Cheese Ramen Noodles ^_^ Cheap Budget Meal
ingredients: ['1 (3 ounce) package pork-flavored ramen noodles', '3 -4 ham slices, thin lunchmeat style', '1/4 cup cheddar cheese, grated (or to taste)', '1 cup water']
directions: Pour 1 cup water in a pan. Put noodles in water. Set noodles and water to boiling. Once noodles have broken up rip the ham in little bite size pieces and place over the noodles. Just before too much water evaporates remove from stove. I like just about a tablespoon of water leftover. Add seasoning packet and stir around well. Top with cheese, let melt and enjoy! Important! Make sure you keep a close eye on this recipe as it cooks very fast.

title: Beef Stroganoff Casserole
ingredients: ['1/2 cup chopped onion', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 lb lean steak, cut in thin strips or 1 lb hamburger', '2 tablespoons flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon paprika', '1/2 cup sliced fresh mushrooms or 1/2 cup canned mushroom', '1 (10 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup', '3/4 cup water', '1 cup sour cream', 'parsley (to garnish)', 'paprika (to garnish)']
directions: Saute onion and butter in skillet. Add and saute beef until cooked through. Add flour, spices, and mushrooms. Simmer for 5 min. Add soup and water. Simmer for 10 min. REMOVE FROM HEAT and stir in sour cream. Add parsley and extra paprika for garnish. Serve over noodles, pasta, rice or serve as a main dish by itself. Easy and fast!

title: Saucy Chops Ii
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '6 boneless pork chops', '1 to taste salt and pepper to taste', '1 onion, thinly sliced', '1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup', '1/4 cup ketchup', '2 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce']
directions: Over medium-high heat, melt butter in a large saucepan. Add pork chops and cook until browned on both sides. Season with salt and pepper. Top with onion slices. In a bowl, stir together soup, ketchup and Worcestershire sauce. Pour soup mixture over pork chops. Cover pan and simmer until meat is no longer pink inside and thermometer reads 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), about 40 to 60 minutes.

title: Spicy Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: ['1 pound pasta (I like spaghetti rigate)', '4 ounces thick slice pancetta, diced', '2 shallots, sliced', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1 jalapeno, sliced', '1 cup grated parmesan', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon coarse ground pepper', 'parsley garnish', 'extra parmesan topping']
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Salt generously and cook pasta until just shy of al dente (about 6 minutes). Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain the pasta. While waiting for the water to boil and whilst pasta is cooking (Step 1), add the diced pancetta to a cold pan and place over medium heat and render out the fat. Once the pancetta starts to crisp, add in the shallots, garlic, and jalapeno and cook until everything is soft and starting to brown on the edges and remove from the heat to a large bowl, rendered fat and all. In a bowl, combine two eggs and one white (reserve the second yolk) with the parmesan cheese and black pepper. Whisk to combine. Thin the egg and cheese mixture with about 1/4 cup of pasta water, whisking quickly to combine (so the hot pasta water doesn't scramble the eggs). Add the cooked pasta to the bowl with the pancetta and toss to coat the noodles in the rendered fat. Pour in the egg and cheese mixture, quickly tossing the noodles with tongs (again, to prevent scrambling), until the noodles are glossy. Thin the noodles out with pasta water to the desired consistency. Keep in mind that because the noodles are hot, they will quickly absorb all of the liquid so go for a slightly runny consistency and by the time the noodles are served (within a few minutes), they will be perfect. Garnish the bowl with the reserved egg yolk, extra parmesan cheese, and parsley and present at the table. Give the pasta one final toss just before serving.

title: Chicken Paprika
ingredients: ['6 boneless, skinless chicken breast', '3 onions, chopped', '2 tsp. paprika', '2 c. water', '2 bouillon cubes', '1 c. sour cream']
directions: Flour skinned breasts. Brown thoroughly and fast. Add onions, chopped, 15 minutes. Add paprika. Place on water, bouillon cubes and sour cream. Cover and simmer 40 minutes. Serve over cooked Amish noodles.

title: Shrimp And Garlic Pasta
ingredients: ['1 (16 oz.) pkg. Green Giant Pasta Accents (garlic flavor)', '7 to 10 oz. shrimp (fresh or frozen)', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: Cook the Pasta Accents according to the package directions, omitting the water and putting the butter on top of pasta before cooking. Saute shrimp in butter. Mix together for a fast and easy main dish.

title: Goulash
ingredients: ['1-1/2 lb. ground chuck', '1 onion, diced', '3/4 lb. noodles of choice', '1 (12 oz.) pkg. garden veggie pasta sauce', '2 tsp. garlic salt']
directions: Brown ground chuck and diced onion. At same time cover noodles with water and boil for 10-15 minutes. Drain noodles. Add pasta sauce and garlic salt to meat. Add noodles to meat and sauce. Top with Parmesan cheese.

title: Simply Elegant Steak And Rice
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb round steak', '1 1/2 tablespoons oil', '2 large onions', '1 can mushrooms', '1 can cream of mushroom soup', '1/2 cup sherry', '1 1/2 teaspoons garlic salt', '3 cups hot cooked rice']
directions: Cut steak into strips. Brown in oil. Add onions. Saute until tender crisp. Add remaining ingredients; reduce heat to simmer for about 1 hour. Serve over a bed of fluffy rice.

title: Spinach-Artichoke Lasagna
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, divided', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon bottled minced garlic', '1 (15-ounce) container part-skim ricotta cheese', '1 (14-ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and coarsely chopped', '1 (10-ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained, and squeezed dry', '1 large egg, lightly beaten', '1/2 cup (2 ounces) shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese', '1/2 cup (2 ounces) shredded sharp provolone cheese', '1 (25.5-ounce) jar Italian herb pasta sauce (such as Muir Glen Organic)', 'Cooking spray', '1/2 (8-ounce) package precooked no-boil lasagna noodles (6 noodles)']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Combine 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese and next 6 ingredients in a bowl; stir well. Combine mozzarella cheese and provolone cheese in a small bowl; toss well. Spread 1/3 cup pasta sauce in bottom of an 8-inch square baking dish coated with cooking spray. Arrange 2 noodles over sauce; top with half of spinach mixture, 1/2 cup shredded cheese mixture, and 3/4 cup pasta sauce. Arrange 2 noodles over sauce, and top with remaining spinach mixture and 3/4 cup pasta sauce. Top with remaining 2 noodles; spread remaining pasta sauce over noodles. Cover tightly with foil; bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Uncover; sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup shredded cheese mixture and remaining 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese. Bake, uncovered, an additional 10 minutes or until cheese melts. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. Cut into 6 equal portions.

title: Skillet Dinner
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef, browned', '1 small pkg. pasta noodles, cooked', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded cheese (Cheddar)', '1/2 c. chopped celery', '1/2 c. chopped green peppers', '1/2 c. chopped onions', '1 can cream soup (any)', '1/2 can milk']
directions: Start with beef; brown and drain off fat. Then add cooked noodles and rest of ingredients. Serve with salad and bread. Fast, easy 1-pan dinner.

title: Hamburger Casserole
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. ground round or ground sirloin', '2 cans French onion soup', '1 large jar Cheez Whiz', '1 bag noodles (dumpling or Kluski)']
directions: Brown meat. Add soup and Cheez Whiz. Add cooked noodles. Simmer 10 to 15 minutes. This recipe is fast and easy.

title: Wild Rice And Hamburger Hot Dish
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1/2 medium diced onion', '1 stalk celery, diced', '1 large carrot, diced', '1 small can mushrooms (with water)', '1/2 c. sliced water chestnuts', '1 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1 c. cooked rice', '1 c. mushroom soup', '1 c. grated sharp cheese']
directions: Brown the beef. Saute onion, celery and carrot in margarine. Add soy sauce, salt and pepper, then the cooked rice, mushrooms, water chestnuts and mushroom soup to the ground beef along with sauteed vegetables. Simmer all for 20 to 30 minutes. Put in a casserole. Add the cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 45 minutes.

title: Sour Cream Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['Soup', '2 cups chicken stock', '1 1/2 cups shredded chicken meat', '2 cups water', '2 tablespoons sour cream', '1/2 onion', '2 celery stalks', '1 carrot', '1 garlic clove', '15 dumplings', 'Dumplings', '1 cup flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/3 cup water', '3 tablespoons sour cream', '1 teaspoon fresh rosemary']
directions: Cook up the onion, celery, carrot, garlic, for a bit in a stock pot with oil. Add the stock and the water. Season and cook for a few minutes. Mix up the dumpling ingredients and make into small balls. Makes about 15. Drop the dumplings in the soup, cover and simmer for 15 minutes.

title: One Bowl Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ["2 pkg. (8 sq. each) Baker's semi-sweet chocolate", '1 can (14 oz.) sweetened condensed milk', '2 tsp. vanilla', '1 1/2 c. chopped Diamond walnuts']
directions: Microwave chocolate and milk in large microwavable bowl on High 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in vanilla and walnuts. Spread in greased 8-inch square pan.

title: Chinese Ham Salad
ingredients: ['1/4 c. corn oil', '2 Tbsp. light karo syrup', '2 Tbsp. soy sauce', '1/4 tsp. ground ginger', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '2 c. cooked julienne ham', '2 c. cooked rice', '1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced', '1/2 c. slivered green pepper', '1/2 c. shredded carrot', '1/4 c. chopped onion']
directions: In a large bowl stir together corn oil, syrup, soy sauce, ginger and pepper. Add ham, rice, water chestnuts, green pepper, carrot and onion. Toss to coat well. Cover. Chill at least one hour. Makes 4 servings.

title: Jill'S Crock-Pot Chicken-N-Dumplings
ingredients: ['3 to 4 boneless chicken breasts', '1 can cream of chicken soup', '1/4 c. water', '1 pkg. dumpling noodles']
directions: Place chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup and water in crock-pot. Cook on low for 8 hours. Shred chicken when done before removing from crock-pot. Cook dumpling noodles according to package directions; drain. Serve chicken over hot dumpling noodles.

title: Chinese Vegetable Soup With Shrimp And Pork Meatballs
ingredients: ['MEATBALLS', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '3 egg whites', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '3 scallions', '3 tablespoons chopped cilantro', '1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger', '2 garlic cloves', '1 lb ground pork', '1/2 lb shrimp', '1/2 cup water chestnut', 'BROTH', '7 cups chicken stock', '6 scallions', '2 garlic cloves', '1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 large carrot', '2 cups chopped bok choy (or cabbage)', '1 cup snow peas']
directions: Prepare the meatballs: Chop the scallions, shrimp, and water chestnuts. Mince the garlic. In a medium bowl, mix the corn starch and soy sauce. Add egg whites, sesame oil, scallions, cilantro, ginger and garlic and blend well. Add shrimp, pork and water chestnuts and mix well. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill for 30 minutes. Prepare the broth: Chop the scallions and bok choy. Thinly slice the carrot and snow peas. Mince the garlic. Combine stock, scallions, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, and carrot in a large soup pot. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes. Form meat mixture into 1\  balls and drop into simmering soup (using wet hands makes this easier). Simmer for 10 minutes, until meatballs are cooked through and no longer pink. Add the bok choy and snow peas and simmer for 2 minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper.

title: Snow Peas Oriental
ingredients: ['vegetable cooking spray', '1 tsp. light sesame oil', '1/2 lb. fresh snow pea pods, trimmed', '1/2 c. diagonally sliced carrot', '1/4 c. sliced water chestnuts', '1/2 c. canned no-salt-added chicken broth (undiluted)', '1 tsp. low-sodium soy sauce', '1 tsp. cornstarch']
directions: Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add oil, and place over medium-high heat until hot. Add snow peas and carrot. Saute 2 minutes. Add water chestnuts and broth. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.

title: Chipped Beef Gravy Recipe
ingredients: ['2 (4 ounce.) Packages thin sliced beef sandwich meat', '4-6 tbsp. flour', '4 c. lowfat milk', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '2 tbsp. butter']
directions: Take meat slices and chop into 1/2 inch pcs. Heat butter in medium-size skillet, stir in flour till a smooth paste forms. Stir lowfat milk in gradually using a wire whisk to prevent lumps. Heat slowly to simmering; stir in meat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Heat till warm. Remove from heat and stir in butter. Serve over toast for breakfast.

title: Achiote Marinade/Mop Recipe
ingredients: ['2 c. Cider Vinegar', '24 ounce Beer', '4 Tbsp. Achiote Paste', '2 Tbsp. Black Pepper', '1 Tbsp. Granulated garlic', '3 Tbsp. Pequin Pepper Flakes', '2 Tbsp. Dry Mustard', '1/4 c. Grnd New Mexican Chile', '1 Tbsp. Oregano', '1 Tbsp. Cumin seed, Roasted and grnd', '4 Tbsp. Trappeys Mexi-Pep or possibly Tabasco Or possibly', '2 Tbsp. Kosher salt']
directions: Mix all ingredients in a non reactive bowl. Use as a marinade or possibly mop.

title: Sirloin Tip Roast
ingredients: ['1 (3 to 4 lbs) sirloin tip roast', '1 bottle italian dressing']
directions: Marinate roast in dressing overnight in refrigerator. Bake at 325 degrees for 2 to 2 1/2 hours or until done.

title: Hawaiian Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['1 (16 oz.) can Fri Chik', '1 lb. rice', '2 Tbsp. vegetable oil', '4 oz. carrots, sliced', '4 oz. onions, diced', '20 oz. pineapple bits', '3/4 c. pineapple juice', '1/4 c. soy sauce', '2 pinches garlic powder', '2 Tbsp. cornstarch', '1/4 c. brown sugar', '1/4 c. lemon juice', '1/2 c. water chestnuts, sliced', '4 oz. snow peas']
directions: Add Fri Chik, pineapple and garlic powder into sauteed carrot and onions. Mix pineapple juice, soy sauce, cornstarch, lemon juice and brown sugar. Stir into hot mixture. Cook until thickened. Add water chestnuts and snow peas. Serve onto rice.

title: Broccoli Brain Power Salad
ingredients: ['1/4 cup low-fat mayonnaise or 1/4 cup salad dressing', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 teaspoon cider vinegar', '2 cups broccoli florets', '1/2 cup carrot, shredded (1 medium)', '1/4 cup reduced-fat cheddar cheese, shredded (1 ounce)', '2 tablespoons bacon, crumbled crisp-cooked', '2 tablespoons red onions, chopped (optional)', '1/4 cup water chestnut, sliced, drained (optional)']
