directions: Mix peanut butter, sugar, cream cheese and vanilla. Mix until smooth. Fold in whipped topping, half at a time. Spoon into pie shell. Chill 2 hours before serving.

title: Double Layer Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1/2 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon cold milk', '1 cup peanut butter', '1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed', '1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust', '2 (3.9 ounce) packages instant chocolate pudding mix', '2 cups cold milk', '4 peanut butter cups, cut into 1/2 inch pieces']
directions: In a large bowl, mix cream cheese, sugar, 1 tablespoon milk and peanut butter until smooth. Gently stir in 1 1/2 cups of whipped topping. Spread mixture on bottom of pie crust. In a second bowl, stir pudding mix with 2 cups milk until thick. Immediately stir in remaining whipped topping. Spread mixture over peanut butter layer. Scatter peanut butter cups over top of pie. Cover and refrigerate for 4 hours.

title: Delicious Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 graham cracker pie crust', '1/2 cup peanut butter, creamy (you can use crunchy)', '1 cup powdered sugar', '0.5 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '12 ounces whipped topping (like Cool Whip)']
directions: Mix peanut butter, powdered sugar, cream cheese until smooth. Fold in the whipped topping. Place in pie shell and refrigerate at least 3-4 hours. Slice and serve. The crunchy peanut butter is just as good!

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['6 oz. softened cream cheese', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '3/4 c. powdered sugar', '2 Tbsp. milk', '8 oz. whipped cream', 'chocolate graham cracker crust', 'chocolate sauce (to decorate the top)']
directions: Mix cream cheese, peanut butter, powdered sugar, milk and whipped cream together. Spoon the mixture into the pie crust. Drizzle chocolate sauce over the top. Refrigerate.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['8 oz. cream cheese', '1 c. confectioners sugar', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. milk', '9 oz. whipped topping', '1 made pie shell']
directions: Whip cream cheese until creamy. Add sugar and peanut butter; mix and add milk slowly. Mix together. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into pie shell and chill.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 c. powdered sugar', '1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened', '1 (8 oz.) carton whipped topping', '3/4 to 1 c. crunchy peanut butter', '1 (8-inch) graham cracker crust']
directions: Combine sugar, cream cheese, whipped topping and peanut butter; stir until smooth. Pour into pie crust and chill for several hours before serving. Serves 6.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 pkg. Dream Whip (2 c. size)', '3/4 c. peanut butter', '1 c. powdered sugar', '1/2 c. milk', 'baked pie shell', 'peanut chips']
directions: Prepare Dream Whip according to package directions. In second bowl mix peanut butter, sugar and milk. Fold in whipped cream and put in pie shell. Sprinkle with peanut chips.

title: Better Than Sex Cake
ingredients: ['1 box yellow cake mix', '1 box vanilla instant pudding', '1 (8 oz.) container sour cream', '4 eggs', '1/2 c. oil', '1/2 c. water', '1 bar German chocolate, shredded', '6 oz. chocolate chips']
directions: In a large bowl, mix cake mix, instant pudding, sour cream, eggs, water and oil well. Add grated chocolate bar and mix again.

title: Sinfully Rich P 'N' B Pie
ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package fat free cream cheese', '1 (16 ounce) jar creamy peanut butter', '3/4 cup honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed', '1 cup peanut butter chips', '1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie crumb crust']
directions: In a large bowl, beat together cream cheese and peanut butter until well combined. Stir in honey and vanilla. Finally, fold in whipped topping and peanut butter chips. Spoon whole mixture into pie crust, then allow to chill overnight.

title: Strawberry Whip Pie
ingredients: ['1 pt. strawberries', '1 c. chilled whipping cream', '1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice', '1/2 c. sugar', 'pinch of salt', 'baked 8-inch pie shell']
directions: Wash and hull the strawberries, then slice in quarters. Save several perfect strawberries for garnish, if desired. Just before serving, whip the cream in a chilled bowl with a chilled beater until stiff. Add lemon juice, then beat in sugar. Fold the strawberries lightly and turn into the pie shell. Top with the selected whole strawberries. Serve at once. Makes 5 servings.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 baked pie crust', '1/2 c. peanut butter', 'whipped cream', '1 pkg. vanilla pudding (cooked kind)']
directions: Cook pudding as directed. Remvoe from heat; stir in peanut butter. Let cool. Pour in a baked 9-inch pie shell. Top with whipped cream.

title: Peanut Butter Cream Pie
ingredients: ['1/2 (8 ounce) package cream cheese', "1 cup confectioners' sugar", '1/3 cup smooth peanut butter', '1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed', '1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust', '1/4 cup finely chopped peanuts']
directions: Whip the cream cheese until soft and fluffy. Beat in the sugar and peanut butter. Fold whipped topping into the peanut butter mixture. Pour filling into the pie shell. Sprinkle pie with chopped peanuts. Chill until firm.

title: Orange Chicken Oregano
ingredients: ['2 -3 lbs chicken, in pieces', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 cup flour', '1/8 teaspoon black pepper', '1/4 cup shortening', '1 (6 ounce) frozen orange juice concentrate', '6 ounces water', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon oregano', '1/2 teaspoon nutmeg']
directions: Sprinkle chicken pieces with 1 t. salt. In large ziploc bag combine flour, remaining 1/2 t. salt and pepper. Coat chicken pieces with the flour mixture. In large frying pan, brown chicken in shortening. While chicken browns, combine remaining ingredients in small bowl. Remove any excess fat from fry pan and pour orange mixture over chicken. Cover and simmer on medium-low heat for 30 minutes, turning 2-3 times, until chicken is tender and cooked through.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1/2 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. light corn syrup', '4 c. cornflakes', '8 oz. cream cheese', '2 c. powdered sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '16 oz. whipped topping']
directions: Combine 1/2 cup peanut butter and corn syrup in bowl. Mix well. Add cereal. Stir until coated. Press into pie plate. Beat cream cheese in mixer bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in powdered sugar and remaining 1 cup peanut butter. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into pie plate. Freeze.

title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['4 medium sweet potatoes', '1 1/2 sticks margarine', '3/4 c. white sugar', '3/4 c. brown sugar', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: Cut potatoes into wedges. Place in baking dish. Mix margarine with brown and white sugars and salt. Pour over potatoes. Cook at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['2 (9-inch) graham cracker pie crusts', '1 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 (8 oz.) cream cheese', '1 (8 oz.) whipped topping']
directions: Mix sugar, milk, peanut butter and cream cheese. Fold in whipped topping. Pour in pie shells and freeze.

title: Peanut Butter Yogurt Pie
ingredients: ['32 ounces vanilla Greek yogurt', '3/4 cup smooth peanut butter', '1 Oreo cookie pie crust']
directions: In a large mixing bowl, stir the yogurt and peanut butter with a wire whisk until blended. Spread into the prepared pie shell. Chill the pie overnight (the pie will be thicker the longer it is chilled). Serve with chopped peanut butter cups or whipped cream, if desired.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['2 small pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese', '3/4 c. powdered sugar', '2 Tbsp. milk', '1/2 c. smooth peanut butter', '1 pkg. whipped topping', 'graham cracker pie shell']
directions: Combine cheese, sugar, milk and peanut butter. Fold whipped topping into cream cheese mixture. Pour into pie shell. Refrigerate and chill. Top with peanuts.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['4 oz. cream cheese', '1/2 c. powdered sugar', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1/2 c. milk', '12 oz. whipped cream']
directions: Blend the cheese, sugar, peanut butter and milk. Mix in whipped cream. Put in chocolate pie crust or graham cracker crust; then freeze.

title: Meat and Spinach Casserole
ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) package bow tie pasta', '2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach', '12 lb bulk pork sausage', '1 lb lean ground beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1 (6 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 12 cups water', '14 teaspoon rosemary', '14 teaspoon basil', '14 teaspoon marjoram', '14 teaspoon oregano', '14 teaspoon savory', '14 teaspoon pepper', '1 12 teaspoons salt', '2 cups sour cream', '1 cup grated romano cheese or 1 cup parmesan cheese']
directions: Cook noodles according to package directions; drain. Thaw spinach; drain. Crumble sausage and beef in frying pan; cook until partially done. Add onion and garlic; cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft. Blend in tomato sauce, tomato paste, water and seasonings; simmer for about 30 minutes. Add noodles; cool. Spread half the mixture in 3-quart casserole. Spread half the spinach over noodle mixture; spread half the sourcream over spinach. Sprinke with half the cheese; repeat layers. Bake at 375* for 40 minutes or until lightly browned.

title: Prosciutto-Wrapped Stuffed Potato Bites
ingredients: ['12 small purple potatoes, scrubbed and halved', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 ounces goat cheese', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 (3 ounce) package prosciutto, cut into 5 strips per piece']
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Trim potato halves so they sit flat on a baking sheet. Scoop out flesh into a bowl. Transfer potato skins to a baking sheet. Drizzle olive oil on top; season with salt and pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Bring a small saucepan of water to a boil. Add potato flesh; cook until soft, about 10 minutes. Strain potato flesh into a bowl and mash with goat cheese, garlic, and rosemary. Fill potato skins with mashed mixture. Wrap a slice of prosciutto around each potato skin. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['4 oz. cream cheese', '1 c. confectioners sugar', '1 1/2 c. peanut butter, divided', '1/4 c. milk', '9 oz. whipped topping, thawed', '1 baked (9-inch) graham cracker crust', 'whipped topping (for frosting)']
directions: Mix together cream cheese, sugar, 3/4 cup peanut butter and milk. Fold in 9 ounces whipped topping. Pour into prepared pie shell. Freeze 2 hours. Spread with remaining peanut butter and top with whipped topping.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['8 oz. extra-crunchy peanut butter', '8 oz. cream cheese, softened', '8 oz. confectioners sugar', '8 oz. whipped topping', '1 or 2 Chocolate graham cracker crusts', 'chocolate syrup (optional)', 'caramel syrup (optional)', 'more whipped topping (optional)', 'chocolate shavings (optional)']
directions: Soften the cream cheese and peanut butter in the microwave for 30 - 60 seconds on medium and cream together thoroughly. Add sugar to the peanut butter mixture and mix thoroughly, then add whipped topping and mix thoroughly. Smooth into pie shell(s). Add chocolate or caramel syrup or more whipped topping and chocolate shavings before refrigerating. This makes 1 huge pie or 2 average pies.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['2 boxes instant vanilla pudding', '2 1/2 c. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 pie shell']
directions: Mix pudding with milk until smooth. Add vanilla and peanut butter, mixing until smooth. Pour into baked pie shell and top with whipped cream.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1/3 c. peanut butter', '3 oz. fat-free cream cheese', '1 (16 oz.) Lite Cool Whip, thawed', '1 lite graham cracker crust']
directions: Combine peanut butter, cream cheese and whipped topping in a large bowl; mix well. Spoon into pie shell. Chill until serving time.

title: Cherry Tomato, Cucumber, Black Olives and Feta Salad
ingredients: ['2 pints cherry tomatoes ripe, quartered, 4 cups', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '3 cloves garlic minced or pressed, small cloves, or 2 medium', '1 teaspoon oregano freshly chopped, or 1/2 teaspoon of dried', '4 tablespoon shallots minced, 1 medium', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons olive oil, extra-virgin', '1 x black pepper freshly ground', '1 small cucumbers peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '1/2 cup kalamata olives pitted and chopped', '1 cup feta cheese crumbled, 4 ounces', '4 tablespoons parsley leaves freshly chopped']
directions: Add the tomatoes, salt, and sugar in a medium bowl, and gently toss until combined. Allow to stand for half an hour to 1 hour. Transfer the tomatoes to salad spinner and spin until seeds and excess liquid have been removed, about 60 second, stop and stir to redistribute the tomatoes a few times during processing. Put the tomatoes to the bowl and set aside. Place the tomato liquid through a fine-mesh strainer into a measuring cup, pressing on the solids to get as much juice as possible. In a small sauce pan, bring 1/2 cup tomato juice (discard any extra), garlic, oregano, shallot, and vinegar to a boil, then reduce the heat, and simmer over medium heat until reduced to 3 tablespoons, about 7 minutes. Transfer the mixture to a small bowl and cool to room temperature, 4 to 6 minutes. Whisk and stir the oil and black pepper to taste until well mixed. Season with salt to taste if needed. In the bowl with tomatoes, gently toss the cucumber, olives, feta, dressing, and parsley together until well mixed. Serve with any kind of main course or pita bread.

title: No-Sweat Hiker'S Pie
ingredients: ['1 graham cracker shell', '1 pt. rocky road ice cream', '7 oz. bag peanut butter chips', '1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip', '1 c. trail mix (nuts, chocolate chips, sunflower seeds)']
directions: Spoon soft ice cream into the pie shell. Sprinkle peanut butter chips over ice cream. Put Cool Whip over peanut butter chips. Sprinkle trail mix over whipped topping. Freeze and serve!

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 graham cracker pie crust', '2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese', '2 Tbsp. confectioners sugar', '2 Tbsp. milk', '3 1/2 Tbsp. crunchy peanut butter', '1 small carton whipped topping']
directions: Let packages of cream cheese soften. Then mix together the cream cheese, sugar, milk and peanut butter. Fold this mixture into the whipped topping. Place in the pie crust and refrigerate.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 c. creamy peanut butter', '1 c. granulated sugar', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. whipping cream', '1 (9-inch) premade pie crust (graham cracker or chocolate crumb)', '4 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits', '3 Tbsp. butter']
directions: Cream peanut butter, sugar, cream cheese and vanilla together until blended and fluffy. Whip cream until soft peaks form. Stir half of whipped cream into peanut butter mixture until smooth. Fold in remaining whipped cream until blended. Smooth mixture into premade crust. Refrigerate 2 hours. In small saucepan, melt chocolate and butter over low heat. Drizzle over pie and refrigerate until firm.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1 c. powdered sugar', '3 oz. cream cheese', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '9 oz. whipped topping', '1 graham cracker pie crust']
directions: Cream together cheese and powdered sugar. Add peanut butter. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into graham cracker pie shell and freeze until ready to serve.

title: Peanut Butter Pie
ingredients: ['1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 c. confectioners sugar', '3 oz. cream cheese (soft)', '8 oz. whipped topping', '1 baked pie shell']
directions: Blend peanut butter, sugar and cream cheese in mixer until creamy. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into pie shell. Chill until serving time. Can be topped with whipped topping. Can use graham cracker crust.

title: Candy Cane Pinwheels
ingredients: ['3 cups all-purpose flour', '3/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '14 tablespoons unsalted butter, softened', '1 cup sugar', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon peppermint extract', '1/2 cup peppermint candy, finely ground (about 20)', '6 drops red food coloring']
directions: whisk flour, baking powder, and salt in bowl. With electric mixer on medium-high speed, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy (about 2 minutes). Beat in egg until incorporated. Reduce speed to low, add flour mixture, and mix until dough forms (about 1 minute). Remove half of the dough from bowl and reserve. Add extracts, candy, and food coloring to remaining dough and mix until combined. Place reserved dough between 2 sheets of parchment paper and roll into 14 by 8-inch rectangle. Repeat with peppermint dough, then place on top fo plain dough and press gently to adhere. With long side facing you, roll dough into log. Wrap dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, at least 2 hours or up to 3 days. Adjust oven racks to upper-middle and lower-middle positions and heat oven to 375 degrees. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper. Slice chilled dough into 1/4-inch rounds and place 1 inch apart on prepared baking sheets. Bake until edges are just golden (12-14 minutes), switching and rotating sheets halfway through baking. Let cool 10 minutes on sheet, then transfer to wire rack and cool completely. Repeat with remaining dough.

title: Pepper Steak
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. boneless chuck steak', '2 Tbsp. shortening', '1 envelope onion soup mix', '2 c. water', '3 bell peppers, cut in thin strips', '1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch', 'cooked rice']
directions: Cut meat into strips 2 inches long. Heat shortening and brown meat. Stir in soup mix and water. Simmer, covered, 30 minutes. Stir in peppers. Simmer, covered, until peppers are tender.

title: Peanut Butter Pie From Papa Nick'S
ingredients: ['1/4 c. chunky peanut butter', '1 c. confectioners sugar', '1 (9 oz.) graham cracker pie shell', '3 oz. cream cheese, softened', '12 oz. whipped topping']
directions: Cream peanut butter, cream cheese and confectioners sugar in mixing bowl until light and fluffy. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into pie shell. Chill until serving time. Makes 8 servings.

title: Cola Chicken(Low Calorie)
ingredients: ['chicken', '1 c. tomato ketchup', '1 diet drink']
directions: Cut up chicken. Pour ketchup and diet drink over it. Cook until done in slow cooker or pressure cooker. There are 283 calories.

title: Diabetic Jello Salad
ingredients: ['1 can diet soft drink', '1 envelope D-Zerta Jell-O', '1 c. cottage cheese', '1 small can crushed pineapple with juice', "1 Sweet 'N Low"]
directions: Heat diet drink with gelatin. Stir. Add sweetener while still hot. Add cottage cheese and pineapple. Stir until mixture sets.

title: Diet Coke Cake
ingredients: ['1 (18 ounce) chocolate cake mix (I prefer a \\', 'fudge\\', ' cake mix with pudding in the mix, but this recipe will work with whatever you hav)', '1 (12 ounce) can Diet Coke', '1 (8 ounce) container Cool Whip Free or (8 ounce) container Cool Whip Lite']
directions: Preheat oven to temperature on cake mix box. Grease a 9x13 pan. Combine cake mix and Diet Coke in large mixing bowl. Mix according to directions on box. (For example, my favorite brand says to mix at medium speed for 2 minutes!). Pour into 9x13 pan. Bake 5 minutes less than the recommended time on the box. For example, if the box says to bake a 9x13 cake for 28 minutes, bake your Diet Coke Cake for 23. Cake is done when a fork or toothpick inserted in the middle of the cake comes out clean. Cool in pan on wire rack. When cooled, frost with Cool Whip topping. Refrigerate leftovers. (I never have any!). Enjoy!

title: Banana Strawberry Treat
ingredients: ['a few bananas', 'a few strawberries', 'Cool Whip']
directions: Slice bananas from end to end. Put round slices into large bowl. Add strawberries and mix; put into refrigerator; chill until ready to serve. Serve plain or top with Cool Whip.

title: Skinny Cake
ingredients: ['1 box chocolate fudge cake mix', '1 can diet Coke', '1 box sugar-free vanilla pudding', '1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip Free']
directions: Mix cake mix with diet Coke. Bake according to directions on cake mix.

title: Chocolate Cream Pots
ingredients: ['140 g dark chocolate', '34 cup cream', '300 g mascarpone cheese', '5 tablespoons Baileys Irish Cream', 'chocolate shavings, to decorate']
directions: Break chocolate into a bowl and microwave on high (100 %) for 2 - 3 minutes or until melted. stir and set aside. Whisk cream to soft peaks. Wisk mascarpone cheese and baileys together. Fold cream into mascarpone mixture. Pour in cooled chocolate (it should be the same temperature as cream mixture) and stir lightly to make a swirly pattern. Spoon mixture into two 300 ml glasses. Cover generously with chocolate shavings and chill.

title: Brett Hoebel Anti-Bloat Smoothie
ingredients: ['3/4 cup papaya', '3/4 cup pineapple', '1/2 pear, sliced', '1 tsp ginger, fresh', '1 tbsp flaxseed, ground', '2 mint leaves (garnish)', '1 cup water', '1/2 cup ice']
directions: Blend all ingredients. Drink with probiotic straws to maximize the benefits of a healthy diet and support normal absorption and assimilation of nutrients in the gut.

title: Banana Fruit Punch
ingredients: ['3 mashed bananas', "3 c. sugar or equivalent Sweet 'N Low", '3 c. pineapple juice', 'juice of 2 lemons', '6 c. water', '1 small can orange juice concentrate']
directions: Mix well and freeze. Three hours before serving, thaw and add a 64-ounce container of carbonated lemon-lime drink (Diet Sprite can be used).

title: Electrolyte
ingredients: ['1 quart warm water', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '1 tablespoon sugar', '4 tablespoons orange juice', 'ginger ale or Coke']
directions: Mix all the ingredients except gingerale or coke. When ready to drink, mix 1 ounce of electrolyte with 1 ounce of gingerale or coke. Give this every hour for up to 10 to 12 doses per day. Keep unused portion refrigerated. Keep gingerale or coke at room temperature. Disclaimer: Of course if there is an abnormally high temperature or if it persists more than a day or two, consult a physician.

title: Long Island Iced Tea
ingredients: ['vodka', 'gin', 'tequila', 'rum', 'Triple Sec', 'sweet and sour mix', 'Cokes', '1 jar cherries', 'lemons and limes']
directions: Mix in a gallon pitcher 3/4 cup each of vodka, gin, tequila, rum and Triple Sec. Add 2 cans Coke (12 ounces each; can use diet Coke). Add 24 ounces of sweet and sour mix to liquors. Add ice and lemons, limes and cherries as desired.

title: Bar-B-Que Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken, skinned', '1 diced onion', '1-1/3 c. Diet Coke', '1/2 c. ketchup', '2 Tbsp. mustard', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Saute diced onion in skillet sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Place in skillet with onion. Stir together Diet Coke, ketchup and mustard. Pour over chicken. Cover and simmer 45 minutes to 1 hour. Remove lid and simmer until liquid is cooked down.

title: Ambrosia Fruit Dip
ingredients: ['1 (8 oz.) container fruit yogurt (any flavor)', '1/2 c. Coco Lopez cream of coconut', '1/4 c. chopped pecans, toasted']
directions: In small bowl, combine yogurt and cream of coconut; mix well. Stir in nuts. Serve with fresh fruit. Refrigerate leftovers.

title: Ranger Rice With Beef
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1/2 c. chopped green pepper', '1/2 c. chopped onion', '1 large clove garlic, minced or garlic chips', '1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup', '1 1/2 c. water', '1 1/2 c. quick cooking rice, uncooked', '1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'generous dash of pepper']
directions: In skillet, cook beef, green pepper and onion with garlic until vegetables are tender. Drain, if needed. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to boil; reduce heat. Cover; cook 10 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir occasionally. Makes about 5 cups.

title: Polenta Napoleon with Mixed Herb Pesto
ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 cup water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon kosher salt', '2 cups cornmeal', '1/2 cup fresh basil leaves', '1/4 cup fresh mint leaves', '1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves', '1 tablespoon minced shallots', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1/4 cup grated Parmesan', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt', '1/2 teaspoon sambal*', '2 zucchini', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 cup tomato sauce, recipe follows', '6 tablespoons grated Parmesan', '*Can be found in specialty Asian markets', 'Special equipment: a food processor, an 8-inch springform pan']
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. For the polenta: In a large saucepan combine the milk, heavy cream, water, olive oil, and kosher salt and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium low and slowly pour in the cornmeal, whisking constantly until it thickens, about 5 minutes. Cover a baking sheet with plastic wrap. Pour the polenta onto the plastic covered baking sheet and spread to an even 1/4-inch thickness. Let cool at least 15 minutes. For the pesto: Puree the basil, mint, cilantro, shallots, and garlic. Add the olive oil in a slow, steady stream, while the food processor is running. Stir in the Parmesan, kosher salt, and sambal. For the lasagna: Cut the zucchini lengthwise into 1/4-inch thick slices. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over high heat and saute the zucchini slices until lightly golden. Season with salt and pepper. Oil an 8-inch round springform pan. Spread 2 tablespoons of tomato sauce on the bottom of the pan. Cut the polenta into 3 (7 3/4-inch) rounds. Brush the tops with the Mixed Herb Pesto. Place 1 disk in the bottom of the spring form pan. Drizzle with 1/4 cup of tomato sauce and arrange half the zucchini on top. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of Parmesan. Cover with the second round of polenta, 1/4 cup tomato sauce, the rest of the zucchini, and 2 tablespoons of Parmesan. Top with the last polenta round, the remaining tomato sauce, and Parmesan. Bake for 20 minutes. Remove from the springform pan, cut into wedges and serve. 1/4 cup olive oil 1 cup minced onion 2 cloves garlic, minced 1/2 teaspoon chili flakes 28 ounce can whole Italian tomatoes 2 tablespoons tomato paste 1 1/2 teaspoons sugar 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 1/2 teaspoons chopped fresh marjoram leaves 1 1/2 teaspoons chopped fresh basil leaves 1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt Special equipment: food processor or food mill In a large pot heat the olive oil over medium heat. Cook the onion, garlic, and chili flakes in the oil until softened but not browned, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes (juice and all), tomato paste, and sugar. Reduce the heat to medium low and simmer until the sauce has thickened, about 20 minutes. Cool the tomato sauce for 10 minutes. Puree the sauce in a food processor or food mill. Stir in the extra-virgin olive oil, marjoram, basil, and kosher salt. Store in the refrigerator for up to 1 week or in the freezer for up to 1 month. Yield: 6 cups Preparation Time: 15 minutes Cooking Time: 30 minutes Inactive Time: 10 minutes

title: Red Dolce Death
ingredients: ['500 gr Glass', '100 gr Martini Rose', '300 gr Coke drink (any)', '50 gr Ice']
directions: First put the Martini in the glass, on it add the Ice and then the Coke Drink. Stir it for a minute. Serve it with a black chocolate and enjoy the chill out

title: Fruit and Mallow Coleslaw
ingredients: ['2 cups grated cabbage', '12 cup drained crushed pineapple (juice reserved)', '12-1 cup miniature marshmallow (your choice)', '12 cup sliced almonds', '12 cup coconut', '12 cup mayonnaise', 'pineapple juice (just enough to thin)']
directions: Combine first 5 ingredients in a bowl. Mix mayonnaise and reserved juice in a separate bowl. Pour as much over salad as needed. Toss well to mix.

title: Diet Coke Cake
ingredients: ['1 (12 ounce) can Diet Coke', '1 (18 ounce) box chocolate cake mix']
directions: Combine the two ingredients and bake as directions say on the back of the cake mix box. Don't add eggs or anything, only the diet coke. TRUST ME! It rocks!

title: Salsa And Coke Chicken
ingredients: ['cooking spray', '1 lb boneless skinless chicken breast', '1/2 cup salsa', '1/2 cup Diet Coke']
directions: Put chicken in baking dish sprayed with cooking spray. Combine Diet Coke and salsa; mixing well. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350 degrees F. until chicken is done, about 30 to 40 minutes.

title: Naturally Sweet Sky-High Apple Pie
ingredients: ['2 unbaked deep-dish pie crusts', '10 to 12 apples, cored, pared and cut in eighths (best if 2 or more varieties are mixed, at least 1 tart)', '2/3 c. raisins', '1/4 c. apple juice or apple cider', '2 tsp. cinnamon', '2 tsp. vanilla extract', '1/2 tsp. nutmeg']
directions: Combine apples, juice and raisins in a heavy pot over low heat. Simmer 10 minutes, stirring gently. Remove mixture from pot and stir in all other pie ingredients. Fill the bottom pie crust with mixture, piling it very, very high. It will sink in baking. Pour in small amount of the liquid remaining in the pot. Place top crust on pie; seal edges well. Prick with fork or paring knife to make steam holes. Bake 40 to 50 minutes at 375\u00b0 or until filling is tender and crust is done (slightly browned). If crust overbrowns too early, place slitted foil over pie to complete baking. Cool for 1 hour before slicing.

title: Tropical Fruit Punch
ingredients: ['21 oz. pkg. unsweetened tropical fruit punch', '46 oz. unsweetened pineapple juice', '1/2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. instant orange drink powder', '8 1/2 c. water', '1 1/2 qt. Diet 7-Up', '4 oranges, sliced (optional)']
directions: Combine punch mix, juice, sugar and orange drink powder in a 6-quart punch bowl. Mix thoroughly. Add water and stir. Slowly add Diet 7-Up, just before serving, and stir. If desired, add orange slices for garnish. Yields 30 (6-ounce) servings.

title: Extra Light Extra Delicious Red Stuff
ingredients: ['2 (3 oz.) pkg. sugar-free cherry jello', '2 c. boiling water', '1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (do not drain)', '1 can cherry pie filling', '1/2 c. nuts, chopped', '1 c. diet coke']
directions: Dissolve jello in hot water; add diet coke. Let set in refrigerator until partially set. Stir in pineapple, pie filling and nuts. Let chill until firm.

title: Awesome Turkey Burgers
ingredients: ['1 12 lbs ground turkey', '1 egg, beaten', '13 cup onion, chopped', '12 teaspoon oil', '12 cup breadcrumbs', '12 teaspoon soy sauce', '12 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '14 teaspoon garlic powder', '14 teaspoon poultry seasoning', '18 teaspoon ground mustard', '18 teaspoon ground pepper', 'salt, to taste']
directions: Combine egg, onion, oil, bread crumbs, soy sauce, worcestershire sauce, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add ground turkey and mix well. Make into patties and refrigerate at least 20 minutes before frying or grilling. Cook until done and serve with your favorite burger toppings and condiments. We did the works -- lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, relish, catsup, and mayo. Serve with french fries or potato chips.

title: Elephant Soup
ingredients: ['1 large elephant (African is best)', '600 gal. hot water', '4 pecks onions, finely chopped', '2 bushels potatoes, peeled and sliced', '4 shovels salt', '2 shovels white pepper', '24 bottles Worcestershire sauce', '15 bottles rum (or more if cooking time is longer)', 'Coke to taste', '8 qt. peanut oil (optional)']
directions: Mix 1 1/2 ounces rum with Coke; drink. Wash and dry elephant (don't use shampoo as this will spoil flavor). Chop into bite-size chunks. In back of 1 ton truck and trailer, pour hot water. Immediately seal all cracks to prevent leaks. Have another rum and Coke; add elephant, potatoes and other ingredients. Allow to simmer.

title: Sesame Chicken With Honey-Mustard Sauce
ingredients: ['8 chicken breasts, skinned and boned', '2 c. all-purpose flour', '1 (2 oz.) bottle sesame seed', '2 eggs', '1/2 c. milk', 'vegetable oil', 'pepper to taste', 'Honey-Mustard Sauce (recipe follows)']
directions: Cut chicken breasts into bite-sized pieces; set aside. In a large bowl, mix the flour and the sesame seed. Add pepper to taste. In medium sized bowl, stir the eggs and milk together. Add the chicken pieces to this mixture. Heat the vegetable oil in an electric skillet at 350\u00b0, or use a large frying pan over medium heat on the stove. While the oil is getting hot, begin rolling the chicken pieces in the flour mixture. When coated well, gently add to the hot oil. Fry until golden brown. Serves 8 football fevered fools!

title: Vanilla Coke (Alcoholic)
ingredients: ['1 ounce vodka', '8 -12 ounces vanilla Coca-Cola', 'vodka', '8 -12 ounces Coca-Cola', '1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon vanilla flavoring']
directions: Pour vodka into a cocktail glass. Top with vanilla coke, diet coke, or Dr. Pepper. alternate: mix 1 oz vodka, 8-12 oz coke, Vanilla flavorina to taste. (1/4 - 1/2 tsp. Add ice cubes and serve.

title: Salsa Chicken
ingredients: ['4 boneless skinless chicken breasts', '1 (16 ounce) jar salsa (your choice of heat)', '1 (12 ounce) can Diet Coke (DO NOT SUBSTITUTE ON THIS ITEM)', '1 lime, juice of, fresh squeezed']
directions: In 12 inch skillet, cook chicken over medium high heat in UNSEASONED pan (do NOT spray with PAM or add any oil or butter). Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper to taste. Chicken will stick a bit to skillet when turning but that is ok. Cook till just brown- you want a bit of color. Add the entire jar of Salsa and the can of Diet Coke. Reduce heat to medium low- and simmer for approximately 15-20 minutes, covered. Remove lid, turn chicken and continue to simmer until sauce has thickened to desired consistency. When ready to serve, squeeze juice from 1 fresh lime over the chicken. I serve this over yellow rice (I just add turmeric to my rice when cooking- adds nice bright yellow color!). Do not use regular Coke as this will turn out too sweet. I promise--you cannot taste the Diet Coke.

title: Sparkling Jello
ingredients: ['1 (1 1/3 ounce) box jell-o sugar-free raspberry gelatin', '1 cup diet Sprite', '1 cup boiling water']
directions: Stir boiling water into Jello until completely dissolved. Add 1 cup Sprite Refridgerate at least 2 hours. other fantastic combinations: diet Coke and cherry jello. Orange soda and strawberry jello. Fresca and lime jello. you can be pretty creative with this -- .

title: Easy Chocolate Cherry Cake
ingredients: ['1 box chocolate cake mix', '1 (12 oz.) can diet cherry Coke']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Mix dry cake mix with diet cherry Coke and stir until smooth. Spray a 9 x 13 cake pan with Pam. Put batter in and follow baking instructions on box. Unbelievably moist and low-fat.

title: Green Beans(For Diabetics Or People On A Diet)
ingredients: ['2 cans green beans', '1 diet Coke']
directions: Drain green beans. Put in saucepan and pour a diet Coke over. Simmer about 20 minutes. Very good.

title: Cheese Rolls
ingredients: ['1 lb. Velveeta cheese', '3 oz. cream cheese', '1/2 c. chopped nuts', '1 clove garlic, grated']
directions: Mix well. Shape into sticks and roll in chili powder.

title: Coke Salad
ingredients: ['6 oz. pkg. sugar-free jello (cherry)', '1 can water packed cherries', '1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple', '1/2 c. water', '6 oz. diet Coke (warm)', "18 pkg. Equal or Sweet 'N Low", '1 c. chopped pecans']
directions: Bring water and juice off cherries to a boil; remove from heat. Add jello, Equal, pineapple with juice and cherries. Let stand 5 minutes. Add diet Coke and nuts. Stir and chill.

title: Salad
ingredients: ['carrot', 'egg', 'apple', 'lettuce', '7-Up', 'corn', 'pepper']
directions: Mix it all together and drink it with a medium diet Coke. I like diet Coke.

title: Macaroni Puff
ingredients: ['1/2 c. small elbow macaroni, cooked', '1 1/2 c. milk, scalded', '1 c. soft bread crumbs', '2 c. grated sharp cheese', '3 egg yolks, beaten', '1/4 c. diced pimiento', '3 Tbsp. melted margarine', '1 Tbsp. chopped parsley', '1 Tbsp. grated onion', '1/2 tsp. salt', '3 egg whites', '1/4 tsp. cream of tartar']
directions: Pour the hot milk over the bread crumbs. Reserve 1/2 cup of cheese and add remaining to milk mixture; cover and let stand until cheese melts. Add cooked macaroni, egg yolks, pimiento, butter, parsley, onion and salt. Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until stiff, but not set. Fold into macaroni mixture. Pour into an ungreased baking or souffle dish. Bake, uncovered, in 325\u00b0 oven about 50 minutes or until set. Top with remaining cheese and return to oven until melted. Serve immediately.

title: Laura Lee'S Cherry Fantasy
ingredients: ['2 c. flour', '1 c. butter or margarine', '1/2 c. brown sugar', '1/2 c. to 1 c. chopped nuts', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese', '1 c. powdered sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 c. cream, whipped or 2 pkg. Dream Whip, prepared', '1 or 2 cans cherry pie mix']
directions: Blend first 4 ingredients together for crumbs; press into large cake pan. Bake for 15 minutes at 400\u00b0. Cool and crumble. Place crumbs in pan, reserving several for topping.

title: Diet Soda Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 cup Ketchup', '1/4 can diet soda', '1/4 tsp garlic powder', '1/4 tsp salt', '1/4 tsp lemon pepper', '4-6 frozen boneless skinless chicken breast thawed and rinsed and pound if necessary']
directions: Defrost chicken breast rinse and pat dry  (Sauce) combine ketchup, diet coke, garlic powder, salt and lemon pepper  Preheat Grill  place chicken breast on grill baste with sauce continue basting and turning frequently until done. About 10-15 minutes depending on size of chicken breasts

title: Apple Nut Saladnederland, Texas
ingredients: ['3 apples, chopped', '1 c. pecans', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '3 Tbsp. flour', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 tsp. vinegar']
directions: Chop apples and pecans.

title: Lemon Cream For Fruit
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/3 c. lemon juice', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 Tbsp. cornstarch', '1/2 c. water', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. (1/2 pt. whipping cream) whipped cream', 'fresh fruit']
directions: Add vanilla and let cool. Fold in whipping cream. Serve with fresh fruit.

title: Naan Bread
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon active yeast dried', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 cup warm water abt 110 degrees', '1 cup all purpose flour plus more as', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 cup clarified butter plus', '1 teaspoon clarified butter', 'vegetable oil or use']
directions: In a glass-measuring cup, combine the yeast and sugar. Add the water and stir well. Let rest until foamy, about 5 minutes. Sift together the flour and salt into a large bowl. Make a well in the center of the flour and pour the yeast mixture and oil into the center. Mix together with your fingers until a smooth dough forms, working in a small amount of additional flour as needed. Knead for 3 minutes. Oil a small bowl with the remaining butter or oil. Place the dough into the bowl, turning to coat, and let rest until doubled in size, about 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Divide the dough into 6 pieces and gently roll into 6 circles on a lightly floured surface. Bake on a baking stone, or a lightly greased baking sheet, until just golden brown and puffed, about 12 minutes.

title: Kentucky Refreshing
ingredients: ['Ice mug to the rim.', '24 oz. Coke Classic preferrable from a glass bottle.', '6 oz. Wild Turkey American Honey.']
directions: Pour Coke in iced mug allow froth to settle, fill shot with Bourbon. Drink Shot chase with Coke, Repeat.

title: Bourbon Ala Rick
ingredients: ['2 shots bourbon', '2 ice cubes', '1 oz. Coke', '1 straw', '1 small glass']
directions: Place ice cubes in glass; slowly add bourbon and Coke. Stir softly. Place to lips, drink as desired.

title: 4 Points - Diet Soda Cake
ingredients: ['1 (18 ounce) box dry cake mix (any flavor)', '10 ounces diet soda (any flavor)', '1 -2 egg white (slightly beaten, optional but cake stays together better and is fluffier)']
directions: Mix the dry cake mix, the diet soda, and the egg white(s) until well blended. Pour into a 9 X 13 sprayed pan or prepared cupcake tins. Cook according to the directions on cake mix box. Slice into 12 pieces - 4 points per slice. Suggested Combinations: * yellow cake mix / diet lemon-lime soda (with a dollop of Cool Whip -- tastes like a \ Twinkie\ ) * orange cake / diet Mountain Dew * cherry chip cake / diet cream soda * diet lemon-lime soda / lemon cake * angel or yellow cake / diet orange * white cake / diet peach soda * spice cake / diet lemon-lime * diet ginger ale / white cake * diet cherry soda / chocolate cake * Diet cola / devils food or chocolate mix * diet vanilla coke / chocolate cake * devils food cake / diet Vanilla coke * diet root beer / chocolate cake * diet cherry coke / chocolate cake * marble cake / diet cream soda * lemon cake / tangerine Diet Rite *.

title: Vodka Tonic
ingredients: ['2 ounces vodka', '4 ounces tonic water', '1 -2 lime wedge']
directions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour vodka in glass (I like Skyy or Grey Goose). Top with tonic water (I use diet tonic water at home). Squeeze lime wedge(s) over the drink, drop wedge(s) into drink, and lightly stir. Enjoy!

title: Cherry Coke Salad(8 Servings)
ingredients: ['1 (20 oz.) can unsweetened crushed pineapple', '1/2 c. water', '2 boxes sugar-free cherry jello', '3/4 c. Diet Coke', '1 can cherry pie filling (use low calorie if you can find it)']
directions: Drain pineapple. Bring pineapple juice and water to a boil. Add jello and stir until dissolved. Stir in pie filling and Diet Coke. Chill until slightly thickened and then fold in pineapple. Chill until firm. Yields 8 servings.

title: Pumpkin Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: ['1 2/3 c. flour', '1/2 tsp. baking powder', '1 tsp. ground cinnamon', '1 c. solid-packed pumpkin', '1/3 c. Crisco', '1 c. packed brown sugar', '1 c. blueberries', 'Streusel Topping (recipe follows)', '1 tsp. soda', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. allspice', '1/2 c. undiluted evaporated milk', '1 egg', '1 Tbsp. flour']
directions: In a large bowl, combine flour, soda, salt, baking powder, cinnamon and allspice. Set aside.

title: Salsa Chicken
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts (no skin/no bones)', '1 (12 or 16 oz.) jar salsa or picante sauce', '1 can diet Coke']
directions: Lightly brown chicken breasts. Add salsa or picante sauce and diet Coke. Cover and simmer 30 to 40 minutes until sauce has thickened. Serve over rice.

title: Elephant Soup
ingredients: ['1 large elephant (African is best)', '600 gal. water', '4 pecks onions, chopped', '2 bushels potatoes, peeled and sliced', '4 shovels salt', '2 shovels white pepper', '24 bottles Worcestershire sauce', '15 bottles rum', 'Coke to taste', '8 qt. peanut oil (optional)*']
directions: Mix 1 1/2 ounces rum with Coke; drink. Wash and dry elephant (don't use shampoo as this will spoil the flavor). Chop into bite size pieces.

title: Congealed Salad(Lo-Cal)
ingredients: ['2/3 c. cottage cheese', '1/2 c. crushed pineapple', '1 can fruit flavored diet drink', '1 pkg. unflavored gelatin']
directions: Heat diet drink to boiling. Stir in gelatin until dissolved. Chill until congealed. Stir in cottage cheese and pineapple. Chill until firm.

title: Melt-In-Your-Mouth Almond Cake
ingredients: ['2 c. flour', '2 tsp. baking powder', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/2 c. butter or margarine', '1 c. sugar', '3/4 tsp. almond extract', '3 eggs', '1/4 tsp. baking soda', '8 oz. plain yogurt', '1/2 c. honey', '1/4 c. water', '1/3 c. finely chopped, toasted almonds']
directions: Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt. Cream the butter and sugar. Add almond extract. Add eggs one at a time. Beat well after each addition. Stir soda into yogurt. Add yogurt alternately to butter mixture with flour, mixing well. Bake in greased 9 x 9-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes.

title: French Silk Pudding Pie
ingredients: ['1 pie crust (optional)', '1 box fat-free sugar-free instant chocolate pudding mix', '2 cups nonfat milk or 2 cups buttermilk', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice or 2 tablespoons vinegar (omit if using buttermilk)', '1 envelope knox gelatin', '1/4 cup cold water', '1 (8 ounce) container fat-free cool whip']
directions: Prepare small box instant pudding, using buttermilk instead of milk; set aside. Prepare 1 envelope Knox gelatin with 1/4 cup cold water. Use glass measuring cup to mix gelatin. Set mixture in a pot or pan of hot water, while still in the cup, to help dissolve gelatin. Gelatin is dissolved when mixture is clear. Wire whisk gelatin into pudding and fold in the 8-oz cool whip. Pour into prepared crust; chill.

title: Surprise Chicken With A Bone
ingredients: ['a handful of chicken', 'meat', 'hamburger', 'eggs', 'pepper', 'bread', '1 Big Red drink']
directions: Put everything in the pot; then turn on the fire. Make sure everything stays on the bottom. Eat the food and drink the Coke.

title: Sugar-Free Coney Sauce
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 can tomato puree', '1 (16 oz.) Diet Coke']
directions: Cook ground beef and onion in large skillet until thoroughly browned. Drain. Add tomato puree and stir thoroughly. Stir in Diet Coke, cover and simmer about 15 minutes. Then remove cover and cook to desired consistency.

title: Chicken In Coke
ingredients: ['Chicken cut into serving pieces or use chicken thighs, etc.', 'Ketchup', 'Diet Coke', 'chopped vegetables, mushrooms, onions (optional)']
directions: Combine equal amounts of ketchup and diet coke to make sauce to cover chicken. Cook until tender and chicken falls apart (about 1 hour). Use sauce over mashed potatoes. If adding optional vegetables, put in at same time as chicken. This sauce works with pork chops also.

title: Barbecue Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken', 'catsup', 'Pepsi or Coke']
directions: Wash and prepare chicken parts of your choice. Brown or boil chicken. Mix catsup and Pepsi or Coke (diet may be used) to medium thickness. Simmer the cooked chicken in the sauce for about 30 minutes.

title: Sopa (Mexican Rice)
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. bacon grease', '1/2 bag rice', '1/2 onion, diced', '1/2 can tomato sauce', '1 can chicken broth', '1 can water', 'garlic powder', 'cumin', 'oregano']
directions: Get bacon grease hot. Add rice and brown; add onion and let brown. Add tomato sauce and mix. Add chicken broth and can of water. Sprinkle garlic, cumin and oregano to taste. Stir and cover. Do not stir anymore. Cook until moisture disappears.

title: Diet Coke Chicken
ingredients: ['1 can diet Coke', '1/2 to 3/4 c. ketchup', '4 to 6 pieces skinless boneless chicken breast']
directions: Spray Pam in frying pan on medium heat. Brown chicken on both sides, remove chicken from pan. Stir diet Coke and ketchup in pan until boiling. Place chicken in mixture and cook for 30 minutes on medium to low heat.

title: Ww 1.5 Points - Skinny B*Tch
ingredients: ['8 8 ounces Coke zero or 8 ounces diet Dr. Pepper soda', '1 fluid ounce rum or 1 fluid ounce Jack Daniels Whiskey', '1 lime wedge']
directions: Mix liquor and diet coke. Squeeze lime juice in to drink. Mix well and enjoy.

title: Coke Barbecue Chicken
ingredients: ['1 c. catsup', '2 c. Coke or Pepsi', 'desired chicken pieces']
directions: Put the catsup and Coke or Pepsi in electric skillet. Add the chicken pieces. Cover and cook on simmer for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Turn chicken once during cooking. (You can use regular or diet soda.)

title: Cherry-Coke Salad(Congealed)
ingredients: ['1 can water-packed cherries', '1 can crushed pineapple in own juice', '2 pkg. NutraSweet cherry jello', '2 pkg. Equal', '1 pkg. Knox gelatine', '2 c. Diet Coke or 1 can', '1/2 c. cold water']
directions: Dissolve Knox gelatine in cold water. Bring to rolling boil the can of cherries. Stir in Knox gelatine mix. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Add jello until well dissolved. Add pineapple (juice and all) and Diet Coke. Yields 8 servings, counts as 1 fruit and 10 calories.

title: Cookie Fruit Cobbler
ingredients: ['1 (18 ounce) packagenestle toll house refrigerated chocolate chip cookie dough', '2 (21 ounce) containers cherry pie filling', '1 cup quick oats or 1 cup old fashioned oats']
directions: PREHEAT oven to 375F Grease 13 x 9-inch baking pan. SPOON pie filling into pan. CRUMBLE cookie dough into medium bowl. Add oats; mix well. Sprinkle over filling. BAKE for 24 to 28 minutes or until top is deep golden brown. Serve warm or at room temperature.

title: Adult Chocolate Milk With Spiced Rum
ingredients: ['2 ounces spiced rum', '1 cup skim milk', '1 tablespoon chocolate syrup', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', 'cola or diet cola']
directions: Add all ingredients except cola to a water bottle, drink mixer, or some other container with a lid. Shake the hell out of it. Pour into a glass and top off with cola. I use Diet Coke, and probably 1/2 cup of it, but for a sweeter drink, use more cola. Drink. Repeat several times.

title: Thai Spiced Tofu
ingredients: ['8 ounces firm tofu, cut into four 1/2-inch slices*', '3 tablespoons Thai red curry paste (found in the Asian section of most supermarkets)', '3 tablespoons sugar', "2 tablespoons fish sauce (for vegetarians who don't eat fish) or 2 tablespoons tamari (for vegetarians who don't eat fish)", '1/2 lb green beans', '1/2 cup vegetable broth', '1 tablespoon peanut oil']
directions: Place the tofu between layers of paper towels and weigh them down with a heavy skillet to remove excess water. Set aside to drain for 10 minutes. Combine the curry paste, sugar, and fish sauce; put half this sauce in a resealable plastic bag. Add the tofu, seal, and set aside for 15 minutes. In a saucepan, combine the green beans, broth, oil, and the remaining curry. Simmer until the beans are tender, about 5 minutes. Cover to keep warm. Lightly coat a nonstick skillet with vegetable cooking spray and place it over medium heat. When hot, add the tofu and cook until golden, about 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a dinner plate and cover. Serve with the green beans.

title: Tofu Scramble With Basil
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons vegan butter', '1/2 onion, diced', '1/2 green pepper, diced', '1/2 roma tomato, diced', '1 jalapeno, diced', '3 sprigs fresh basil, chopped or 2 tablespoons fresh basil', '1 (14 ounce) package soft tofu, drained', '2 tablespoons turmeric']
directions: Drain the tofu and then wrap with paper towels to remove as much water as possible. Let the tofu stand between the paper towels. In saute pan, melt the butter, add the onion, green pepper, tomato and jalapeno. Saute until union is translucent about three minutes. Add the tofu and break it up into small bites. Add the turmeric until the tofu turns yellow, you might need more. Saute for a few minutes, getting as much liquid to reduce out. Add the basil and then salt and pepper. Continue to stir for a minute or two. Serve with beans and rice.

title: Ground Beef Soup
ingredients: ['1 lb. lean ground beef', '1 clove garlic or 1 tsp. garlic powder', '1 c. sliced celery', '1/4 c. uncooked regular rice', '3 1/2 c. water', '2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes, cut up', '1 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. pepper', '1 c. chopped onion', '1 c. sliced carrot', '1 (15 oz.) can kidney beans, undrained', '5 beef bouillon cubes', '1 Tbsp. parsley flakes', '3/4 tsp. basil', '1 c. frozen green beans or 1 can green beans, drained']
directions: Cook beef, onion and garlic until beef is brown. In large pot, put all ingredients except green beans. Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 40 minutes. Add green beans, continue simmering for 10 minutes.

title: Tofu And Green Beans With Coconut-Peanut Sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut oil', '2 tablespoons ginger, diced', '1 tablespoon garlic, diced', '1 lb extra firm tofu, cut into 1/2-inch dice', '1 lb green beans, stemmed, and cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 tablespoon tamari', 'Coconut-Peanut Sauce', '2/3 cup all natural-style peanut butter', '6 green onions, chopped', '4 teaspoons ginger, diced', '2 teaspoons garlic, diced', '1 cup light coconut milk', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 teaspoons brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne', '2 tablespoons tamari']
directions: In a large skillet or wok, saute the ginger, garlic, and tofu in the oil until the tofu is browned on all sides, about 15 minutes. Mix in the green beans and tamari and cover tightly. Steam the beans until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes. Remove the lid, and saute until the beans are have browned a bit and tender to your liking. Meanwhile, in a food processor, add all the coconut-peanut sauce ingredients and process until smooth. Add the peanut sauce and cook until thickened, 2-3 minutes. Serve over rice noodles or rice.

title: Chocolate Applesauce Bread
ingredients: ['1 1/2 sticks oleo', '3 eggs', '1 c. sugar', '3 c. applesauce', '4 c. flour', '2 1/2 tsp. baking soda', '3/4 tsp. salt', '3/4 tsp. cinnamon', '4 Tbsp. unsweetened cocoa', '1/2 c. chocolate chips']
directions: Heat oven to 350\u00b0. Cream sugar and butter. Beat eggs well, then applesauce. Sift flour, soda, salt, cinnamon and cocoa. Mix all together. Pour in 3 buttered pans. Fill about 3/4 full. Sprinkle top with chips. Bake about 1 hour. Insert knife in center; when it comes out clean, it's baked. Let cool on wire rack. Makes 3 loaves.

title: Mi Krop (Thai Noodle Dish)
ingredients: ['None None oil, for deep-frying', '4.5 oz rice vermicelli noodles', '5.25 oz firm tofu, diced', '1/4 cup brown sugar', '2 tbsp fish sauce', '2 tbsp tomato sauce', '1 tbsp rice wine vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, finely sliced', '2 None Thai chilies, sliced', '8.75 oz small shrimp, peeled, cooked', '6 None green onions, thinly sliced']
directions: Heat oil in a wok or saucepan. Working in batches, deep-fry vermicelli for 1-2 mins, until puffed. Drain on paper towels. Deep-fry tofu for 1-2 mins, until golden and crisp. Drain on paper towels. Drain oil from wok. Combine sugar, fish sauce, tomato sauce, vinegar, garlic and chilies. Stir-fry for 30 seconds then add shrimp, tofu and 3 green onions. Stir-fry for 2-3 mins. Remove from heat and mix in noodles. Serve with remaining green onion.

title: Toasted Brussels Sprout And Kale Salad With Strawberry-Basil Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['FOR THE BRUSSELS SPROUTS:', '1 Tablespoon Avocado Oil Or Light Olive Oil', '1 pound Brussels Sprouts, Trimmed And Halved', '2 sprigs Fresh Thyme (or 1/4 Teaspoon Dried)', '2 cloves Garlic, Minced', 'FOR THE VINAIGRETTE:', '5 Large Ripe Strawberries', '1 teaspoon Whole Grain Or Dijon Mustard', '4 Tablespoons White Wine Vinegar', '10 leaves Fresh Basil', '1 teaspoon Honey, Or More To Taste', '1/4 teaspoons Sea Salt', '1/4 cups Avocado Oil Or Light Olive Oil', 'FOR THE CANDIED ALMONDS:', '2/3 cups Sliced Almonds', '1 Tablespoon Pure Maple Syrup', 'Sea Salt, to taste', 'FOR THE SALAD:', '5 ounces, weight Spring Greens Salad Mix', '5 ounces, weight Baby Kale', '1 English Cucumber, Diced', '1 cup Blueberries', '1 cup Halved Grapes', '1/2 cups Crumbled Feta Cheese', '1/2 cups Dried Cranberries']
directions: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add Brussels sprouts and thyme sprigs. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10-12 minutes until sprouts are cooked through and golden brown. Add garlic and cook for another 1-2 minutes. Remove sprouts from heat and let cool. Make the vinaigrette by putting vinaigrette ingredients (except for oil) into a food processor or blender. Blend until smooth. While machine is running, pour in oil. Taste, and add more salt if needed. Place almonds in a small skillet along with maple syrup and a generous pinch of salt. Cook over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and fragrant. The syrup will have cooked off some, leaving the nuts sticky and clumped together. Remove from heat and let it cool. Assemble the salads by putting some salad mix and baby kale in each bowl and adding the toppings. Drizzle some vinaigrette over the top and serve.

title: Tofu In Spicy Coconut Milk
ingredients: ['1 tbsp vegetable oil', '3 None shallots, peeled, finely chopped', '1 stalk lemongrass, finely chopped', '1 None Thai chili, finely chopped', '1 tsp shrimp paste', '2 None kaffir lime leaves, finely shredded, plus extra to serve', '1 1/4 cups coconut milk', '1 1/4 lb silken firm tofu, drained', 'None None steamed rice, to serve', 'None None Asian greens, to serve', 'None None green tea, to serve']
directions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add shallots, lemongrass, chili and shrimp paste. Cook for 3 mins, stirring, until fragrant. Add lime leaves and coconut milk. Season. Simmer for 5 mins. Meanwhile, steam tofu for 3 mins, until heated through. Slice. Distribute sauce between serving bowls. Top with sliced tofu and extra lime leaves. Serve with steamed rice, Asian greens and green tea.

title: Baby Plum Bread
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2 c. self-rising flour', '2 tsp. cinnamon', '1 tsp. allspice', '3 eggs', '2 small jars strained baby plums', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chopped nuts', '1 c. cooking oil']
directions: Mix sugar, spices and self-rising flour. Add oil and eggs, one at a time, beating well after each is added. Fold in vanilla, baby plums and chopped nuts. Turn into 2 small greased and floured loaf pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.

title: Stir-Fried Green Beans And Five-Spice Dry Tofu Recipe
ingredients: ['8 ounces dry five-spice tofu (see note)', '3 tablespoons vegetable, peanut, or canola oil', '1 tablespoon fresh ginger, peeled and sliced to matchsticks', '1 to 2 fresh small chilies, such as Thai (optional), thinly sliced', '8 ounces fresh green beans, trimmed', 'Kosher salt to taste', '2 teaspoons light soy sauce', '1 teaspoon chili sauce, such as sambal olek (optional)', '2 scallions, sliced thinly on a bias']
directions: Slice the dry tofu blocks into thin, roughly 1/8\  rectangular slices. Heat 2 tablespoons of the oil in a wok over high heat until smoking. Add the tofu slices and stir-fry until just crispy on both sides, 2 to 3 minutes. Transfer the tofu to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil and heat until lightly smoking. Add the ginger and optional chilies. Stir fry until fragrant, about 30 seconds, then add the green beans along with a pinch of salt. Stir fry for until the green beans are lightly softened, deeper green in color, and a little seared on their sides, about 30 seconds Return the dry tofu to the pan and stir with the green beans. Add the soy sauce and optional chili sauce and stir immediately to incorporate evenly. Stir in the scallions and cook, stirring, for another minute. Season with more salt if desired, and serve.

title: Gumbo
ingredients: ['4 oz. shrimp', '4 oz. orange roughy or 4 oz. crabmeat', '1 c. diced tomatoes', '1 c. water', '1/2 c. green beans', '1/2 c. cabbage', '1/8 tsp. garlic powder', '1/2 tsp. ground bay leaves', '1/2 tsp. onion powder', '1/4 tsp. celery seed', '1 tsp. Mrs. Dash (table blend)', '1/2 tsp. gumbo file']
directions: Combine all ingredients except shrimp. Cook until green beans and cabbage are tender. Add shrimp and cook additional 15 minutes over low heat.

title: Shrimp Ball Soup
ingredients: ['1 egg white, slightly beaten', '2 tablespoons cornstarch', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '8 ounces shrimp, peeled, deveined, finely chopped', '6 cups chicken broth', '3 tablespoons rice wine or 3 tablespoons dry sherry', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '1 garlic clove, minced', '1 cup fresh snow pea, halved crosswise', '3/4 cup carrot, thinly sliced', '4 ounces tofu, cubed', '3 tablespoons green onions, thinly sliced']
directions: For shrimp balls, in a mixing bowl combine egg white, cornstarch, and ginger. Add shrimp and mix well. In a Dutch oven combine broth, rice wine, pepper and garlic. Bring to a boil and add shrimp mixture by rounded teaspoons; return to boiling; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 1 minute. Add pea pods, carrots, tofu, and green onion. Return to boiling; reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5 minutes more until vegetables are crisp-tender.

title: Indonesian Tempeh And Green Beans
ingredients: ['12 oz. tempeh (may substitute very firm tofu for tempeh)', '1 - 2 Tbls olive oil', '3-4 shallots, finely chopped', '6 garlic cloves, minced', '1 Tbls minced ginger', '1 lb green beans, trimed and cut into 2 inch pieces', '2 Tbls brown sugar', '2 Tbls tamari or soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon turmeric', 'Juice of 1 lime', 'Garnishes: chopped peanuts, chopped cilantro and lime wedges']
directions: Heat a wok over medium high heat. Add 1 Tbl olive oil, heat and add tempeh. (If using tofu, skip this step and add tofu after adding sauce ingredients). Brown tempeh (cook about 3-4 minutes stirring) and remove to a platter. Add 1 Tbls oil, heat, then add shallots, garlic and ginger, reducing heat if shallot or garlic begin to brown. When these are translucent, add green beans, stir and then cover. Cook until green beans are bright green and still crisp. Uncover, add remaining sauce ingredients and stir until sugar is dissolved. Return tempeh to pan (or add tofu now) and cook until tempeh is heated.  Serve over rice, if desired. For low carb, use a sugar substitute for the brown sugar.

title: Sparkling Fruit Punch
ingredients: ['2 qt. cranberry juice cocktail', '1 can frozen pink lemonade concentrate', '1 qt. sparkling water']
directions: Stir all ingredients together and keep chilled.

title: Microwave Fudge(Servings:  20)
ingredients: ['3 1/2 c. powdered sugar', '1/2 c. cocoa', '1/4 c. milk', '1 stick butter or margarine', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Cook sugar, cocoa and milk with butter in glass bowl for 2 minutes on High. Remove from microwave. Stir until smooth. Add vanilla. Pour into buttered 8 x 8-inch pan. Freeze for 20 minutes or refrigerate for 1 hour.

title: Miso Shiru
ingredients: ['4 c. water', '1/4 c. dried shrimp or any of dashi ingredients', '1/2 c. miso', '1/2 tofu, diced', '3 green onions, cut in 1-inch pieces']
directions: Make soup stock by boiling water and shrimp (or meat) for about 30 minutes; strain. Add miso, tofu and green onions; cook for about 5 minutes. Serves 4 to 5.

title: Squash And Coconut Milk Stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, minced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 acorn squash, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk', '8 ounces green beans, cut into 3-inch pieces', '8 ounces cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 (14 ounce) package extra-firm tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons white sugar']
directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add ginger, garlic, and onion. Cook until garlic begins to brown, about 5 min. Add squash, coconut milk, and green beans to skillet. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce heat to medium, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes until squash is tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in shrimp and tofu, then season to taste with salt, pepper, and sugar.

title: Mongolian Tofu And Green Beans With Rice
ingredients: ['16 ounces extra firm tofu', '2-3 tablespoons corn starch', '2 tablespoons sesame oil, divided', '1 1/2 cups jasmine rice, dry', '3 cups water', '1 tablespoon ginger, grated', '3 garlic cloves, chopped', '1/2 cup soy sauce', '1/2 cup water', '1/2 cup brown sugar', '3/4 pound green beans, trimmed', '1 scallion, chopped', '1-2 tablespoons sesame seeds']
directions: Drain liquid out of tofu. You can do this by placing tofu block on a large plate and covering with a cutting board or another plate. Then put something heavy (like a full teapot) on top and let drain for at least 30 minutes. Discard the liquid and cut tofu into 1/2 inch cubes. Sprinkle cornstarch on tofu and lightly cover on all sides. In a medium pot, heat 1 tablespoon sesame oil over medium heat. Add rice and stir to coat. Add water, bring to a boil, cover and reduce heat and cook until fluffy. Meanwhile, in a medium sized bowl, combine ginger, garlic, soy sauce, water, and brown sugar. Mix until all sugar is dissolved. Set aside. Heat remaining 1 tablespoon sesame oil in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add tofu and cook until browned (about 5 minutes), then flip and brown on opposite side (an additional 5 minutes). Add soy sauce mixture to pan, bring to a boil, and reduce heat. Stir to make sure tofu is covered. Once liquid starts to thicken, add in green beans and cook for 3-4 minutes. Serve tofu and green beans over rice. Top with scallions and sesame seeds.

title: Chuck Wagon Stew
ingredients: ['1 pound ground beef', '1/2 onion, chopped', '2 potatoes, diced', '2 cubes beef bouillon', '1 cup water', '1 (14.5 ounce) can green beans', '1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Brown the ground beef with the onion in a large skillet over medium heat; drain the excess fat from the pan. Stir the potatoes, beef bouillon, and water into the beef. Drain the liquid from the canned green beans into the beef mixture; set the green beans aside. Cook the mixture until the potatoes are soft. Add the green beans and diced tomatoes and cook until hot. Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Cambodian Style Tofu Salad
ingredients: ['1 lb firm tofu, cut into 1-inch cubes', 'Sauce', '2 inches piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped (or 1-inch piece galangal if you can find it-can use frozen ginger)', '4 -5 large garlic cloves, coarsely chopped', '1 -2 fresh jalapeno pepper, diced', '2 tablespoons sugar', '4 teaspoons asian fish sauce (nam pla)', '3/4 - 1 cup freshly squeezed lime juice', '4 tablespoons rice wine vinegar', 'Salad', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 lb green beans, trimmed', '3 medium carrots, peeled and cut into 2-inch matchsticks (about 1/2 pound)', '7 scallions, cut into 2-inch slivers', '3 red italian frying bell peppers, seeded and thinly sliced (about 11 ounces, or 2 bell peppers)', '1 head boston lettuce, shredded (8 ounces)', '1/4 - 1/3 cup of fresh mint, coarsely chopped', '1/4 cup roasted unsalted peanuts, coarsely chopped']
directions: Place tofu between two layers of paper towel on a dish. Place a baking sheet over tofu, and set a heavy book on top of baking sheet to weight tofu so it releases excess water; let stand about 30 minutes. Combine ginger, garlic, jalapeno, sugar, fish sauce, lime juice, and vinegar in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, remove from heat, and set aside. Bring a large saucepan of water to a boil. Add salt and beans; cook until beans are just tender and bright green, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain beans, and transfer immediately to a large bowl of ice water. When chilled, drain again, and pat dry. Distribute beans, carrots, scallions, red peppers, lettuce, and mint evenly among six plates. Meanwhile, heat a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add tofu, and cook until golden brown and slightly crisp, about 3 to 4 minutes on each side. Add ginger mixture, toss to coat tofu, and cook about 1 minute more. Spoon tofu and sauce over vegetables, sprinkle with peanuts, and serve.

title: Endive Salad with Grainy-Mustard Vinaigrette
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons French whole-grain mustard', '1 tablespoon sherry vinegar', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1/4 cup canola oil', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper', '3 large white Belgian endives, separated into spears', '3 large red Belgian endives, separated into spears, or 3 heads of radicchio, torn into bite-size pieces']
directions: In a large bowl, whisk the whole-grain mustard with the sherry vinegar and lemon juice. Gradually whisk in the olive oil and the canola oil and season with salt and pepper. Add the endive spears and toss to coat. Serve the endive salad right away.

title: Quick Chicken Laksa
ingredients: ['2 tbsp vegetable or peanut oil', '3.5 oz firm tofu, drained, cut into 1/3 inch pieces', '3 oz laksa paste', '2 cups chicken stock', '2/3 cup coconut milk', '2 tsp brown sugar', '2 tsp fish sauce', '2.5 oz shredded cooked chicken', '5 oz green beans, trimmed, sliced', '6 oz fresh Singapore noodles, soaked in boiling water for 2-3 mins, drained', '2.5 oz bean sprouts, rinsed', '1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves', '1 None fresh long red chili, thinly sliced', 'None None lime wedges, to serve']
directions: Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook tofu, in batches, for 2 mins, or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. Add laksa paste and cook for 1 min, or until fragrant. Add stock, coconut milk, sugar and fish sauce. Bring to a boil then add chicken, green beans and tofu. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 mins, or until beans are tender. Distribute noodles between serving bowls. Ladle hot soup over top. Garnish with bean sprouts, cilantro and chili. Serve immediately with lime wedges.

title: Salsa, Spaghetti Soup
ingredients: ['1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth', '1 (14 1/2 oz.) can beef broth', '1 (14 1/2 oz.) can stewed tomatoes', '1 jar mild or medium salsa', '1 medium size onion, chopped', '2 large stalks celery, sliced', '1 pkg. Green Giant frozen white Shoepeg corn (no sauce)']
directions: Optional: Small chunks of cooked beef, pork or chicken; red kidney beans or green lima beans or string beans.

title: Southwestern Cobb Salad With Avocado Cream Dressing
ingredients: ['6 cups Salad Greens', '1 cup Cheddar Cheese, Grated', '1 cup Roasted Corn Kernels', '1 cup Roasted Red Peppers, Diced', '1 cup Canned Black Beans, Drained', '1 cup Avocados, Diced', '1-1/2 cup Cooked Chicken, Diced', 'FOR THE DRESSING:', '2 whole Avocados, Diced', '1/4 cups Sour Cream', '1/2 cups Milk', '2 Tablespoons Fresh Cilantro', '1 whole Lime, Juiced', '3 cloves Garlic, Minced', 'Salt And Pepper, to taste']
directions: Lay salad greens in a large bowl or platter. Place each ingredient on top of the salad in rows. Place all dressing ingredients into a blender or food processor. Process until smooth and creamy. Notes: To roast the corn and peppers, just place the veggies on the grill or under the broiler. After a few minutes, rotate the produce so it gets charred evenly on each side. For the chicken, you can season it however you like. I used some garlic powder, chipotle powder and some kosher salt. I didn't measure anything; I just sprinkled the seasoning over the chicken breasts and tossed it on the grill. Depending on the size of your avocados, you may need to add extra milk in order to make the dressing pourable. Just keep adding milk until you feel that the consistency is right. Be sure to adjust the salt and pepper if you feel like you need to. Take a taste to be sure.

title: Chicken and Olive Quiche
ingredients: ['1 x quiche shell', '1 cup cream', '1 each eggs', '2 each egg yolks', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch nutmeg', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 cups chicken cooked, cut into cubes', '1 x salt and black pepper to taste', '1/2 cup olives chopped']
directions: Blend together cream, egg, egg yolks, salt, nutmeg and cayenne. Cut chicken into cubes. Season with salt and pepper. Put into prepared quiche shell. Scatter olives over chicken. Pour custard filling over. Bake at 375F (190C). for 40 to 45 minutes.

title: Tofu And Black Bean Tacos
ingredients: ['1 (140z) package of extra firm tofu, drained', '1 1/2 tsp chili powder', '1/2 tsp dried oregano', '1/2 tsp ground cumin', '1/2 tsp ground coriander', '1/2 tsp salt', '1 tblsp EVOO', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '3 scallions, finely chopped', '1 (15 oz) can black beans, drained and rinsed', '12 corn tortillas', '3 cups shredded green leaf lettuce', '2 cups chopped tomatoes', '1 1/2 cups shredded cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese']
directions: Put tofu, chili powder, oregano, cumin, coriander, and salt into a bowl and mash together with a fork. Set aside.  Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and two-thirds of the green onions and cook until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, until most of the moisture has evaporated, 10-12 minutes. Add beans and remaining green onions, stir well and cook until beans are heated through, about 2 minutes more.  Spoon tofu mixture into tortillas, top with lettuce, tomatoes and cheese and serve.

title: Broiled Salmon Fillet With Mustard Dill Sauce
ingredients: ['2 1/2 - 3 lbs salmon fillets', 'soy sauce, for rubbing the salmon', 'fresh bay leaf, for garnish if desired', 'fresh thyme sprig, for garnish if desired']
directions: Preheat broiler. Rinse salmon and pat dry. Arrange salmon, skin side down, in a foil-lined jelly-roll pan and rub thoroughly with soy sauce. Season salmon with salt and pepper and broil about 4 inches from heat 12 to 15 minutes, or until just cooked through. Transfer salmon to a platter and garnish with herbs. Serve salmon warm or at room temperature with mustard dill sauce.

title: Feta Grain Salad
ingredients: ['1/2 cup wheat', '1/2 cup spelt', '1/2 cup rye berries', '3/4 cup diced Feta (about 3 ounces)', '3/4 cup thinly sliced red onion', '3/4 cup julienne strips seedless cucumber', '7 tablespoons olive oil', '3/8 cup julienne strips drained bottled roasted red pepper', '3/8 cup mixed minced fresh herbs such as parsley, mint, and dill plus herb sprigs for garnish', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, or to taste', '2 tablespoons red-wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons chopped pitted brine-cured black olives', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 garlic cloves, minced', 'dried hot red pepper flakes to taste']
directions: In a kettle of boiling salted water cook the grains for 1 hour, or until they are tender, and drain them. In a large bowl stir together the grains, the Feta, the onion, the cucumber, the oil, the roasted pepper, the minced herbs, the lemon juice, the vinegar, the olives, the cumin, the garlic, the red pepper flakes, and salt to taste and garnish the salad with the herb sprigs.

title: Curried Tofu And Green Beans
ingredients: ['1 (14 ounce) package extra firm tofu, drained well', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 small onion, halved and thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon curry powder', 'coarse salt', 'ground pepper', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 cup half-and-half', '1 (10 ounce) box frozen cut green beans, thawed', '4 plum tomatoes, halved lengthwise and cut crosswise into 1/2 inch pieces (3 cups)', '3 cups cooked white rice, for serving']
directions: Halve tofu horizontally and then crosswise to make 4 rectangles. Cut each rectangle into 2 triangles. Press tofu slices between 2 baking sheets lined with plenty of paper towels and weighted with a heavy skillet or canned goods for about 20 minutes. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in large (12 inch) nonstick skillet over medium high heat. Cook tofu, turning once, until golden brown, about 10 minutes. Transfer to a plate. Reduce heat to medium and add the remaining tablespoon of oil, onion, and curry powder. Season generously with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often until onion is soft, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, cook 1 minute. Reduce heat to medium low and add half and half, and 1/2 cup water; bring to a gentle simmer. Add tofu and green beans. Cover. Cook until beans are bright green, about 2 minutes. Uncover; add tomatoes. Cook until soft, 3-4 minutes. Serve over rice.

title: Egg Custard
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '1 (13 oz.) can evaporated milk', '3 tsp. margarine, melted', '3 tsp. flour', '1 c. sugar', 'nutmeg to taste']
directions: Grease and flour 9-inch pie pan, generously. Combine all ingredients in bowl. Mix well. Pour into pie pan. Cook at 350\u00b0 for 45 to 50 minutes.

title: Summer Corn And Shrimp Succotash
ingredients: ['3/4 pound jumbo shrimp', '2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 cup unsalted chicken stock', '8 cups water', '3 cups shelled fava beans (about 4 1/2 pounds unshelled beans)', '1 cup (1-inch) diagonally cut green beans (about 1/4 pound)', '2 tablespoons butter, divided', '3 garlic cloves, minced', '2 shallots, minced', '1 1/2 cups fresh corn kernels (about 3 ears)', '1/2 teaspoon kosher salt', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh tarragon', '1/2 teaspoon hot sauce', '2 tablespoons reduced-fat sour cream', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
directions: Peel and devein shrimp, reserving shells. Set shrimp aside. Heat a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Add 1 tablespoon oil to pan. Add shrimp shells; saute 5 minutes. Add stock. Bring to a boil; cook until liquid is reduced to 1/2 cup. Strain liquid through a sieve into a bowl; discard shells. Reserve liquid. Fill a large bowl with ice water. Bring 8 cups water to a boil in a large saucepan or Dutch oven. Add fava beans to pan; cook 1 minute. Remove with a slotted spoon. Plunge fava beans into ice water; cool completely. Drain well. Remove and discard tough outer shell from fava beans. Add green beans to boiling water; cook 2 minutes. Plunge green beans into ice water; cool completely. Drain well. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add remaining oil and 1 tablespoon butter. Add garlic and shallots; saute 2 minutes. Add corn; saute 2 minutes. Add shrimp, reserved shrimp liquid, and salt; cook 3 minutes. Add fava beans, green beans, remaining 1 tablespoon butter, dill, tarragon, and hot sauce; cook 3 minutes or until shrimp are done. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and pepper.

title: Beef And Green Beans
ingredients: ['beef', 'French cut green beans', '4 Tbs soy sauce', '2 T corn starch', '2 T oil', '2 T gin']
directions: Slice beef thin. Stir beef fry in sauce mixture remove beef stir fry green beans mix together

title: Black Pepper Tofu And Green Beans
ingredients: ['1 pound green beans, trimmed and halved', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons reduced-sodium soy sauce', '1 teaspoon pepper', '14 ounces firm tofu, drained and patted dry', '2 tablespoons canola oil', '1 tablespoon packed brown sugar', '1/2 cup sliced shallots']
directions: Bring a medium pot of water to a boil, add green beans, and cook until bright green, about 3 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a small bowl, mix lime juice, soy sauce, and pepper, then set aside. Cut tofu into 1/2-in.-thick rectangles. Heat oil in a nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add tofu, sprinkle with sugar, and cook, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Stir in shallots and cook until browned, about 3 minutes. Add green beans and cook until warmed, about 3 minutes. Pour in soy mixture and stir to coat. Note: Nutritional analysis is per serving.

title: Piper'S Pancake
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c all-purpose flour', '3 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1/1/4 c milk', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons butter, melted']
directions: Mix dry ingredients and then add milk and egg. Make batter and grill on a greased griddle at 375.

title: A Dieter'S Dream Shrimp Salad
ingredients: ['6 oz. shrimp, cooked', '16 oz. green beans', '1 garlic clove', '1 Tbsp. salad oil', '1/4 tsp. mustard powder', '1/2 tsp. sugar', '1/4 c. vinegar', '2 chicken bouillon cubes', '2/3 c. rice, cooked', '1 c. celery, sliced', '1/2 c. onions (sweet), sliced', '2 c. lettuce, shredded', 'soy sauce (optional)']
directions: Rinse shrimp and cook. Chill can of green beans. Drain and save liquid. Slice thinly the garlic clove and crush in a large bowl. Add oil, mustard, sugar, vinegar, shrimp and beans. Refrigerate.

title: Miso Soup
ingredients: ['1/2 c. dried shrimp', '5 c. water', '3/4 c. miso', '1/2 cube tofu', '3/8 c. green onion', 'Saimin noodles, optional']
directions: Cook shrimp in water for 10 minutes. Bring water to a boil and let simmer. Put miso in strainer (over a pot) and pour shrimp water through until all miso is dissolved.
