Shave a thin slice off the bottom of each white so it will stand upright. Arrange the whites, cut side up in a large plate. In a medium bowl, combine the potatoes, garlic and the 2 yolk halves. Mash with a potato masher or the back of a fork until well-blended. Stir in 2 tablespoons stock, 1 tablespoon lemon juice and 1 teaspoon vinegar until well blended. Add the oil and the remaining 1 tablespoon stock, 1 tablespoon lemon juice and 2 teaspoons vinegar. Beat with a spoon until smooth and fluffy. Fold in 1 tablespoon of the scallions and the pepper. Using a teaspoon or a pastry bag fitted with a large star tip, fill the egg whites with the potato mixture. Sprinkle the tops with the remaining scallions.

title: Hummus Amongus
ingredients: ['1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas', '1/4 cup tahini paste', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 garlic clove', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', 'salt and pepper']
directions: Drain beans; reserve water. In a food processor or blender add beans and all the ingredients. Process until smooth. If mixture is too thick, add some of the reserved liquid from the beans to dilute to a desired consistency. Serve at room temperature with pita bread, grilled pork, lamb or chicken.

title: Roast Lamb With Greek Herbs
ingredients: ['2 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary', '2 tbsp chopped fresh oregano', '2 tsp grated lemon peel', '1 tsp sea salt', '1/2 cup olive oil', '1 None leg of lamb (4 1/2 lbs), boned and butterflied', '1 cup Greek yogurt', '2 tbsp tahini', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '1 tsp salt', 'None None Arugula and pita bread, to serve']
directions: Mix the rosemary, oregano, lemon peel, sea salt and olive oil in a small bowl. Pour over the lamb. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or preferably overnight. Preheat the oven to 400\u00b0F. Heat a large skillet on high heat. Cook the lamb for 3-5 mins on each side, or until seared. Transfer to a roasting pan and roast for 15-20 mins, or until cooked to desired doneness. Let stand for 10 mins, then slice. Combine yogurt, tahini, lemon juice and salt in a small bowl. Serve lamb with arugula, pita bread and yogurt sauce.

title: George'S Salmon-Pepper Pate
ingredients: ['1/3 pound cooked salmon fillet', '1/2 cup Greek yogurt', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon dried dill weed', '2 tablespoons butter, or to taste', '4 slices French bread, or to taste', '2 tablespoons prepared jalapeno pepper jelly, or to taste']
directions: Blend salmon, Greek yogurt, salt, and dill weed together in a food processor until creamy and smooth. Refrigerate pate until set, at least 1 hour. Butter each slice of bread and toast in the toaster oven, about 4 minutes. Spread salmon pate over bread; spread pepper jelly on top.

title: Sunday Brunch: Kibbeh And Cucumber Salad Recipe
ingredients: ['2/3 cup bulgur wheat, soaked in warm water for 15 minutes then drained', '1 pound ground lamb', '1 onion, grated', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 cup mint leaves, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon cracked black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 English cucumber, thinly sliced into rounds', '2 tablespoons Greek yogurt', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'small bunch of chives, finely chopped', 'Kosher salt and cracked black pepper to taste']
directions: Preheat oven to 375\u00b0F. Combine soaked bulgur, lamb, onion, salt, mint, black pepper, cinnamon, cumin and allspice in a large bowl and mix thoroughly until all ingredients are well combined. Line a baking sheet with foil. Using wet hands, form meat mixture into 25 evenly sized football-shaped balls and arrange on baking sheet. Bake for 25 minutes, or until meat is cooked through. While kibbeh cook, make cucumber salad by combining cucumber, Greek yogurt, lemon juice and salt and pepper to taste. When kibbeh are cooked served hot with cucumber salad, warm pita, and mint tea.

title: Garlicky Feta Dip
ingredients: ['6 oz feta cheese, crumbled', '4 oz cream cheese, softened', '1/3 cup greek yogurt', '2-3 cloves garlic, minced', 'Pinch of dried dill', 'Pinch of dried oregano', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 Roma tomato, diced', 'Chopped parsley, to garnish', 'Black pepper, to taste', 'Pita, chips, or crackers, to serve']
directions: Combine the feta, cream cheese, greek yogurt, garlic, dill, oregano, and lemon juice in the bowl of a food processor or blender. When well-combined, scoop into a bowl and top with tomato, parsley, and black pepper. Serve cold with pita, chips, or crackers.

title: Cucumber-Horseradish Relish
ingredients: ['3/4 cup finely chopped cucumber', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '2 teaspoons sugar', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh dill', '2 teaspoons prepared horseradish', '1/8 teaspoon salt']
directions: Combine all ingredients in a small bowl. Cover and chill 2 hours.

title: Finest Arabic Chicken Shawarma Sandwich
ingredients: ['Marinade:', '3 tablespoons Greek yogurt', '3 tablespoons chile sauce', '2 tablespoons white vinegar', '2 tablespoons barbeque sauce (such as HP(R))', '1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 pound boneless chicken breast, cut into cubes', 'Sauce:', '1/2 cup Greek yogurt', '3 tablespoons tahini', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'Sandwich:', '1/4 cup cooking oil', '6 pita bread rounds', '1/2 head cabbage, finely shredded', '1 onion, cut into matchstick-size pieces', '2 pickled cucumbers, sliced']
directions: Combine 3 tablespoons Greek yogurt, chile sauce, vinegar, barbeque sauce, soy sauce, minced garlic, 1/2 teaspoon white pepper, black pepper, and cinnamon in a bowl; add chicken. Marinate chicken in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes. Mix 1/2 cup Greek yogurt, tahini, lemon juice, chopped garlic, 1/2 teaspoon white pepper, and salt in a bowl until sauce is smooth. Heat cooking oil in a skillet or wok over high heat; add chicken. Cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, 12 to 15 minutes. Toast pita bread on a flat pan or skillet over medium heat until golden, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Spread sauce on pita bread (or make pocket in the pita and spread sauce inside). Layer chicken, cabbage, onion, and pickles over sauce. Fold or wrap sandwiches with aluminum foil or parchment paper.

title: Lamb Cutlets- Mediterranean Style
ingredients: ['1 cup Greek yogurt', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 lemon, zest and juice of', '12 lamb cutlets, trimmed', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper, freshly cracked', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
directions: Combine the Greek yogurt, garlic, lemon zest, lemon juice and freshly ground pepper and salt. Mix to combine. Add the lamb cutlets, combine. Cover and refrigerate for one hour. Chargrill the cutlets on a moderately high heat for 2-3 minutes on each side or until cooked to your liking. Suggested to serve with a Greek salad and tzatziki for a complete meal.

title: Greek Spaghetti Quickie
ingredients: ['1 pkg. whole wheat spaghetti', 'favorite Greek salad dressing', 'Feta cheese', 'tomatoes, quartered', 'black olives', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'basil (optional)', 'oregano (optional)', 'garlic powder (optional)']
directions: Prepare spaghetti. Add Greek dressing, salt, pepper and spices. Add tomatoes, olives and cheese. May be served hot or cold. Great served with kabobs and pita bread.

title: Sharon'S Scrumptious Souvlaki
ingredients: ['2 pounds lamb, cut into 1 inch square cubes', '1/2 cup olive oil', '1 cup red wine', '1 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon dried mint, crushed', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '4 cups plain yogurt', '1 cucumber, shredded', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon dried dill weed', 'salt and pepper to taste', '8 pita bread rounds', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 tomato, thinly sliced']
directions: Place lamb in a large bowl. Add 1/2 cup olive oil, red wine, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper, oregano, mint and garlic. Stir until lamb is well coated. Cover, and refrigerate 3 hours, or overnight. Preheat grill, and lightly oil grate. In a small bowl, combine yogurt, cucumber, minced garlic and 2 tablespoons olive oil. Season with dill weed, salt and pepper; set aside. Thread meat onto skewers. Grill 10 minutes, turning once. Lightly sprinkle pita bread with olive oil, and place on grill until warm, about 1 minute. Serve meat on pita bread along with sliced red onion, sliced tomato and yogurt sauce.

title: Mexican Rice
ingredients: ['1 c. dry rice', '3 Tbsp. oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 clove garlic, diced', '1 fresh tomato, cubed or 1 small can tomato sauce', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', '1 1/2 tsp. chili powder']
directions: In large skillet, saute rice in oil until brown. Add remaining ingredients and 2 1/4 cups water over and simmer 20 to 25 minutes until rice is tender.

title: Tuna And Lemon Dip
ingredients: ['1 (7 ounce) can tuna in water, drained', '1 garlic clove, peeled and finely chopped', '1/2 lemon, juice of', '1/2 red pepper, deseeded and roughly chopped', '2 tablespoons Greek yogurt', 'fresh ground black pepper', '4 pita breads, toasted']
directions: Place the tuna, garlic, lemon juice, red pepper and Greek yogurt in a food processor and process until smooth. Season to taste accordingly. Serve with toasted pita breads or a selection of prepared vegetables.

title: Souvlaki On Pita Bread
ingredients: ['2 lbs lean boneless leg of lamb, 1 1/2 inch cubes', 'MARINADE', '2/3 cup onion, chop', '2/3 cup fresh parsley', '2/3 cup olive oil', '1/3 cup fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons garlic, mince', '2 tablespoons dried oregano leaves', '1 tablespoon fresh ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', 'red pepper mayonnaise or tzatziki', '1 medium onion, slice thin', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '8 pita breads (8\\', ')', '2 cups lettuce, shredded', '2 medium tomatoes, halve,slice thin', 'Tabasco sauce or hot sauce (optional)', '8 metal skewers or 8 presoaked long bamboo skewers (8\\', ')']
directions: Place the lamb cubes in a large mixing bowl. Combine all the marinade ingredients in the bowl of a food processor fitted with the metal blade, and process to a puree. Pour the marinade over the lamb. Toss the meat to coat well with the marinade. Cover and let marinate for at least 4 hours at room temp or refrigerate overnight. Prepare the mayonnaise and/or tzatziki, cover and refrigerate. Toss the onion with the vinegar, cover, and refrigerate. Wrap the pitas in foil and keep warm in a preheated 350~ oven while you cook the lamb. Bring the lamb to room temp. Thread the lamb cubes onto the skewers. Prepare a medium-hot fire in a grill. Place the lamb on the grill and cook, turning them frequently, until the lamb is medium rare, about 7 minutes. Transfer the lamb cubes to a warm platter, and remove the lamb from the skewers. These can also be broiled. Set out the pita breads, lamb, the mayonnaise and/or tzatziki, onion, lettuce, and tomatoes at the table for guests to help themselves. Spread some mayonnaise or tzatziki over a pita. Distribute a few cubes of lamb on the bread and top with onion, lettuce, and tomatoes. Sprinkle with a few drops of Tabasco sauce, if desired, roll up the pita, and eat the sandwich out of hand. If you use store-bought instead of homemade pocketless pita breads, reheat them before serving. To reheat,wrap them in foil in stacks of 2. Place the foil-wrapped pita breads in a preheated 400~ oven until they are soft, about 15 minutes.

title: Green Chili/Cheese Bread Recipe
ingredients: ['1 loaf French or possibly sourdough bread', '1 cube butter, softened', '1/2 c. diced green chilies, 1/2 of the 4 ounce. can', '3/4 pound Monterey Jack cheese', '2-3 tbsp. mayonnaise', '2 tbsp. chopped onions, or possibly to taste', 'Paprika']
directions: Mix butter, green chilies, Jack cheese, mayonnaise, and chopped onions. Cut bread in half lengthwise. Spread mix on bread. Sprinkle with paprika. Cut into slices. Broil 4-5 min.

title: Easy Pecan Coffee Cake
ingredients: ['2 (10 oz.) flaky biscuits', '1 (5 oz.) flaky biscuits', '1/2 c. margarine', '1 c. brown sugar', '1/2 c. chopped pecans or other nuts']
directions: Grease a Bundt pan or angel food cake pan. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons of pecans in bottom of pan. In small saucepan, bring margarine, brown sugar and remaining nuts to a boil. Set aside. Use one 10 ounce package of biscuits and one half of 5 ounce package. Cut biscuits in half; roll into balls and arrange in Bundt pan. Pour half of the brown sugar syrup over the balls. Repeat with the remaining biscuits. Pour the remaining syrup over the balls of dough. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes until lightly brown. Invert on waxed paper immediately.

title: Hazelnut Dukkah Yogurt Dip
ingredients: ["1 . set rawspicebar's hazelnut dukkah", '2 . set 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt', '1 . set lemon, juice of', '4 . set 1 tsp sea salt', '5 . set high quality extra virgin olive oil']
directions: Using a small, dry skillet over low heat, toast RawSpiceBar's Hazelnut Dukkah until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Mix greek yogurt with salt and lemon juice. Sprinkle dukkah on top with a generous drizzle of olive oil. Serve with RawSpiceBar's roasted Egyptian spiced bronzini or pita chips.

title: Lamb Pita Pockets
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups diced cooked lamb', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 1/2 cups chopped romaine lettuce', '1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese', '2 small tomatoes, sliced', '3 tablespoons bottled Greek dressing', '4 whole wheat pita rounds, halved and warmed']
directions: Saute lamb in hot olive oil in a medium skillet over high heat 2 minutes or until hot. Combine romaine lettuce, feta cheese, tomatoes, and 3 Greek dressing. Divide lamb among pita rounds. Top with lettuce mixture and Yogurt Sauce.

title: Warm Potato Salad With Hot Smoked Trout
ingredients: ['1 2/3 lb new potatoes, halved', '3 tbsp cider vinegar', '4 tbsp canola oil', '1 tsp wholegrain mustard', '1/2 tsp granulated sugar', '2 tbsp pickles, finely chopped', '2 tsp capers', '4 tbsp fresh dill, chopped', '3/4 lb hot smoked trout, flaked']
directions: Cook the potatoes in a large pot of salted, boiling water for 12-15 mins, or until tender. Drain and keep warm. Whisk the vinegar, oil, mustard and sugar together. Stir in the chopped pickles and capers then season to taste. Toss with the hot potatoes and sprinkle with fresh dill. Arrange the flaked trout on top then serve.

title: Crock-Pot Macaroni
ingredients: ['1 lb. cooked macaroni', '1 stick butter or margarine', '1 1/4 c. milk', '1 lb. grated sharp cheese', 'egg', '1 can evaporated milk']
directions: Place stick of butter in bottom of crock-pot. Layer macaroni and cheese (save some cheese to sprinkle on top); stir as you add. Stir in milk and salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Mix egg and evaporated milk; pour over top of everything. Do not stir!!! Cook on low for 3 1/2 hours. Enjoy!!!

title: Spicy Lamb Shish Kebabs With Greek Pita Bread
ingredients: ['1/4 cup fat-free plain Greek yogurt', '3/4 tablespoon hot paprika', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil, plus more for brushing', 'kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper', '2 lbs trimmed lean leg of lamb, cut into 1-inch cubes', '1 lb small zucchini, halved lengthwise and cut crosswise into 1-inch pieces', 'greek pita bread, warmed for serving']
directions: In a large bowl, whisk the yogurt with the paprika, cumin, allspice, garlic and the 1 tablespoon of olive oil. Season with 1 1/2 teaspoons of kosher salt and 1/2 teaspoon of pepper. Add the lamb and stir until evenly coated. Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour or refrigerate for up to 3 hours. Light a grill or preheat a grill pan. Thread the lamb and zucchini onto 12 long metal skewers and brush with oil. Season lightly with salt and pepper. Grill the kebabs over moderately high heat, turning, until the lamb is browned outside and medium-rare inside, 6 minutes. Serve the lamb kebabs with Warm Greek pita bread.

title: Greek Pitas
ingredients: ['2 ounces lean boneless lamb', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/8 teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', 'Dash of salt', 'Olive oil-flavored vegetable cooking spray', '2 tablespoons chopped cucumber', '2 tablespoons chopped tomato', '1 tablespoon plain nonfat yogurt', '2 (4-inch) pita bread rounds, cut in half crosswise']
directions: Cut lamb into 1/8-inch-wide strips; place in a small bowl. Sprinkle garlic powder, rosemary, and salt over lamb; toss to coat. Coat a small nonstick skillet with cooking spray; place over medium-high heat until hot. Add lamb strips, and cook 5 minutes or until lamb is browned on both sides. Drain and pat dry with paper towels. Combine cucumber, tomato, and yogurt, stirring well. Spoon lamb evenly into pita halves, and top evenly with cucumber mixture.

title: Chicken Pasta Primavera
ingredients: ['1/2 pound chicken breast halves, boneless, skinless cut into 1 inch pieces', '1 cup broccoli florets', '1/2 cup carrots cut in 1/4 inch strips', '1 each garlic cloves finely chopped', '1 1/2 cups pasta, fettuccine cooked', '2 tablespoons parmesan, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, grated grated', '2 tablespoons salad dressing, creamy ranch', '2 tablespoons light cream (half&half)', '18 teaspoon basil dried']
directions: Place chicken, broccoli, carrot and garlic in 1-quart microwaveable casserole. Cover tightly and microwave on high for 5 to 6 minutes, stirring after 3 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is no longer pink in center. Add remaining ingredients; toss. Microwave on high 1 1/2 minutes or until hot.

title: Birdfeed
ingredients: ['1 (15 oz.) box Cheerios', '1 (16 oz.) jar salted peanuts', '1 (8 oz.) pkg. raisins', "1 lb. pkg. plain M&M's"]
directions: Mix all together and store in airtight container. Great to munch and healthy for kids.

title: Moon Over Miami
ingredients: ['sliced bread', 'butter or oleo', 'egg', 'imagination']
directions: This is not a recipe for your \ best company,\  but my Great Uncle Milton loved it and so do kids.

title: Snack Mix
ingredients: ['4 c. popcorn', '2 c. Post super crisp cereal', '2 c. mini marshmallows', '2 c. real semi-sweet chocolate chips', '1 c. mixed nuts', '1 c. raisins']
directions: Mix well. Great for kids to do on their own !!!!!

title: Friendship Cake
ingredients: ['3/4 c. drained canned peaches, cut in pieces', '3/4 c. drained crushed pineapple', '6 maraschino cherries, drained', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 pkg. active dry yeast']
directions: Combine ingredients at room temperature in a glass jar with a loose cover. Stir several times the first day, then once a week after that. At the end of 2 weeks, the starter will have fermented enough to begin the steps of the Friendship Cake mix.

title: Finger Jello
ingredients: ['3 small pkg. jello', '3 c. boiling water', '4 envelopes Knox unflavored gelatine', '1 c. cold water']
directions: Dissolve jello in boiling water. Mix Knox gelatine and cold water together. Mix both together and set in refrigerator. Great for kids!!!!!!

title: Turkey Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: ['1 lb ground turkey', '1 (8 ounce) can tomato paste', '1 (12 ounce) bag frozen mixed vegetables', '5 medium potatoes', '2 cups cheddar cheese', '12 cup milk', 'pepper']
directions: Preheat oven to 350F. Brown ground turkey. Add tomato paste and veggies. Simmer til veggies are cooked. Make mashed potatoes(using milk and pepper to taste). Put meat mixture in the bottom of oven safe dish layer potatoes on top sprinkle cheese Bake 15-20 minutes.

title: Angel Biscuits
ingredients: ['1 pkg. yeast', '1 c. warm water', '3/4 c. vegetable oil', '5 c. self-rising flour', '2 c. buttermilk', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 tsp. soda']
directions: Stir yeast into warm water. Add oil, buttermilk, sugar, soda and flour. Mix well until smooth. Cover and refrigerate. Use as needed. Keeps 5 or 6 days. Bake biscuits at 350\u00b0 until browned.

title: Cinnamon Twist
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter or margarine', '1/4 c. sugar', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '1 pkg. refrigerator biscuits', '3 Tbsp. chopped pecans']
directions: This is a great recipe to make with kids. It is so simple they can do it themselves, and it tastes good, too!

title: Apple Pinwheels
ingredients: ['apple', 'peanut butter, cream cheese or cheese spread']
directions: Core apple; stuff inside with peanut butter, cream cheese or cheese spread. Chill. Serve crosswise and serve. Great kids' snack.

title: Three Cheese Mushroom And Spinach  Pie
ingredients: ['1 -9 inch deep dish pie shell', '1/4 lb diced bacon', '1/4 lb diced ham', '12 ounces sliced fresh mushrooms', '2 teaspoons chopped garlic', '1 cup fresh baby spinach leaves', '6 eggs', '1/4 cup parmesan cheese', '1/2 cup feta cheese with dried basil and tomato or 1/2 cup plain feta', '1/2 cup large curd cottage cheese', '1/4 teaspoon nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees. In a large skillet, cook bacon and ham for 5 minutes, until done, stirring occasionally. Add chopped mushrooms and continue to cook for another 8 minutes, until mushrooms start to release some liquid. Add chopped garlic and spinach. Stir and cook until the spinach is wilted, about 2 or 3 minutes. Set the skillet off the heat to cool a few minutes while the egg mixture is being prepared. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs until well blended. Mix in the cheeses, one at a time. Add nutmeg, salt and pepper. Mix all together well. Slowly add the cooled mushroom-spinach mixture to the eggs and cheese. Combine all of this well and pour into the 9 inch deep dish pie shell. Place pie on a cookie sheet that is lined with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees. Remove from oven and cool 15-20 minutes before slicing.

title: Honey Mustard Dip(For Vegies, Chicken, Fish, Salads)
ingredients: ['1 c. light mayonnaise', '1/2 c. honey', '1/4 c. red wine vinegar', '1 Tbsp. prepared mustard', '1 Tbsp. chopped parsley', 'dash of white pepper']
directions: Mix all ingredients. Refrigerate. Great for getting kids to eat vegies.

title: Spaghetti Pizza
ingredients: ['6 oz. spaghetti', '1 large egg', '1/4 c. milk', '5 heaping Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese', '1 1/4 c. meatless spaghetti sauce', '3/4 c. shredded Mozzarella']
directions: Cook and drain the spaghetti. Mix with the egg, milk and Parmesan. Press into a buttered pizza pan or 10-inch pie plate. Spoon on sauce. Sprinkle with Mozzarella. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes. Cool and cut into pizza wedges. Great lunch for kids.

title: Aunt Mag'S Pound Cake
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. Crisco', '1 stick oleo', '6 eggs', '1 c. cream or milk', '3 c. flour', '2 tsp. flavoring of your choice']
directions: Cream sugar and shortening real well. Add eggs one at a time. Stir in flour with wooden spoon. Do not use electric mixer! Add flavoring of your choice. Bake at 300\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for 1 hour and 20 minutes.

title: Strawberry Shakes
ingredients: ['3/4 c. water', '1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries or use fresh when in season', '1 c. instant nonfat dry milk powder', '3 Tbsp. sugar', '1 tsp. lemon juice', '1/8 tsp. salt', '2 c. ice cubes']
directions: In blender, place all ingredients, except ice. Cover and blend at medium speed until smooth. Increase speed to high; add ice cubes, one at a time, until all are finely crushed.

title: Joyce'S Scratch Pancakes
ingredients: ['3 3/4 c. flour', '3 tsp. soda', '3 tsp. salt', '3 tsp. baking powder', '5 eggs', '3 c. buttermilk']
directions: Mix together and cook on hot griddle. Makes plenty for the whole family or company. Great when all the kids come home.

title: Quail Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 quail breasts', '1 large baking potato', '3 bacon strips']
directions: Place potato between two quail breasts. Secure with toothpicks. Wrap bacon strips around potato and breasts. Wrap in foil. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 1 hour or until potato is done. Cut into slices. Great for kids to help with.

title: Chili Hazelnut Cake
ingredients: ['4 medium eggs, separated', '150 g caster sugar', '1 tsp vanilla essence', '75 g plain flour', '25 g cornflour', '1 tbsp baking powder', '50 g ground hazelnuts', '1 tsp chilli flakes', '225 g red currant jelly', '1 can peach halves, drained', '100 g cream cheese', 'None None red sugar, for decoration']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0F. Whisk the egg whites with 2 tbsp cold water while slowly adding 1/2 cup sugar and vanilla extract. Stir in the egg yolks one at a time, then fold in the flour, cornstarch and baking powder. Gently stir in the hazelnuts and chili flakes, then transfer to a lined 9 x 9 inch baking pan and bake for about 20 minutes. Remove and allow to cool on a wire rack. Remove from the pan and cut into 12 evenly sized strips. Heat the jelly in a pan until liquid and spread over the cakes. Puree the peaches with 1/4 cup sugar. Mix with the cream cheese and refrigerate for 15 minutes, then transfer to a piping bag and decorate the cakes. Sprinkle with red sugar and serve.

title: Zucchini Pickles
ingredients: ['1 qt. white vinegar', '2 c. granulated sugar', '1/4 c. salt', '2 tsp. celery seed', '2 tsp. turmeric (ground)', '1 tsp. dry mustard', '5 lb. small zucchini, sliced thin', '1 qt. thinly sliced onions']
directions: Combine first 6 ingredients in a saucepan and bring to a boil. Pour over prepared zucchini and onions in large bowl and let stand one hour, stirring occasionally. In large saucepan, bring mixture to a boil and simmer 3 minutes. Continue simmering as you quickly pack hot sterilized jars. Makes sure vinegar solution tops pickles. Seal. Process 5 minutes. Makes 6 to 7 pints.

title: Tater Tot Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. hamburger meat', '1/2 small bag Tater Tots', '1 can cream of mushroom soup', '1 small jar Cheez Whiz']
directions: Brown meat; drain. Arrange Tater Tots in casserole dish. Heat together the browned meat, soup and Cheez Whiz. Pour over Tater Tots; mix together. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 30 minutes, or until bubbly in the middle. Great for kids!

title: Green Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. lemon-lime Kool-Aid', '2 c. sugar', '2 qt. water', '1 tall can pineapple juice', '1 qt. ginger ale']
directions: Mix all ingredients except ginger ale. Just before serving, add ginger ale. Great for parties. Kids love this.

title: Spinach Lasagne
ingredients: ['1 pkg. lasagne', '2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach', '16 oz. cottage cheese', '28 oz. spaghetti sauce', '8 oz. part skim Mozzarella']
directions: Boil lasagne and boil spinach. Layer: spaghetti sauce, lasagne, spinach, cottage cheese, spaghetti sauce. Last, top with cubed Mozzarella. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Great for Christmas colors.

title: Ravioli Casserole
ingredients: ['1 (40 oz.) can beef ravioli', '2 beaten eggs', '1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, cooked and drained', '1 c. creamed cottage cheese', '1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tsp. dried parsley', '1 tsp. crushed basil', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese']
directions: Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Put half of the canned ravioli in an 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Stir together the eggs, spinach, cheeses and spices. Spoon mixture over ravioli and layer again with ravioli. Cover with foil and bake for 50 minutes. Kids will eat spinach fixed this way!

title: Spinach And Potato In Broth
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 c. chicken broth', '1 c. water', '4 medium potatoes, peeled, quartered and boiled', '2 lb. spinach']
directions: In large saucepan, gently brown garlic in olive oil. Add to pot: broth, water and potato. Add spinach. Cover and cook 15 minutes. Goes great with pork or chicken. Delicious.

title: Mexican Bean Dip
ingredients: ['2 cans pinto beans, drained', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 medium green pepper, finely chopped', '3 c. shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 jar Catalina salad dressing']
directions: Mix ingredients together and use as a dip with tortilla chips. Great as an appetizer or as a snack for the kids!

title: Ground Beef Enchiladas
ingredients: ['8 tortillas', '1 cup vegetable oil', '1 1/2 lbs hamburger', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (or colby jack)', '1 cup sour cream', '2 tablespoons parsley', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '1 (15 ounce) can tomato sauce', '1/2 cup water', '4 ounces chopped mild green chilies', '2 -3 teaspoons chili powder', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano leaves', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped']
directions: Cook and stir hamburger in skillet over medium heat until no longer pink. Remove from heat and drain. Stir into hamburger the onion, cheese, sour cream, parsley, salt, and pepper. Do not put back onto burner. Heat remaining ingredients (except water) to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 5 minutes. In large skillet, heat oil on medium, place tortillas in oil to saturate both sides (do not let tortillas crisp up). Remove from oil. Dip each tortilla into sauce to coat both sides in ungreased oblong baking dish. Spoon about 1/4 cup hamburger mixture onto each tortilla, roll tortilla around filling. Arrange in ungreased oblong baking dish with seam side down. Pour remaining sauce over enchiladas and add a little water at a time. Do not drown your enchiladas. Cook uncovered in 350 degrees oven, about 35 minutes.

title: Santa Fe Spinach Dip
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, chopped fine', '1 green onion, diced, to garnish (optional)', '16 ounces frozen spinach, thawed and squeezed dry', '14 ounces diced tomatoes, drained', '1 (4 ounce) can green chilies, chopped', '8 ounces low-fat cream cheese, softened- room temp', '1 (5 ounce) can fat-free evaporated milk, skim', '2 cups monterey jack cheese, grated- low fat is great too', '1 cup low-fat parmesan cheese, grated', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '3 tablespoons low-fat sour cream', 'salt and pepper']
directions: Saute onion in skillet over medium until softened. Add tomatoes and chilies, cook 2 minutes. Squeeze thawed spinach until dry. I use a potato ricer to squeeze it easily. In a large bowl combine spinach, cheeses, cream cheese, milk, vinegar, sour cream, salt and pepper. Stir well. Add the mixture from the skillet and stir just until combined. Spray a shallow baking dish with cooking spray and spoon everything into dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes or until top is light brown. Garnish with extra sour cream and green onion if desired. Great with pita chips, tortilla chips or veggie sticks. Also really good as a filling for baked potatoes or a dip with baked potato wedges or fries.

title: Cookies And Cream Delight
ingredients: ['1 pkg. chocolate chip cookies', '1 container Cool Whip', '1 c. milk']
directions: Dip cookies in milk and make a layer of them in the bottom of a large bowl. Spoon on a layer of Cool Whip. Continue layering cookies, dipped in milk, and Cool Whip until you reach the desired level. Makes a great dish for kids to prepare!!

title: One-Bite Stuffed Peppers With Quail Egg
ingredients: ['6 pieces green bell pepper', '6 pieces quail egg', '1/4 piece onion (medium size)', '200 grams ground meat (beef and pork)', '1/3 tablespoon paprika powder', 'Pinch salt', 'Pinch black pepper', '2 tablespoons Japanese Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons ketchup', '1 teaspoon sour cream']
directions: Cut peppers in half lengthwise, and remove seeds. Cook quail eggs in boiling water. Peel them and cut in half lengthwise. Stuff peppers with above mixture, and put eggs on them, and bake 20-25 minutes at 200 degrees. Here are some pictures step by step. http://daidokoro.mominaina.com/10159

title: Knox Blocs (Finger Jello)
ingredients: ['1 (6 oz.) box Jell-o plus 1 (3 oz.) box Jell-O', '4 pkg. Knox gelatine', '4 c. boiling water']
directions: Stir very well; pour into a long cake pan. Place a piece of wax paper over top when you refrigerate. (Great for sick kids.)

title: Resurrection Rolls
ingredients: ['1 bag large marshmallows', 'melted butter', 'cinnamon/sugar, mixed', '1 pkg. crescent rolls']
directions: A great Easter activity/story lesson for kids! (Very tasty, too!)

title: Zuppa Tuscana Or Tuscan Soup (Italian Sausge Peasant Soup
ingredients: ['16 cups chicken broth (made from 10 lbs. chicken legs)', '1 head celery, diced', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 lb Italian sausage, crumbled', '5 potatoes, cubed (or cooked pasta if you prefer)', '5 carrots', '1 lb mushroom', '2 (8 ounce) bags spinach leaves', '1 -2 tablespoon salt, to taste (about 2 Tbsp but add slowly and taste)', 'pepper, to taste', '1 cup parmigiano-reggiano cheese, freshly shredded (You may use asiago as well but do not use cheese from a shaker.)']
directions: To make the chicken broth, put 10 pounds of chicken legs in a large pot (bigger than a dutch oven - at least 32 cups). Fill with water. After washing celery, trim and put the trimmings in with the chicken. Once chicken is just barely cooked, remove from the pot and pull the chicken off the bone reserving for another use (I make chicken salad with it. Goes great with soup.) Return skin and bones to the pot and allow to cook until the broth tastes very chickeny. At least two to three hours. Strain broth of bones. At this point, I allow the broth to sit overnight in the fridge and then skim off all fat the next morning. You can skim fat without allowing it to sit, if you prefer. In a medium frying pan, sautee garlic in olive oil under it begin turns a tan color but do not allow to burn or get too dark or it will turn bitter. Add sausage and cook until browned. Add sausage mixture and all remaining ingredietns to the broth in the soup pot, except potatoes and spinach. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Simmer in the broth until the carrots are just tender enough to easily pierce with a fork, about twenty minutes. Add potatoes and cook until tender. Remove from heat and add spinach. Serve with parmesan or asiago cheese.

title: Bubbles
ingredients: ['1 1/4 c. water', '1/3 c. dish detergent', '2 tsp. sugar']
directions: Mix together and let kids blow tons of bubbles. Generic soap works great.

title: Gak
ingredients: ['Ingredients', '1 cup white elmer glue', '1 cup liquid starch', 'food coloring']
directions: Put glue and food coloring in a plastic container. Add starch a little at a time, stirring constantly. Keep stirring until mixture hold together like putty. Test with fingers, if too sticky add more starch in small amounts until mass is smooth and rubbery.

title: Spinach Fettucini
ingredients: ['1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach', '1 pkg. fettucini noodles', '2 Tbsp. butter', '2 Tbsp. chopped onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 c. butter', '1/2 c. whipping cream', '1 c. grated cheese (Parmesan or Romano)']
directions: Defrost spinach and drain in colander. Cook noodles and drain. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons butter until tender. Stir in spinach. Cover and simmer 3 minutes. Add 1/2 cup butter to warm noodles, tossing gently until butter melts. Add spinach mixture, whipping cream and cheese. Toss gently and serve. Serves 6. A great way to get kids to eat spinach!

title: Soap Balls
ingredients: ['1/4 c. Ivory Snow soap', '2 tsp. water']
directions: Mix together; roll into balls. Great for kids in summer to wash with fun.

title: Bill'S Meat And Pickle Salad]
ingredients: ['1 lb. beef Big Bologna (de-rined)', '8 sweet gherkin pickles', 'Miracle Whip', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: In an old-fashioned table meat grinder, grind bologna and pickles into a casserole dish. Mix with Miracle Whip, salt and pepper. Tastes great on homemade bread. Kids love it.

title: Peanut Butter Sauce
ingredients: ['1/2 c. peanut butter (smooth)', '1/4 c. maple syrup']
directions: Mix together until smooth and creamy. Serve with fresh sliced apples, celery or strawberries. Great snack for kids.

title: Orange Shake
ingredients: ['1/2 (6 oz.) can orange juice concentrate (frozen)', '1/2 c. milk', '12 ice cubes', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Mix all ingredients in blender. Pour into glasses. This is a great snack or frozen drink for kids and grown-ups.

title: Temptation Trail Mix
ingredients: ['1 cup salted peanuts, roasted and blanched', '1 cup tart dried cherries, pitted', '1/4 cup white chocolate chips', '1/4 cup dark chocolate chips', '1/4 cup peanut butter chips', '1 cup whole cashews or 1 cup cashew halves, roasted', '1 cup salted whole almond, roasted']
directions: Combine all ingredients in large bowl and mix well. Keep stored in airtight container. Great for traveling, parties, kids' snacks, etc.

title: Apple Cheese Appetizer
ingredients: ['apples, cut in wedges', '8 oz. cream cheese', '2 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese', '3 green onions, finely chopped']
directions: Soften cream cheese. Add Cheddar cheese and onions. Spread on apples. Sprinkle with chopped nuts if desired. Great for kids.

title: Fowl Play
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts', '1 can mushroom soup', '1 can chicken soup', '1 soup can water', '1 envelope onion soup mix', "1 box Uncle Ben's wild rice or 1 c. rice"]
directions: Saute onion in vegetable oil lightly. Brown chicken parts in oil. Just barely cover with water, then add salt and pepper to taste. Cover with paprika (as much as you like). Simmer until chicken is done, then mix about 3 tablespoons flour to a cup of milk. Add this to the chicken and simmer until it is thick. Very good with pasta.

title: Kentucky Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['2 c. self-rising flour', '2 envelopes Lipton tomato soup', '1 tsp. salt', '2 pkg. Good Seasons dressing mix']
directions: Put in plastic bag; mix well. Add chicken; coat well. (Best to coat one or two pieces at a time.) Lay out until coating is moist. Re-coat chicken. Melt 1/4 pound margarine in large baking dish; add chicken. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes or until tender.

title: OREO Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 qt. (4 cups) eggnog', '18 OREO Cookies, divided', '1 cup thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping']
directions: Place eggnog and 10 of the cookies in blender container; cover. Blend until smooth. Pour evenly into 8 glasses. Top each with 2 Tbsp. of the whipped topping and 1 of the remaining cookies. Serve immediately.

title: Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ["1/4 c. Hershey's cocoa", '3/4 c. sugar', '2/3 c. evaporated milk', '1/3 c. corn syrup', '1 stick margarine', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: Combine cocoa and sugar in saucepan. Blend in milk and syrup. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until it boils. Boil one minute; remove from heat. Stir in margarine and vanilla. Serve warm. Great with yellow cake and vanilla ice cream. Kids love this sauce over twinkies also.

title: Sewer Punch
ingredients: ['1 1/2 gal. lime sherbet', '1 (3 liter) 7-Up or Sprite', '1 large can pineapple juice']
directions: In punch bowl, dump semi soft sherbet and pour in 1/2 juice and 1/2 7-Up. Refill as needed. Great for kids' parties!

title: Gluten Free, Vegan Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['Dry Ingredients', '3 cups gf rolled oats', '3/4 cup coconut sugar or 3/4 cup another granulated sugar', '1/2 cup arrowroot', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda', '1/4 teaspoon sea salt', 'Wet Ingredients', '1/2 cup virgin coconut oil', '1/4 cup unsweetened applesauce', '2 teaspoons vanilla']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the dry ingredients into a food processor fitted with the \ s\  blade. Process until very finely ground (not as fine as oat flour, still a little coarse). Add wet ingredients, process until the mixture forms a cohesive ball. It may take a few minutes but it will happen. Pulse the processor if needed. Remove dough, finish forming into a ball with your hands. Chill the dough if it is too soft for 20 to 30 minutes. Then place on parchment or waxed paper for rolling. Roll out dough. Cut into heart shapes with a cookie cutter. Place onto a parchment-lined baking sheet. Bake for approximately 15 to 16 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. Dip in a glaze made from about 3 ounces dark chocolate, 1 tablespoon coconut oil, and 1 tablespoon sweetener. (Melted and whisked together over low heat). Enjoy!

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter (great if you use 1/2 c. creamy peanut butter and 1/2 c. crunchy peanut butter)']
directions: Mix together well. Roll into small balls. Put on cookie sheet. Press out with fork. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes. Great for kids!

title: The Best Pizza!
ingredients: ['Bridgeford frozen bread dough (white or wheat, 3 loaves to pkg.)', 'your favorite pizza sauce (homemade or storebought like Classico)', 'your favorite toppings', 'Monterey Jack cheese, Mozzarella or other white grated cheese']
directions: This is a great recipe for kids birthday parties because kids can design their own pizza. It's also great to cut in small squares and serve as an appetizer.

title: Corn And Macaroni Casserole
ingredients: ['1 can whole kernel corn', '1 can creamed corn', '1 empty can filled with dry macaroni', '1/2 stick butter', 'Velveeta cheese']
directions: Put both cans of corn in a casserole dish; fill one can with dry macaroni and add the 1/2 stick of butter. Place chunks of Velveeta cheese in with the ingredients. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes. Stir occasionally to mix the cheese throughout. Makes a great dish for kids.

title: Grapefruit Bird Baskets
ingredients: ['1 grapefruit', '3/4 c. suet, softened', '1 c. bird seed', 'jute or string']
directions: This recipe is \ for the birds!\  Also makes a great gift for bird lovers and the kids can do this one.

title: Pizza Muffins
ingredients: ['English muffins', 'butter', 'tomato sauce', 'oregano', 'American cheese, grated', 'Parmesan cheese']
directions: Split English muffin in half. Butter and toast in broiler. Spread with tomato sauce, dash of oregano, American and Parmesan cheeses and toast under broiler until cheeses are melted. Easy and great for kids!!

title: Sherbet Ice Cream
ingredients: ['9 bottles orange Crush', '3 cans Eagle Brand milk']
directions: Mix very well and freeze. Great for the kids to help make and, of course, eat!

title: City Chicken
ingredients: ['2 lb. veal or pork, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes', '2/3 c. fine cracker crumbs', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. paprika', '3/4 tsp. poultry seasoning', '1/2 tsp. monosodium glutamate', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '2 Tbsp. milk', '3 Tbsp. shortening', '1 chicken bouillon cube']
directions: Thread veal or pork cubes onto short skewers. Combine crumbs and seasonings. Combine egg and milk. Dip meat in egg mixture, then in crumbs. Brown slowly on all sides in hot shortening. Dissolve bouillon cube in 1/2 cup boiling water. Add to meat, cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes. Uncover and bake 30 minutes.

title: Apple Pound Cake
ingredients: ['5 jumbo-sized eggs, separated', '1 cup buttermilk', '4 sticks butter, plus 1 tablespoon, for pan', '3 cups cake flour, plus 2 tablespoons, for pan', '1 Granny Smith apple, peeled, cored and diced into 1/8-inch pieces', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '2 1/2 cups sugar, divided', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon extract', '3 teaspoons baking powder', 'Special equipment: 10-inch Bundt cake pan']
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Let the eggs, milk and butter come to room temperature on the counter before beginning. (Butter goes on the counter last.) Butter the Bundt pan with 1 tablespoon of butter, then add 2 tablespoons of flour and shake and tap to coat the interior of the pan; set aside. Put the diced apples in a bowl with the cinnamon and lemon juice. In a large bowl or stand mixer add the butter and 2 cups of sugar and beat until smooth. Add the egg yolks, 1 at a time, and blend to completely incorporate before adding the next. The mixture will become very light in color. Add the buttermilk and the extracts and mix to combine. Stir in 3 cups of flour along with the baking powder and stir until incorporated. In a separate clean dry bowl, whisk egg whites until foamy, then add the remaining 1/2 cup of sugar and whisk until shiny and soft peaks form when removing the whisk from the whites. Gently fold this into the cake batter. Pour half of the batter into the prepared pan. Arrange the apples in the center of the ring all the way around, being sure they don't touch the outer or inner edge of the pan. Pour in the remaining batter and bake for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Remove the cake from the oven and cool completely. Put a large plate or cake plate on top of the pan, then holding both together, flip them so that the curved bottom of the Bundt pan is on the top and the plate is resting on a flat surface. Slowly remove the pan from the cake by lifting it straight up. Slice and serve.

title: Macadamia Nut Pie
ingredients: ['2 (2 1/2 oz.) jars Macadamia nuts', '1/3 c. flaked coconut', '1 unbaked 9-inch pie shell', '4 large eggs, lightly beaten', '1 c. light corn syrup', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1 1/2 Tbsp. cream of coconut', '1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped']
directions: Rinse nuts with hot water. Drain and pat dry with paper towels. Coarsely chop nuts; set aside. Press coconut into bottom and up sides of pastry shell; set aside. Combine eggs and next 4 ingredients; stir in nuts. Pour filling into prepared pastry shell. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 325\u00b0 and bake an additional 35 minutes or until set. Fold cream of coconut into whipped cream; serve whipped cream mixture with pie. Yield: One 9-inch pie.

title: Knox Blox Squares
ingredients: ['4 envelopes Knox unflavored gelatine', '3 (3 oz. each) pkg. flavored jello', '4 c. boiling water']
directions: Mix all together and put in a 9 x 12-inch pan and refrigerate. Cut into squares. Cover. Great for kids!

title: Edible Play Dough
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. corn syrup (I use white Karo)', '1 1/4 c. powdered sugar', '1 1/2 c. powdered milk']
directions: Mix ingredients to get a good consistency for modeling. Let kids create yummy sculptures, then gobble up! Great for kindergarten class, Sunday school class and grand kids. Protect table by covering with freezer paper, wax side up and let kids at it. Quick clean up, to!

title: Shoyu Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['24 chicken wings', '1 c. soy sauce', '1/3 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. oil', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1/2-inch fresh ginger root, crushed']
directions: Disjoint wings, discarding tips. Combine ingredients. Marinate at least 2 hours. Place wings in a single layer in a shallow baking dish. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 30 to 45 minutes. Best cooked just before serving. Great for feeding a bunch of hungry kids!

title: People Seed
ingredients: ['Cheerios', 'raisins', 'peanuts', 'small marshmallows', 'chocolate chips', 'Chinese noodles']
directions: Combine any amounts of the listed ingredients. Store in covered container. Kids love it! A great nursery school snack.

title: Venison Ragout
ingredients: ['2 lb. venison leg meat', '3/4 c. sliced carrots', '3/4 c. chopped celery', '4 chopped green onions', '1/2 tsp. marjoram', '1/8 tsp. ground pepper', '1 bay leaf, crushed', '2 1/2 c. water', '1 tsp. olive oil', '1 tsp. salt', 'flour', '3 tsp. butter', '1 c. beef bouillon']
directions: Place carrots, celery, onions, marjoram, pepper, bay leaf, water, olive oil and salt in a bowl. Cut meat into 3-inch strips 1-inch thick. Add to vegetable and spice mixture. Add more water if meat is not covered. Refrigerate, covered, for 5 hours. Remove meat; drain vegetables and reserve marinade. Roll meat in flour and brown in skillet. Brown vegetables in casserole dish. Boil marinade and bouillon for 1 minute. Add bouillon, marinade and meat to casserole dish; cover and bake for 2 hours at 325\u00b0. Add water if it boils dry.

title: Trustee Turner'S Tacos
ingredients: ['1 1/4 lb. ground beef', '1 large head lettuce', '1 large tomato', 'handful of diced onion', '1 doz. tortillas', '1 c. grated Cheddar cheese']
directions: Brown beef and onion; drain. Cut up lettuce and add diced tomato. In very hot oil, drop tortilla, using 2 forks. Turn tortilla over right away and fold in half. Remove from oil and drain on paper towel. Cook each tortilla individually.

title: J. T.'S Guacamole
ingredients: ['2 large, ripe avocados, peeled and mashed with fork', 'juice of 2 lemons', '3 cloves garlic, crushed with 1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 small onion, chopped finely', '1/2 large tomato, chopped', '5 or 6 drops hot sauce']
directions: Mix all ingredients together well. Serve with tortilla chips or as a condiment for Mexican dishes.

title: Peggy's Cottage Cheese Dill Bread Recipe
ingredients: ['2 Packages active dry yeast', '2 teaspoon sugar', '2 tbsp. chopped onion', '1 teaspoon baking pwdr', '2 tbsp. sugar', '4 1/2 c. all-purpose flour', '1/2 c. hot water', '2 c. creamed cottage cheese', '2 tbsp. dill weed', '2 teaspoon salt', '2 Large eggs']
directions: Sprinkle yeast on hot water. Stir till blended. Stir in 2 tsp. sugar. Set aside. Combine cottage cheese, onion, dill weed, baking pwdr, salt, 2 Tbsp. sugar and Large eggs. Mix thoroughly. Add in yeast mix and mix well. Add in flour to make a stiff dough. Knead on lightly floured surface till smooth and elastic. Place dough in greased bowl. Turn to bring greased side up. Cover and let rise in hot place (85) till double in size (1 to 1 1/2 hrs). Punch down. Turn out onto lightly floured surface. Knead a few times. Divide into 2 equal portions. Shape each portion into a loaf in well greased loaf pans 8x5x3. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 min. Remove from pans to rack. Brush tops with melted butter. 2 loaves.

title: Smothered Pierogies
ingredients: ['1/2 pound bulk Italian sausage', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 small green bell pepper, sliced', '1 small red bell pepper, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, drained', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/8 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/8 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch crushed red pepper flakes (optional)', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '20 ounces frozen pierogies', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '1/4 cup grated Romano cheese']
directions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the Italian sausage. Cook and stir until crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink. Drain and discard any excess grease, then remove the sausage from the skillet and place into a bowl. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in the skillet. Stir in the onion, green bell pepper, and red bell pepper; cook and stir until the onion is golden, and the peppers are tender, about 8 minutes. Stir in the garlic and mushrooms; cook for 1 minute more. Season with parsley, garlic powder, oregano, basil, and red pepper flakes. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Stir to combine, then scrape the vegetables into the bowl with the sausage. Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Place the pierogies into the hot oil, and cook until golden brown on each side and hot in the center, about 5 minutes. Spoon the sausage and vegetable mixture over the pierogies. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese and Romano cheese. Cover, and cook until the cheese has melted.

title: Sopos
ingredients: ['12 corn tortillas', 'oil (to fry tortillas)', '3 c. refried beans', '3 large tomatoes, diced', '1/2 head lettuce, chopped', 'white cheese (Queso Blanco), crumbled', 'lemon (to squeeze on top)', 'salt to taste']
directions: Fry the beans until they are dry (no liquid). Set aside. Fry the corn tortillas flat until they are hard. Set aside. Take flat fried tortilla, put or spread beans on first. Next, add white cheese, tomato and lettuce. Squeeze lemon on top. Add salt to taste. This is now ready to eat. You can serve it with Mexican rice and top it with Pico de Gallo.

title: Salsa With Fresh Cilantro
ingredients: ['1/2 cup green house fresh cilantro leaves', '2 medium tomatoes chopped', '1 small green chile seeded and minced', '1/4 cup onion chopped', '1 clove garlic minced', '1/2 teaspoon wine vinegar']
directions: Mix all toether and serve with tortilla chips or mexican foods.

title: Lemon Bread
ingredients: ['1/4 c. margarine or butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '2 eggs', '1/2 c. milk', 'rind of lemon grated', '1 1/2 c. flour', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. baking powder', '1/2 c. walnuts, chopped']
directions: Mix butter or margarine and sugar. Add the 2 eggs and beat. Add milk, lemon rind, flour, salt, baking powder and nuts. Put in 1 large or 2 small bread pans. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Mix juice of one lemon and 1/2 cup sugar. When done poke holes in bread and pour lemon/sugar mixture over the top.

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ['lettuce', 'tomato', 'tortilla chips', 'chili beans', 'grated Cheddar cheese', 'sour cream', 'picante sauce']
directions: On plate, layer lettuce, tomato, tortilla chips, chili and grated cheese in that order. Serve with sour cream and picante sauce.

title: Divine Turkey Tortilla Club Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '3 tortillas', '200 grams turkey', '1 tomato', '1 iceberg lettuce', '4 strips of bacon', '2 slices of cheese', '1 tablespoon Sriracha', '11/2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil']
directions: Boil 1 egg (approx. 7 minutes for a hard boiled egg) Slice the egg in small strips Slice the tomato in small strips Combine 1 tbsp of Sriracha and 11/2 tbsp of mayonnaise Put some vegetable oil in a skillet and pan fry the turkey. Add some spices to your like e.g. paprika powder or garlic powder Pan fry the bacon and let it drain on a paper towel Fry the egg and set aside on a plate Warm all the tortillas in a medium to hot pan. Do not use any baking product Plate up the first tortilla club sandwich Start with a tortilla, lettuce then the turkey, salsa then another tortilla more lettuce, cheese, bacon, tomato, salsa and the fried egg The final tortilla cut a hole in the tortilla and add it on top. Put a bamboo skewer in the club sandwich to hold it together Plate up the second tortilla club sandwich Start with a tortilla, lettuce then the turkey, salsa then another tortilla more lettuce, cheese, bacon, tomato, salsa and slices of egg and the final tortilla Now put two bamboo skewers in the tortilla so you can cut it in half. Then add two more skewers so you can again cut the halfs of the club sandwich in half

title: Frozen Peanut Butter Torte
ingredients: ['1/2 cup all-purpose flour', '1/3 cup quick-cooking oats', '1/4 cup sugar', '1/4 cup butter, softened', '1/4 teaspoon baking soda', '1/2 cup crunchy peanut butter', '1/3 cup light corn syrup', '2 tablespoons honey', '1/2 gallon vanilla ice cream, softened', '3/4 cup chopped salted peanuts']
directions: Combine the first five ingredients; mix well. Pat into a greased 9-in. square baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15-17 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool to room temperature. Combine the peanut butter, corn syrup and honey; carefully spread half over crust. Spread with half the ice cream. Drop remaining peanut butter mixture over ice cream. Sprinkle with half the nuts. Top with remaining ice cream and nuts. Freeze until firm, 3-4 hours. Let stand 5-10 minutes before serving.

title: Guacamole Dip
ingredients: ['2 medium avocados, peeled and mashed', '1 medium tomato, peeled and finely chopped', '1 small onion, minced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon olive oil', 'Leaf lettuce', 'Tomato wedges']
directions: Combine first 6 ingredients; mix well. Cover, and chill thoroughly. Arrange on lettuce leaves, and garnish with tomato wedges. Serve with tortilla chips.

title: Layered Taco Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground chuck beef', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 medium onion, chopped (about 1/2 c.)', '2 Tbsp. diced green chilies', '1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce', '1 (1 1/4 oz.) pkg. taco seasoning mix', '1/2 c. water', '2 eggs', '1 c. dairy half and half', '1 (6 oz.) pkg. corn chips', '8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, shredded or sliced']
directions: With the exception of lettuce, this casserole has the texture and flavor of Mexican tacos.

title: Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: ['1 box seasoned croutons', '16 oz. canned mushrooms', '2 Tbsp. flour', '1 c. sour cream', '1 c. milk', '1 pkg. shredded cheddar cheese']
directions: Saute mushrooms with butter and garlic salt. Line casserole dish with half the croutons. Mix together in a bowl the flour, sour cream, milk, and mushrooms. Pour this mixture on the croutons. Pour remaining croutons on top of mushroom mixture. Top with cheese. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes, or microwave for 8 minutes.

title: Guacamole
ingredients: ['1 large avocado', '1 medium tomato, chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', 'salt or garlic salt', '1 Tbsp. red crushed pepper or 1 hot pepper', '2 Tbsp. lemon juice']
directions: Peel and chop the avocado. Add the tomato, onion and pepper. Mix well and add the lemon juice and salt to taste. Serve with Mexican food or eat with tortilla chips.

title: Mexican Dip
ingredients: ['1 (8 oz.) bar cream cheese, softened', '1 large jar salsa', '1 head lettuce, shredded', '4 large tomatoes, cut in small chunks', '4 to 5 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, shredded', '1 bag tortilla chips']
directions: Spread cream cheese on large round tray. Pour salsa over cream cheese; spread shredded lettuce on salsa. Pour tomatoes on lettuce. Top everything with shredded lettuce. Use tortilla chips to scoop up Mexican dip and enjoy.

title: Mexican Nacho Dip
ingredients: ['2 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese', '1 pkg. dry taco mix', 'mild or hot Mexican salsa', '1 onion, chopped', 'shredded lettuce', '1 chopped tomato', 'sliced black olives', 'shredded Cheddar cheese', 'nacho chips']
directions: Mix together cream cheese with dry taco mix. Spread on the bottom of large serving platter. Then spread 2 or 3 tablespoons of Mexican salsa on top. Layer chopped onion, shredded lettuce, chopped tomato and shredded Cheddar cheese. Top with sliced black olives. Serve with nacho chips.

title: Summer Salsa
ingredients: ['4 large ripe tomatoes, skinned and chopped', '1 large red onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (4 oz.) cans peeled green chilies, chopped', '1 lime, juiced', '2 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: Combine all ingredients and enjoy with tortilla chips or use in your favorite Mexican recipe. Store in refrigerator.

title: Instant Paroni Tortilas
ingredients: ['Packet peproni', 'Packet tortila', '12 tablespoons hummus', '12 tablespoons jalapenos fine chopp', '6 tablespoons gherkin fine slice', '6 tablespoons cream chese', '12 tablespoons chilli garlic']
directions:
take tortilla
spread hummus
place ice burg or lettuce put tortilla on top add gherkin,jalapenos,tomato.
pour cream cheese and chilli garlic fold it,
serve. you can grill tortilla on top.

title: Ground Beef Taco Casserole
ingredients: ['1 lb ground beef', '1 -2 cup cooked rice (more or less, to taste, ie more rice makes it less spicy)', '1 1/4 ounces taco seasoning', '10 1/2 ounces cheddar cheese soup', '14 ounces diced tomatoes', '8 3/4 ounces kernel corn', '8 -10 ounces tortilla chips', '1 -2 cup taco-seasoned cheddar cheese (to taste)']
directions: Brown ground beef, adding Taco seasoning when nearly browned with juice from tomato can, I leave in the fat from the burger, drain of you like before adding the seasoning. Add tomatoes, cheese soup, and corn. Meanwhile, crush the bag of tortilla chips, using more or less of the bag to line the bottom of your casserole dish. Pour the heated beef mix on top and bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes, adding shredded cheese to top for 5 minutes or so. Serve with whatever you like to accompany mexican dishes - sour cream, fresh tomatoes, lettuce, salsa, etc.

title: Turkey Wraps
ingredients: ['4 large flour tortillas', '1 small head romaine lettuce, washed and patted dry', '3/4 pound sliced turkey breast', '2 tomatoes, thinly sliced', '2 Kirby cucumbers, cut into spears', '1/2 cup store-bought pesto']
directions: In the center of each tortilla, layer some lettuce, turkey, tomato, and cucumber. Spread the pesto over the top and roll like a burrito.

title: Southwest Chicken Wraps
ingredients: ['16 pieces frozen popcorn chicken', '2 tablespoons ranch dressing', '2 tablespoons picante sauce', '2 flour tortillas', '1/4 cup shredded lettuce', '1/4 cup chopped tomato', '1/4 cup Mexican blend cheese, shredded']
directions: Prepare chicken as directed on package. Meanwhile, spread 1 tbs each ranch and picante over each tortilla. Place chicken down center of each tortilla, layer with lettuce, tomato and cheese. Roll up tortillas.

title: Vegetarian Tostada
ingredients: ['1 large whole wheat tortilla', '1 cup fat-free canned refried beans', '1/2 cup Spanish-style rice, cooked', '1/2 cup tomato, diced', '3 tablespoons red onion, diced', '2 cups iceberg lettuce, shredded', '2 tablespoons low-fat sour cream', '3 tablespoons salsa']
directions: 1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. 2. Spray tortilla with corn oil spray and brown tortilla for several minutes until crisp. 3. Meanwhile, heat beans in a small saucepan. 4. Remove tortilla and layer with beans, rice, tomato, onion, lettuce, sour cream, and salsa.

title: Turkey Wraps
ingredients: ['1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese with chives', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '6 (8 inch) whole wheat tortillas', '1 1/2 cups finely shredded iceberg lettuce', '12 slices thinly sliced deli turkey', '3/4 cup shredded Swiss cheese', '1 large tomato, seeded and diced', '1 large avocado, sliced', '6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled']
directions: Mix together the cream cheese and Dijon mustard until smooth. Spread each tortilla with about 2 tablespoons of the cream cheese mixture, spreading to within 1/4 inch of the edge of the tortillas. Arrange about 1/4 cup of shredded lettuce on each tortilla, and press the lettuce down into the cream cheese mixture. Place 2 turkey slices per tortilla over the lettuce, and sprinkle with 2 tablespoons of shredded Swiss cheese. Top each tortilla evenly with tomato, avocado slices, and crumbled bacon. Roll each tortilla up tightly, and cut in half across the middle with a slightly diagonal cut.

title: Cincinnati Chili
ingredients: ['1 qt. water', '2 lb. ground beef', '2 medium onions, grated', '2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce', '5 whole allspice', '1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper', '1 tsp. ground cumin', '4 Tbsp. chili powder', '1/2 oz. unsweetened baking chocolate or 1 1/2 Tbsp. unsweetened cocoa', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 Tbsp. cider vinegar', '1 large bay leaf', '5 whole cloves', '2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. cinnamon', '2 cans chili beans, drained']
directions: Add beef to water in a 4-quart pot. Stir until beef separates into a fine texture. Boil slowly for 30 minutes. Add remaining ingredients. Stir to blend and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 3 hours. Serve with bowls of cooked spaghetti, chopped raw onions and grated cheese. Chili can be refrigerated overnight so that the fat can be lifted off before reheating.

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ['1 onion', '4 tomatoes', '1 head lettuce', '1 large avocado', '1 lb. ground beef', '1/4 tsp. salt', '4 oz. grated Cheddar cheese', '8 oz. Thousand Island or French dressing', '1 medium bag tortilla chips, crushed', '1 (15 oz.) can kidney beans']
directions: Chop onion, tomato and lettuce. Toss with cheese and dressing. Add crushed tortilla chips. Slice and add 1 large avocado. Brown ground beef, add drained kidney beans and salt; simmer for 10 minutes and add to cold salad. Decorate with tortilla chips, avocado and tomato slices.

title: Norwegian Flat Bread
ingredients: ['2 c. corn meal', '2 c. white flour', '2 level Tbsp. lard']
directions: Mix all together and add enough cold water to hold together like a pie crust. Roll out very thin with grooved rolling pin and bake slowly on ungreased griddle or in a moderate oven, 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0. Watch closely. When it begins to get a light golden color, turn and bake on other side. Let dry out completely before putting into a container. Keep in a dry place.

title: Old Time Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 large fryer, boiled and boned (save broth)', '2 c. plain flour', '1 c. broth', '1/2 tsp. pepper', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: Cook beef roast until \ falling apart.\  When roast is half done, add 1 bottle of hot or medium picante sauce and let cook into the meat. Remove from stove and shred into tiny pieces. Place approximately 1/2 beef mixture or more if tortillas are extra large; add more picante sauce to taste. Sprinkle heavily with shredded Mexican style cheese (usually a mixture of Monterey Jack, Colby, Cheddar or other hard yellow cheese). Begin with one side and fold tortilla into an envelope; deep-fry until tortilla is brown. This will melt the cheese inside. Serve with salad, chopped lettuce and tomato and other Mexican compliments.

title: Taco Salad
ingredients: ['3/4 pound ground round', '1 cup chopped onion', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic (about 1 clove)', '1 teaspoon salt-free Mexican seasoning', '1 (10-ounce) can enchilada sauce', '1 (8-ounce) can no-salt-added whole-kernel corn, drained', '8 cups slivered iceberg lettuce', '1 1/2 cups chopped tomato (about 2 medium)', '3/4 cup coarsely crushed no-oil baked tortilla chips']
directions: Cook beef, onion, and garlic in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat until browned, stirring until beef crumbles; drain. Add Mexican seasoning to beef mixture in skillet; cook 1 minute. Stir in enchilada sauce and corn. Reduce heat to low, and simmer, uncovered, 5 minutes. Arrange lettuce on 4 individual salad plates. Spoon beef mixture evenly over lettuce; top with tomato and chips.

title: Tallerine
ingredients: ['1 lb. ground beef', '1 lb. pork sausage', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cans tomato soup', '1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste', '1/2 tsp. chili powder', '1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn', '1 small jar chopped olives', 'mushrooms (optional)', '1 box shell macaroni, cooked', '1/2 lb. grated cheese']
directions: Brown ground beef, sausage, onion, bell pepper, salt, pepper and chili powder in large pan such as a Dutch oven. Add rest of ingredients, except cheese; mix well. Add cheese and simmer until cheese is melted. This makes a large amount and it freezes well. Just thaw and reheat. Bake at 350\u00b0 until cheese melts or appears bubbly.

title: Lo Cal Florentine Recipe
ingredients: ['1 pound chicken breasts, skinned, boned', '3/4 c. chicken broth', '2 tbsp. dry white wine', '1 pound spinach', '2 teaspoon cornstarch', '3 ounce. neufchatel cheese, cut up', 'Lemon juice']
directions: Simmer breasts in broth and wine, very slowly for 45 min. Remove to heated platter and cover loosely. Cook spinach. While cooking add in cornstarch to broth and thickens slightly. Add in cheese, stir till cheese is blended. Turn off heat. On a platter arrange a bed of rice, then spinach, next chicken and then cover with sauce.

title: Bally'S Casino Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 lb French bread, stale', '1/2 cup raisins', '5 eggs', '6 cups milk', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', 'SAUCE', '1 1/2 cups butter, unsalted', '1 cup sugar', '2/3 cup light brown sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 cup Bourbon', '1/2 cup heavy whipping cream']
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Tear bread into 2-inch pieces and place in 9-by-13-inch baking dish. Add raisins; set aside. In large mixing bowl, beat eggs with wire whip until well blended. Stir in milk, sugar and vanilla. Pour over torn bread and push bread down with fingers until saturated. Let soak for 3 minutes. Place pudding pan in larger pan, then fill larger pan with about one inch of hot water (to come halfway up sides of pudding pan). Bake for 65 minutes. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan melt butter on medium heat (do not boil). Add both sugars and beat with wire whip until creamy. Remove pot from heat and beat in whipping cream and salt. Add bourbon and beat thoroughly. You may pour the sauce over the entire bread pudding or over individual servings.

title: Taco Dip
ingredients: ['16 oz. cottage cheese', '8 oz. cream cheese', '1 pkg. taco seasoning', '1 c. chopped lettuce and tomatoes', 'Mexican cheese']
directions: Soften and mix ingredients (except Mexican cheese, chopped lettuce and tomatoes) together. Put in dish and top with grated Mexican cheese and chopped lettuce and tomatoes. Serve with taco chips.

title: Yummy Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. cocoa', '1/2 c. milk', '1/4 c. oleo', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '2 tsp. vanilla', '3 c. quick oatmeal']
directions: Mix sugar, cocoa, milk and oleo in a saucepan. Bring to a rolling boil. Remove from heat. Add peanut butter and vanilla. Quickly add oatmeal and stir while still hot. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper and cool.

title: Jean'S Taco Salad
ingredients: ['2 pkg. cream cheese (1 light and 1 regular)', '8 oz. taco sauce (mild or medium)', '8 oz. shredded Mexican cheese', '8 oz. shredded taco cheese', 'lettuce (iceberg or Boston or mix platter)', '3 tomatoes', '3 tsp. milk', '1 bag tortilla chips']
directions: Beat together cream cheese with milk. Smear on bottom of a good size platter. Cover with taco sauce. Chop tomatoes very fine; squeeze excess juice from tomatoes. Spread tomatoes on top of salsa. Spread all of taco cheese, then sprinkle the Velveeta Mexican shredded cheese. Mix evenly. Shred lettuce on top 1/4 inch thick. Serve with tortilla chips.

title: "Mexican Breakfast"
ingredients: ['6 eggs', 'dried onion bits', 'flour tortillas', 'tomato', 'Bacon Bits', 'ham chucks', '1 green pepper', 'lettuce', 'cheese, grated']
directions: Scramble eggs along with the rest of ingredients. Roll scrambled eggs in flour tortilla and top with lettuce, tomato and cheese.

title: Southwest Chicken Wraps
ingredients: ['16 pieces frozen popcorn chicken', '2 tablespoons prepared ranch salad dressing', '2 tablespoons picante sauce', '2 flour tortillas (10 inches), warmed', '1/4 cup shredded lettuce', '1/4 cup chopped tomato', '1/4 cup shredded Mexican cheese blend']
directions: Prepare chicken according to package directions. Meanwhile, spread 1 tablespoon each salad dressing and picante sauce over each tortilla. Place chicken down the center of each tortilla. Layer with lettuce, tomato and cheese. Roll up tortillas.

title: Pepper-Crusted Lamb With Mint Yogurt
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons whole black peppercorns', '2 tablespoons white peppercorns whole', '12 lamb cutlets trimmed', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '3/4 cup plain greek yogurt', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '2 tablespoons mint finely chopped', 'mixed salad greens to serve', 'lime quarters, to serve']
directions: Using a mortar and pestle, pound the peppercorns until finely crushed, then spread them over a large flat plate. Preheat a grill pan over a high heat. Brush the lamb with half the oil, season to taste and place on the griddle. Cook for 2 mins each side, or until seared. Press the lamb into the pepper to lightly coat, then return the lamb to the pan. Cook for 1 min each side for medium, or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil and leave to rest for 5 mins. Whisk the yogurt, juice, mint and remaining oil in a bowl. Place the lamb on serving plates. Serve with yogurt dip, mixed salad and lime quarters.

title: Kosheri
ingredients: ['4 tbsp olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 hot red chillies, seeded and diced', '8 ripe tomatoes, chopped (tinned are fine)', '370ml water', '4 tbsp cider vinegar', '3 tsp salt', '2 tsp ground cumin', '20g coriander leaves. chopped', '300g green lentils', '200g basmati rice', '40g unsalted butter', '50g vermicelli noodles, broken into 4cm pieces', '400ml chicken stock or water', '1/2 tsp grated nutmeg', '1/2 tsp ground cinnamon', '1 1/2 tsp salt', '1/2 tsp black pepper', '4 tbsp olive oil', '2 onions, halved and thinly sliced']
directions: First make the sauce. Heat the oil in a pan, add the garlic and chilli, and fry for two minutes. Add the tomatoes, water, vinegar, salt and cumin, bring to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 20 minutes, until slightly thickened. Remove from the heat, stir in the coriander and taste - add salt, pepper or coriander as required. Keep hot or leave to cool (just remember to adjust the seasoning once it's cold).  To make the kosheri, put the lentils in a large sieve and wash them under the cold tap. Transfer to a large saucepan, cover with cold water and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 25 minutes - the lentils should be tender but far from mushy. Drain in a colander and set aside.  ln a large bowl, cover the rice with cold water, wash and drain. Melt the butter in a large pan over a medium heat. Add the vermicelli, stir, and continue frying and stirring until they turn golden brown. Add the rice and stir to coat in the butter. Add the stock, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt and pepper, bring to a boil, cover, reduce the heat to its lowest setting and simmer for 12 minutes. Turn off the heat, remove the lid, cover with a clean tea towel and put the lid back on. Leave for about five minutes - this helps make the rice light and fluffy.  Heat the oil in a large frying pan and saute the onions over medium heat for about 20 minutes, until dark brown. Drain on kitchen paper. Gently break up the rice with a fork and add the lentils and most of the onions, reserving a few for garnish. Taste, adjust for seasoning and pile high on a platter. Top with the reserved onions and serve hot, with the sauce.

title: Microwave Italian Chicken
ingredients: ['4 boneless skinned chicken breasts', '1 egg, beaten', '3/4 c. Italian bread crumbs', '1/4 c. Parmesan cheese', '1 jar spaghetti sauce (large)', '1 c. Mozzarella cheese, grated', '1 Tbsp. vegetable oil']
directions: Dip chicken breasts in egg, then roll in bread crumbs/Parmesan cheese mixture. Place in microwave-safe baking dish with 1 tablespoon oil. Cook on High for 2 minutes each side.

title: Roasted Tomatoes With Feta
ingredients: ['9 oz vine-ripened cherry tomatoes, snipped into 4 small bunches', '6 tbsp olive oil', '2 tbsp sugar', '1/3 cup balsamic vinegar', '2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '2 stems rosemary', '1 tbsp finely grated lemon peel', '2 tbsp lemon juice', '1 can (4 oz) sliced black olives, drained and chopped', '2 tbsp drained capers', '7 oz feta, thickly sliced', 'None None Baby arugula leaves, to serve']
directions: Preheat the oven to 300\u00b0F. Place tomatoes in a roasting pan. Mix 3 tbsp of the oil with sugar, vinegar and garlic in a small bowl. Drizzle on the tomatoes. Top with rosemary. Roast 20 mins or until tomatoes split. Mix remaining 3 tbsp oil with lemon peel and juice, olives and capers in a large bowl. Stir in 1/2 cup of the tomato juices from pan. Season with salt and pepper. To serve, place feta and arugula on serving plates. Top with tomatoes. Drizzle with dressing.

title: Mexican Chip Dip
ingredients: ['1 can Old El Paso beans', '1 c. salsa (mild, medium or hot)', '1 medium tomato', '1 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded', '1 (8 oz.) sour cream', '1 medium red onion, chopped', '2 c. lettuce, chopped']
directions: Spread beans on a small platter. Layer sour cream, then onions. Sprinkle with chopped tomato, lettuce, cheese and salsa. Serve with tortilla chips.

title: Taco Pizza
ingredients: ['1 (12-inch) frozen pizza crust', '1 (8-inch) can tomato sauce', '1 Tbsp. Mexican or taco seasoning', '3/4 lb. lean ground beef', '1 can green chili pepper, rinsed, seeded and chopped', '1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 c. shredded lettuce', '1 medium tomato, chopped', '1/4 c. corn chips, crumbled']
directions: Preheat oven to 425\u00b0. Put pizza crust on pan or baking sheet. Mix tomato sauce and Mexican seasoning. Spread over crust. Dot with beef. Sprinkle with chili pepper and cheese. Bake in a 425\u00b0 oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until meat is cooked and cheese is melted. Sprinkle with lettuce, tomato and corn chips. Serves 4.

title: Black Bean Salsa
ingredients: ['1 (15 oz.) can black beans, drained', '1 (10 oz.) can Niblets corn, drained', '1 red bell pepper, chopped', '1 green bell pepper, chopped', '1/2 purple onion, chopped', '1 to 2 jalapenos, chopped', '1/3 c. lime juice', '1/3 c. olive oil', '1/3 c. cilantro (optional)', '1 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. lemon pepper', '1/2 tsp. red pepper', '1/2 tsp. cumin']
directions: Combine all ingredients and refrigerate. Serve with tortilla chips or on fajitas as a salsa. May also be served over lettuce as a Mexican salad.

title: Mexican Salad
ingredients: ['4 c. chopped lettuce', '1/2 c. chopped green onions', '1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese', 'crushed tortilla chips', '1 c. chopped tomatoes', '1 can sliced pitted olives', '1 can Ranch-style beans', '1 1/2 lb. hamburger', '1 c. Ranch dressing']
directions: Layer lettuce, tomato, onions, olives, beans, cheese, meat and dressing. Refrigerate. Top with crushed tortilla chips and toss lightly just before serving.

title: Mom's Gold Brownies
ingredients: ['2 cups firmly packed graham cracker crumbs (18 crackers)', '6 ounces chocolate pieces', '12 cup coarsely chopped nutmeats', '1 cup flaked coconut', '1 (15 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk']
directions: Mix together all ingredients except condensed milk. Gradually blend in condensed milk. Grease a square pan. Line bottom with wax paper. Grease again. Bake at 350 degrees Fahrenheit until top is golden brown. Remove from oven. Allow to remain in pan 10 minutes. Turn out from pan; remove waxed paper. While still warm cut into squares. Cool.

title: Layered Nacho Dip
ingredients: ['1 (16 oz.) can refried beans', '1/2 (1.25 oz.) pkg. taco seasoning mix', '1 (6 oz.) carton avocado mix', '1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream', '1 (4 1/2 oz.) can chopped ripe olives', '2 large tomatoes, diced', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies', 'shredded lettuce', 'salsa']
directions: Combine beans and seasoning mix. Spread evenly in large dish. Layer remaining ingredients, except tomatoes, lettuce and salsa. Top dip with shredded lettuce, tomato and drizzle salsa over top. Serve chilled with tortilla chips.

title: Caffe Di Cioccolata Recipe
ingredients: ['1/4 c. Instant espresso', '1/4 c. Instant cocoa', '2 c. Boiling water']
directions: Whipped cream Finely shredded orange peel or possibly grnd cinnamon Combine coffee and cocoa. Add in boiling water and stir to dissolve. Pour into demitasse c.. Top each serving with whipped cream and shredded orange peel. Serves 6 to 7.

title: Hot Quesadillas
ingredients: ['flour tortillas', 'Cheddar cheese, shredded or Monterey Jack or both', 'green onion, chopped', 'salsa']
directions: Sprinkle ingredients on 1 flour tortilla and cover with another tortilla. Place in microwave or conventional oven until the cheese melts. Cut the quesadilla into quarters. May be served with lettuce, tomato, sour cream or guacamole.

title: Sausage Balls
ingredients: ['1 lb. mild sausage, room temperature', '3 c. Bisquick', '8 oz. cheddar cheese, grated']
directions: Mix it all together with hands. Roll into 1-inch balls. Place on baking sheet. Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Bake 10-15 minutes or until brown.

title: Gringo Dip
ingredients: ['2 packages of cream cheese', 'Large jar of salsa (spicieness to your liking)', '1 small package shredded lettuce', '2 medium tomatoes', '1 can of sliced black olives', '1 package of shredded mexican blend cheese', '1 bag of tortilla chips']
